44009043	Petelo wadzakala biluumbu byalaka ku Yope , ku nzo Simoni waba musari mukaanda ngoombo .
44010001	Ku Kayisareya , kwaba muutu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Kornelyo ; nde waba mukuutu mukaangu wa nkama bayongolo , yibateele " Italiko " .
44010002	Nde waba munsaambiri wamakwa , waba se na kibvumi kya Nzaambi , kaanda dyaandi se dyodinso . Nde waba haana lubakusu kwalaka kuri baatu , na waba saambilaana Nzaambi mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu .
44010003	Nde wamono mbasi Nzaambi , mu mamono-miisu kwa bu kyensekelee , kampe kyaba kilookolo kyawa kya mwiini . Mbasi Nzaambi yakoto mu nzo yaandi na yamuteele mbila : " Kornelyo " .
44010004	Nde watala yo kisoosi tumi na boomo bwobunso , nde waleele ti : " Bi nki Mfumu ? " Mbasi yaleele ti : " Nsaambulu dzaaku na lubakusu lwaaku bitoombokirye bunu kikabu ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
44010005	Na mu lumalu heeke baatu ku Yope na tumisa Simoni wubateelaa Petelo ;
44010006	Nde wuri ku nzo musari mukaanda ngoombo , wuri mu nzo yiri ku simu dya mubu . "
44010007	Mbasi yaba dzoonso na nde , bu yabvutuka , nde wateele boolo mu bisari byaandi na muyongolo mosi wakwiikama mu bakaangama na nde ,
44010008	na bu kabaangula myominso kuri bo , nde wabaheeke ku Yope .
44010009	Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo , bu baba bakiri mu nzila na baba kwekokosolo na bvula , Petelo wanwaata ku yulu nzo mu kusaambila mu kilookolo kyabisaamunu .
44010010	Nde wakolo nzala na waba tiiri kudya . Bu bari mu kumulambukila byandya , nde wamono mamono-miisu ,
44010011	nde wamono yulu dyadzibula na kitotolo kimosi , bunu nsaanda yayinene yaleleke mu manto mo mana , kyasunduka ha butoto ,
44010012	munsa yo mwaba bibulu bya makaanda , banyoko ba butoto na banoni ba yulu .
44010013	Mbeembu mosi yayukukuna kuri nde ti : " Teleme , Petelo , dzusa na dya . "
44010014	Petelo waleele ti : " Ti bele pe , Mfumu , bukuri me nyadyaanaa ti kimosi kyasumuka na kyamviindu ko . "
44010015	Mbeembu yayukukuna lwadzoolo kuri nde ti : " Bibyo biri Nzaambi mwaatsyeemese , ye wuri ndeelele ko ti byasumuka . "
44010016	Bubwo bwamonoko mbala tatu , na hanaho , kitotolo kikyo kyatoombulu ku yulu .
44010017	Petelo , mu nde-meene madyeele mamuwa mu mamono-miisu mamo , nki matiiri kuleele ; mono baatu baheekiri Kornelyo , bafuulaa nzo Simoni , bateleme ha mweelu ,
44010018	bateele na basaka kuyaaba , mbuti Simoni wubateelaa Petelo haho kakoodzakalaa .
44010019	Petelo , bu kari mu kwetsima mu ntoono ya mamono-miisu , Mpeeve yileeriri kuri [ nde ] ti : " Mono , baatu batatu basaka ye .
44010020	Ngo , teleme , sunduka na yende na bo kwahele maketi-keti , bukuri me nyibaheekirye .
44010021	Petelo bu kasunduka , waleele kuri baatu babo ti : " Me ngo muutu wunde wu luri mu kwesaka . Nkya ntoono yilutweesi kuri ? "
44010022	Bo baleele « Kornelyo wuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo , muutu wasuunguma na wuri na kibvumi kya Nzaambi , kaanda dyodinso dya Bayudayo bamuteelaa kimbaangi kyakibwete , mbasi yangisi yimulubiryee mu kutumisa ye ku nzo yaandi , na kuyuka maampu ma ye . »
44010023	Petelo wabakotoso mu nzo , na nde wabadzakasa . Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo , bu kateleme , wayende na bo , kintwaari na bampaangi ba ku Yope .
44010024	Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kikyo , nde wakoto ku Kayisareya . Kornelyo waba bakiingilaana , wateele kaanda dyaandi , na banduku baandi ba mutima .
44010025	Petelo bu kaba mu kukoto mu nzo , Kornelyo wayende mu kumubwaana , wabwa ha miilu mya Petelo , wamutsukumina .
44010026	Petelo wamutelemese na wamuleele ti : " Teleme , me se muutu nyiri "
44010027	Bu kadzoonso na nde , wakoto mu nzo , na wamono baatu balaka bakutukina .
44010028	Nde waleele kuri bo ti : " Beenu luyaari ti diri dyadiku kuri Muyudayo mu kukaangama bunu pe mu kukokosolo na wunde wahele Muyudayo ; ngo kasi Nzaambi soongiri me ti yaa ndeele kuri muutu ko ti wasumuka bunu pe wuri mviindu .
44010029	Mu bubwo me nyiisiri kwahele kukalikisa , na ntiiri kuyaaba mu nki ntoono beenu lutumusinyee me ? "
44010030	Kornelyo waleele ti : " Kuholosono kiluumbu kyabina ki natee kilookolo ki kyawa , lo me nyiri mu lusaambulu mu nzo yaami , na mono muutu mosi wateleme ha busu bwa me mu binkuta biseme ,
44010031	nde ti : " Kornelyo , lusaambulu lwa ye luyukukini mu yulu , Na Nzaambi babukiri mwooyo mu bikabu bi koohaanaa ye kuri bawelu .
44010032	Heeke baatu ku Yope mpisi tumisa Simoni wubateelaa Petelo . Nde wadzakala ku nzo Simoni musari mukaanda ngoombo wuri ku simu dya mubu .
44010033	Hanaho me mpeekiri baatu kuri ye , na ye yirikiri bwabubwe bu wiisiri . Mu lumalu beetu bobanso turi ha busu bwa Nzaambi mu kuyuka momanso ma kusikiryee Mfumu mu kudzoonso . "
44010034	Petelo bu kadzibula munwa waleele ti : " Mu ngwanwa me mbakiri ti Nzaambi wahele na nsobokoso mu baatu ,
44010035	ngo mu mpisi kaanda , wunde wumubvumina na wusalila nsungumunu , lo wabweeye kuri nde .
44010036	Nde waheeke maampu maandi kuri baala ba Isaheli , mu kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa kiyeengi mu Yesu Kiristo , nde wuri Mfumu ya bobanso .
44010037	Beenu luyaari maampu mayirimini mu Yudaya dyodinso , kubaandika ku Ngalili ha mambisa ma mbotokulu ya yaabisiri Yowane .
44010038	Dyaburi Nzaambi kalwiikirye Yesu wa ku Nadzareti Mpeeve Yangisi na mu mpinu . Nde wabee kwelutaana mu kweyirika mamabwe na kwetsinikisa bobanso babeeri kunsa nkwamusunu dza dyabulu , bukuri Nzaambi wabeeri na nde .
44010039	Na beetu turi bambaangi mu myominso mi kayirika mu nkoonsi ya Bayudayo na [ ku ] Yerusalemi . Nde bamudzusiri mu kumumanika ha muti .
44010040	Ngo Nzaambi wamufulukisa [ mu ] kiluumbu kyabitatu na wamuha miswa mu kwemonokono ,
44010041	ngo kari kuri baatu bobanso ko , ngo kasi kuri beetu , bambaangi bari Nzaambi watekisiri kusoolo , beetu twadiiri na twanwiini kintwaari na nde , ha mambisa ma mfulukulu yaandi mu bafwa ;
44010042	Nde watutuma mu kuyaabisa kuri kaanda na kutswiikisa ti Nzaambi nde kari kasa mutsuundisi bafwa na bamwooyo .
44010043	Babikiri bobanso bateele nde kimbaangi , mpisi wusa kanyi mu nde , sa kataambula mpemisi ya masumu mu nkuumbu yaandi . "
44010044	Petelo bu kaba wakiri mu kudzoonso , Mpeeve Yangisi yabwa ha yulu bobanso babayuka maampu .
44010045	Bayudayo basaa kanyi mu nteendulu bubakala bayisiri na Petelo bapamuka , Bukuri kikabu kya Mpeeve Yangisi se kyabwa ha yulu bangooyi .
44010046	Bo bayuka baba dzoonso mu mandiinga mahele kuyabakana , na badumusa Nzaambi . Haho Petelo kabangula mbeembu ti :
44010047	" Buri lo bakabikisi muutu kubotoko mu maampa , mu babo bamwaataambula Mpeeve Yangisi bunu beetu ? "
44010048	Nde wabaha miswa mu kutaambula mbotokulu mu nkuumbu Yesu Kiristo . Haho , bamuloombo mu kudzakala mwaa biluumbu na bo .
44011001	Bantumu na bampaangi bari ku Yudaya bayuka ti bangooyi se bataamburi maampu ma Nzaambi .
44011002	Ha toombokiri Petelo ku Yerusalemi , bateende bubakala bakalikisa na nde
44011003	baleele ti : " Ye wakotiri mu manzo ma baatu bahele kuteende bubakala na wadiiri kintwaari na bo ! "
44011004	Haho Petelo , bu kabaandika , wabasoongo bunu bwa yookiri misamu , waleele ti :
44011005	" Me nyaba ku bvula dya Yope , kunsa lusaambulu . Na nyabaka mamono-miisu , kitotolo kimosi kyasunduka , bunu nsaanda yayinene , yikwe sunduka mu manto mo mana , yatsingisa mu yulu , yatubuka natee ha nyaba me .
44011006	Bu nyaba tala , me nyamono bibulu bya miilu mina bya ha butoto , bya ku bitiiti , banyoko na banoni ba mayulu .
44011007	Me nyayuka mbeembu yaleele kuri me ti : " Teleme , Petelo , dzusa na dya .
44011008	Ngo me nyaleele ti : " Ka buba ko ! Mfumu , bukuri kyasumuka bunu pe kyabviimfuka ti kimosi kyakotiri mu munwa me ko .
44011009	Mbeembu , mu lwadzoolo , yayukukuna mu yulu ti : " Bi tsyeemisini Nzaambi , ye yaa hololo byo ti byasumuka
44011010	Mimyo myamonoko mbala tatu , na byobinso ha byeki kweendaa ku yulu .
44011011	Hanaho baatu batatu bantelemini ku nzo ku twaba ; bari Kayisareya babaheekiri kuri me .
44011012	Mpeeve yaleele kuri me ti , me nyeende kintwaari na bo , kwahele kusa maket-keti Bampaangi basaamunu , biisiri na me ha , bakoto mu nzo muutu wunde .
44011013	Nde watuyaabisa bunu bu kamwiini mbasi yateleme munsa dzo yaandi na yaleele ti : " Heeke baatu ku Yope , na tumisa Simoni wu bateelaa ti Petelo ,
44011014	nde wukuleele maampu , mu mo ye wubvuuka , ye na nzo yaaku yoyinso .
44011015	Me bu nyabaandika mu kudzoonso , Mpeeve Yangisi yabwa ha yulu bo , bunu bu yabwiiriri beetu kunu mbandukulu .
44011016	Me nyibaambuka mwooyo mu maampu ma Mfumu , bunu bu kaba leele : " Yowane wabotokiri mu maampa , ngo beenu sa lwaba lwabotoko mu Mpeeve Yangisi
44011017	Ngo mbuti Nzaambi heeri kuri bo kikabu kyokimosi na beetu twasa kanyi mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , lo buri me nyaketi kubangisina kuhaakula Nzaambi ?
44011018	Bo bu bayuka mamo , bawura na badumisa Nzaambi , baleele ti : " Na kuri bangooyi se Nzaambi heeri nyiingulu madyeele ma kidziingu .
44011019	Hango babo babatsyamikisa mu nwanusunu yanata lufwa lwa Estefano , bayookolo natee ku Foyiniki , ku Kiporo , na ku Antyoke , kwahele kuyikisa maampu kuri muutu , mbuti ka kunu ku Bayudayo .
44011020	Bunu bamosi mu bo , baba bari Kiporo na bari Kirene , bayisiri ku Antyoke bayikisa kuri Bahelene mu nyabusulu Musamu Wamubwete wu Mfumu Yesu .
44011021	Kooko kwa Mfumu kwaba na bo , na lutaangu lwa baatu balaka basiiri kanyi na basyeetukiri kuri Mfumu .
44011022	Musamu wayukukuna mu makutu ma badibuundu bari ku Yerusalemi . Bo baheeke Barnaba mu kuyookolo kukwo natee ku Antyoke .
44011023	Nde bu katubuka , wamoono bweese bwa Nzaambi , wakeembe na wasyaamisa bobanso mu mutima mosi , mu kukaangama mu Mfumu ,
44011024	bukuri nde waba muutu wamubwete , waluula mu Mpeeve Yangisi na mu kanyi . Na mpuumbu yalaka yabweeseme kuri Mfumu .
44011025	Barnaba wayende ku Taraso mu kwesaka Sawulo ,
44011026	na bu kamumono , nde wamunata ku Antyoke . Bo balutisa mubvu wamutsiina , mu kukutukunaa mu dibuundu , na mu kuyikisa mpuumbu yalaka . Ku Antyoke , mbala yatete bateele bayiki ti bakiristo .
44011027	Mu biluumbu bibyo babikiri basunduka ku Yerusalemi mu kweende ku Antyoke .
44011028	Angabo , mosi mu bo , bu kateleme , wayaabisa mu Mpeeve ti , sa kwaba nzala yayinene mu nsi yoyinso , na yamonoko mu ntaangu ya Kolodyo .
44011029	Bayiki bakaanga kitsimi , kya kuheeke , bunu buri lubaku lwa muutu-muutu , lubakusu kuri bampaangi badzakala ku nsi ya Yudaya .
44011030	Bubwo se basiiri , baheeke lubakusu kuri bakulu ba babakala mu myooko mya Barnaba bo na Sawulo .
44012001	Mu ntaangu yiyo , mbyaasi Erode wakwaata bamosi mu bari mu dibuundu , mu kubakwaamisa .
44012002	Nde wadzusa Yakobo , mpaangi Yowane , mu mbeesi yayila .
44012003	Bu kamono ti mimyo myaba myamibwe kuri Bayudayo , nde wakaanga kitsimi mu kusa Petelo mu boroko . Byaba biluumbu bya munkeembu wa mampa mahele lufunusu .
44012004	Nde wamukwaata na wamusoko mu boroko , na wamukebese kuri mampuumbu mana , ma bayongolo bana-bana , watya ti ha mambisa ma munkeembu wa Paaka , nde kamutsuundisa ha busu baatu .
44012005	Petelo waba mu boroko , ngo dibuundu dyasaambila Nzaambi mu makwa mu ntoono nde .
44012006	Erode watya kutsuundisa Petelo . Mu butsuku bubwo , Petelo wabwa tolo ha kakati dya bayongolo boolo , bamukaanga mu bikonyi bya biseengu ; ha mweelu boroko basuusiri bakebi boolo .
44012007	Mono , mbasi Mfumu yamonokono na buungi bwaluulusa nzo . Bu kamulata mu lubaansi , wasiimbila Petelo na wamuleele ti : " Teleme mu mawasu " , na bikonyi byasonoko mu myooko myaandi .
44012008	Mbasi yamuleele ti : " Lwaata musweele waaku , na masaapatu maaku , nde wasa bubwo ; mbasi yabweese kuleele kuri nde ti : " Teeteke kiyuungu kyaaku na nama me . "
44012009	Petelo bu kapala , wamunama wahele kuyaaba ti mari mu kweyirika mbasi mangwanwa ; nde waba kutsima ti mamono-miisu kari mu kumono .
44012010	Bu bataba kihekiri kyatete na kyabyoolo kya bakebi , batubuka ha mweelu wa biseengu wa kweende kunsa bvula . Mweelu nde-meene dzibumini mu bo , bu bapala , banamitina kweende mu nzila yomosi , na hanaho , mbasi yasasika na Petelo .
44012011	Petelo bu kabvutuka mu nde-meene , waleele ti : " Mu lumalu , me nyaari mu ngwanwa ti Mfumu heekirye mbasi yaandi , mu kutaandala me mu myooko mya Erode , na mu bubi bu bee bwataasila baatu ba Bayudayo . "
44012012	Bu kamana kubakula , nde wayende ku nzo Mariya , nguri Yowane , Yowane wuri nkuumbu se Malako , kwaba kwa kutukuna baatu balaka na ku baba saambilaana .
44012013	Bu kakomboto ha mweelu , kisari kya mukyeetu kiri nkuumbu Lode , kyakokosolo mu kuywiila ,
44012014	nde wayaabula ti yiyo mbeembu Petelo ; mu kiminu , nde wahele kudzibula mweelu , wabvutuka munsa nzo , mu kweyaabisa ti wukombotiri Petelo .
44012015	Bo baleele kuri nde ti : " Ye wa lawuka . " Nde wasika ti ngwanwa nde . Bo baleele ti : " Ngo lo mbasi yaandi . "
44012016	Petelo wanamitina mu kukomboto . Bu badzibula , bamumono na bapamuka .
44012017	Nde wabawurisa mu naangukunu kooko , nde wayaabisa [ kuri bo ] , dyaburi Mfumu kamupalisiri mu boroko , na waleele ti : " Yaabisee kuri Yakobo na bampaangi mamama . Bu kapala , wayende ku kibeendu kikimi .
44012018	Bwiisi bu bwakya , kisaangila kyabwa ha kakati dya bayongolo , bakwefulusina ti : " Bee Petelo , na keki .
44012019	Erode waloombo ti bamunatina Petelo , ngo bahele kumumono . Bafuula bakebi na waha lutumu mpisi baba dzusa . Bu kasunduka ku Yudaya , wayende ku Kayisareya na wadzakala kukwo .
44012020	Erode waba na nkesi dzamakwa mu baatu ba ku Tiro na bari ku Sidoni . Mu nyukusunu mosi , bo baba haho ha busu bwa nde . Bu bayukusa Balasto , kisari kya mbyaasi mu mitariri kihekiri kya tolo , baloombo kiyeengi , bukuri mansi ma bo maba taambulaa byalaka mu nsi Erode .
44012021	Mu kiluumbu kya nyukusunu , Erode waba walwaata binkuta bya bumbyaasi [ na ] wadzakala ha yulu kibala kya mutsuundu , wuri mu kubadzoonsolo .
44012022	Baatu babikisa ti : " Mbeembu yiyo mbeembu Nzaambi nkani ka ya muutu ko ! "
44012023	Hanaho mbasi Mfumu yamulata , bukuri nde kasii ha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi ko ; na mitaka bu myamudya , nde wafwa .
44012024	Hango maampu ma Nzaambi maba kweyukuna kwalaka na kwefununa .
44012025	Barnaba bo na Sawulo haba bvutuka ku Yerusalemi , bamana kusa kisalu , ha banata Yowane wu bateelaana ti Malako .
44013001	Mu dibuundu dyaba ku Antyoke , kwaba babikiri na bayikisi : Barnaba , Simehoni wu baba teelaana ti Ningere , Lukyo wa ku Kirene , Manahene wunde wabuukiri ha kimosi na Erode mfumu mankoonsi mana , na Sawulo .
44013002	Bu baba mu kusaambila Mfumu , na baba bakoto loomi , Mpeeve Yangisi yabaleele bumabu ti : " Nsuusuleenu ha luteke Barnaba na Sawulo mu ntoono kisalu ki nyabateeriri mbila .
44013003	Haho , bu bakoto loomi , bo ba saambila na babatetekele myooko , na ha babasindika .
44013004	Mpeeve Yangisi bu kabasindika , bo basunduka ku Selekeya , haho bayende ku nsi ya Kiporo .
44013005	Bu batubuka ku Salami , bo bayaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi munsa manzo ma nkutukunu ma Bayudayo . Yowane waba na bo bunu mubakisi .
44013006	Bu bataba kibuma kyokinso natee ku Pafo , bo bamono Muyudayo mosi ngaa-mpaanu , mubikiri wampya nkuumbu yaandi Baryesu .
44013007	Nde waba kintwaari na ngoforo Serengyo Pawulo , muutu wa madyeele . Nde watumisa Barnaba na Sawulo mu nzala kuyuka kwa ngwanwa maampu ma Nzaambi .
44013008	Elima ngaa-mpaanu , bubwo babangulaa nkuumbu yaandi , wasaka kuwumuna ngoforo yiyo la na kanyi .
44013009	Hango Sawulo wu bateelaana ti Pawulo , waluula mu Mpeeve Yangisi , wamupana kisoosi
44013010	waleele ti : " Ho ye waluula mu mawunu na mu kwiibi , mwaana dyabulu , mutaatu nsungumunu , buri ye wuhoto ko mu kwetengemese ma nzila [ ma ] Mfumu masuunguma ?
44013011	Na mono , mu lumalu , koko kwa Mfumu kweki ha yulu ye , na ye sa fwa miisu , wubweese kumono ntaangu ko mu mwaa-kilookolo . Na hanaho mubuungi na mampimbisi mamubwiila , wadyeengele na wasaka bamunata .
44013012	Hango ngoforo , bu kamwiini myayirimini , wasa kanyi mu nyikusulu dza Mfumu .
44013013	Bu bayende ku Pafo , Pawulo na banduku baandi batubuka ku Perenge , dya ku Pamfilya , Yowane bu kabasisa , wabvutuka ku Yerusalemi
44013014	Basisaa Perenge , batubuka ku Antyoke dya ku Pisidya . Bu bakoto munsa nzo ya nkutukunu , mu kiluumbu kya mpuumunu ha badzakala .
44013015	Ha mambisa ma ntaangulu mangisi na babikiri , bamfumu ba nzo-nkutukunu baleele kuri bo ti : " Bampaangi , mbuti luri na dyaambu dya mboondulu dya kudzoonsolo kuri baatu , lo dzoonsee kweenu . "
44013016	Pawulo , bu kateleme na bu kanaanguna koko , waleele ti : " Baatu ba Isaheli na beenu lubvuminaa Nzaambi , yukeenu !
44013017	Nzaambi ya kaanda dya Isaheli wasooriri ba taayi beetu , na wafunisa kaanda didyo , mu ntaangu yi badzakala ku nsi ya Ngipiti ; na mu kwa dya kooko kwaandi , nde wabapalisa mu yo ,
44013018	na wabakuunda mu mibvu kampe makuumi mana mu nsi yankatu .
44013019	Bu katsyaamuna makaanda nsaamu ma mu nsi ya Kanana , nde wabaha nsi bo yiyo bunu saala .
44013020	Kampe mu nkama na makuumi mataanu ma mibvu . Ha mambisa haho , nde wabaha balarimi natee mu mubikiri Samweli .
44013021	Kuholosono haho , bo baloombo mbyaasi , na Nzaambi wabaha Sawuli , mwaana Kise , muutu wa mu kaanda dya Benyamini , wadzakiri mu mibvu makuumi mana ,
44013022	bu kamuyekele , watelemese Davidi , mbyaasi kuri bo , kuri nde kari kaleele mu kimbaangi ki kari kata ti : " Me ndzuukiryee Davidi , mwaana Yesayi , muutu wuri bunu bu ntiiri mu mutima waami , wuyirika momanso ma ntiiri .
44013023	Mu kaanda dya nde , bunu buri nsiilulu dzaandi , Nzaambi kari kapalisa Mubvuukisi Isaheli , Yesu .
44013024	Yowane wayaabisa , tekesele nyisulu yaandi , mbotokulu ya nyiingula madyeele , kuri kaanda dyodinso dya Isaheli .
44013025	Yowane bu kaba mu kumana kisalu kyaandi , waleele ti : " Beenu na lutsimini ti me nyiri " . Pele me nyiri nde ko ! Ngo mono kukwiisa muutu ku mambisa ma me , wunde wuri , me nyahele kukuka mu kunyanguna misiinga mya masaapatu ma nde .
44013026	Bampaangi baami , baala ba kitsuubu kya Abalaami , na babo bari ha kakati dya beenu babvumunaa Nzaambi , kuri beetu bari baheeke maampu ma mvuukulu .
44013027	Bari ku Yerusalemi na bamfumu ba bo , bamudziimbiri , na bahele kubakula maampu ma babikiri , ma bataangaa mu mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu , ngo bakukisa mo , mu kumudzeengele mukanu wa lufwa .
44013028	Mu kumono , bahele kumubakila kibila mu kumudzeengele mukanu wa lufwa , baloombo kuri Pilato mu kumudzusa .
44013029	Bu bakukisa momanso maba tinini mu nde , bamusundula ha muti , na bamusuusa mu mukala .
44013030	Kasi Nzaambi wamufulukisa mu bafwa .
44013031	Nde wamonoko mu biluumbu byalaka kuri babo batoombikiri na nde kuholosono Ngalili natee ku Yerusalemi , na babo bari mu lumalu bambaangi baandi kuri baatu .
44013032	Na beetu turi mu kuluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete , na lusiilulu lu kasa kuri bataayi beetu ,
44013033	luri Nzaambi walukukisiri mu baala [ ba bo ] beetu , mu kufulukisa Yesu , bunu bu diri dyatinu mu mukuunga wa myoolo ti : " Ye ngo Mwaana me , bwalolo me nyi kubutiri . "
44013034	Nzaambi wamufulukisi mu bafwa , mu kuri ti nde kahele kubvutuka ku mbolulu , bu kari kaleele : " Me sa nyaluha byangisi bi nyatambukiri Davidi . "
44013035	Hango nkuumbu , nde wabweese kutswiikisa mu matinu makaka ti : " Ye ka wutala ko ti waaku wangisi kamono mbolulu . "
44013036	Davidi ha mambisa ma kusalila mya tiri Nzaambi , mu ntaangu yaandi , nde wafwa na bamusuusa ha pele bataayi baandi , na nde wamono mbolulu .
44013037	Kasi mu wumawu , Nzaambi wamufulukisa na wahele kumono mbolulu .
44013038	Hango di diba dyayabakana kuri beenu , bampaangi baami , mu nde bayaabisiri beenu mpemusunu masumu [ na ] na momanso ma lwaheriri kubangisina kusa mu mangisi ma Moose , mu kuba lwalulukusu ,
44013039	Mu nde , mpisi musi kanyi lo sa kaba walulukusu .
44013040	Hango , kebeenu kweenu , ma leele babikiri yaa malutubukila ko :
44013041	" Taleenu beenu bangaa-nsanunu , pamukeenu na dziimbileenu ! Bukuri me sa nyakukisa kisalu mu biluumbu bya beenu , kisalu kiri beenu lusiila kyo kanyi ko , mbuti muutu wuluyaabisiri kyo ! "
44013042	Bu bapala , babaloombo mu kubweese kwiisa kubvutuka , mu biluumbu bya mpuumunu bikimi , mu kubweese kuyikisa munu mu musamu wunde .
44013043	Buundu bu dyatsyamikina , Bayudayo balaka na minsaambiri mya Nzaambi bo , banama Pawulo na Barnaba . Bamaba badzoonso na bo , babayukusa mu kukaangama mu bweese bwa Nzaambi .
44013044	Kiluumbu kya mpuumunu kyanama , kampe bvula dyodinso dyakutukuna mu kuyuka maampu ma Mfumu .
44013045	Bayudayo , bu bamono mampuumbu ma baatu , baluula mu musoki , basaana na ba beke kunwaanisa ma leele Pawulo .
44013046	Kasi Pawulo na Barnaba bu baba baluula mu nsiitu baleele ti : " Kuri beenu baketyee kuyikiseeti maampu ma Nzaambi ; ngo mu bukuri beenu luri mu kulooso mo , na lumono mu beenu-meene ti lwahele kukuka mu kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso ; mono beetu tusyeetukiri kuri bangooyi .
44013047	Bukuri Mfumu watutumini : " Me nyakusuusa mu kuba buungi bwa mansi , na mu kunata mvuukulu natee ku nsukulu butoto . "
44013048	Bangooyi bu bayuka bubwo , bamono kiminu , badumusa maampu ma Mfumu , na bobanso ba bataasiri kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso , basa kanyi .
44013049	Maampu ma Mfumu matsamukusu mu nsi yoyinso .
44013050	Kasi Bayudayo basinda minsaambiri mya bakyeetu balukiinsu na bamfumu ba bvula , mu kutsuba nwanusunu mu Pawulo bo na Barnaba , na bababinga natee ku mandilu mabvula .
44013051	Bamaba bakubula fufunda dya bitaambi bya bo , na bayende ku Ikonyo .
44013052	Bayiki baba baluula mu kiminu na mu Mpeeve Yangisi .
44014001	Bwayirima bumosi ku Ikonyo , Pawulo na Barnaba bakoto mu nzo-nkutukunu ya Bayudayo , na bo badzoonso mu kiteesu kiri mpuumbu yayinene ya Bayudayo na ya Bahelene basa kanyi .
44014002	Ngo kasi Bayudayo , bari basii sa kanyi ko , basinda bangooyi mu kusa bubi kuri bampaangi
44014003	Hango , bo balutisa mwaa-ntaangu yalaka , badzoonsolo mu nsiitu mu Mfumu , wata kimbaangi mu maampu ma bweese bwaandi , na wa baha mpinu mu kuyirika bidiimbu na bimaangu mu myooko mya bo .
44014004	Mpuumbu ya bvula yakabuma mu bibari byoolo ; bamosi baba mu kibari kya Bayudayo , bakaka mu kya bantumu .
44014005	Bukuri kwamonoko kutya kuri bangooyi na kuri Bayudayo kintwaari na bamfumu ba bo , mu kubakwaamisa na mu kubadzusila mu matari ,
44014006	bo bu bayaaba , bayitika ku mabvula ma Likahonya , Listara , Derbe na mari loonde didyo .
44014007	Kukwo bo bayikisa Musamu Wamubwete .
44014008	Ku Listara , kwaba muutu mosi waba wabobo miilu , wabeeriri miilu bu kaba wakiri mu mwooyo nguri ; nde kaba kweyendaa ko .
44014009	Nde wayuka Pawulo mu kunzoonso . Pawulo bu kamutala na bu kamono ti waba na kanyi mu kuba wabvuukusu ,
44014010	waleele mu mbeembu yamakwa ti : " Teleme kwaaku kuri wasuunguma mu miilu mya ye-meene . " Nde wadumuka na wadyaata .
44014011	Mampuumbu ma baatu bu bamono ma yirikiri Pawulo , badzaangisa mambeembu ma bo , baleele mu ndiinga ya ku Likahonya ti : " Banzaambi bakitikiri baatu na basundukiri kuri beetu , "
44014012	bo bateele Barnaba mu nkuumbu Dzese na Pawulo Ereme , bukuri Pawulo ngo waba mutuburi misamu .
44014013	Ngaanga-nzaambi Dzese waba munsa bvula , waholo balumi ba bangoombo ba bayende kweleleke bifulu , na wasuusa ha myeelu mya bvula , kintwaari na mampuumbu , mu kudzusa mu kikabu .
44014014	Bantumu bu bayuka , Barnaba na Pawulo bakaakala binkuta , babingikila kuri mpuumbu , bafula misaakulu
44014015	na baleele ti : " Bampaangi , buri lusa mya bu mi ? Beetu se turi na bitsimi byobimosi na beenu , beetu turi baatu bunu beenu ; Musamu Wamubwete wutuluyaabisiri , ngo mu kubwoongolo myahele mufunu mi , mu kusyeeteke kuri Nzaambi ya mwooyo , wayirika yulu , butoto , mubu na byobinso biri mu byo ;
44014016	nde Nde wuri mu biseendu byaluta , waha miswa kuri makaanda momanso , mu kunama manzila ma bo-meene .
44014017	Ngo ti hayuku bubwo , mani mamabwe nde ka kooluyirikilaa : ku yulu , wuluhaa bvula , mantaangu ma bikunu bibuta , na wululuulusaa mu byandya na kiminu mu mitima myeenu . "
44014018	Bu kaleele mamo , bamono mpasi mu kukabikisa mampuumbu , mu kuri ti bahele kubayokolo bikabu .
44014019	Bayudayo bafumini ku Antyoke na ku Ikonyo bu bayisa , bu basinda mampuumbu ma baatu , na bu balata Pawulo mu matari , bo bamukoko ku mbasi bvula , bu batsima ti kampe wafwa .
44014020	Bayiki baandi bu bamudyengekele , nde wateleme , na wakoto ku bvula . Bu bwakya , wapala bo na Barnaba mu kweende ku Derbe .
44014021	Bu bamana kuyikisa Musamu Wamubwe kunsa bvula dimadi , na kusa bayiki balaka , bo babvutuka ku Listara , ku Ikonyo na ku Antyoke ,
44014022	bo bakumisa mitima mya bayiki , babasyaamisa mu kunamitina mu kanyi , na kubaleele ti mu nwanusunu dza makwa , tukotoleenu mu Kimfumu kya Nzaambi .
44014023	Mu mpisi dibuundu , bo basoolo bakulu ba babakala , babasaambikila , na bakoto loomi , bayekele bo kuri Mfumu mu wunde wubari basa kanyi .
44014024	Bu bataba Pisidya , bayisa ku Pamfilya ,
44014025	bu bayikisa maampu ku Perenge , bo basunduka ku Atalya .
44014026	Bayisikaa haho , bakoto bwaatu mu kweende ku Antyoke , kukwo ku bataamburi bweese bwa Nzaambi , mu kisalu ki bakukisiri .
44014027	Bu batubuka , bakutukisa dibuundu , bayaabisa momanso ma yirikiri Nzaambi kintwaari na bo , mu kudzibukila bangooyi mweelu wa kanyi .
44014028	Bo balutisa mwaa-mantaangu malaka kukwo kintwaari na bantumu .
44015001	Bamosi banangukini ku nsi ya Yudaya , bayikisa kuri bampaangi ti : « Mbuti beenu lwahele kuteende bubakala , bunu buri kifu kya Moose , lo beenu lubvuuka ko . »
44015002	Yumu na nkalikisi dza makwa byabwa ha kakati dya bayisiri babo na Pawulo , wuri waba kibari kimosi na Barnaba . Bakaanga kitsimi kiri ti Pawulo , Barnaba na bamosi bayisiri , batoomboko ku Yerusalemi , kuri bantumu na bakulu ba babakala , mu mitariri nkalikisi dzidzo .
44015003	Dibuundu dyabaheeke , bataba Foyiniki na Samariya , kuri bakweyaabisa bunu bwayiingiri bangooyi madyeele , na bampaangi bobanso bamono kiminu kyalaka .
44015004	Bu batubuka ku Yerusalemi , dibuundu , bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bababwaana , baleele momanso mari mu kweyirika Nzaambi mu bo .
44015005	Bamosi bari mu kabu dya ba Bafarisi basii kanyi bateleme , baleele ti : " Buri bwayelemene ti bateende bubakala , mu kukebe mangisi ma Moose . "
44015006	Bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bakutukina mu kumono dyaambu didyo .
44015007	Nkalikisi dzadzinene dzabwa , Petelo wateleme , waleele : " Bampaangi baami , beenu luyaari ti , kuholosono mantaangu mamakulu , Nzaambi wasooriri me ha kakati dya beenu , mpisi heki bangooyi bayuka , mu munwa me , maampu ma Musamu Wamubwe na basa kanyi .
44015008	Na Nzaambi wu yaari mitima mya baatu , wubateeriri kimbaangi , mu kubaha Mpeeve Yangisi , bunu bu kaheeri beetu ,
44015009	na wahele kusa nsobokoso ha kakati dya bo na beetu , bukuri mu kanyi , Nzaambi katsyeemisinyee mitima mya bo .
44015010	Hango mu lumalu , buri lutiiri kusindukila Nzaambi , mu kukolokoso kihaangu mu mankiingu ma bayiki , kiri , ti bataayi beetu , ti beetu-meene twasii baka makwa ma kukinata ko ?
44015011	Ngo mu bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu , turi na kanyi ti sa batubvuukisa mu nzelu yomosi na bo . "
44015012	Mpuumbu yoyinso yawura , yiyuka Barnaba na Pawulo bari mu kuyaabisa momanso mari mu kweyirika Nzaambi , bidiimbu na bimaangu ha kakati dya bangooyi mu kisalu kya bo .
44015013	Ha mambisa ma kuhura kwa bo , Yakobo wabvutula , waleele ti : « Bampaangi baami , ywiilee me !
44015014	Simehoni baanguri dyaburi Nzaambi katekisiri kumonoko mu kusolo ha kakati dya bangooyi baatu mu nkuumbu yaandi .
44015015	Na mimyo mya kwelesene na maampu ma babikiri bunu bu di dyatinu ti :
44015016	" Ha mambisa ma mimyo , me sa nyabvutuka , sa nyabweese kutuunga musaampu Davidi wabee wabwa , sa nyabweese kutuunga bibaka bya nde byakosoko na sa nyabweese kumutelemese ;
44015017	mpisi heki baatu basaala babo basaka Mfumu , na makaanda momanso ma bari bataangukuna nkuumbu yaami masa bwobumosi , buleele Mfumu , muyiriki bitotolo bibyo
44015018	byayabakana kuholosono mantaangu mahele mbandukulu na manunu . " »
44015019	Hango nkuumbu , « me nsimini ti kubamisa pe bangooyi bamwaayiinga madyeele mu kwiisa kuri Nzaambi .
44015020	Kasi batinineenu mu mukaanda ti yaa besumuka mu biteki ko , yaa besa buyala ko , yaa bedya toongo twa bibulu byadzusa mu tsukusulu muwuumunu , na bedya makila ko .
44015021	Bukuri kuholosono mu biseendu byabikulu , Moose wuri na bayikisaa mangisi maandi mu mpisi bvula , mu manzo ma nkutukunu mu mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu bakoomataangaa . »
44015022	Mukwongo , bantumu na bakuutu bayukusina na dibuundu dyodinso , mu kusoolo baatu munsa bo na mu kubaheeke ku Antyoke , kintwaari na Pawulo na Barnaba na Yuda wu bakotelaa ti Barsaba na Sila baatu balukiinsu ha kakati dya bampaangi .
44015023	Bo batina mu mukaanda mu myooko mya bo-meene ti : " Bantumu na bakuutu bampaangi beenu , kuri bampaangi bari kunsa bangooyi ku Antyoke , ku Sirya na ku Kilikya mboto yeenu !
44015024	Bu twayukiri ti babamosi mu beetu bu bayisiri kuri beenu , kuri twahele kubaha ntumunu , balubamisini mu miheebulu ,
44015025	beetu twamwiini ti bwayelemene mu kusoolo baatu ba kuheeke ha kimosi na bampaangi beetu ba mutima Barnaba na Pawulo ;
44015026	baatu babo baha kidziingu kyaaku mu kuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
44015027	Mu bubwo beetu twaheekiri Yuda bo na Sila , bakwiisa kululeele ha munwa musamu wunu wunde .
44015028	Hango Mpeeve Yangisi na beetu-meene se twatsimini ti yaa tulukwiikisa bilemu bikimi ko , ha yulu bini biri mufunu .
44015029	Beenu biseenu toongo twa bibulu byadzusulu mu kikabu kuri biteki , makila , na toongo twa bibulu byadzusu mu nsukusulu muwuumunu , na buyala ; mbuti lukebiri manyutu meenu mu mimyo , lo bubwo bwabubwe lusa . Mamboto menu !
44015030	Babatumisini bayisikaa haho , ha basunduka ku Antyoke , bo bakutukusaa baatu ha baheeri mukaanda wunde .
44015031	Bu bataanga mukaanda , bamono kiminu mu nsyamusunu dzidzo .
44015032	Yuda na Sila , bu baba bo-meene babikiri , bo basyaamisa bampaangi na babakumisa mu dzoonsolo dzalaka .
44015033	Mwaa-ntaangu bu yaluta , bampaangi bababvutula mu kidzuunu kuri babo baba heekiri . [
44015035	Pawulo bo na Barnaba badzakala ku Antyoke , ku baba kweyikisaa na kweyaabisaa Musamu Wamubwete wa Mfumu kintwaari na bambaasi bakimi balaka .
44015036	Mwaa-mantaangu bu maluta , Pawulo waleele kuri Barnaba ti : Tubvutuka mu kwemono bampaangi mu mpisi bvula di twayaabisiri maampu ma Mfumu , mpisi tuyaaba kari buri bari basiila .
44015037	Ngo Barnaba waba na nzala kunata se Yowane , wu bakootelaa Malako .
44015038	Kasi Pawulo waba wahele kutya kubweese kuholo muutu wunde wabayekiri ku Pamfilya , na wuri kasii kuba kintwaari na bo mu kisalu ko .
44015039	Hango nkalikisi bu dzabvulula , bo bahambikisa bo na bo . Barnaba waholo Malako na nde na wayende ku Kiporo .
44015040	Pawulo waholo Sila na wayende , bampaangi bamanaana kubaloombolo bweese bwa Mfumu .
44015041	Nde walutila ku Sirya na ku Kilikya mu kwesyaamisa mabuundu .
44016001	Ha mambisa haho , Pawulo watubuka ku Derbe , tumi ku Listara . Kukwo kwaba muyiki mosi , nkuumbu Timoteho , mwaana mukyeetu wa Muyudayo wuri na kanyi , ngo kasi taayi waba Muhelene .
44016002	Bampaangi ba ku Listara na ba ku Ikonyo baba tanaa kimbaangi kyakibweete mu nde .
44016003	Pawulo waba tiiri kweende na nde . Bu kamuholo , wa muteende bubakala , mu ntoono Bayudayo baba mu loondolo didyo ; bukuri bobanso baba bayaari ti taayi dya nde Muhelene kaba .
44016004	Mu mabvula ma baba kwelutaana , bo baba kweyikisaana mu kukebe mangisi ma heeri bantumu na bakulu ba babakala bari ku Yerusalemi .
44016005	Mabuundu maba kwesyaama mu kanyi na kwefununa mu lutaangu lwa baatu mpisi kiluumbu .
44016006	Mpeeve Yangisi bu kabadika kuyaabisa musamu ku Asya , bo bataba nkoonsi ya Firingya na ya Ngalatya .
44016007	Bu batubuka bebele na Misya , bo basaka kukoto ku Bitinya ngo kasi Mpeeve Yesu ya bisiri kubaha miswa .
44016008	Bu batabaa Misya , bo basuunduka ku Torowasi .
44016009	Ngo mu butsuku , Pawulo wabaka mamono-miisu : muutu mosi wa ku Makedonya waba wateleme na waba muyiingikila , na kumuleele ti : " Wasa ku Makedonya , wutubakisa . "
44016010	Hanaho , bu kamono mamo , beetu twasaka mu kweende ku Makedonya , mu nsiitu ti Nzaambi wututeeriri mu kunata Musamu Wamubwete kuri bo se .
44016011	Bu twaholo bwaatu ha Torowasi , twasuunguma na soongo-soongo ku Samotarake , na mu kiluumbu kyanama twayende ku Neyapoli .
44016012	Bu twayisika haho , twayende ku Filipo , bvula dyatete dya nkoonsi ya Makedonya , kimvuka kya bari Loma . Beetu twalutisa mwaa-biluumbu ha bvula didyo .
44016013	Mu kiluumbu kya mpuumunu , beetu twapala ku mbasi , mu kukweende ku simu dya muwiilu maampa , kukwo twaba tsima ti kuri kibeendu kya lusaambulu . Beetu twadzakala kukwo na twadzoonso kuri bakyeetu baba bakutukini haho .
44016014	Ngo mukyeetu mosi , nkuumbu Lidya , waba tuywiilaana , nde waba muyariki mansaanda mamabwe mabeenge , waba ku bvula dya Tyatira , nde waba bvuminaa Nzaambi . Mfumu wa dzibula mutima nde , kuri nde kangamini mu mimyo mya ba dzoonsaana Pawulo .
44016015	Bamanaa kumubotoko , nde na kaanda dyaandi , ha katuyiingukila , na waleele ti : " mbuti beenu lumono ti me nyiri na kanyi mu Mfumu , lo wasee lukoto na ludzakala ku nzo me . " Na nde watukwiikisa mu kutaambula .
44016016	Kiluumbu kimosi bu twaba kweende ku kibeendu kya lusaambulu , kisari kimosi kya mukyeetu kyaba na mpeeve ya mboomo , wayisa kutubwaana . Nde waba bakilaa bamfumu baandi ndaandu yalaka mu mbikukulu dzaandi .
44016017	Nde wabeke mu kwetunama , Pawulo na beetu , kuri wukwefula misaakulu wukweleele ti : " Baatu bamaba , bisari bya Nzaambi Mwa-Yulu bari , bo bari mu kweluyaabisa nzila ya mvuukulu .
44016018	Nde wasa bubwo mu biluumbu byalaka . Nduungusu dzibvulilaana , Pawulo wasyeeteke , na waleele kuri mpeeve yiyo ti : " me nyikutumini mu nkuumbu Yesu Kiristo , pala mu nde ! " Mu kilookolo kinikyo , mpeeve ya pala .
44016019	Bamfumu baandi bubamono ti nsiitu mu ndaandu yaaku yi mwaakweende , bo bakaanga Pawulo na Sila na babanata ha kibeendu kya baatu bobanso ha busu bwa bamfumu .
44016020	Na bu babanata kuri batsuundisi ba bari Loma , baleele ti : " Baatu bamaba bari mu kwesa kisaangila kunsa bvula dyeetu . Bo bayudayo ,
44016021	na bo bari mu kweyikisaa bifu biri beetu twahele na miswa mu ku bitaambula bunu pe mu kubisalila , beetu bari Loma . "
44016022	Mpuumbu baatu yabaka nkesi mu bo . Batsuundisi batuma ti babasyoonono binkuta , na babalata nkwaasulu .
44016023	Bu bamana kubalata nkwaasulu , babatuba mu boroko na batumisa kuri mukebi boroko mu kubakebe kwakubwe .
44016024	Bu kataambula lutumu lwa bubwo , nde wabasoko kunsa kihekiri kya boroko na wakaanga miilu mya bo mu kidu .
44016025	Mu kakati dya butsuku , Pawulo bo na Sila baba saambilaana na baba yimbilaana mu kudumusa Nzaambi , na baba mu boroko bakaka baba baywiilaana .
44016026	Hanaho , na sisuu butoto bwateembele mu makwa , kuri lufulu lwa nzo boroko lwawa kutsyaamuka , ha nsi na nsi bidzibuku byobinso byawa kudzibuma na bikonyi bya maboroko byobinso byawa kunyanguka .
44016027	Mukebi boroko bu kasiimbuka , nde wamono myeelu mya nzo boroko myadzibulu ; bu kanana mbeesi yayila , nde wasaka kudzusa nyutu nde-meene , nde bu kaba tsima ti maboroko ma mwaayitika .
44016028	Pawulo wafula mu mbeembu yayinene , waleele ti : " yasa bubi mu nyutu yaaku ko , bukuri beetu-banso turi haka . "
44016029	Mukebi boroko bu kaloombo buungi , nde wabingukila na kinkuuka kyokinso , wabwa ha miilu mya Pawulo bo na Sila .
44016030	Tumi , bu kabanata ku mbasi , nde waleele ti : " Bamfumu , me nki nyelemini kusa mu kuri ti me bvuuka ? "
44016031	Bo baleele ti : " Siila kanyi mu Mfumu Yesu na ye sa bvuuka , ye na nzo yaaku . "
44016032	Bo bayaabisa maampu ma Mfumu , kuri nde na kuri bobanso baba mu nzo yaandi .
44016033	Bunu butsuku bubwo , nde wabaholo , waswaaka mamputa ma bo , na hanaho , nde bamubotoko , na baatu baandi bobanso .
44016034	Bu kabanata ku nzo yaandi , nde wabaha byandya ha taabala . Nde wamono kiminu na nzo yaandi yoyinso , bu basiiri kanyi mu Nzaambi .
44016035	Bu bwakya , batsuundisi baheeke bayongolo , mu kuleele kuri mukebi boroko ti : " patala baatu babo . "
44016036	Mukebi boroko wayisa kuleele maampu mamo kuri Pawulo ti : " Batsuundisi baheekiri mukeensu ti balupatula haaka na haaka , ngo palee kweenu , yendee mu kiyeengi . "
44016037	Kasi Pawulo waleele kuri bo ti : " bo bu batumini ti balata beetu nkwaasulu ha busu bwa baatu , kwahele kututsuundisa , beetu baatu ba ku Loma , na batutubiri mu boroko ; mu lumalu bo batiiri kutupatula mu mansweeki ? Ngo pele , bo-meene biisa batupatula . "
44016038	Bayongolo bayende kutubula misamu mimyo kuri batsuundisi . Bo babaka boomo bayukaa ti bo baatu ba ku Loma bari .
44016039	Bo bayisa , babayiingukila , babapalisa ku mbasi , na babatuma ti bayisika ha bvula didyo .
44016040	Bu bapala mu boroko , Pawulo na Sila ba yende ku nzo Lidya , na bu bamono bampaangi , babasyaamisa , tumi ha bayende .
44017001	Bu bataba Amfipoli na Apolonya , bo batubuka ku Tesalonika kwaba Bayudayo na nzo-nkutukunu .
44017002	Bunu bwaba kifu kyaandi , Pawulo wayende ku bamono . Nde wadzoonso na bo mu Matinu mu biluumbu bya mpuumunu bitatu .
44017003	Nde wabaangula na wasoongo ti : Kiristo waba wayelemene kumono mpasi , na kufuluka mu bafwa , na ti : " Yesu , wu nyiri mu kuluyaabisa me wunde ngo Kiristo . "
44017004	Babamosi mu bo bataambula mamo , na babvuutuna na Pawulo na Sila , ha kimosi na mpuumbu Bahelene , bari na kinzaambi , na bakyeetu balaka ba lukiinsu .
44017005	Kasi Bayudayo bamono musoki , na baholo baatu ba babakala bari na mutima-bubi , babakutukisa na basa kisaangila kunsa bvula . Bu batubuka ha nzo Yasoni , bo basaka Pawulo na Sila mu ku banata ha busu bwa baatu .
44017006	Bahelaa kubamono , bo banata Yasoni na bampaangi babamosi kuri batsuundisi , na babeke mu kwefula misaakulu ti : " Baatu bamaba ngo bakotisiri tungu mu nsi yansiina , mu lumalu beki hamaha . "
44017007	Yasoni wubataamburyee ku nzo yaandi , na bobanso bakwetuungukila misiku mya Kayisari , bo bakweleele ti kuri mbyaasi yikimi , yiri nkuumbu Yesu . "
44017008	Bu bayuka bubwo , mpuumbu baatu na bamfumu ba nsi batekete .
44017009	Bamfumu bu baholo mboongo kuri Yasoni na baatu bakaka , ha ba bapatula .
44017010	Hanaho , mu butsuku bampaangi , basiindika Pawulo na Sila ku Beroya . Bu batubuka , bayende ku nzo-nkutukunu ya Bayudayo .
44017011	Babo baba babvuri bitsimi bubwete ti na bari Tesalonika . Bo bataamburi maampu mu kiminu kyalaka . Mpisi kiluumbu , bo baba fyongokinaana Matinu , mu kumono kari myominso myatswiika .
44017012	Mu bo , baatu balaka basiiri kanyi , kwaba Bahelene , bakyeetu ba lukiinsu , na babakala balaka .
44017013	Ngo kasi Bayudayo ba ku Tesalonika , bayabaana ti Pawulo wuri mu kweyaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi ku Beroya , bo bayende kukwo na babeke kunyiingisa mpuumbu na kusa kisaangila .
44017014	Hanaho , bampaangi baholo baatu mu kunata Pawulo ku teke mubu ; Sila bo na Timoteho ngo bari basii sala ku Beroya .
44017015	Baba kweyende Pawulo , bamunata natee ku Atena . Tumi bo babvutuka na mukeensu wuri ti Sila bo na Timoteho beende mu mawasu kuri kari nde .
44017016	Pawulo mu ntaangu yi kaba kingaana bambaasi ku Atena , wabama kunsa mitima waandi bu kamono ti bvula didyo dyaba dyaluula mu biteki .
44017017	Nde waba dzoonsaana ku nzo-nkutukunu bo na Bayudayo , na minsaambiri Nzaambi , na ha kibeendu kya bobanso mpisi kiluumbu , nde waba dzoonsaana na baatu baba haho .
44017018	Babamosi se baba kooleelaa ti ba-epikure na ba-estoyiko baba yolaa na nde . Bamosi baba leelaa ti : " Ngaa-lusuku wu se ti nki katiiri kuleele ? " Bakaka ti : " Bunu ti muyikisi banzaambi banzeense nde kari " , bukuri nde waba yaabisaana Musamu wamubwete wa Yesu na mfulukulu ya bafwa .
44017019	Bo bamukangaana bamunata ha kibeendu kya mfuundu bakuutu ba bvula , ha bamuleele ti : " Buri beetu lo tutsiitsiri kuyaaba nkya nyikusulu dzamoono ye wuri mu kweyaabisa ?
44017020	Ye wuri mu kuyukusa beetu misamu myanzeense na beetu tutiiri kuyaaba mambangukulu mu myo . "
44017021	Mukwongo , bari Atena na banzeense badzakala ha bvula didyo baba lutisaa ntaangu yaaku mu kudzoonso , bunu pe kuyuka mampolo mamoono .
44017022	Pawulo katelemaa ha kakati dya kibeendu kya mfuundu bakuutu , wabeke mu kuleele ti : " Baatu ba ku Atena , me nyiri mu kumono ti beenu luri na kinzaambi kyalaka mu myominso .
44017023	Bu nyabee kweyunga , na kwetala bimama byeenu byangisi , me nyamwiini dziku dimosi di bari batina ti : " kuri nzaambi yiri bayiyaa ko . " Ngo , bibyo bi luri mu kwesaambila kwahele kuyaaba , bibyo me nyiisiri mu kuluyabisa .
44017024	Nzaambi yiyo ya yirika nsi na byobinso biri mu nsi , nde ngo Mfumu yulu na butoto , nde ka koodzakala mu manzo-nzaambi matuungu mu myooko mya baatu ko .
44017025	Nde wahele se na nzala kuri ti myooko mya baatu mimusalisa , kari na nzala kitotolo ti kimosi se ko , nde koohaanaa kuri bobanso kidziingu na muwuumunu na byobinso .
44017026	Mu muutu mosi , nde wayirika bitsuumbu byobinso bya baatu , na wabasuusa ha butoto bwabutsiina , nde wasa mandilu mu mantaangu , mandilu ma mansi ma kwedzakala baatu ,
44017027	mpisi bemusaka , ti ha yuka ba kwebumbula mu nzala kumudzuukila , koomosoko nde wahele la na mpisi muutu mu beetu .
44017028	Mukwongo , mu nde beetuneenu turi bamwooyo , na turi mu kwedyaata , na turi na kidziingu . Bunu bwa leele babamosi mu baatu bangaa-lungwensu ti : " Beetu se turi mu kitsuumbu kya nde . "
44017029	Ngo bu turi kitsuumbu kimosi na Nzaambi , lo yaa tutsima ko ti nde wafwanikina na woolo , na palata , na tari bunu pe kiteki kyahala mu bunkete na mu bitsimi bya baatu .
44017030	Nzaambi wahele kubweese kutsima mantaangu ma bunzimbu bwa baatu , mu lumalu nde wuloombo kuri baatu ba mansi momanso ti bayiinga madyeele .
44017031	Bukuri nde wasoolo kiluumbu ki katsuundisa nsi mu nsungumunu , mu muutu wunde wu kari kasoolo , na nde wasoongo kimbaangi kuri bobanso mu kumufulukisa mu bafwa . "
44017032	Bu bayuka mfulukulu ya bafwa , babamosi bamusiila munsiku , bakaka baleele ti : " beetu ngo bari tumi bee tukuywiila mu mamo kiluumbu kikimi . "
44017033	Haho , Pawulo kayisika ha kakati dya bo .
44017034	Mukwongo , baatu babamosi bakaangamini mu nde , basiila kanyi , mu bo kwaba Deni mosi waba mu mfuunda bakuutu , na mukyeetu wuri nkuumbu Damari na bakaka se .
44018001	Ha mambisa haho , Pawulo wasiisa Atena na wayende ku Korinto .
44018002	Nde wabwaana Muyudayo mosi , wuri nkuumbu Akila , wabutuka ku nkoonsi ya Pontiko . Kidzika kyantele kaba kamwaasa , wafumuni ku Italya , bo na Piriska , mukasi waandi , mu ntoono Kolodyo waheeri lutumu ti Bayudayo bapala mu Loma . Nde wakokosolo na bo ,
44018003	na bukuri waba kisalu kimosi na bo , nde wadzakala kuri bo na wasala kintwaari na bo . Bo baba batuungi ba misaampu .
44018004	Nde waba dzoonsaana mu nzo-nkutukunu , mpisi kiluumbu kya mpuumunu , na waba yukusaana misamu ku Bayudayo na Bahelene .
44018005	Sila bo na Timoteho bu baba tubuka kuri ba mwaanangukina ku Makedonya , lo Pawulo wuri mu kwelutusa ntaangu , mu maampu ma Nzaambi , mu kweta kimbaangi ha busu bwa Bayudayo ti Yesu ngo Kiristo .
44018006	Mukwongo , Bayudayo bu baba kwemunyaafuna na kwemutuka , nde wakubula binkuta byaandi na wabaleele ti : " Makila ma beenu mabwa ha yulu mitu myeenu , me nyahele na kibila mu mo ; mu lumalu , me ntalisiri kuri bangooyi . "
44018007	Nde wayisika haho , na wayende kukoto mu nzo muutu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Tityo Yusto munsaambiri Nzaambi , wuri nzo yaba ha teke nzo-nkutukunu .
44018008	Kirispo mfumu nzo-nkutukunu , wasii kanyi mu Mfumu , nde na nzo yaandi , na baatu balaka ba ku Korinto bayukiri , basii kanyi na bababotukiri .
44018009	Butsuku bu mosi , Mfumu waleele mu mamono-miisu kuri Pawulo ti : " Yaa ba na boomo ko , kasi dzoonso , na yaa wura ko ,
44018010	bukuri me nyiri na ye , na kuri muutu ti mosi ko , wukwiisa mu kusa ye bubi , bukuri me nyiri na baatu balaka mu bvula dimadi .
44018011	Nde wadzakala na bo mu mubvu mosi na mangoondo masaamunu mu kweyikisa maampu ma Nzaambi .
44018012	Ngalyono waba kimonikisi kya nsi ya Loma ku Akaya ; Bayudayo bayukusina batelemise kitaatu mu Pawulo , na bamunata ku nzo ya miyalu ,
44018013	mu kuleele ti : " Muutu wumawu wuri mu kwesinda baatu mu kusaambila Nzaambi , mu kiteese kya kuhele kubvumina mangisi .
44018014	Pawulo bu kabaandika kudzibula munwa , Ngalyono leeriri kuri Bayudayo ti : " Mbuti habeeri lumvuki bunu pe musamu wamubi , nkani me ntaamburi nyayulu yeenu ;
44018015	mbuti nkalikisi mu ntoono maampu , mankuumbu na mu mangisi meenu , lo monee beenu-meene ; me ntiiri kuba mularimi mimyo ko .
44018016	Na nde wabapalisa mu nzo miyalu .
44018017	Bobanso bakwaata Sosetene , mfumu nzo-nkutukunu , bamulata ha mbasi nzo miyalu ; kasi myominso mimyo myaba myahele kutala Ngalyono .
44018018	Pawulo wabweese kulutisa biluumbu byalaka . Tumi wasiisa bampaangi na wakoto mu bwaatu , mu kweende ku Sirya , ha kimosi na Piriska na Akila . Nde watebe mfu ku Nkengerya , mu lusiilulu lukasiiri .
44018019	Bo batubukaa ku Efeso , wubasiisiri kukwo . Bu kakota mu nzo-nkutukunu , nde wadzoonso na Bayudayo .
44018020	Bo bamuloombo mu kulutisa mwaa-ntaangu yalaka na bo , kasi nde wabisa .
44018021	Ngo nde wabasisa , waleele ti : " Me sa bweese kwiisa kuri beenu , mbuti Nzaambi tiri . Na wakoto bwaatu ku Efeso .
44018022	Nde wakulumuka ku Kayisareya , bu kanaaka ku Yerusalemi mu kuha dibuundu mboto , tumi ha kakulumuka ku Antyoke .
44018023	Nde bu kalutisa mwaa-mantaangu , ha kataba mankoonsi malandisina Ngalatya , Firingya , mu kwesyaamisa bayiki bobanso .
44018024	Muyudayo mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Apolo , wabutuka ku Alekanderi muutu wuri na bunzoonsi , wayisa ku Efeso , waba na nyaabulu mu matinu .
44018025	Nde waba na nyaabulu mu nzila Mfumu , na ntiiti mu kisalu , waba kwedzoonso na kweyikisa mu bunkete misamu mitariri Yesu , ngo yini mbotokulu ya Yowane kaba kayaari ;
44018026	Nde wabaandika kuyikisa mu kibakala mu nzo-nkutukunu ; Piriska na Akila bu bamuywiila , bamuholo mu kuba na bo , na bamuyikisa nzila [ Nzaambi ] .
44018027	Nde bu kaba katya kweende ku Akaya , bampaangi bamusyaamisa na batinina kuri bantumu mu kuri ti bamutaambula , nde bu katubuka wamonoko mufunu walaka kuri babo basii kanyi mu bweese .
44018028	Mukwongo , nde waba tungukilaa Bayudayo mu makwa , ha busu bwa baatu , na waba soongaa mu matinu ti Yesu ngo Kiristo .
44019001	Ntaangu yaba Apolo ku Korinto , Pawulo wataba mankoonsi ma ku yulu milaandu , mu kweende ku Efeso . Bu kabwaana bayiki bamosi ,
44019002	wabaleele ti : " Buri beenu lwataambiri Mpeeve Yangisi ha lwasii kanyi ? " Bo babvutula ti : " Beetu twahele kuyuka ti , kuri badzoonsolo ti , Mpeeve Yangisi yiri . "
44019003	Pawulo wabafuula ti : " Nkya mbotokulu beenu luri lwataambula ? " Bo babvutula ti : " Mbotokulu ya Yowane . "
44019004	Pawulo waleele ti : " Yowane wasalila mbotokulu ya nyiingula madyeele , waleele kuri baatu , mpisi heki baatu basa kanyi , mu wunde wukwiisa ha mambisa ma nde , mbangukulu Yesu . "
44019005	Bamanaa kuyuka mamo , bataambula mbotokulu mu nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu .
44019006	Pawulo bu kabatetekele myooko , Mpeeve Yangisi yayisa ha yulu bo , bo badzoonso mandiinga na babikula .
44019007	Baatu baba kampe kuumi na boolo .
44019008	Bu kakoto mu nzo-nkutukunu , nde wayikisa mu bunsaalisi , mu mangoondo matatu , nde waba dzoonsaana na waba yukusaana mu mitariri Kimfumu kya Nzaambi .
44019009	Bukuri bamosi baba kubisaa mitima na baba bisaa kusa kanyi , bo badzoonsolo bwabubi mu nzila , ha busu bwa mpuumbu , nde wabasiisa , Ngo mpisi kiluumbu nde waba holaana bayiki kintwaari na nde , wabayoloso mu nzo nyikulu ya muutu mosi wuri nkuumbu Tirano .
44019010	Mimyo myayirima , mu mibvu myoolo , kuri bobanso badzakalaana ku Asya , Bayudayo na Bahelene , bayuka maampu ma Mfumu .
44019011	Nzaambi waba yirika bimaangu bya nkimukunu mu myooko mya Pawulo ,
44019012	kuri lo babumusa mu babeeru , mansaanda bunu pe biteendi bi babumusinyee mu nyutu nde , mabeeru matsiinika na mampeeve mamabi mapala .
44019013	Bayudayo babamosi bakookwepalisaa mampeeve baba kweyendaa mu mabula , bo se batsiitsa mu kusalila nkuumbu Yesu ha yulu baatu baba na mampeeve mamabi , baleele ti : " Me nyiloombo kuri beenu , mu nkuumbu ya Yesu wuri Pawulo wuri mu kweyikisa ! "
44019014	Bo baba baala nsaamu ba Keva , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , Muyudayo , baba kwesalila bubwo .
44019015	Mpeeve yayibi yaha mvutu , yabaleele ti : " Me nyaari Yesu , na me nyaari se Pawulo , heki beenu ba na luri ? "
44019016	Bu kabasungumina , muutu waba na mpeeve yayibi wababwiisikila kikiindu , wabvula kwa na bo , mu kiteesu kiri , bu baba pala mu nzo yiyo , mu ntiinu , mpene na balemene .
44019017	Mimyo mya yabakana kuri Bayudayo bobanso na Bahelene , badzakalaana ku Efeso na boomo bwabwiila ha yulu bobanso , na badzaangisa nkuumbu Mfumu Yesu .
44019018	Balaka mu babo basii kanyi , batambukila na bayaabisa nsalulu yaaku .
44019019	Balaka mu baba salilaa mu mpiitunu , bakutukisa mikaanda , bayoko myo ha busu bwa baatu , bu batangumisa ntalu , kampe mafuunda mataanu ma mboongo .
44019020	Bunubwo , bunu buri makwa ma Mfumu , maampu maba kweyalamika na mamonoko na makwa .
44019021	Mamo bu mayirima , Pawulo wabaka kitsimi mu kutaba Makedonya na Akaya mu kweende ku Yerusalemi . Nde waleele : " Bu nyiyisika kukwo , bwayelemene ti me mono Loma . "
44019022	Nde waheeke ku Makedonya boolo mu bisari byaandi , Timoteho na Erasto , mu ntaangu yi kabakiingila ku Asya .
44019023	Mu ntaangu yiniyo , kwayirimini kisaangila kya makwa mu ntoono nzila .
44019024	Muyiriki miluungu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Demeteryo , waba yirikaana biteki bya woolo mu kifwaani kya manzo-nzaambi ma Artemi , na wabahaanaa ndaandu yalaka kuri baba salila byo .
44019025	Nde wakutukisa ba bari kisalu kimosi kintwaari na nde , waleele ti : " Banduku baami , beenu luyaari ti kisalu ki ngo busina bwa beetuneenu ,
44019026	lutala na luyuka ti ka kunu ku Efeso ko , ngo kampe mu Asya dyodinso , Pawulo , wayukusa baatu , na mpuumbu yalaka yahoomboko kuri nde , wukweleele ti , banzaambi bayiriku mu myooko mya baatu , bari banzaambi ko .
44019027	Kari kini kisalu kya beetu kinyaafuka ko , ngo se nzo-nzaambi ya Aretemi , nzaambi yayinene , yiba yabwoongolo , nzaambi yi bari mu kwesaambila mu nkoonsi yoyinso ya Asya na mu nsi yansiina ! "
44019028	Bu bayuka bubwo , bo baluula mu nkesi , bafula misaakulu , baleele ti : " Wadzaangama , Aretemi wa bari Efeso ! "
44019029	Bvula dyodinso dyaluula mu kisaangila , bakwaata Ngayo na Aristarako wa ku Makedonya , bambaasi ba Pawulo , babanata mu kitsimi kimosi ku nzo bimpa .
44019030	Pawulo waba tiiri kukoto kunsa mpuumbu yiyo , kasi bayiki bamudika .
44019031	Bamosi mu bambaasi baandi ba ku Asya se , bamuyingukila mu kuhele kweende nde-meene ku nzo bimpa .
44019032	Kisaangila kyakinene kyakoto kunsa buundu , babamosi babikisa mi , bakaka kubikisa mikimi ; na balaka mu bo baba bahele kuyaaba mu nki ntoono baba bari bakutukina .
44019033	Munsa mpuumbu baatu bayaabisa kuri Alekandere , wuri Bayudayo basuusa ha mankula . Alekandere bu kanaanguna koko watya kukalila nyutu ha busu bwa baatu .
44019034	Bu bayaaba ti nde Muyudayo , bobanso bafula mu mbeembu mosi kampe mu bilookolo byoolo : " Wadzaangama , Aretemi wa bari Efeso ! "
44019035	Mutini wa bvula wadzuunisa mpuumbu waleele ti : " Baatu ba ku Efeso , nani mu baatu dziimbiri ti bvula dya Efeso ngo mukebi nzo nzaambi ya wadzaangama Aretemi na kiteki kwafumini ku yulu ?
44019036	Mimyo myahele na bwa kutununa , beenu luyelemini kuba badzuuna , yaa lubingukila kusa kitotolo ti kimosi ko .
44019037	Beenu lutweesi baatu bamaba hamaha . Bo bari bangaa-kwiibi ko , bunu pe basaani ba Nzaambi yeetu ko .
44019038	Hango , mbuti Demeteryo na bisari bya miluungu biri kintwaari na nde , bari na kooti mu muutu , lo kuri biluumbu bya miyalu na banzoonsi se na bo , lo be bafundusuna bo na bo .
44019039	Na mbuti luri na kitotolo kikimi ha yulu , lo buundu dikootala misamu sa dyaha mvutu .
44019040	Bukuri bee batuhoriri bunu bangaa-ntungu mu mya lolo . Bukuri kwahele ntoono ti yimosi yisoongo bunu buyirimini buundu dya bangaa-tungu dimadi . Kaleelaa mimyo nde tsyaamini buundu .
44020001	Misamu mya tungu mimyo milutaana , Pawulo watumisa bayiki , bu kabasyaamisa , nde wabaha mboto na wayende ku Makedonya .
44020002	Bu kaba kwetaba mankoonsi mamo , nde wabasyaamisa mu maampu malaka , watubuka ku nsi ya Bahelene ,
44020003	nde walutisa mangoondo matatu kukwo . Nde bu kasaka kuholo bwaatu mu kweende ku Sirya , nde wayuka kele dya Bayudayo mu nde , na wataambula kubvutukila mu nzila ya Makedonya .
44020004	Bayende na nde mu nzila ngo : Sopatero mwaana Piro wa ku Bere , Aristarako na Sekundo ba ku Tesalonika , Ngayo wa ku Derbe , Timoteho , Tikiko na Torofimo ba ku ha Asya .
44020005	Bamaba bateekilaana , batukiingila ku Torowasi .
44020006	Beetu twakoto bwaatu ku Filipo , ha mambisa ma biluumbu bya mampa mahele lufunusu . Beetu tababakala ku Torowasi ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitaanu , na twalutisa lumiingu kukwo .
44020007	Kiluumbu kyatete kya lumiingu , bu twabvuutuna mu kubukunu mpa , Pawulo waba dzoonsaana na babo , bukuri waba kweende mu kiluumbu kyaba nama , nde wanonono luyolo natee mu kakati dya butsuku .
44020008	Miinda myaba myalaka , mu kihekiri kya ku yulu mu twaba twakutukina .
44020009	Mwaa munkuula mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Etiko , waba wadzakala ha mweelu nzo wantele , wuri tolo twa mpoondo . Pawulo wanamitina mu kudzoonso mu ntaangu yalaka . Ngo munkuula wunde , tolo bu twabvulila , wasonoko kuholosono mu mve yamatatu ya nzo natee ha nsi , na wafwa .
44020010	Pawulo bu kasunduka , wabwa ha yulu nde , wamuholo mu munsa myooko myaandi waleele ti : " Yaa lunyoongo ko , kiluunsi kyaandi kyakiri mu nde .
44020011	Bu katoomboko , wabukuna mpa na wadya , walutisa ntaangu yalaka na wadzoonso natee ku nkyeelele bwiisi , na wayende .
44020012	Bo banata mwaana wamwooyo na bataambula mboondulu yalaka .
44020013	Beetu bu twatekele mu bwaatu , twatalisa ku Asoso , ku twaketi kuholo Pawulo . Bukuri nde watiiri kuholo nzila ya mu nsi .
44020014	Bu katubakala ku Asoso , beetu twabweese kumuholo , na twayende ku Mitilene .
44020015	Tuyisikaa haho , beetu twaholo nzila ya mu mubu . Mu kiluumbu kyanama , twatubuka ha simi dya Kyo , mu kiluumbu kyabweese kunama beetu twataba Samo , na mu kiluumbu kyakaka twatubuka ku Mileto .
44020016	Mukwongo , Pawulo waba tiiri kulutila la na Efeso , mu kuhele kulutisa ntaangu ku Asya , nde waba kwebingukila , bukuri waba tiiri ti , mbuti bwakuka lo nde kaba ku Yerusalemi , mu kiluumbu kya Pantekote .
44020017	Kuholosono ku Mileto , Pawulo waheeke mukeensu ku Efeso mu kutumisa bakuutu ba dibuundu .
44020018	Bu bayisa kutubuka hari nde , nde wabaleele ti : " beenu luyaari ti kuholosono kiluumbu kyatete kinyasuusiri me kitaambi kunsa Asya , bunu bu nyabee na beenu mantaangu momanso ,
44020019	nyasalila Mfumu mu nkulukulu yoyinso ; kunsa bidilu na kunsa nsindukulu dzantumbukila mu makele ma Bayudayo .
44020020	Me nyahele kusweeke kitotolo ti kimosi , mu byaba mufunu kuri beenu , mu ntaangu ya kuyaabisa na kuyikisa , ha busu bwa baatu na mu manzo .
44020021	Me nyaloombo kuri Bayudayo na kuri Bahelene mu nyiingulu madyeele mu Nzaambi na kusiila kanyi mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
44020022	Mu lumalu me Mpeeve wankaanga , na me nyeensi ku Yerusalemi kwahele kuyaaba misamu mi nyibwaanikina na myo ku mankula .
44020023	Mpeeve Yangisi yiri mu kunswiikisila ti , mu bvula ngo bvula bikonyi na mpasi biri mu kunkiingila .
44020024	Kasi ha miisu mya me , kidziingu kyaami kyahele mufunu , kasi miri mufunu kuri meenu kusukisa nzila yaami na kisalu ki nyataamburi kuri Mfumu Yesu , kya kweta kimbaangi mu Musamu Wamubwete mu bweese bwa Nzaambi .
44020025	Mu lumalu me nyaari ti beenu lubweese kumono busu bwa me ko , beenu-banso kunsa baatu ba nyabee kweluta mu kuyikisa maampu ma Kimfumu kya mayulu .
44020026	Mu ntoono bubwo me nyilutswiikisa mu kiluumbu kya lolo ti , mu makila ma beenu-banso me nyiri na kibila ko .
44020027	Mu ngwanwa , me nyahele kulusweekele kitotolo ti kimosi , mu kuluyikisa kutya kwa Nzaambi .
44020028	Seenee madyeele mu beenu-meene , na mu mpuumbu bimeeme yoyinso yiri Mpeeve Yangisi wulutelemisi mu kuba bakebi . Buunguleenu dibuundu dya Nzaambi di kari kabaka mu makila ma nde-meene .
44020029	Me nyaari ti ha mambisa ma nyendukulu me , kunsa beenu bambulu bari na kibakala sa bakoto , na babvuukisa mpuumbu bimeeme ko ,
44020030	na munsa beenu se sa kwateleme baatu ba kwesa biwobiri , mu kunata bayiki ha mambisa ma bo .
44020031	Mu ntoono bubwo , beene naana na baambukeenu mwooyo ti , mu lutaangu lwa mibvu mitatu , butsuku na mwiini , me nyahele kudzimbikina kulubula mpisi nde mu beenu , mu mansangasi .
44020032	Mu lumalu , me nyiluyekele beenu-banso kuri Nzaambi na kuri maampu ma bweese bwaandi , nde wuri na mpinu dza kutuunga nzo na dza kuha saala kuri bobanso basakumunu .
44020033	Me nya sii saka mboongo , bunu pe woolo , bunu pe binkuta bya muutu ko .
44020034	Beenu-meene luyaari ti myooko mimami , myabakisiryee me-meene na banduku baami mu manzala .
44020035	Mu myominso , me nyasoongiri kuri beenu ti , mu kusala , beenu luyelemini kubakisa bari na buyonsi , na kubaambuka mwooyo mu maampu ma Mfumu Yesu , bukuri nde-meene waleeriri ti : " Kiminu kibvuriri mu kuha ti na mu kutaambula . "
44020036	Bu kamana kuleele mimyo , nde watsuka maboongo ha nsi , na wasaambila na bobanso .
44020037	Bobanso bakoto kunsa bidilu byalaka , babeke kwemudumukuna mu nkiingu na kwemunyumutina .
44020038	Bo bamono ngebe mu ntoono yi kaleeriri ti , bo babweese kumono busu bwaandi ko . Bo bayende kumufila natee ku bwaatu .
44021001	Tumanaa kuhaambuka na bo , beetu twayende mu bwaatu , na twasuunguma mu mawasu , na twatubuka ku bula buri nkuumbu Kosi . Tumi mu kiluumbu kyanama twatubuka ku Lodo , na tuyisikaa haho tweensi ku Patara .
44021002	Bu twabaka bwaatu haho , dyaba kweende ku Foyiniki , tukotiri na twayende mu mubu .
44021003	Bu twatubuka bebele na Kiporo , tusisiri bula bubwo ku mpele yalumoso , na twayende mu bwaatu ku Sirya na twasunduka ha Tiro , bukuri bwaatu bwaba na bitotolo bya kusundula haho .
44021004	Bu twabaka bayiki haho , twalutisa biluumbu nsaamu kintwaari na bo . Mpeeve ya batwaalisa mu kuleele kuri Pawulo , ti yaa keende ku Yerusalemi ko .
44021005	Biluumbu bya kulitisa haho bu byawa , beetu twayende . Bo batufila mu kintwaari na bakasi na baala , natee ku mbisa bvula , na bu twatsukuma ha simu dya mubu ha twasaambila .
44021006	Tumi bu twahelesene mamboto ma kuhambusina , ha twanwaata mu bwaatu , na bo babvutuka kunsa bvula .
44021007	Beetu twasukisa nyeendulu ya mu bwaatu mu kuyisika ku tiro na kwesunduka ku Petolemayi . Bu twahelesene mamboto na bampaangi , ha twalutisa kiluumbu kyakitsiina na bo .
44021008	Kiluumbu kyanama beetu twayende na twatubuka ku Kayisareya , na twakoto mu nzo dinginsi diri kuumbu Filipo , nde waba mosi mu bo nsaamu ; tumi ha twadzakala ha nzo nde .
44021009	Nde waba na baala babakyeetu banswaasa bana baba bikulaana .
44021010	Bu twaba tweki haho mwaa-biluumbu byalaka , mubikiri mosi nkuumbu Angabo , wanangukini ku Yudaya , wakulumuka ,
44021011	na wayisa kuri beetu . Bu kaholo musweele Pawulo , wakaanga miilu na myooko mya nde-meene , na waleele ti : Mpeeve wuleele bumabu ti : muutu ngaa-musweele wu , Bayudayo sa bamukaanga bikonyi bumabu ku Yerusalemi , na kumuyekele mu myooko mya bangooyi .
44021012	Tumanaa kuyuka bubwo , beetu na baatu baba ha kibeendu kikyo , twayingukila Pawulo , ti yaa katoomboko ku Yerusalemi ko .
44021013	Haho , Pawulo wabvutula ti : " Nki luri mu kusa mu kudiila na mu kutabula me mutima ? Me nyayirima , kari mu kunu kuri ti bankaanga bikonyi ko , ngo na mu kufwa ku Yerusalemi mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu . "
44021014	Ngo bukuri nde waba wahele kutaambula mamo , beetu twawuriri kweetu , na twaleele ti : " Hemese kutya kwa Mfumu kuyirima ! "
44021015	Tumanaa kulutisa biluumbu bibyo haho , ha twatoomboko ku Yerusalemi .
44021016	Bayiki ba ku Kayisareya bayende se kintwaari na beetu , na batunata ku nzo muutu waba tutaambula , muutu wunde nkuumbu Naasoni , wa ku Kiporo , waba wayeki muyiki na kidzika .
44021017	Tumanaa kutubuka ku Yerusalemi , bampaangi batutaambula mu kiminu .
44021018	Mu kiluumbu kyanama , Pawulo na beetu , twakoto mu nzo Yakobo , kwaba se bakulu ba babakala bobanso .
44021019	Bu kabaha mamboto , wabeke kubayaabisa musamu mosi-mosi , mu myayirikiri Nzaambi , mu kisalu kya nde , ha kakati dya bangooyi .
44021020	Bo bamana kuyuka mamo , bakeembese Nzaambi , na bamuleele ti : " Mpaangi , moneeti , mburi mafuunda ma ba mwaasa kanyi ha kakati dya Bayudayo , na bakaangama kunsa mangisi .
44021021	Ngo bo bari mu kweyuka mu ntoono ya ye ti : ye wukweyikisa kuri Bayudayo bari ha kakati dya makaanda ti yaa bateende baala bubakala ko , na yaa benama bifu bya Bayudayo ko .
44021022	Ngo kusiila buri ? Bo bee bayukiri ti ye mwaakwiisa .
44021023	Yirika ma tukuleele beetu . Beetu turi na baatu bana hamaha ba mwaasa nsiilulu mu bo-meene .
44021024	Baholo na sa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo , na baha mboongo mpisi batebe makungulu mu mitu , na baatu bobanso sa bayaaba ti myominso mi bayukiri mu ntoono ye myabuunu , ngo kasi ye-meene wukwedyaatila kunsa mangisi .
44021025	Ngo kuri bangooyi babo bamwaasa kanyi , beetu twatinini kuri bo ma twakaangiri ti : bo yaa beedya toongo twa bibulu byadzusu mu kikabu kuri biteki ko , makila se kudya pe , toongo twa bibulu byadzusa mu nsukusulu muwuumunu se kudya pe , kimpala se kuta pe .
44021026	Haho , mu kiluumbu kyanama , Pawulo waholo babakala babo , wabaandika kusa nsyemusunu kintwaari na bo , tumi wakoto mu Nzo-nzaambi mu kuyaabisa nsukulu biluumbu bya nsyemusunu , natee kiluumbu ki baha kikabu mu mosi-mosi mu bo .
44021027	Biluumbu byo nsaamu bibaanaa byeki suka , Bayudayo ba ku Asya , bamono Pawulo mu Nzo-nzaambi , na bakotoso kisaangila mu mpuumbu yoyinso , na bamukaanga .
44021028	Bo babeke kubikisa ti : " Babakala ba Isaheli , wasee lutubakisa ! Muutu wumawu wukweha nyikusulu kuri bobanso na mwomunso , dzahele bubwe mu kaanda , mu mangisi na mu kibeendu ki ; ha yulu haho se nde mwaakotoso Bahelene mu Nzo-nzaambi , na mwaasumuna kibeendu kyangisi ki .
44021029	Bo baba bamwaatekesele kumono Torofimo wa ku Efeso , kunsa bvula , kintwaari na nde , na bo baba kutsima ti Pawulo mwaamukotoso mu Nzo-nzaambi .
44021030	Kisaangila kyabwa mu bvula dyodinso , na baatu bobanso bakutukuna . Bu bakaanga Pawulo , bamukooko ku mbasi Nzo-nzaambi , na hanaho , bo bakaanga myeelu .
44021031	Bu baba beki saka kumudzusa , musamu watubuka kuri mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , ti kisaangila kimwaakoto mu Yerusalemi dyodinso .
44021032	Mu mawasu-mawasu , nde waholo bayongolo , na bakuutu ba mikaangu mya nkama bayongolo , na badzumuna kwaba baatu babo . Bo bu bamono mukuutu mukaangu wa fuunda , na bayongolo , ha bahoto kulata Pawulo .
44021033	Haho , mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , bu kakokosolo wakaanga Pawulo , na watuma ti bamukaanga mu masyeene moolo . Tumi nde wasaka kuyaaba , muutu wu na kari , na nki kayirikirye .
44021034	Ngo kunsa mpuumbu , bamaba kuleele mi , bakaka kuleele mikimi ; na nde kasii yirika kuyaaba lumvuki ko , mu ntoono kisaangila . Nde watuma bamunata ku lumpaangu lwa dzakala bayongolo .
44021035	Pawulo kabaanaa weki ha kikaari , bayongolo bamunata bukuri mpuumbu yaba na kabala dyalaka .
44021036	Baatu ba bu fundu-fundu baba kwenamaana na bakwebikisa ti : " Mudzusa ! "
44021037	Babaanaa beki baandika kukoto ku lumpaangu lu dzakala bayongolo , Pawulo waleele kuri mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo ti : " Buri me nyiri na miswa mu kuleele ntoono kuri ye ? Nde wamuleele ti : " Ye yaari kihelene ?
44021038	Buri ye wuri muutu wa ku Ngipiti , wabee kotoso kisaangila , mu biluumbu bi , na kunata mafuunda mana ma bangaa-tungu ku nsi yankatu ko ? "
44021039	Pawulo waleele ti : " Me Muyudayo nyabutuka ku Taraso , mu nkoonsi ya Kilikya , nyiri muutu wa bula buri bwayabakana kwalaka . Me nyikuyingukiri , ti ha me miswa me nzoonso kuri baatu ba . "
44021040	Bu bamuha miswa , Pawulo wateleme ha yulu kikaari , na wanaanguna kooko mu kusa kidiimbu mpisi baatu bawura . Baatu bobanso bu bawura na pwooro , nde wabadzoonsolo mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho .
44022001	" Bampaangi na bataata , yukee ma nyileele me mu kukalila nyutu yaami . "
44022002	Bo bu bayuka wuri mu kubadzoonsolo mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho , bahaamisa na kuwura . Nde waleele ti :
44022003	" Me Muyudayo , nyabutuka ku Taraso , mu nkoonsi ya Kilikya . Me nyabuukula ha bvula dimadi , nyayika ha miilu mya Ngamalyele , bunu buyelemini mu kubvumina mangisi ma bakuutu . Me nyaba na kuheme mu Nzaambi , bunu bu luri beenu lolo dimadi .
44022004	Me nyakwaamisa natee mu kiteesu kya kudzusa , babo bakwenama nzila yimayi , na nyasoko bakyeetu na babakala mu boroko .
44022005	Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , na kikuutu kyokinso , kya bakulu ba babakala lo bateeri kimbaangi . Me kuri bo nyataamburi mikaanda mu ntoono bampaangi bari ku Damasiko , na me nyayende kukwo , mu kwebakaanga na kubatwaala ku Yerusalemi mpisi baba seembe .
44022006	« Bu nyaba mu nzila , na nyeki kokosolo na Damasiko mu nkati-mwiini , bu nyeki monaa na sisuu , buungi bwansisi bwandyengekele mpele na mpele .
44022007	Me nyabwa ha nsi , na nyayuka mbeembu yaleele kuri me ti : " Sawuli , Sawuli , buri wuri mu kwekwaamisa me ? "
44022008	Me nyafuula ti : " Ye na , Mfumu ? " Nde waleele ti : " Me ngo Yesu wa ku Nadzareti wu wuri mu kwekwaamisa . "
44022009	Baba kintwaari na me bamwiini buungi , ngo kasi basii yuka mbeembu yaba dzoonso kuri me ko .
44022010	Me nyafuula ti : " Nki me nyelemini kusa Mfumu ? " Mfumu wandeele ti : " Teleme yende ku Damasiko , tumi bakuleele myominso mi bakutumini kusa . "
44022011	Ngo bukuri nyaba nyahele kumono mu ntoono buungi bwaba semaana , babo baba kintwaari na me bampolo mu kooko , na banata ku Damasiko .
44022012	Kwaba muutu mosi , nkuumbu Ananya , wuri na kinzaambi bunu buri mangisi , wuri na kimbaangi kyakibwete , ha kakati dya Bayudayo bobanso badzakalaa haho .
44022013	Nde wayisa , wamono me , na wandeele ti : " Sawuli , mpaangi yaami , miisu myaaku mibweese kumono ! " Na ha nsi na nsi , me nyabweese kumono , na nyatala kuri nde .
44022014	Nde waleele ti : " Nzaambi ya bataayi beetu , wakusoolo mu kuyaaba kutya kwaandi , mu kumono wunde wasuunguma , na mu kuyuka mbeembu ya munwa waandi ,
44022015	bukuri ye sa ba mbaangi yaandi , ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , mu misamu myominso mi mwiini na mi yukiri .
44022016	Ngo mu lumalu , nki wubweese kukiinga ? Teleme , taambula mbotokulu , na mpemusunu ya masumu maaku , mu nteelulu nkuumbu yaandi . " »
44022017	« Me bu nyabvutuka ku Yerusalemi , na bu nyaba saambilaa mu Nzo-nzaambi , Mpeeve ya mbaka ,
44022018	na me nyamono Mfumu , na waleele kuri me ti : " Wasula , na pala mu mawasu mu Yerusalemi , bukuri bo bataambula kimbaangi kya ye mu me ko . "
44022019	Me nyaleele ti : " Mfumu , bo bayaari ti me nyabee kweyendaana mu manzo mankutukunu , mu kwekotoso mu boroko , na kweseembe mu makwa bobanso basiila kanyi mu ye .
44022020	Na mu ntaangu yi baba tsaamuna makila ma Estefano mbaangi yaaku , me nyaba hanaho me-meene , nyataamburi mimyo na nyaba nyakwaata binkuta bya babo baba mudzusa . "
44022021	Nde wandeele ti : " Yende , bukuri me sa nyakuheeke kuri makaanda mari ku la ! " »
44022022	Baatu baba yukaana Pawulo natee mu ntoono yiyo , tumi bo bafula misaakulu baleele ti : " Yisilee muutu wa bumabu ha butoto , nde wahele kuyelemene kuba wamwooyo . "
44022023	Bo bafula misaakulu , balooso binkuta bya bo , na banaanguna fuunda ku yulu .
44022024	Mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo watuma ti bamukotoso kunsa lumpaangu , na bamufuulila mu nkwaasulu , mpisi kaleele mu nkya ntoono baatu bari mu kufula misaakulu mu nde .
44022025	Ngo babaanaa beki mukaanga misiinga mu kumulata , Pawulo wafuula kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo waba haho ti : " Buri beenu luri na miswa mya kulata muutu bari Loma , kuri bahele kumukesele mukanu ? "
44022026	Mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu kayuka bubwo , wakokosolo kuri mukuutu fuunda , wamuyaabisa wamuleele ti : " Nki ye keti kusa ? Muutu bari Loma nde kari .
44022027	Mukuutu fuunda bu kakokosolo , wamufuula ti : " Leele me , buri ye muutu bari Loma wuri ? " Pawulo waleele ti : " Heehe . "
44022028	Mukuutu fuunda waleele ti : " Me nyaheeri mboongo dzalaka mu kuba muutu bari Loma . " Ngo Pawulo waleele ti : " Me ngo wuri mu mbutukulu . "
44022029	Hanaho , babo baketi kumulata nkwaasulu basasika na nde , na mukuutu fuunda wabaka boomo , bu kayaaba ti muutu bari Loma nde kari , na nde bee mwaakumukaanga bikonyi .
44022030	Mu kiluumbu kyanama , mukuutu fuunda dya bayongolo , bu kaba na nzala kuyaaba mu nkya ntoono Bayudayo baba mufuundila , nde waleele bamunyanguna , na watuma ti bakutikisa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi , na kikuutu kyokinso . Tumi nde bu kasundulaa Pawulo , wamusuusa ha busu bwa bo .
44023001	Pawulo katala kikuutu kya Bayudayo kisooso waleele ti : « Bampaangi baami , mu nsimunu yaami yoyinso , me nyadyeeti ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu kifwaani kyakibwe natee kiluumbu ki . »
44023002	Mukuutu ngaanga-nzaambi , Ananya , watuma kuri baba haho , mu kumulata mu munwa .
44023003	Ngo Pawulo waleele kuri nde ti : « Ngo Nzaambi ye-meene kalata , kibaki kyakila mpeembe ! Ye wadzakala haho mu kutsuundisa bunu buri mangisi , na mu nsaanunu mangisi ye wutuma balata me ! »
44023004	Baba haho baleele ti : « Ye tukiri mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi ! »
44023005	Pawulo waleele ti : « Bampaangi baami , me mbee nyahele kuyaaba ti nde mukuutu ngaanga-nzaambi . Mukwongo , matinu maleele ti : " Yaa dzoonsolo bwabubi mu mfumu kaanda ko ! " »
44023006	Pawulo bu kaba kayaari ti kunsa kikuutu babamosi baba Basaduki , na bakaka Bafarisi , nde wabikisa ha busu bwa bo ti : « Bampaangi baami , me nyiri mu Mufarisi , mwaana Mufarisi , [ me ] bari mu kutsuundisa , mu ntoono nsiitu na mu ntoono mfulukulu ya bafwa . »
44023007	Nde bu kamana kuleele bubwo , yumu dyabwa ha kakati dya Bafarisi na Basaduki ; mpuumbu yakabuka .
44023008	Mukwongo , Basaduki bakooleelaa ti , mfulukulu , na bambasi , na mampeeve biri ko ; ngo kasi Bafarisi babitaambulaa .
44023009	Misaakulu myaminene myayukukuna , batina bamosi bari mu kibari kya Bafarisi , bateleme , basa nkalikisi baleele ti : " Beetu twahele kumono dyadibi mu muutu wu ; kampe mbasi bunu pe mpeeve yidzoonsiri kuri nde ! "
44023010	Yumu dyamonoko dya makwa , mukuutu wabaka boomo ti Pawulo bee bamusebiri . Nde watuma bayongolo basunduka , beende bamupalisa ha kakati dya bari mu kuyumuna , na bamunata ku lumpaangu lu dzakalaa bayongolo .
44023011	Mu butsuku bwaba nama , Mfumu wamonoko kuri nde waleele ti : « Ba na kibakala , bukuri , bunu bu teerye kimbaangi mu mitariri me ku Yerusalemi , bunubwo se ye yelimini , kweeta kimbaangi ku Loma . »
44023012	Bwiisi bu bwakya , Bayudayo basa mfuundu , balaba maalu bo-meene baleele ti , natee bakiri kudzusa Pawulo tumi bo badya na banwa .
44023013	Badiiri kikaandu kikyo baba baluta makuumi mana ma baatu .
44023014	Bo bakokosolo kuri bangaanga-nzaambi na kuri bakulu ba babakala baleele kuri bo ti : « Beetu tumwaalaba-maalu beetu-meene ti , beetu mu kusa kitotolo mu munwa , natee beetu twakiri kudzusa Pawulo .
44023015	Hango mu lumalu , yukusunee beenu na mukuutu bayongolo kintwaari na kikuutu kya Bayudayo , batwaala Pawulo kuri beenu , luyirika kufyongokono mya nde , na beetu , tekesele katubuka hamaha , twayirima mu kumudzusa . »
44023016	Ngo mwaana kibusi kya Pawulo wayuka kele didyo ; wayende ku lumpaangu lu dzakalaa bayongolo , wayaabisa momanso kuri Pawulo .
44023017	Pawulo kateelaana mosi mu bakuutu ba nkama bayongolo waleele ti : « Nata munkuula wu kuri mukuutu fuunda , bukuri nde wuri na ma kuyaabisa kuri nde . »
44023018	Wunde kamuholaana , wumuneti kuri mukuutu fuunda na waleele ti : " Pawulo wuri mu boroko , teeriryee me , na ndoombiri , me nyikutwalikila munkuula wu , wuri na dya kuleele kuri ye . "
44023019	Mukuutu fuunda , wamukwaata mu kooko , wayende na nde ha lumperi , wasaka kuyaaba : " Nkya mo wuri na mo ma kuleele kuri me ? "
44023020	Nde waleele ti : " Bayudayo bamwaakaanga kitsimi kya kuloombo kuri ye , mpisi heki bweepari , ye nata Pawulo kuri kikuutu , bunu ti ye tiiri kuyaaba na tswitswikii mya mu nde . "
44023021	Ye ngo wuri , yaa tambukila mya bo ko ; baatu baluta lutaangu lwa makuumi mana bamwaamulebekele mweete . Bo balaburyee maalu mu bo-meene ti , natee badzusiri Pawulo tumi badiiri na banwiini . Mu lumalu bo bayirima , bakiingika lusiilulu lwa ye .
44023022	Hango , mukuutu fuunda wabvutula munkuula wunde , na wamudika ti yaa kuyaabisa ma kamuyaabisiri mamo , kuri muutu ti mosi .
44023023	Mukuutu fuunda , bu kateele bakuutu boolo ba nkama , waleele ti : " Holee nkama dzoolo dza bayongolo , makuumi tsaamu ma banati ba makavaalu na nkama dzoolo dza bakebi , bayirima mu kwende ku Kayisareya , mu kilookolo kya bitatu kya butsuku .
44023024	Yirikeenu se makavaalu ma lunatina Pawulo mpee-mpolo kuri ngoforo Felikisi . "
44023025	Nde watina mukaanda , na mi katinini mimami :
44023026	" Kolodyo Lisya , kuri ngoforo ya lukiinsu Felikisi , mboto !
44023027	Muutu wu , Bayudayo bamukaangiri , na bamono dyo ti bayelemene kumudzusa . Me bu nyayukiri ti muutu bari Loma , ha nyayensi na mpuumbu bayongolo mu kumukuula .
44023028	Bu nyasakiri kuyaaba bubi bu bari mu kumfuundila , me nyamuneti ha busu bwa kikuutu kya bo .
44023029	Me mwiinyee ti mi bari mu kumufuundila , mitariri mi bakwesa nkalikisi mu mangisi ma bo . Kuri musamu ti mosi ko , mu mi bari mu kumufuundila , wu bayelemini mu kumudzusa bunu pe mu kumusoko mu boroko .
44023030	Bu ba nyaabisiri kele dya mu nde , mawasu-mawasu , me nyikuheekiri nde , na me ndoombiri kuri bari mu kumufuunda , biisa baleele ha busu bwa ye , myamibi mi kari kayirika . "
44023031	Hango , bayongolo , bunu buri lutumu lu bari bataambula , baholo Pawulo , bamunata mu butsuku ku bvula dya Antipatiri .
44023032	Bukyaanaa , baha miswa kuri banati ba makavaalu mu kweemuholo na kumunata ; tumi bayongolo babvutuka ku badzakalaa .
44023033	Bu bakoto mu Kayisareya , bayakisa mukaanda kuri ngoforo na basoongo Pawulo kuri nde .
44023034	Bu kataanga mukaanda , wafuula bula bwa fumuni Pawulo , na bamuyaabisa ti ku Kilikya .
44023035	Nde waleele ti : " Me kukuywiila mu ntaangu yiri bafuundi ba ye batelemini ha busu bwa me . " Nde waha miswa mu kumukebele mu nzo miyalu ya Erode .
44024001	Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitaanu , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi Ananya wayisa kintwaari na bakulu ba babakala babamosi , na nzoonsi mosi ya nkariri , nkuumbu yaandi Teretilo , babo bafuundiri Pawulo kuri ngoforo .
44024002	Bu bamuteele , Teretilo wabaandika mu kumufuunda , waleele ti : " Walukiinsu , beetu twataambula kiyeengi kyakinene , na mbweeyulu ya nsi yimayi yiri mu kumonokono mu ntoono bweese bwa ye ,
44024003	Walukiinsu Felikisi , beetu tutoondo kwalaka bu tutaambulaa mamo , mu mpisi ntaangu , na mu bibeendu byobinso .
44024004	Me ntiiri kudya ntaangu ye yalaka ko , me nyikuloombo mu kuba na mpemisi mu kuywiila beetu , mu mwaa-myamikufi .
44024005	Beetu tubakuryee ti muutu wu kiyoolo kiri , mukuutu kisaangila kuri Bayudayo bobanso , munu mu bari bayende kwetuunga ; tumi ha yulu haho se , nde mukuutu kabu dya minsaambiri myahaambuka mya ku Nadzareti .
44024006	Nde watsiitsiri kusumuna Nzo-nzaambi , mu didyo , beetu twamukaangiri . [
44024008	Mbuti ye wumufuuriri , lo ye sa mono ti , mi turi mu kumufuundila miri myangwanwa . "
44024009	Bayudayo basika ti mimyo bunubwo miri .
44024010	Ngoforo bu kamuha miswa mu kunzoonso , Pawulo wabvutula waleele ti : " Kuholosono mibvu myalaka , me nyaari ti ye wuri nzoonsi mu kaanda dimadi . Hango nkuumbu , me nyikalila nyutu yaami mu nsiitu .
44024011	Ye wayelemene kuyaaba ti , me nyakiri kukukisa pe biluumbu kuumi na byoolo , kuholosono ku nyatoombikiri me ku Yerusalemi , mu kusaambila .
44024012	Muutu ti mosi wahele kumono me ti mu nzo-nzaambi , kuri nyikalikisa na muutu , bunu pe nyisinda mpuumbu mu kusa kisaangila , ti mu manzo ma nkutukunu , ti kunsa bvula .
44024013	Bo ka babangusina kusoongo kitotolo ti kimosi ko kuri ye , mu mi bari mu kufuundila me .
44024014	Me ntaambiri musamu wunde wu bari mu kuleele me , mu nzila ya kabu . Mukwongo me nyiri mu kwesaambila Nzaambi yiyo ya bataayi beetu bobanso . Me nyasa kanyi mu matinu mu Mangisi na Babikiri .
44024015	Nsiitu dzi nyasa mu Nzaambi , dzinidzo se bo bari na dzo , sa kwaba mfulukulu baatu basuunguma na bangaa-bubayi .
44024016	Me-meene nyisalila kwa mu kumonoko kwahele maseembu mu nsimunu yaami , ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na ha busu bwa baatu mu mantaangu momanso .
44024017	« Ha mambisa mya mibvu myalaka , me nyiisiri kubvutuka ku Yerusalemi , mu kutwaala lubakusu kuri kaanda dyaami , na kuha bikabu .
44024018	Mu ntaangu ya bikabu yiyo , bo bamwiini me nyatsyeemeke mu Nzo-nzaambi , kari na mpuumbu ko , kari se mu kisaangila ko .
44024019	Ngo kasi Bayudayo babamosi ba ku Asya , babeeri haho , bo baketyee kufuunda me kuri ye , mbuti bamwii dyadibi mu me .
44024020	Bunu pe , bamaba baleele , bubi bu bamwiini mu me , ha nyabee nyateleme ha busu bwa kikuutu kya Bayudayo .
44024021	Bunu pe mu mbeembu yomosi yi nyabikisiri me , ha kakati dya bo , " mu ntoono mfulukulu ya bafwa , me bari mu kutsuundisa , lolo di ha busu bwa beenu ! " »
44024022	Felikisi wayiinga kiluumbu , bu kaba yaari myominso mi tariri Nzila , na waleele ti : " Tumi ha sunduka Lisya , mukuutu fuunda , me mfyongokono misamu mi tariri beenu . "
44024023	Nde watuma mukuutu nkama mu kumukebe mu boroko , kuri wuri na mwaa-bunsaalisi , na se kuri banduku baandi bamubakisa .
44024024	Ha mambisa ma mwaa-biluumbu , Felikisi bo na mukasi waandi wa Muyudayo , Durusila , bayisa . Batumisa Pawulo na bamuyuka wudzoonsolo mu kanyi dya Kiristo Yesu .
44024025	Bo bayolo na nde mu mi tariri nsungumunu , mu nkebulu nyutu na mu mutsuundu wukwiisa . Felikisi wabwiila kinkuuku , waleele ti : " Mu ntaangu yi , yende ; me mbaka mpwaani sa nyikuteele lukimi . "
44024026	Nde waba nsiitu ti , Pawulo sa kamuha mboongo ; mu didyo nde kaba Muteelaana kinsosi-kinsosi mu kuyolaa na nde .
44024027	Mibvu myoolo bu myalabuka , Felikisi wataambula muyiingisi , nkuumbu yaandi , Porokyo Festo . Wunde se bu katya kubweeye ha busu bwa Bayudayo , wahemese Pawulo mu boroko .
44025001	Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitatu bi katubukiri , Festo wayisika ku Kayisareya , mu kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi .
44025002	Bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi na Bayudayo ba lukiinsu , bafuunda Pawulo , na bayingukila Festo .
44025003	Bo baloombo bweese kuri nde , mpisi kaba bvutukila Pawulo ku Yerusalemi , na kukwo , bamulebekele mweete mu nzila mu kumudzusa .
44025004	Ngo kasi nde wabvutula ti : Pawulo wuri mu boroko dya ku Kayisareya , na me-meene Festo nyiri mu kubvutuka mu mawasu .
44025005	Nde wabweese kuleele ti : " Hango babo bamono ti bakuka ngo bari basunduka ha kimosi na me ; mbuti bari na kibila mu muutu wunde , lo bamufuunda ! "
44025006	Bu kalutisa biluumbu mpoomo bunu pe kuumi , nde wasunduka ku Kayisareya . Kiluumbu kyanama , bu kaba kadzakala mu nzo ya mutsuundu , waloombo ti bamutwaalikila Pawulo .
44025007	Bu kayisa , Bayudayo bafumini ku Yerusalemi bamudyengekele , bamufuunda mu myalaka , miri bahele kubangisina kusoongo .
44025008	Pawulo wakalila nyutu yaandi waleele ti : " Me nyahele kuyirika sumu ti dimosi , ti ha busu bwa Mangisi ma Bayudayo , ti mu mya mu Nzo-nzaambi , ti mu mi tariri Kayisari . "
44025009	Festo bu katya kubweeye ha busu bwa Bayudayo , mu mpeelu mvutu kuri Pawulo , waleele kuri nde ti : " Buri ye tiiri kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi , mu mimami , mpisi bakutsuundisa , kuri me nyiri ha nsi ? "
44025010	Pawulo waleele ti : " Me nyateleme ha busu bwa mutsuundu wa Kayisari , kukwo me ntiiri ti bansuundisa . Me nyahele kuyirika dyadibi kuri Bayudayo , bunu bu yirikiri ye kuyaaba .
44025011	Mbuti me nyasa lumvuki , na nyayirika ntoono , yiri nyayelemene kufwa , lo me nyahele kubisa kufwa . Ngo mbuti kwahele ntoono yangwanwa mu mi bari mu kumfuundila , lo kuri muutu wuri na miswa mu kuyekele me mu myooko mya bo ko . Ngo me ndoombiri bansuundisa ha busu bwa Kayisari "
44025012	Haho Festo , bu kayende ku mfuundu na ba nde , wabvutula ti : " Ku Kayisari ye loombiri mu kweende , kunukwo ye wukweende . "
44025013	Mwa biluumbu bu byaluta , mbyaasi Angiripa na Berenike batubuka ku Kayisareya , baha Festo mboto .
44025014	Bo badzakala kukwo biluumbu byalaka ; Festo wayala mampolo kuri mbyaasi , mu mi tariri Pawulo , waleele ti : " Boroko dimosi Felikisi kasiisiri .
