44025015	Me bu nyayeensi ku Yerusalemi , bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi , na bakulu ba babakala ba Bayudayo banyaabisiri misamu mya mu nde , na baloombiri ti me nyimukesele mukanu .
44025016	Me nyabvutiri kuri bo ti , bari Loma bahele na kifu kya kuyekele mu myooko mya baatu , muutu wu bafuundiri , tekesele kabaka mpwaani ha busu bwa bamufuundiri mu kukalila nyutu , mu mi bamufuundiri .
44025017	Hango [ bo ] bobanso bayisiri ha , kwahele kumpa laki . Bu bukyeeri , me nzakiri mu nzo muyalu , na ntumisini bantwalikila muutu wunde .
44025018	Bu twadzakala , bafuundi bateleme , ngo kuri ti dimosi ko , mu mi bamufuundiri myabwanikina na mi nyabee tsima me myamibi .
44025019	Ngo dzini mwaa-nkalikisi mu mi tariri nsaambukulu yaaku ; mi bari bamubelele mitariri muutu mosi , nkuumbu yaandi Yesu , wuri wafwa , ngo kasi Pawulo wuri mu kuleele ti wuri mwooyo .
44025020	Ngo bukuri me nyahele kuyaaba mi nyisa , me nyafuuriri Pawulo , mbuti tiiri kweende ku Yerusalemi , na kukwo bamutsuundisa mu mimyo .
44025021	Kasi Pawulo waloombo ti musamu nde kaba wakebu , natee Oguste lalimini nde . Mu bubwo , me nyatuma ti bamukebe natee ku nyimuheeke me kuri Kayisari .
44025022	Angiripa waleele kuri Festo ti : " Me se bee ntiiri kuywiila muutu wunde . " Festo wabvutula ti : " Bweepari sa wumuywiila . "
44025023	Hango , bu bwakya , Angiripa bo na Berenike bayisa mu lukiinsu na mpuumbu baatu , na bakoto mu nzo mutsuundu kintwaari na bakuutu ba mikaangu mya fuunda , na baatu bari bunu buri lukiinsu lwaaku mu bvula . Festo bu kaha lutumu , batwaala Pawulo .
44025024	Festo waleele ti : " Mbyaasi Angiripa na beenu bobanso luri hamaha , monee muutu wuri mu ntoono nde , mpuumbu Bayudayo yoyinso yayisiri kuri me , ku Yerusalemi , na hamaha se , mu kuloombo mu misaakulu ti yaa kabweese kuba wamwooyo ko .
44025025	Mu bitsimi bya me , me nyahele kumono di kari kasa mu kubwiilila mukanu wa lufwa . Mu bukuri nde waloombo ti musamu waandi , Oguste wuyelemini kudzoonso nde , me nyakaangiri kitsimi mu kumuheeke .
44025026	Me nyahele na dya butswiswikii dya kutinina mukuutu , mu didyo me nyikutweesikiri nde hamaha , mpisi heki ha lumbisa lwa bifuuri bya beenu , me mbaka mya kutina .
44025027	Me madyeele mawa , mu kuheeke ku Loma boroko kwahele kusoongo bubi , bu bari mu kumufuundila .
44026001	Angiripa waleele kuri Pawulo ti : " Wuri na miswa mu kukalila nyutu yaaku . " Haho Pawulo kalaambula kooko wadzoonso mu kukalila nyutu yaandi :
44026002	" Mu myominso mya fuundiri me Bayudayo , mbyaasi Angiripa , me nyiri na kiminu kyalaka mu kukalila nyutu yaami ha busu bwa ye , lolo dimadi ,
44026003	bukuri ye wuri na nyaabulu ya myominso , mitariri bifu bya Bayudayo na mi bakwesiila bo nkalikisi . Ha ngo nkuumbu , me nyikuyingukila mu nkindusulu-mutima mu kunywiila .
44026004	" Hango kidziingu kyaami , kuholosono kunu mbandukulu butuuti bwaami , me nyikiyookisiirye hansa kaanda dyaami ; Bayudayo bobanso badzakala mu Yerusalemi bayaari .
44026005	Kuholosono na kidzika banyaari ; lo bateeriri me kimbaangi . Me netyee kidziingu kyaami bunu Mufarisi , bunu buri nsambukulu yeetu .
44026006	Na mu lumalu mu nsiitu dza lusiilulu dzasa Nzaambi kuri bataayi beetu , me ntelimini ku mutsuundu .
44026007	Kintwaari kya makaanda mo kuumi na moolo meetu , makwesalila mu kifiki , butsuku na mwiini , mari na nsiitu mu kumono nsiilulu dzidzo . Mu ntoono nsiitu dzidzo , mbyaasi , Bayudayo bafuundiri me .
44026008	Bukuri ki luri mu kutsima , ti Nzaambi kari mfulukisa bafwa ko ?
44026009	" Me ngo wuri , nyaba na kitsimi kya kunwaanisa , mu manzila momanso , nkuumbu Yesu , wa ku Nadzareti .
44026010	Mamo se , me nyasiiri ku Yerusalemi . Nyasoko bangisi balaka mu boroko , bu nyataamburi lutumu lwa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi . Me nyataamburi kuri ti babadzusa , habaanaa babakesiri mukanu wa lufwa .
44026011	Me nyayende mu manzo ma nkutukunu mu kwebaseembe . Nyabakwiikisa mu kuri basaana nkuumbu Yesu , na mu nkesi dzalutila kiteesu , nyabanama natee mu mabvula manzeense .
44026012	Mu ntoono misamu mimyo , me nyayende ku Damasiko , na lutumu na kisalu kya mpeeri bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi .
44026013	Mu nkati-mwiini , ha kakati dya nzila , buungi bubvuriri na ntaangu , bwafumuna ku yulu , bwadyengekele me , ha kimosi na baba kwemfila .
44026014	Beetu bobanso twabwa ha nsi , me nyayuka mbeembu yaba leele me mu ndiinga ya kihebeleho ti : " Sawuli , Sawuli ! Mu nki wuri mu kwekwaamisa me ? Diri mpasi kuri ye , mu kunwaanisa kutya kwa Nzaambi .
44026015	Me nyafuula ti : " Mfumu ye na ? Mfumu waleele ti : " Me ngo Yesu , wu wuri mu kwekwaamisa .
44026016	Kasi , siimbika na teleme mu miilu myaaku ; me nyikumonokini mu kusa ye kisari kyaami na mbaangi [ me ] mu ma mwiini , na ma wubweese kumono , ha nyikumonokono me .
44026017	Mu kukuula ye mu kaanda , na kweende ku nyikuheeke me kuri bangooyi .
44026018	Me nyikuheekiri mu kudzibula miisu mya bo , mpisi bapala mu mampimbisi biisa ku buungi , bapala na mu lutumu lwa Satana , mu kuba mu lwa Nzaambi , mu kutaambula mpemusunu ya masumu , na bataambula kikuuku ha kakati dya bangisi mu kanyi dibasa mu me . "
44026019	Mu bubwo , mbyaasi Angiripa , me nyasii tungukila mamono-miisu ma ku yulu mamo ko .
44026020	Kubaandukila kuri bari ku Damasiko , tumi bari ku Yerusalemi , nkoonsi yoyinso ya Yudaya , na kuri bangooyi , nyayikisa ti bayiinga madyeele , na babvutuka kuri Nzaambi , na basalila biyiriki byayelemene na nyiingulu madyeele .
44026021	Mu ntoono yiyo , [ bu nyaba ] mu Nzo-nzaambi , Bayudayo bankaanga na basaka bwa kunzusila .
44026022	Me Nzaambi wa bakisa me , natee mu kiluumbu ki . Me nyiri hamaha , mu kuta kimbaangi kuri bilesi na bakuutu . Babikiri na Moose bayaabisiri miyelemini kwiisa , minimyo se me nyiri mu kwetswiikisa .
44026023	Mbuti Kiristo wamwiini mpasi , na nde ngo watete mu kufuluka mu bafwa , nde yelemini kuyaabisa buungi kuri kaanda na kuri bangooyi . "
44026024	Pawulo bu kari mu kukalila nyutu mu mamo , Festo mu mbeembu yadzaangama waleele ti : " Ye walawuka , Pawulo ! Nyaabulu yi wuri na ye , kukunata ku kulawuka ! "
44026025	Kasi Pawulo wabvutula ti : " Me nyahele kulawuka , Walukiinsu Festo , ngo ma ndeeriri me ma ngwanwa na ma madyeele .
44026026	Mukwongo mbyaasi yaari myominso mimyo , na me lo nzoonsiri mu nsiitu ha busu bwa nde . Me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti nde kadziimburi ti dimosi mu mamo ko , bukuri mamo mahele kuyirima mu nsweeki .
44026027	Buri ye wusa kanyi mu babikiri , mbyaasi Angiripa ? Me nyaari ti ye wusa kanyi ! "
44026028	Angiripa waleele kuri Pawulo ti : " Hasiiri , hantele ye tiiri kukitula me mukiristo . "
44026029	Pawulo waleele kuri nde ti : " Ntaangu yiba yantele , bunu pe yalaka , me nyisaambila Nzaambi , kari mu wunu ye ko , ngo mu beenu-banso luri mu kuyuka me lolo di , mpisi luba bunu me , ngo kwahele bikonyi bi ! "
44026030	Mbyaasi , ngoforo , Berenike na bobanso baba na bo , bateleme ,
44026031	na bu bayende ku mfuundu , badzoonso bo na bo , baleele ti : " Muutu wu wahele kuyirika ntoono ti mosi wu bayelemini kumudzusa bunu pe kumusa mu bikonyi . "
44026032	Angiripa waleele kuri Festo ti : " Muutu wu beeri wayelemene kumupatula , mbuti bee wahele kuloombo kuri ti Kayisari kalalama . "
44027001	Bu baholo nzeengulu dza kunata beetu ku Italya , baha Pawulo na maboroko makimi kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo , nkuumbu yaandi Yulyo , mu mukaangu bayongolo wa Oguste .
44027002	Beetu twanwaata mu bwaatu , bwa Adaramitino , bwaba kweende mu mabula ma Asya , mari mu teke mubu . Baba na beetu ngo Aristarako wa ku Makedonya wudzakalaa ku Tesalonika .
44027003	Kiluumbu kyanama , beetu twatuula ku Sidoni . Yulyo waba hololo Pawulo mu bumuutu , wamuha miswa mu kwemono banduku baandi , mu kutaambula lubakusu lukaba na nzala lwo .
44027004	Bu twayisika haho , twayende mu teteke dya simu dya Kiporo , mu ntoono kiteembu kyaba tubwaana ,
44027005	na beetu twataba mubu , bebele dya Kilikya na Pamfilya , na twasunduka ku Mira mya ku Likya .
44027006	Haho , mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu kamono bwaatu bwa ku Alekanderi bwaba kweende ku Italya , nde wutunwaatisa mu bwo .
44027007	Mu biluumbu byalaka , beetu twaba kweyende buke-buke mu maampa ; na mu mpasi dzalaka beetu twatubuka ku teke bvula dya Kinido , ngo twasii bangusina kusunduka haho ko , mu ntoono kiteembu kyaba tukakisila . Beetu twayendekele mu teteke dya simu , twabwa ha kakati dya maampa dya Salemone , mu kutubuka ku Kerete .
44027008	Mu mpasi , beetu twatubuka ku kibeendu ki bateela ti Masabu Mamabwete , bebele na bvula dya Lasaya .
44027009	Ntaangu yalaka yaba yimwaaluta , na bwaba bweki bwabubi mu kweyendekele mu maampa , mu bukuri ntaangu ya loomi yaba yimwaaluta . Pawulo walubula ,
44027010	waleele kuri bo ti : " Banduku baami , me nyimono ti budyeengi bu , buri na nsisi , kari munu mu bitotolo ko , ngo se na mu kidziingu kya muutu-muutu mu beetu . "
44027011	Kasi mukuutu nkama waba bvuriri kusiila nsiitu mu munati na mu ngaa-bwaatu , ti na mu maba leele Pawulo .
44027012	Ngo bukuri sabu dyaba bwa kulutisila pe ntaangu ya kyoosi , balaka baha kitsimi kya kuyisika haho , mu kuri ti kampe tutubukiri ku Foyiniki , sabu dya Kerete , ku teke sude bebele na weste na ku node bebele na weste .
44027013	Kiteembu kyadzuuna kyafumuna ku sude kyabeke kupeepe . Bo batsima ti lo beensi kwaaku ; ngo bayende mu nzila ya Kerete .
44027014	Mwaa-kidzika kyantele kiteembu kya makwa , ki bateelaana Erakilo , kyasangumuka .
44027015	Kiteembu kyanata bwaatu , na bu twaba bwakusiila pe , twayendekele bunubwo .
44027016	Bu twaba mu kuluta ku nsuku kibuma ki bateelaa Kawuda , mu mpasi dzalaka beetu twabangisini kaholo mwaa-bwaatu bwantele bwa lubakusu .
44027017	Bakolokoso bwaatu bubwo mu misiinga mya lubakusu . Mu kubata kuri ti bakwiisa kutukoko natee ku Siriti , bo basundula bitsuri bya miti bikoobaanaa byakolokoso mu bwaatu , na bahemese bee yendekele mu kiteembu bunubwo .
44027018	Kiluumbu kyaba nama , kiteembu bunu kyaba kyakiri mu kutuningisa . Baatu babeke kulooso bitotolo mu kuleengese bwaatu .
44027019	Na mu kiluumbu kyabitatu , bo basundula makuunsi ma bwaatu mu myooko mya bo-meene .
44027020	Mu biluumbu byalaka , ntaangu na bambwetete byasii pala ko ; kiteembu kyasii kuluka ti mwaa-kwantele ko , na nsiitu ya kubvuuka yaba yeki yo pe .
44027021	Byandya byaba bimwaawa na kidzika . Pawulo , bu kateleme ha kakati dya bo , waleele ti : " Ho ! Banduku , bwaba bwayelemini ti beenu lunwiila ; twaketyee kuyisika Kerete ko , mu kuhele kusuumbuka na kuhele kuhoomboso byobinso bi .
44027022	Mu lumalu me nyiluloombo ti lwaatee kibakala . Kuri muutu mu beenu wufwa ko , ngo bunu bwaatu bubvukuna .
44027023	Mukwongo , Nzaambi yi bakiri me , na yi nkoosalila me , mbasi yaandi yiisiryee kumonokono me , mu butsuku
44027024	na yileeriryee kuri me ti : " Pawulo ya baa na boomo ko , ye yelemini kuteleme ha busu bwa Kayisari ; na mono , Nzaambi wukusiiriri bweese na bobanso ba luri mu budyeengi .
44027025	Hango nkuumbu , banduku beenee na kibakala , me nyiri na nsiitu mu Nzaambi ; mamo ma kaleeriryee kuri me , sa mayirima .
44027026	Buri bwabubwete ti tutelemee ha yulu kibuma .
44027027	Butsuku bubwo bwaba bweki bwa kuumi na bina , na twaba tumwaawumuka wa Adirya . Mu kakati dya butsuku , bisari bya mu bwaatu , babaka kitsimi ti kampe tukokisiri bebele na butoto .
44027028	Bo badiimba musundu , na babaka mankwaanga makuumi moolo ; bu bayende ha mankula , babweese kudiimba , na babaka mankwaanga kuumi na mataanu .
44027029	Bo bamono boomo , ti bwee tukakiri mu matari , basundula binko bina ku mambisa ma bwaatu , na basuka mutima ti nkani bwiisi buwasula mu kukya .
44027030	Bisari bya bwaatu baba na nzala kuyitika ; bu basundula mwaa-bwaatu bwa lubakusu , ku mutu bwaatu , bo kuleele ti binko bakwee yirika .
44027031	Pawulo waleele kuri mukuutu nkama bayongolo na bayongolo ti : " Mbuti baatu ba bahele kuba munsa bwaatu , lo beenu lubangusina kubvuuka ko . "
44027032	Haho bayongolo batabula misiinga myaba myakolokoso mwaa-bwaatu bwa lubakusu na badipatula dyayende mu maampa .
44027033	Tekesele bwiisi bukya , Pawulo wasyaamisa bobanso ti nkani badya , waleele ti : " Kiluumbu ki kyakuumi na bina , luri mu kukiinga na lwahele kudya .
44027034	Hango nkuumbu me nyilusyaamisa mu kuholo byandya , bukuri mvuukulu yeenu yiri mu byo , na kuri ti lufu lumosi lwa mitu myeenu ludziimbila ko . "
44027035	Nde kaleelaa mimyo , waholo mpa , wabvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , ha busu bwa bobanso , na bu kabukuna , wabaandika kudya .
44027036	Bobanso babaka makwa , na bo se baholo byandya mu kudya .
44027037	Munsa bwaatu , twaba nkama dzoolo na makuumi nsaamu na baatu basaamunu .
44027038	Bu bayukuta , bo balooso masaangu mu mubu mu kuleengese bwaatu .
44027039	Bwiisi bu bwakya , basii bweese kuyaaba butoto ko , ngo batalila mwaa-waanga diri na kibeendu kyapalila munyeenge . Bo bakaanga kitsimi kya kweende ku simu , mbuti babangusini kusindukila bwaatu .
44027040	Bu bapatula binko , bayende ha yulu mubu , mu ntaangu yomosi , banyanguna misiinga mya kisuunguki , bataanda nsaanda ya ku mankula ma bwaatu , mpisi heki kiteembu kibasindukila ku simu .
44027041	Bo babwa ha kikuma kya munyeenge , kiri ha kakati dya mubu ; bo basaka bwakweendekile ku simu , ngo mutu wakakimina kunsa munyeenge , bwaatu bwaba bwa kutembekele pe . Kitsuri kya mambisa kyatsyaamuka mu ntoono makwa ma [ mipaku ] .
44027042	Kutya kwa bayongolo kwaba ti badzusa maboroko , mpisi heki ti dimosi dihele kubwa mu mubu na kubvuuka ha mambisa ma kutsaya .
44027043	Mukuutu nkama bayongolo bu katiiri kuyitikisa Pawulo , wabakabikisa kitsimi kikyo . Nde watuma kuri babo babangusina kutsaya , mu kubwa batete mu maampa na beende ku simu .
44027044	Heki mu babo basiiri , babamosi basalila mabaya , bakaka basalila mabaya ma bayisila mu bwaatu . Bubwo bobanso batubuka ku simu , mpee-mpolo .
44028001	Bu babvuuka mpee-mpolo , bo bayuka ti kibuma kya butoto ki batubukiri kikyo nkuumbu Melite .
44028002	Bangaa-bula bubwo batubwaana mu ntiilu yayinene . Bu banamuka mbaawu , batuteele ku kuyoto , mu ntoono mbvula yaba yimwaanoko , na mu ntoono kyoosi .
44028003	Pawulo bu katolo bitsootso byalaka , wabituba ku mbaawu , mpiri yapala , mu ntoono nyangala , na yamutatika mu kooko .
44028004	Bangaa-bula bu bamono nyoko yiri mu kutsinga mu kooko kwa Pawulo , bo na bo baleele ti : " Ngwanwa muutu wu mudzusi kari . Nde pariryee mpee-mpolo mu mubu , ngo nsundusulu dza Nzaambi dzimuha miswa ko mu kuba mwooyo .
44028005	Hango nde kakubulaa kooko , nyoko yabwa ku mbaawu ; nde wahele kumono mpasi ti dzimosi .
44028006	Baatu baba kiingilaa ti kooko bee kumutuundiri , bunu pe bee fwiiri na sisuu . Bo bakiingila kidzika kyalaka , na bahele kumono dya mpasi dimutubukila . Bo bayiinga nzoonsulu , beki leele ti muutu wu nzaambi kari .
44028007	Bebele na kibeendu kikyo , kwaba bula bwa muutu mosi , mukuutu kibuma , nkuumbu yaandi Popilyo , watutaambiri , mu kimbaasi ku nzo yaandi , mu biluumbu bitatu .
44028008	Ngo taayi dya Popilyo wabeele baawu , na mwooyo wa makila , waneŋene . Pawulo wayende kuri nde , wasaambila , wamutetekele myooko , na wamutsinikisa .
44028009	Mamo bu mamonoko , baatu bakimi ku kibuma , baba na babeeru bakokosolo , na batsiinika .
44028010	Bo batuhololo mu lukiinsu lwolunso ; bu twaba tweki mu kweende , batuha bi twaba na nzala byo mu budyeengi .
44028011	Ha lumbisa lwa mangoondo matatu , beetu twaholo bwaatu bwa ku Alekanderi , bwalutisiri ntaangu ya kyoosi ku kibuma . Bisoni byatina mu bwaatu byaba « Dyoskuro . »
44028012	Bu twatubuka ku Sirakusayi , beetu twalutisa biluumbu bitatu haho .
44028013	Bu twayisika haho , twatubuka ku Lengyoni . Ha mambisa ma kiluumbu kimosi , kiteembu kya sude kyatubuka , na bukyaanaa twatubuka ku Potyolo ,
44028014	kukwo , twabaka bampaangi , batuteele mu kudzakala kuri bo , mu biluumbu nsaamu ; bubwo twatubukila ku Loma .
44028015	Bampaangi ba ku Loma , bu bayuka mi twabwanikini na myo , bayisa tubwaana natee ku dzaandu dya Apyo , na ku Manzo Matatu . Pawulo bu kabamona wabvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , na walwaata kibakala .
44028016	Mu ntaangu yi twakoto mu Loma , baha miswa kuri Pawulo mu kuba kwa nde-kaka na muyongolo waba kemukebaana .
44028017	Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitatu , Pawulo wateele bakuutu batete ba Bayudayo ba ku Loma , ku nzo yi kaba . Bu bakutukuna , nde waleele kuri bo ti : " Bampaangi baami , me nyahele kuyirika lumvuki ti lumosi kuri kaanda , bunu pe kuri bifu bya bataayi beetu . Bu nyabee mu boroko ku Yerusalemi , me banyekele mu myooko mya bari Loma .
44028018	Bo bamfuulaana , baba batiiri kumpatula , mu ntoono yiri bahele kumono kibila ki badzusila me .
44028019	Ngo kasi , Bayudayo basii tya ko , na me nya kati kuloombo ti Kayisari kansuundisa , kuri nyahele na kitsimi kya kufuunda kaanda dyaami .
44028020	Mu ntoono yiyo me ndoombiryee mu kulumono , na mu kuyolo na beenu . Mu ntoono nsiitu ya Isaheli , me nyiri mu bikonyi bi nyiri na byo bi .
44028021	Bo bamuleele ti : « Mu mitariri ye , beetu twahele kutaambula mukaanda ti mosi , wafumuni ku Yudaya ; kwahele se ti mosi mu bampaangi bayisiri kumaku , watuyaabisa bunu pe wadzoonso mamabi mu ye .
44028022	Ngo beetu tutiiryee kuyuka ye-meene , ma wutsima ye , mu mitariri kabu dya minsaambiri myahaambuka , bukuri dyayabakana ku turi beetu , na mwomunso bari mu kudinwaanisa . »
44028023	Bu bakaanga laki na Pawulo , bo bayisa mu lutaangu lwalaka ku nzo yaandi . Kuri bo kayaabisa mu nteelulu kimbaangi kya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi , mu kubayukusa mu mitariri Yesu , kabandukila mu Mangisi ma Moose , natee mu babikiri , baholosonaa kipari natee nsinsika .
44028024	Babamosi basiila kanyi mu ma kaba leelaana , bakaka babisa kusa kanyi .
44028025	Bu baba kuyukusuna pe bo na bo , batsamukina . Pawulo waleele dyaambu dimosi ti : « Bwabubwete , Mpeeve Yangisi yadzoonsiri mu Esaya kuri bataayi beenu ,
44028026	yaleele ti : " Yende leele kuri kaanda didyo : Beenu sa lwayuka , ngo ka lubakula ko ; beenu sa lwakyeese , ngo ka lumono ko .
44028027	Bukuri mutima kaanda di weki wakuba ; bari na mpasi mu kuyuka mu makutu , bakaangiryee miisu myaaku , mpisi bahele kumono mu miisu , na bahele kuyuka mu makutu , na bahele kubakula mu mutima , na bahele kuyiinga madyeele , kuri me nyibatsinikisa . "
44028028	Ngo diba dyayabakana kuri beenu ti , mvuukulu ya Nzaambi yi , yeki yaheeku , kuri bangooyi ; bo se sa bayuka ! » [
44028030	Pawulo wadzakala mibvu myoolo mu nzo ya kufutila . Nde waba taambulaana bobanso baba kweemumonaa .
44028031	Nde wayaabisa Kimfumu kya Nzaambi , na wayikisa mitariri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , mu nsiitu dzodzinso , kwahele bikakusulu .
45001001	Pawulo , nkutu Yesu Kiristo , wataambula mbila mu kuba ntumu na wu bari basoolo mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi .
45001002	Nzaambi watekisiri kusa nsiilulu kuri babikiri baandi mu Matinu Mangisi ,
45001003	mu mitariri Mwaana waandi , wabutukila mu kaanda dya Davidi mu muswinyi ,
45001004	wu kari kasa Mwaana Nzaambi , mu mpinu , bunu buri Mpeeve ya bungisi , mu mfulukulu ya bafwa , ngo Yesu Kiristo Mfumu yeetu .
45001005	Mu nde turi twataambula bweese na buntumu , mu kuri ti makaanda momanso matumuma mu kanyi , mu nkuumbu yaandi ,
45001006	munsa mo beenu se luri baatu , bataambula mbila Yesu Kiristo .
45001007	Kuri banduku ba Nzaambi bobanso ba mutima , bari ku Loma , bataambula mbila mu kuba bangisi : bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
45001008	Hatete , me nyibvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi yaami mu Yesu Kiristo , mu ntoono beenu bobanso , bukuri kanyi dyeenu bakwedzoonsolo mu dyo , mu nsi yansiina .
45001009	Mukwongo , Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , nde wu nyisalilaa me mu mpeeve yaami , mu nyabusulu Musamu Wamubwete wa Mwaana waandi : me nyibambukilaa beenu mwooyo kwahele kuhoto ,
45001010	mu nsaambulu dzaami , mu mantaangu momanso . Me nyiri mu kuloombaana mpisi mbaka , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , mpwaani ya kwiisa kuri beenu .
45001011	Bukuri nyiri na musoongo walaka wa kulumono , mpisi heki nyilutubukila kikabu kyakimpeeve , mpisi luba bakumusu .
45001012	Mimyo mu kuri ti tubeenee basyaamusu ha kimosi , ha nyiba kuri beenu , mu kanyi dyantwaari kuri beenu na kuri me .
45001013	Bampaangi , me ntii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu . Mantaangu malaka me nkootsimaa kwiisa , mu kutolo bimbutu kuri beenu na kuri makaanda makaka , ngo natee mu lumalu me bankabikisa .
45001014	Me nyiri na ma nyelemini kuyirika kuri Bahelene na kuri banzeense , kuri bangaa-madyeele na kuri madzeeke se .
45001015	Mu didyo , me nyiri na musoongo wa kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete kuri beenu se bari Loma .
45001016	Mukwongo , me nyahele na nsoni mu Musamu Wamubwete , bukuri nde ngo mpinu dza Nzaambi , mu mvuukulu ya mpisi wunde wusiila kanyi , ha tete kuri Bayudayo tumi kuri Bahelene .
45001017	Bukuri nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yayabakana mu nde , mu kanyi na mu ntoono kanyi bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Ngaa-kusuunguma sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi . »
45001018	Mukwongo , kunu kinsongi-yulu , nkesi dza Nzaambi dzimonokinaa mu baatu bahele na kinzaambi , na bari na bubayi , basweekaa ngwanwa kunsa bubayi ,
45001019	ngo mari lo bayaaburi mu Nzaambi , mari mamonokono kuri bo , bukuri Nzaambi wabasoongo mo .
45001020	Mukwongo , bitotolo bya nde byahele kumonokono , mpinu dzahele manunu na bunzaambi , kuholosono nyirikulu nsi , biri byamonokono mbuti babimwiinini mu biyiriki byaandi . Ngo bo ka babaka mpemisi ko ,
45001021	bukuri bu bayaaba Nzaambi , ka basii kumukeembese bunu Nzaambi ko , bunu pe kubvutula matoondo kuri nde ko . Kasi bayeki bamikangala mu nsimunu yaaku , na mitima mya bo mya buwulu miri kunsa mampimbisi .
45001022	Bo batsima kuba bangaa-madyeele , ngo bilawuku bari ,
45001023	na bayeki baha nkeembu Nzaambi yiri yafwaa ko , kuri biteki biri mu kifwaani kya muutu wufwaanaa , kya banoni , kya bibulu na kya banyoko .
45001024	Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kabayekele mu nsumukunu mu nzila ya nyiimunu dza mitima myaaku , mu kuhele kukiinsa manyutu ma bo-meene .
45001025	Bo bakituri ngwanwa ya Nzaambi yeki mpya , badumusini na basaambiri kiyiriki ha kibeendu kya Muyiriki , nde wuri wasakumunu kwahele manunu . Amene .
45001026	Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kabayekele mu mantiilu mansoni . Mukwongo , bakyeetu ba bo bahotiri kwepala na babakala , mu kwesakisina na bambaasi bakyeetu .
45001027	Bwobumosi se babakala , bahotiri kwepala na bakyeetu , basangumiki mu mampwiisu ma bo na bo , mu kweyirika myansoni babakala na babakala , na kutaambula mufutu wayelemene na nzimbukulu ya bo-meene .
45001028	Ngo bukuri bahele na musoongo wa kuyaaba Nzaambi mu ngwanwa , Nzaambi wabayekele kunsa madyeele maaku mamabi , mu kweyirika mahele kuyelemene .
45001029	Bayeki baluula mu momanso ma bubayi , mu mutima-bubi , mu ntiki-mboongo , mu nyirikulu mamabi ; baluula mu musoki , nzusulu baatu , mu mayumu , mu mawunu , mu ndyaatulu dzadzibi . Bo bangaa-saana ,
45001030	bangaa-makele , bataatu ba Nzaambi , bangaa-kinwa , bangaa-masiiku , bangaa-nzala-kubila , bari na madyeele mu nyirikulu myamibi , bari na tungu kuri bataayi na banguri .
45001031	Bo bahele na madyeele , bahele na ngwanwa , bahele na musoongo mu bambaasi , bahele na mutima wangebe .
45001032	Bo bayaari mukesu wa Nzaambi , ti bayirikaa ma bubwo lo bayelemeni kubadzusa ; ngo kasi kari kunu kuyirika bari mu kumiyirika ko , ngo bari mu kwesyaamisa se baatu bakwemiyirika .
45002001	Hango-nkuumbu , ye muutu , wuri mutsuundisi , wuri mbakila mpemisi ko bwooso ye beele ; bukuri ye wubaanaa wutsuundisa mbaasi , lo nyutu ye-meene wuri mu kubwiisa , bukuri ma wutsuundisila mbaasi , ye-meene se manamo wuri mu kuyirika .
45002002	Tuyaari ti nsundusulu ya Nzaambi yilutilaa bunu buri ngwanwa , kuri babo bayirikaa mya bubwo .
45002003	Ye muutu , wuri mutsuundisi bakweyirika mya bubwo , na ye-meene se wukwemiyirika ; buri ye butsimini ti ye ngo wuri sa bvuuka mu nsundusulu ya Nzaambi ?
45002004	Hoti busina bwa mbweeyulu-mutima waandi , nkuundulu na nkindusulu-mutima waandi , ye wuri mu kunyaafuna , mu kuhele kuyaaba ti mbweeyulu-mutima ya Nzaambi , yinataa ye ku nyiingulu madyeele ?
45002005	Ngo mu bunkuri bwaaku na nkubusulu mutima waaku , ye wukwekutukisa nkesi dzibwa mu ye , mu kiluumbu kya nkesi , na kya nyabusulu nsundusulu yasuunguma ya Nzaambi ,
45002006	nde mbasi-tsuku wubvutula kuri mpisi muutu bunu buri biyiriki byaandi .
45002007	Sa kaha kidziingu kyahele manunu kuri babamosi , bakwesaka mu kifiki kunsa kisalu kyaandi , nkeembu , lukiinsu na kiteesu kyahele mbolulu .
45002008	Sa kasoongo nkesi na kabala kuri bakaka , mu ntoono tungu na bukuri bahele kutumuma kuri ngwanwa , kasi batumuma mu mya bubayi .
45002009	Manyoongi na kinkuukulu kuri mpisi muutu wukweyirika mamabi , dyatete kuri Muyudayo tumi kuri Muhelene .
45002010	Ngo kasi nkeembu , lukiinsu na kiyeengi kuri bakweyirika mamabwe , dyatete kuri Muyudayo tumi kuri Muhelene ;
45002011	bukuri Nzaambi wahele na bubayi .
45002012	Mukwongo , bobanso bayirikiri masumu kwahele mangisi , sa bafuuka se kwahele mangisi ; na bobanso bayirikiri masumu kunsa mangisi , sa baba batsuundusu mu mangisi .
45002013	Bukuri kari bayukaa mangisi basuunguma ha busu bwa Nzaambi ko , ngo kasi basalilaa mangisi sa baba balulukusu .
45002014	Mukwongo , mbuti bangooyi bahele na mangisi , bakwesalila mangisi bunubwo , bo bu bahele na mangisi , bo-meene ngo mangisi .
45002015	Bo basoongaa kuri ti , biyiriki bya mangisi byatinima mu mitima mya bo , nsimunu bo yita kimbaangi , mu bo na bo bitsimi bikwebafuunda bunu pe bikwebakalila .
45002016	Bubwo buba , mu kiluumbu ki tsuundisa Nzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu , mansweeki ma baatu , bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete .
45002017	Ye wuri na nkuumbu ya Muyudayo , wasa nsiitu mu mangisi , na wuri na kimweese mu Nzaambi yaaku .
45002018	Ye yaari kutya kwaandi , wusaanaa nsobokoso mu mari mufunu , wayikusu mu mangisi .
45002019	Ye yirikiri kuyaaba ti ye wuri munati bafwa miisu , buungi bwa bari ku mampimbisi ,
45002020	muyikisi baatu bahele na nyaabulu , muyikisi mwaa-baala , wunde wuri na dyeele dya kuba na nyaabulu , na dya kuba na ngwanwa mu mangisi .
45002021	Ngo habaanaa ye ngo wukweyikisa bambaasi , dyaburi wuri ye-meene kuyikisa pe ? Ye wukweyikisa ti kuyiba pe , buri ye-meene wukweyiba ?
45002022	Ye wukweleele ti kimpala kusa pe , buri ye-meene wukwesa kimpala ? Ye wumonaa kinkeni mu biteki , buri wuri mu kweyiba mu manzo ma Nzaambi ?
45002023	Ye wukwesa kimweese mu mangisi , buri wuri mu kwesaana Nzaambi mu kwesinina mangisi ?
45002024	Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : « Mu ntoono beenu , makaanda makwesaana nkuumbu Nzaambi . »
45002025	Mukwongo , nteendulu bubakala yiri ndaandu mbuti ye wusalilaa mangisi ; ngo mbuti ye wuri musinini mangisi , lo nteendulu bubakala bwa ye yampya .
45002026	Ngo mbuti muutu wahele kuteende bubakala , wubvuminaa mangisi , buri lo mpelulu nteendulu bubakala bwa nde , yahele kumonokono bunu nteendulu bubakala ?
45002027	Muutu wahele kuteende bubakala mu muswinyi , ngo wusalilaa mangisi , sa katsuundisa ye wuri na mukaanda mangisi , na wateende bubakala , ngo wuri musinini mangisi .
45002028	Mukwongo , Muyudayo kari wunde wubamonaa mu miisu ko , na nteendulu bubakala kari yibamonaa mu muswinyi ko ,
45002029	ngo Muyudayo , wa mansweeki ; na nteendulu bubakala , ya mutima mu Mpeeve , nkani ka ya mu mukaanda ko . Wa bubwo wutaambula ndumusu ya Nzaambi nkani ka ya baatu ko .
45003001	Hango mufunu wa kuba Muyudayo wuri hari , bunu pe ndaandu ya nteendulu bubakala yiri hari ?
45003002	Yiri yayinene mu monso . Bukuri kuri Bayudayo batekisiri kuha maampu ma Nzaambi .
45003003	Heki mu nki ? Mbuti babamosi basii ba bakwiikama ko , buri kuhele kukwiikama kwa bo , lo kuyaariri nkwikumunu ya Nzaambi ?
45003004	Ti bele na dyo pe ! Nzaambi ngaa-ngwanwa , ngo kasi mpisi muutu wuri na mpya , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Ye yelemini kuba wasuunguma mu nzoonsulu yaaku , mpisi ye luuluka ha bakutsuundisa . »
45003005	Ngo mbuti kunsa bubayi bwa beetu nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yimonokono , lo nki tuleele ? Buri Nzaambi kabaka nkesi , lo weki ngaa-bubayi ? Me mu kimuutu nyiri mu kudzoonsolo .
45003006	Ti bele na dyo pe ! Lo dyaburi Nzaambi mbasi-tsuku katsuundisila nsi ?
45003007	Ngo mbuti mu mpya dza me , ngwanwa ya Nzaambi yimonokono na kensekelee mu ntoono nkeembu yaandi , lo mu nki babweese kutsuundisa me bunu ngaa-masumu ?
45003008	Hango , mamabi tuyirikee kweetu mpisi mamabwe miisa , kindeele babo bakwetufutukila , ti beetu turi mu kweeleele bubwo ? Mutsuundu wu bataambula bo , wayelemene mu bo .
45003009	Ngo nki ? Buri beetu tubvuriri bweese ti na bambaasi ? Pele ! Mukwongo , beetu twatswiikisiri ti : na Bayudayo , na Bahelene bobanso bari kunsa lutumu lwa masumu ;
45003010	bu diri dyatinu : « Kuri muutu wasuunguma ko , kuri ti mosi ko ,
45003011	kuri ti mosi ko wuri na madyeele , kuri ti mosi ko wukwesaka Nzaambi .
45003012	Bobanso badziimbisa nzila , mu kintwaari bobanso basaala mufunu ko ; Kuri ti mosi ko wuyirikaa mamabwe , nkati kwahele ti mosi .
45003013	Miwiri mya bo , mampeembe mamwaasi , bakwesalila ndima dza bo mu kwewuna , mu bibori bya bo muri misya mya mpiri ;
45003014	minwa mya bo myaluula mu mampopi na mu misamu myankari ;
45003015	miilu mya bo myaleenge mu kwetsaamuna makila ,
45003016	mfukusulu na manyoongi biri mu manzila ma bo ,
45003017	bahele kuyaaba nzila ya kiyeengi .
45003018	Kibvumi kya Nzaambi kyo pe ha miisu mya bo . »
45003019	Tuyaari ti myominso mi leele mangisi , mitariri bari kunsa mangisi , mpisi bobanso bakaanga minwa , na nsi yansiina yitaambula kibila ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
45003020	Hango-nkuumbu , kuri muutu ko wuba walulukusu mu biyiriki bya mangisi , bukuri mangisi yini nyaabulu masumu makoohaanaa .
45003021	Mu lumalu , Nzaambi mwaasoongo buri nde kaluulukisa kwahele mangisi , didyo dyatswiikusu mu mangisi na babikiri :
45003022	Nzaambi wuluulukisa bobanso , mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo . Mukwongo , kwahele nsobokoso ,
45003023	bukuri bobanso bayirika masumu na bahelele nkeembu Nzaambi ,
45003024	ngo nde wabalulukisa kwa mungengi mu bweese , mu nzila ya nkuululu yiyo yiri mu Kiristo Yesu .
45003025	Nde , Nzaambi kari kayakisa bunu kikori mu makila maandi mu nzila ya kanyi , mu kusoongo nsungumunu yaandi bu kahemisini masumu matekisiri ,
45003026	mu ntaangu ya nkindusulu-mutima waandi . Nde wuri mu kusoongo nsungumunu yaandi , mu ntaangu ya lumalu , mpisi kaba wasuunguma nde-meene na kaluulukisa wunde wuri na kanyi mu Yesu .
45003027	Ngo masiiku mari hari ? Mari ko . Mu nkya ngisi ? Ya biyiriki ? Pele , ngo mu ngisi ya kanyi .
45003028	Mukwongo , beetu tutsimini ti , muutu wuri walulukusu mu kanyi , kwahele biyiriki bya mangisi .
45003029	Buri Nzaambi ya bani Bayudayo yiri ? Buri kari ya makaanda se ko ? Bunubwo ! Ya makaanda se yiri .
45003030	Ngo bukuri Nzaambi mosi kitsu , yiluulukisa mu kanyi , bateende bubakala na bahele kuteende bubakala .
45003031	Ngo tuyisilee kwaandi mangisi mu ntoono kanyi ? Pele ! Yaa buba bubwo ko , ngo kasi beetu tutswiikisa mangisi .
45004001	Hango nki tuleele mu Abalaami mwaa-nkaaka yeetu ? Nki kari kataambula mu muswinyi ?
45004002	Mbuti Abalaami mu biyiriki kari walulukusu , lo wuri na miswa mu kuba na masiiku ; ngo ka ha busu bwa Nzaambi ko .
45004003	Mukwongo , nki Matinu mari mu kuleele ? « Abalaami kasaana kanyi mu Nzaambi , mu didyo kari walulukusu . »
45004004	Ngo kuri wunde wuri mu kusalaa , mufutu lo wahele kumonoko bunu bweese , ngo bunu kitotolo ki kari na miswa .
45004005	Kasi kuri wunde wahele mu kusala , ngo wasa kanyi mu wunde wululukisaana wa mungooyi , lo kanyi dyaandi dimonokini mu nsungumunu .
45004006	Mu didyo se , Davidi kari mu kudzoonsolo mu lwambwe , lwa muutu wuri Nzaambi wamululukisa kwahele biyiriki :
45004007	« Kiminu kuri babo bataambula mpemisi mu lumvuki lwaaku , na bari masumu maaku mahemusunu !
45004008	Kiminu kuri muutu wunde wuri Mfumu wahele kumutaangila masumu ! »
45004009	Buri muutu wuri mu kiminu kikyo , wuni wateende bubakala , hoti wunde se wahele kuteende bubakala ? Mukwongo , beetu bu tuleele ti : « Kanyi dya Abalaami dyamonokini bunu nsungumunu » .
45004010	Mu nkya ntaangu kanyi didyo dyamonokini bubwo ? Mu ntaangu yiri weki wateende bubakala , hoti mu ntaangu yiri wakiri bubakala kuteende pe ? Pele ! Kari kuri mwaateende bubakala ko , ngo kuri wakiri bubakala kuteende pe .
45004011	Nde wataamburi kidiimbu kya nteendulu bubakala , bunu kinyemu kya ndulukulu yi kataamburi mu kanyi , ha kaba wakiri wahele kuteende bubakala , mpisi heki kaba taayi dya bobanso basaa kanyi , bakiri bubakala kuteende pe , kuri heki bo se , babamono bunu basuunguma .
45004012	Na nde kaba taayi dya bateende bubakala , kari dya bani bateende bubakala ko , ngo se bakwenama bitaambi bya kanyi dya taayi dyeetu , Abalaami bu kaba wakiri bubakala kuteende pe .
45004013	Mukwongo , kari mu nzila ya mangisi ko , ngo mu nzila ya ndulukulu mu kanyi , bari basa lusiilulu kuri Abalaami , bunu pe kuri bapalila mu nde , mu kuba mukondiri saala dya nsi .
45004014	Mukwongo , mbuti bakoondiri ba saala , kubakula dyo mu mangisi , lo kanyi dyeki dyamukangala , na lusiilulu lusii ko .
45004015	Mukwongo , mangisi mabutaa nkesi ; haho hahele mangisi , lo halele se kusinina kwa mo .
45004016	Hango-nkuumbu , saala kubakila mu nzila ya kanyi , mpisi heki mu bweese lusiilulu luba lwatswiikama kuri bobanso bapalila mu Abalaami , kari bani bapalila mu mangisi ko , ngo bapalila se mu kanyi dyaandi . Nde wuri taayi dya beetu-banso ,
45004017	bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Me nyasa ye taayi dya makaanda malaka . » Nde wuri ha busu bwa Nzaambi , yi kari kasiila kanyi , Nzaambi yibvutulaa bafwa mu bumwooyo , na yiyirika bitotolo biri bibeeri byo pe .
45004018	Nde wasii kanyi , bu kasiiriri nsiitu mu mimyo myahele na bwa kusiila nsiitu , mpisi kaba « taayi dya makaanda malaka » , bunu bu diri dyaleelu ti : « Bapalila mu ye sa baba balaka . »
45004019	Nde kasii yekele kanyi dyaandi ko , ti bukuri waba weki na mpaangi-pe nkama mibvu , miilu myeki mu bulu , na Sara mwooyo wafwa .
45004020	Nde kasii yekele kanyi na kusa mpaka ko , mu nsiilulu dza Nzaambi , ngo kasi wabaka makwa mu kanyi , na waha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi .
45004021	Nde waba nkati na nsiitu dzakuka , ti Nzaambi wakuka mu kuyirika mamo , ma kari kasa nsiilulu .
45004022	Hango-nkuumbu , « mu didyo bari bamwiinina ti wasuunguma » .
45004023	Mamo mahele kuba matinu mu wunu nde kitsu ti : « Mu didyo , bari bamwiinina ti wasuunguma . »
45004024	Ngo kasi , mu beetu se , bari bayelemini kumono bubwo , basiilaa kanyi mu wunde wafulukisi Yesu , Mfumu yeetu , mu bafwa .
45004025	Nde bamuyekele mu ntoono masumu meetu , na Nzaambi wamufulukisi mpisi tuba basuunguma .
45005001	Ngo twayeki twaluulukusu mu kanyi , turi kiyeengi na Nzaambi , mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo ;
45005002	mu nde se turi twabaka miswa , mya kutaambula mu kanyi mu bweese bubwo , bu turi twatelemene , na turi twasiila kimweese kyeetu , mu nsiitu ya nkeembu Nzaambi .
45005003	Kari bunubwo kitsu ko , ngo beetu tusiila kimweese kyeetu mu mpasi , bu tuyaari ti mpasi dzibutaa kifiki .
45005004	Kifiki kibuta ndulukulu mu nsindukulu , na ndulukulu mu nsindukulu yibuta nsiitu .
45005005	Nsiitu dzadzusaa muutu nsoni ko , bukuri kuri Mpeeve Yangisi yibari batuha , yatsaamuna ntiilu ya Nzaambi mu mitima myeetu .
45005006	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri makwa pe , Kiristo wafwiilila mu bangaa-masumu mu ntaangu yayelemene .
45005007	Mukwongo , diri dya mpasi ti muutu kataambula kufwa mu ntoono wasuunguma ; kampe mu wamubwete se , lo muutu tamburi kufwa .
45005008	Nzaambi wasoongo ntiilu yaandi mu beetu , bukuri , bu twaba twakiri bangaa-masumu , Kiristo watufwiila .
45005009	Hango mu lumalu , bu tweki twalulukusu mu makila maandi , lo dibvuriri bubwete diri nde sa katubvuukisa mu nkesi dza Nzaambi .
45005010	Mukwongo , mbuti ha twaba bataatu , Nzaambi wasuusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya nde na beetu , mu lufwa lwa Mwaana waandi , lo dyaburi tuhele kubvula kuba babvuukusu mu bumwooyo bwaandi , ha tumwaayukusuna na nde ?
45005011	Kari mu mini mimyo kitsu ko , ngo beetu twasa kimweese kyeetu mu Nzaambi , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu nde turi twataambula nyukusunu lumalu .
45005012	Hango nkuumbu , bunu bwakotolo masumu mu nsi mu muutu mosi , na lufwa se mu ntoono masumu , bunubwo se lufwa lwakotolo mu baatu bobanso , bukuri bobanso babwa mu masumu .
45005013	Mukwongo , natee mu ntaangu yaba mangisi , masumu maba mu nsi , ngo maba mahele mu lutaangu , bukuri mangisi maba mo pe .
45005014	Koomosoko , kuholosono mu ntaangu ya Adami natee ya Moose , lufwa lwaba se mu baatu , bari basii yirika masumu mafwanikina na kusinina kwa mangisi kwa Adami ko . Nde wuri kifwaani kya wunde waba wuri mu kwiisa .
45005015	Kasi , kikabu kya bweese kyahele kuba bunu buri kiteesu kya lumvuki . Ngo mbuti heki mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , lufwa luri lwakoto mu baatu balaka , lo dibvuriri mufunu diri bweese bwa Nzaambi , na kikabu kya bweese , mu muutu mosi , ngo Yesu Kiristo , bari baheele byo kwa mansaalisi kuri baatu balaka .
45005016	Ngo kikabu kyahele kuba , bunu buri kiteesu kya muutu mosi wayirika masumu . Mukwongo , nkesulu mukanu yayisa mu mutsuundu wa muutu mosi ; ngo kasi ndulukulu yayisa mu kikabu , ha mambisa ma lumvuki lwalaka .
45005017	Ngo mbuti mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , lufwa lwatuma lwolukaka , lo dibvuriri mufunu diri ti , mu Yesu Kiristo kitsu , baatu bataambula kwa mansaalisi bweese na kikabu kya nsungumunu , sa batuma mu bumwooyo .
45005018	Hango bukuri , mu lumvuki lwa muutu mosi , bobanso bari kunsa mukanu ; bwobumosi se , mu nsungumunu ya muutu mosi , bobanso bataambula nsungumunu ya bumwooyo ;
45005019	bunubwo se buri , mu nko dza muutu mosi , balaka babwa mu masumu , bwobumosi se mu bintambukulu bya muutu mosi , balaka sa baba balulukusu .
45005020	Mangisi mayisa mpisi heki lumvuki lufunina ; ngo haho hafunina masumu , hanaho se ha buukulaa bweese ,
45005021	mpisi heki , bunu bwaba masumu kuri mari na lutumu mu lufwa , bunubwo se bweese buri na lutumu mu nsungumunu , mu kuha kidziingu kyahele manunu , mu Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu .
45006001	Ngo nki tuleele ? Mu masumu tunamitinee kweetu , mpisi heki bweese bubuukila ?
45006002	Ti bele na dyo pe ! Beetuneenu bari twafwa mu masumu , buri tubweese kubeele bamwooyo mu masumu ?
45006003	Hoti beenu lwahele kuyaaba , ti beetu-banso twabotikiri mu Kiristo Yesu , mu lufwa lwaandi turi twataambula mbotokulu ?
45006004	Ngo beetu batudziika kintwaari na nde , mu mbotokulu mu lufwa , mpisi heki bunu bwafulukiri Kiristo mu bafwa , mu nkeembu ya Taayi , bunubwo se beetu , twedyaatila mu kidziingu kyamoono .
45006005	Mukwongo , mbuti beetu twayeki muutu mosi na nde , mu lufwa lwafwanikina na lwa nde , lo sa twaba kintwaari na nde se mu mfulukulu .
45006006	Bu tuyaari kuri ti , muutu weetu wamukulu bayeki bamukomono kintwaari na nde , mpisi heki nyutu ya masumu yiba yatsyaamunu , na tuhele kubweese kuba bankutu ba masumu .
45006007	Bukuri , wunde wumwaafwa , lo walulukusu kwakinkulu mu masumu .
45006008	Mbuti twafwa kintwaari na Kiristo , lo twasa kanyi ti sa twaba mwooyo kintwaari na nde .
45006009	Bu tuyaari kuri ti Kiristo wafulukiri mu bafwa , kabweese kufwa ko , lufwa ka lubweese kuba na lutumu mu nde ko .
45006010	Bukuri , wunde wafwiiri , wafwiiri lwolumosi mu ntoono masumu ngo wunde wuri mwooyo , wuri mwooyo mu ntoono Nzaambi .
45006011	Mu didyo , beenu se , beeneenu bunu lwafwa mu masumu beenu-meene , na bunu luri mwooyo mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono Nzaambi .
45006012	Ngo yaa lutala ko ti , masumu maba na lutumu mu nyutu yeenu ya mfwiilu , mpisi luhele kutumuma mu nyiimunu dza nyutu .
45006013	Yaa lusalila binamu byeenu , bunu bisalulu bya bubayi mu kuyirika masumu ko . Ngo kasi beenu-meene salileenu Nzaambi , bunu baatu bamwooyo bafulukusu mu bafwa , na salileenu binamu byeenu , bunu binwaanunu bya nsungumunu mu kusalila Nzaambi .
45006014	Mukwongo , masumu ka mabweese kuba na lutumu mu beenu ko , bukuri beenu lwahele mu lutumu lwa mangisi , ngo luri mu lutumu lwa bweese .
45006015	Hango nki ? Masumu tukweyirikee kweetu , bukuri twahele mu lutumu lwa mangisi , ngo turi mu lutumu lwa bweese ? Ti bele na dyo !
45006016	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , lutaambukila kusalila muutu bunu bankutu , lo lweki bankutu ba wunde wu luri mu kutambukila , bankutu ba masumu mu kweende ku lufwa , bunu pe bankutu ba bintambukulu mu kweende ku nsungumunu ?
45006017	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , bukuri beenu lwaba bankutu ba masumu , ngo kasi lumwaataambukila mu mutima ndemunso , kiteesu kya nyikusulu dzi bari baluha .
45006018	Bu balukuula mu masumu , lwayeki bankutu ba nsungumunu .
45006019	Mu kimuutu me nyiri mu kudzoonsolo , mu ntoono ya muswinyi wahele na makwa . Bunu bu lwasariri binamu byeenu bunu bankutu kuri nsumukunu na kuri bubi , mu ntoono mamabi , bunubwo se mu lumalu , salileenu binamu byeenu bunu bankutu kuri nsungumunu , mu ntoono bungisi .
45006020	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi lwaba bankutu ba masumu , lwaba na bunsaalisi mu mitariri nsungumunu .
45006021	Ngo nkya bimbutu luri na byo ? Mu lumalu beenu lweki na nsoni mu byo , bukuri manunu ya byo lufwa .
45006022	Ngo kasi mu lumalu , bu bamwaalukuula mu masumu , lweki bankutu ba Nzaambi , na luri na bimbutu mu mbakulu bungisi . Manunu ya byo , ngo kidziingu kyahele manunu .
45006023	Mukwongo , mufutu masumu ngo lufwa ; ngo kasi kikabu kya mungengi kya Nzaambi , ngo kidziingu kyahele manunu , mu Kiristo Yesu Mfumu yeetu .
45007001	Mukwongo , bampaangi , me kuri bari na nyaabulu ya mangisi nyiri mu kudzoonso . Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba , ti mangisi mari na lutumu mu muutu , mu ntaangu yoyinso yikari mu bumwooyo ?
45007002	Mukasi wuri kunsa lutumu lwa mulumi , wu bari bakaangama mu mangisi , mu ntaangu yiri mulumi wakiri mwooyo , ngo mbuti mulumi fwiiri , lo nde kuulukiri mu mangisi ma mulumi .
45007003	Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti mulumi wakiri mwooyo , ngo mukasi pariri na bakala dikimi , lo baleeriri ti nde ngaa-kimpala ; ngo mbuti mulumi fwiiri , lo mukasi bakiri bunsaalisi ha busu bwa mangisi , kuri hayuku nde pariri na bakala dikimi , lo wahele kuba ngaa-kimpala .
45007004	Beenu se bunubwo , bampaangi baami , beenu lwayeki lwafwa mu mangisi mu nyutu ya Kiristo , mu kuba ba muutu mukimi , wunde wafulukusu mu bafwa , mpisi tubeeneenu na bimbutu mu ntoono Nzaambi .
45007005	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri kwedyaatila mu kimuutu , mantiilu ma masumu mu nzila ya mangisi , maba kwesalaana mu binamu byeetu , mu kubuta bimbutu binata ku lufwa .
45007006	Ngo mu lumalu , twayeki twakuuluka mu mangisi , twafwa mu mi twaba twakaangama , kuri heki tuba bankutu mu kiteesu kyamono kya Mpeeve , kari mu kiteesu kya kikulu kya mukaanda ko .
45007007	Ngo nki tuleele ? Buri mangisi ngo masumu ? Ti bele na dyo pe ! Kasi mbuti ka nzila ya Mangisi ko , nkani me nyahele kuyaaba masumu . Mukwongo , mbuti ka mangisi maleele kuri ti : « Yaa sa nyiimunu ko » , nkani me nyaketi kuyaaba nyiimunu ko .
45007008	Mu nzila ya mangisi , masumu mabaka mpwaani , ya kubuta mu me , nyiimunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu . Bukuri , mangisi mbuti mo pe , lo masumu mafwa .
45007009	Mu ntaangu yayikulu , me nyanata kidziingu kwahele mangisi ; ngo mangisi bu mayisa , masumu mabweesiri kuba mamwooyo .
45007010	Ngo me nyafwa ; dyamonokono ti mangisi maketi kuha me bumwooyo , meki kunata ku lufwa .
45007011	Mukwongo , mu nzila ya mangisi , masumu mabaka mpwaani ya kuwuna me , na ya kudzusa me .
45007012	Mu didyo , mangisi matsyeemeke , na lutumu lwangisi , lwasuunguma na lwalubwete .
45007013	Buri haho , mamabwe , meki kuri me lufwa ? Ka butsiitsa kuba ko ! Kasi masumu mu kumonoko kuri me ti masumu , mo mabuta lufwa kuri meenu mu nzila ya mamabwete , mpisi ngaa-masumu kaba nkati na masumu mu nzila ya ntumunu .
45007014	Beetu tuyaari ti mangisi mari ma kimpeeve , ngo me nyiri na nyutu ya muswinyi , bayeki banyarika kuri masumu .
45007015	Mamo ma nyiri mu kuyirika , nyahele kubakula ; bukuri mari nyahele kutya kuyirika , mamo ngo ma nyiyirika , kasi mamo ma mberiri , mamo ngo ma nyiyirika .
45007016	Ngo mbuti , mamo mari ntii ko ngo ma nyiyirika , lo me ntaamburi ti mangisi mamabwete .
45007017	Ngo mu lumalu , kari me nyibweese kuyirika mamo ko , kasi masumu mari mu me .
45007018	Me nyaari ti mamabwe mahele mu me , bu ntiiri kuleele ti , mu muswinyi waami . Nzala kuyirika mamabwe yiri mu me , kasi nyahele kubangisina kumayirika .
45007019	Mukwongo , me nyahele kuyirika mamabwe ma ntiiri , kasi me kuyirika mamabi mari ntii ko .
45007020	Mbuti mamo mari ntii ko , ngo ma nyiyirika , lo kari me nyibweese kumayirika ko , kasi masumu mari mu me .
45007021	Me nyimono kiteesu kimaki : ha ntiiri kuyirika mamabwe , kumonokono mamabi .
45007022	Me nyimono kiminu mu mangisi ma Nzaambi , bunu buri muutu wa kunsa-kati .
45007023	Ngo me nyimono kiteesu kikimi mu binamu byaami , kiri mu kunwaanisa ngisi ya nyukulu yaami , na kukotoso me boroko dya ngisi ya masumu , yiri kunsa binamu bya me .
45007024	Kyaari kuri me ! Nani wukuula me mu nyutu yimayi ya lufwa ?
45007025	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , mu Yesu Kiristo Mfumu yeetu ! Hango-nkuumbu , mu nyukulu ya me-meene me nyiri nkutu ya mangisi ma Nzaambi , ngo mu muswinyi , nyiri nkutu ya mangisi ma masumu .
45008001	Ngo mu lumalu , kwasaala mbwiilu mu mutsuundu ko , kuri babo bari mu Kiristo Yesu .
45008002	Bukuri , ngisi ya Mpeeve , ya bumwooyo mu Kiristo Yesu , yayeki yakuula me mu ngisi ya masumu na ya lufwa .
45008003	Mukwongo , mangisi maketi kubangisina mimyo ko , bukuri maba mahele na makwa mu ntoono muswinyi . Ngo Nzaambi bu kaheeke Mwaana waandi , mu kifwa-fwani kya muutu ngaa-masumu , mu ntoono masumu , wabwiisa masumu mu nyutu ya muswinyi ,
45008004	mpisi heki nsungumunu mu mangisi , yiba yakukusu mu beetu , turi mu kwedyaatila mu Mpeeve nkani ka mu muswinyi ko .
45008005	Mukwongo , babo bari mu muswinyi , bakwedyaatila bunu buri mi tiiri muswinyi ; ngo kasi , babo bari mu Mpeeve , bakwedyaatila bunu buri mi tiiri Mpeeve .
45008006	Ndyaatulu ya muswinyi yinataa ku lufwa , ngo kasi ndyaatulu ya Mpeeve yinataa ku bumwooyo na ku kiyeengi .
45008007	Hango-nkuumbu , ndyaatulu ya muswinyi yiri kitaatu na Nzaambi , yahele kutumuma mu mangisi ma Nzaambi , na ka yitsiitsa kubangisina ko .
45008008	Babo bari mu muswinyi ka batsiitsa kubweeye kuri Nzaambi ko .
45008009	Beenu lwahele kuba mu muswinyi , ngo luri mu Mpeeve , mbuti heki Mpeeve Nzaambi yadzakala mu beenu . Mbuti muutu wahele na Mpeeve ya Kiristo , lo nde kari wa Kiristo ko .
45008010	Mbuti Kiristo wuri mu beenu , lo nyutu yafwa mu ntoono masumu , ngo Mpeeve yiluha bumwooyo , mu ntoono nsungumunu .
45008011	Mbuti Mpeeve ya wunde wafulukisi Yesu mu bafwa , yadzakala mu beenu , lo wunde wafulukisi Kiristo mu bafwa , sa kaha bumwooyo kuri manyutu meenu ma mfwiilu , mu Mpeeve yaandi yadzakala mu beenu .
45008012	Mu didyo bampaangi , beetu turi na kibiimbu , ngo kari kuri muswinyi ko , mu kuri ti tuba bamwooyo mu muswinyi .
45008013	Mukwongo , mbuti luri bamwooyo mu muswinyi , lo sa lwafwa ; ngo kasi , mbuti mu Mpeeve , lo ludzusiri biyiriki bya kimuutu , na sa lwaba bamwooyo .
45008014	Mukwongo , bobanso batwaalusu mu Mpeeve Nzaambi , babo ngo baala ba Nzaambi .
45008015	Bukuri beenu lwahele kutaambula mpeeve ya bunkutu , mu kuri ti lubweese kuba na boomo : ngo kasi beenu lwataambula Mpeeve , yisa kuri ti luba baala ba Nzaambi , mu yo beetu tukoobikisaa ti : « Aba , Taata ! »
45008016	Mpeeve yo-meene , yita kimbaangi kuri kiluunsi kyeetu , ti beetu turi baala ba Nzaambi .
45008017	Mbuti turi baala , lo turi se bakondiri ba saala : bakondiri ba saala dya Nzaambi , bakondiri kintwaari na Kiristo , mbuti heki tubamaa na nde , mpisi heki tuba se bakeembese na nde .
45008018	Me nyitsima ti , mpasi dza lumalu dzahele kuyelemene , na nkeembu mbasi-tsuku wuba wayabakana kuri beetu .
45008019	Mukwongo , nsi yoyinso yiri mu kwekiingila mu kinsukulu-mutima , ntaangu mbasi-tsuku , yi yabakana baala ba Nzaambi .
45008020	Bukuri , nsi yoyinso yayeki kunsa lutumu lwa mimyo myahele mufunu , kari mu ntiilu ya yo-meene ko , ngo mu ntoono wunde wayituma , mu nsiitu
45008021	yiri ti , nsi yo-meene se , sa yaba yakuuluka mu bunkutu bwa mbiiyulu , mu kutaambula bunsaalisi bwa nkeembu ya baala ba Nzaambi .
45008022	Mukwongo , beetu tuyaari ti nsi yoyinso yiri mu kwekuuma , na kwenyonyomoko mu misoongo mya mbutulu , natee mu lumalu .
45008023	Kari yini nsi yo yikaka ko , ngo na beetu se tumwaabaka mintekesele mya Mpeeve ; beetu se mu beetu-meene , tukwekuuma mu kwekiingila ntaangu ya kuba baala ba Nzaambi , na ya nkuululu manyutu meetu .
45008024	Mukwongo , mu nsiitu beetu turi twabvuukusu ; ngo nsiitu dzibaanaa dzamonokono lo dzisiiri nsiitu ko ; mukwongo , na wuri lo siiri nsiitu mu bi kamono ?
45008025	Ngo mbuti beetu tusa nsiitu mu bibyo biri twahele kumono , lo tukwekiingila mu nkindusulu-mutima .
45008026	Bunubwo se , Mpeeve yikwiisaana mu kutubakisa mu bubolo bweetu , bukuri twahele kuyaaba kusaambila bunu buyelemini . Kasi Mpeeve nde-meene , wutunwanikinaa mu lusaambulu mu nkuumunu , yahele na bwa kubangukila .
45008027	Wunde wufyongokinaa mitima myeetu , yaari bunu buri bitsimi bya Mpeeve , bukuri wunwanikinaa bangisi mu lusaambulu , bunu bu tiiriri Nzaambi .
45008028	Beetu tuyaari kuri ti , byobinso bisalisinaana mu bubwe bwa batyaanaa Nzaambi , babo bakari kateele mbila bunu buri bitaasi byaandi .
45008029	Bukuri babo ba katekisiri kuyaaba , wabataasila mu kuba bafwanikina na mwaana waandi , mpisi nde kaba mwaana watete , ha kakati dya bampaangi balaka .
45008030	Babo ba kataasiri , babo se kari kateele mbila ; babo ba kari kateele mbila , babo se kari kalulukisa ; babo ba kari kalulukisa , babo se kari kakeembese .
45008031	Ngo nki tuleele mu mamo ? Mbuti Nzaambi wuri na beetu , lo na wubwiisa beetu ?
45008032	Nde wuri kasii wuungula Mwaana wa nde-meene ko , kasi wamuyekiri mu ntoono beetu-banso , lo dyaburi kahele kutuha byobinso kintwaari na nde ?
45008033	Na wutsiitsa kufuunda basoolu kuri Nzaambi ? Nzaambi ngo mululukisi !
45008034	Na wubakesele mukanu ? Kiristo Yesu wafwiiri , ha yulu haho se wafulukiri , wuri ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi , na wuri mu kutunwaanikinaa mu lusaambulu .
45008035	Na wutuhaambila na ntiilu ya Kiristo ? Buri manyoongi , kinkuukulu , nkwamusunu , nzala , mpene , nsisi , bunu pe mbeesi yayila ?
45008036	Bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Mu ntoono ye , beetu turi ha busu bwa lufwa mpisi kiluumbu . Beetu bayeki batuhololo bunu bimeeme , bi bari mu kunata ku nzo yi bapaakulaa bibulu . »
45008037	Kasi mu momanso mamo , beetu tubvuriri kuba baluuluka mu wunde watutya .
45008038	Mukwongo , me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti hayuku lufwa , bumwooyo , bambasi , bangaa-lutumu , misamu mya lolo di bunu mpe mya ntaangu yikwiisa , mpinu ,
45008039	kudzaangama , musundu , ti hayuku kiyiriki kikimi ka kitsiitsa kuhaambula beetu ko , na ntiilu ya Nzaambi , yiri mu Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yeetu .
45009001	Me ngwanwa nyiri mu kudzoonso mu Kiristo , nyahele kufuta mpya , nsimunu yaami yinteelele kimbaangi , mu Mpeeve Yangisi ,
45009002	ti me nyiri na ngebe dzalaka , na nyiri mu kwebama kunsa mutima waami mpisi ntaangu .
45009003	Me nyitiisila mu me-meene , kuba kunsa mpopi , na kuba la na Kiristo , mu ntoono bampaangi baami , bampaangi baami ba mu kaanda dya muswinyi ,
45009004	bapalila mu Isaheli . Kuri bo , bari baha kiteesu kya kuba baala ba Nzaambi , nkeembu , ndelusunu , kikabu kya mangisi , kisalu kya lusaambulu , nsiilulu .
45009005	Bataayi bari , Kiristo wapalila mu bo mu muswinyi , nde wuri hayulu byobinso , Nzaambi wasakumunu mu bibvu . Amene .
45009006	Ka kuri ko ti maampu ma Nzaambi , mayeki mawa mufunu . Bukuri bobanso bapalila mu Isaheli , bari Isaheli ;
45009007	na babo bapalila mu Abalaami , bobanso ka bari baala ba nde ko , kasi : « Mu Isaki , ye wubaka babo babateele ti bapalila mu ye . »
45009008	Mbangukulu ti : kari baala ba muswinyi ko , bari baala ba Nzaambi , kasi baala bansiilulu bari mu lutaangu lwa bapalila mu nde .
45009009	Mukwongo , mu lusiilulu luri maampu mamama : « Mbasi-tsuku mu mantaangu maama , me sa nyiisa , na Sara sa kaba na mwaana wa mubakala . »
45009010	Kari manamo kitsu ko , ngo Lebeka se , wabakiri yimi mu wunu Isaki , taayi dyeetu .
45009011	Mukwongo , baala baba bakiri kubutuka pe , na baba bakiri bahele kuyirika mamabwe bunu pe mamabi , mpisi heki bitaasi bya Nzaambi binamitina kuba , bunu buri nsoolulu yaandi ya bunsaalisi .
45009012	Kari mu nzila ya biyiriki ko , ngo bunu bu tiiriri muteeri-mbila , Nzaambi waleele kuri Lebeka ti : « Mwaana wa mukuutu sa kaba mu bunkutu kuri mwaana-nguri . »
45009013	Bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Me nyatya Yakobe , ngo kasi nyabele Esawu . »
45009014	Ngo nki tuleele ? Buri bubwo buri bubayi Nzaambi kari na bwo ko ? Ti bele na dyo pe !
45009015	Bukuri nde waleele kuri Moose ti : « Me sa nyabakila ngebe kuri wunde wu ntiiri kubakila ngebe ; na me sa mba na kyaari mu wunde wu ntiiri kumwiinina kyaari . »
45009016	Hango-nkuumbu , mimyo myahele mu miswa mya wunde wutiiri , bunu pe mya wunde wuyirika , ngo mu miswa mya Nzaambi wubakila ngebe .
45009017	Mukwongo , Matinu maleele kuri Falaho : « Mu didyo me nyatelemisi ye , mpisi heki mu ye , me nsoongo mpinu dzaami , na mpisi heki badzoonsolo nkuumbu yaami mu nsi yansiina . »
45009018	Hango-nkuumbu , kuri wunde wu katiiri kubakila ngebe , lo wumubakiri ngebe ; kuri wunde wu katiiri kukubisa mutima , lo wumukubisiri .
45009019	Hango , ye lo leeriri me ti : « Heki mu nki ntoono Nzaambi kakoobweesa kuŋaŋinaa ? Na wuri lo tsiitsiri kutungukila kutya kwa nde ? »
45009020	Heki ye muutu na wuri mu kukaalisa mbeembu kuri Nzaambi ? Buri kisa lo kileeriri kuri mubuumbi ti : « Buri wuri wanyirikila bumabu ? »
45009021	Buri mubuumbi wahele na lutumu , mu kuyirika mu tubuumbu twotumosi , kisa kya lukiinsu , na kisa kyahele kuba kya lukiinsu ?
45009022	Ngo Nzaambi watiiri kusoongo nkesi dzaandi , na kuyaabisa mpinu dzaandi , wakiindisa mutima mu nkindusulu yayinene mu bisa bya nkesi , bi bari bayirika mu ntoono ya mfukusulu .
45009023	Nde watiiri se kuyaabisa busina bwa nkeembu yaandi , kuri bisa bikari kabakila ngebe , bi katekisiri kuyirika mu ntoono nkeembu yaandi .
45009024	Beetuneenu turi , babo ba kari kateele mbila , kari hani ha kakati dya Bayudayo kitsu ko , ngo se na ha kakati dya makaanda .
45009025	Bunu bu kari kaleele mu mukaanda Ose ti : « Me sa nteele , wunde wahele kuba kaanda dya me , ti kaanda dya me , na mukyeetu wahele kuba nduku ya mutima , ti nduku ya mutima ;
45009026	na ha kibeendu ki baba baleele kuri bo ti : " Beenu luri kaanda dya me ko " , haho sa babateele baala ba Nzaambi ya mwooyo . »
45009027	Esaya waleele mu ntoono Isaheli ti : « Ti hayuku lutaangu lwa baala ba Isaheli luri bunu munyeenge wa mubu , lo mwaa-ndaambu yisaala yiba yabvuukusu ;
45009028	bukuri Mfumu sa kakukisa maampu maandi momanso mu mawasu , ha butoto . »
45009029	Bunu bwaba tekesele kuleele Esaya ti : « Mbuti Mfumu ngaa-mikaangu kasii tusisikila mwaa-baatu bapalila mu beetu ko , nkani twaketi kuba bunu Sodoma , nkani twaketi kufwanikina na Ngomora . »
45009030	Hango nki tuleele ? Ti : makaanda mahele kwenama nsungumunu , babaka nsungumunu ; nsungumunu yifumunaa mu kanyi ,
45009031	ngo kasi , Isaheli wukwenama mangisi mu kubaka nsungumunu , wahele kubangisina mu mangisi .
45009032	Bukuri nki ? Bukuri nde wahele kusakila mu kanyi , ngo mu biyiriki . Bo babumuna kya mu « tari dya mbumukunu makya » ,
45009033	bunu bu diri dyatinu ti : « Mono , me nyisuusa mu Syoni , tari dya mbumukunu makya , lweende dya mbwiisulu makubu . Ngo wunde wusiila kanyi mu nde , kafwa nsoni ko . »
45010001	Bampaangi , ma nyitiisila me kunsa mutima waami , na mu lusaambulu lwaami kuri Nzaambi mu bo , kuri ti baba babvuukusu .
45010002	Mukwongo , me nyita kimbaangi mu bo ti bari na kuheme mu Nzaambi , ngo kasi bahele na nyaabulu .
45010003	Mukwongo , babaanaa bahele kuyaaba nsungumunu ya Nzaambi , na bakwesaka kusalila nsungumunu ya bo-meene , lo bahele kuba batumuma mu nsungumunu ya Nzaambi .
45010004	Bukuri Kiristo ngo nsukulu ya mangisi , mu ntoono nsungumunu , ya mpisi wunde wusa kanyi .
45010005	Mukwongo , Moose watina mu mitariri nsungumunu ya mangisi ti : « Muutu wumasalila , sa kaba wamwooyo mu mo . »
45010006	Ngo kasi , nsungumunu mu kanyi yiri mu kuleele bumabu : « Yaa leele mu mutima waaku ko ti : Na wunde wunwaata ku yulu ? » Mbangukulu lo ti : mu kusundula Kiristo .
45010007	Bunu pe ti : « Na wusunduka ku nsi ya bafwa ? » Mbangukulu lo ti : mu kutoombolo Kiristo mu bafwa .
45010008	Ngo nki diri mu kuleele ? « Maampu mari bebele na ye , mari munsa munwa waaku , na munsa mutima waaku . » Mamo ngo maampu ma kanyi ma turi mu kweyaabisa .
45010009	Mbuti ye leeriri mu munwa waaku ti Yesu ngo Mfumu , na siiriri kanyi mu mutima waaku , ti Nzaambi wamufulukisa mu bafwa , lo ye sa bvuuka .
45010010	Mukwongo , mu mutima bakoosiilaa kanyi mu kubaka nsungumunu , na mu munwa bakootambukilaa mu kubaka mvuukulu .
45010011	Mukwongo , Matinu maleele ti : « Mpisi wunde wusiila kanyi mu nde , lo kafwa nsoni ko . »
45010012	Mukwongo , kwahele nsobokoso ha kakati dya Muyudayo na Muhelene . Bukuri bobanso Mfumu mosi , wuri kisina kuri bobanso bakoomuteelaa mbila .
45010013	Mukwongo : « Mpisi wunde wuteele nkuumbu ya mfumu , lo sa kaba kabvuuka . »
45010014	Ngo dyaburi bateelele wunde wuri bahele kumusiila kanyi ? Dyaburi basiila kanyi mu wunde wuri bahele kuyuka badzoonsolo mu nde ? Dyaburi bayukila , mbuti kwahele wuyaabisa ?
45010015	Na buri bayabisila , mbuti bahele kubaheeke ? Bunu bu diri dyatinu ti : « Miri myamibwete , miilu mya babo bakweyaabisa misamu myamibwete ! »
45010016	Ngo kasi , bobanso bahele kutumuma mu Musamu Wamubwete . Mukwongo , bunu buleele Esaya ti : « Mfumu , na wasiiriri kanyi mu ma kayukiri kuri beetu ? »
45010017	Hango , kanyi difumunaa mu mi bayukaa , mi bayukaa mu maampu ma Kiristo .
45010018	Kasi me nyifuula ti : buri basii kuyuka ko ? Heehe bayukiri kwaandi ! « Mbeembu bo yayukukuna mu nsi yansiina ; na maampu ma bo matubuka natee mwasukuna butoto . »
45010019	Kasi me nyifuula ti : buri Isaheli wuri kasii bakula ko ? Moose ngo watete mu kuleele ti : « Me sa nyalusa bangaa-bukwa , mu babo bahele kuba kaanda ; me sa nyalubakisa nkesi , mu kaanda dyahele na nyukulu . »
45010020	Esaya se wutsiitsa kuleele ti : « Babo bari bahele kwesaka me , banzuukiri ; na me nyamonikini kuri babo bari bahele kwemfuula . »
45010021	Ngo kuri Isaheli nde wuleele ti : « Mpisi kiluumbu , me nyalaamburi myooko myaami , kuri baatu bari na nko , na bari na tungu . »
45011001	Hango me nyifuula ti : buri Nzaambi wayekele baatu baandi ? Ti bele na dyo pe ! Mukwongo , me Mu-isaheli , nyapalila mu Abalaami , mu mwooyo wa Benyamini .
45011002	Nzaambi wahele kuyekele baatu baandi ba katekisiri kuyaaba . Hoti beenu lwahele kuyaaba ma leele Matinu mu Eliya , ha kari mu kunyoongono Isaheli kuri Nzaambi ?
45011003	« Mfumu , badzusiri babikiri ba ye , batsyaamini madziku maaku na me me-kaka nyasiiri , na basaka kunzusa . »
45011004	Ngo kasi , nkya mvutu Nzaambi kari kamuha ? « Me nyasweeke mu ntoono ya me-meene , mafuunda nsaamu ma baatu , bari bahele kutsukumina Baali . »
45011005	Ngo bwobumosi se mu ntaangu yimayi , kuri ndaambu Baatu yasaala , bunu buri nsoolulu ya bweese .
45011006	Ngo mbuti mu bweese , lo kusii kuri ko ti mu biyiriki , bukuri bweese , lo busii bweese ko .
45011007	Hango buri ? Bikwesaka Isaheli , wahele kubibaka ; ngo kasi wunde wu bari basoolu wabibaka ; ngo bakaka babakubisa mutima ,
45011008	bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Nzaambi wabaha mpeeve ya mbwiilu tolo , miisu mu kuhele kumono , na makutu mu kuhele kuyuka , natee mu kiluumbu kya lu . »
45011009	Na Davidi wuleele ti : « Hemese ndiilu yaaku yiba kuri bo mweete na siinga , mpwaani ya kubwa mu masumu na ya kutaambila maseembu .
45011010	Hemese miisu mya bo miba mampimbisi , mpisi bahele kumono ; na sa kuri ti mambisa ma bo maba ma koromo mu mpisi ntaangu . »
45011011	Ngo me nyifuula ti : buri bo babumuna kya ngo bari babwa ? Ti bele na dyo pe ! Kasi mu lumvuki lwa bo , ngo makaanda mari mabaka mvuukulu , mpisi heki bo basa bukwa kuri makaanda .
45011012	Ngo mbuti heki lumvuki lwa bo ngo busina bwa nsi , na mbwiilu bo ngo busina bwa makaanda , lo dyaburi bahele kutaambula mibvuriri bubwete , mu ntaangu yiri bobanso bakukiri ?
45011013	Kuri beenu makaanda me nyeki dzoonso : Mu bukuri me nyiri ntumu kuri makaanda , nyikeembese kisalu kyaami ,
45011014	mbuti heki mu bubwo , lo me nsii kuri ti , baturi mu kaanda dya muswinyi basa bukwa , na me mvuukisa babamosi mu bo .
45011015	Mukwongo , mbuti kusuusa kwa bo ha luteke , ngo nyukusunu na nsi , lo buri bubeele mvutukulu bo , mbuti ka bumwooyo mu bafwa ko ?
45011016	Mbuti ndaambu mbanda yiri yangisi , lo mbanda yoyinso se yangisi ; na mbuti mwaansi wangisi , lo bimpaala se byangisi .
45011017	Ngo mbuti mu muti wu bakunini , bimpaala byabimosi byatabulu , na ye wuri muti wa ku musitu , bakukwiikiri mu muti wunde , mu kuba kintwaari na bimpaala byasaala , na kutaambula maampa mafumuna mu myaansi ,
45011018	lo yaa sa kimweese ko kuri bimpaala byatabulu . Mbuti ye wusa kimweese , lo yaaba kuri ti , kari myaansi myamene mu ye ko , ngo ye wamene mu myaansi .
45011019	Ye kampe sa leele ti : « Bimpaala bibyo babitabula , mpisi heki me mba nyakwiiku . »
45011020	Bwabubwete ; bimpaala bibyo babitaburi bukuri byahele na kanyi , ngo kasi ye wakangimina mu kanyi . Yaa ba na masiiku ko , ngo ba na boomo .
45011021	Bukuri , mbuti Nzaambi kasii wuungula bimpaala bya muti wamene mu nde-meene ko , lo ye se kakuwuungula ko .
45011022	Ngo moneeti buri mbweeyulu-mutima , na nkubulu mutima ya Nzaambi : nde wuri na nkubulu mutima kuri babo babwa , ngo wuri na mbweeyulu-mutima kuri ye , mbuti ye namitini kuba kunsa mbweeyulu mitima yiyo , mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo ye se sa bakuyusula .
45011023	Bo ngo bari , mbuti bahele kunamitina mu mpelulu kanyi , lo bo se sa baba bakwiiku ; bukuri Nzaambi wakuka mu kubweese kubakwiika .
45011024	Mukwongo , mbuti ye kimpaala kya muti wa musitu , bakutabula na bakukwiika mu muti wakunu , lo buri dihele kubvulila bubwete mu bo , mu kuba bakwiiku mu muti wa bo-meene .
45011025	Bampaangi , me ntii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu , mu mitariri mpaanu yimayi , mpisi luhele kumonoko bunu bangaa-madyeele mu beenu-meene , bukuri nkubulu mutima ya ndaambu kaanda dya Isaheli sa yaba , natee makaanda momanso makotiri .
45011026	Na mu bubwo , Isaheli dyodinso diba dyabvuukusu , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Wunde wukuula baatu sa kafumuna ku Syoni , sa kayusula tungu mu Yakobe .
45011027	Bubwo buba lulelusunu lu nyisa na bo , mu ntaangu yi nyiyisila masumu ma bo . »
45011028	Mu mitariri Musamu Wamubwete , bo bataatu mu ntoono beenu ; ngo mu mitariri nsoolulu , bo banduku ba mutima mu ntoono bataayi ,
45011029	bukuri bikabu na mbila Nzaambi bayisila ko .
45011030	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yayikulu , beenu lwasiiri nko kuri Nzaambi , ngo kasi mu lumalu , beenu balubakila ngebe , ha lumbisa lwa nko dza bo .
45011031	Bunubwo se , bo mu lumalu , basa nko ha lumbisa lwa ngebe dzi bari babakila beenu , mpisi heki bo se bababakila ngebe mu lumalu .
45011032	Mukwongo , Nzaambi wakaangisa bobanso kunsa nko , mpisi heki kabakila bobanso ngebe .
45011033	Busina , madyeele na nyaabulu ya Nzaambi biri na musundu ; nsundusulu dzaandi dziri na bwa kufyongokono ko , na manzila maandi mari na bwa kukotolo ko .
45011034	Mukwongo , « Na wayaaba kitsimi kya Mfumu ? Bunu pe na waba muhe-mandoongi kuri Mfumu ?
45011035	Bunu pe , na waha kuri nde , mpisi nde kamubvutukila ? »
45011036	Bukuri byobinso kuri nde , mu nde na bya nde . Kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu bibvu ! Amene .
45012001	Hango me nyisyaamisa beenu bampaangi , mu kyaari kya Nzaambi , mu kuyekele manyutu meenu bunu kikabu kyamwooyo , kyangisi na kyabweeye kuri Nzaambi . Yiyo ngo nsambukulu yangwanwa kuri beenu .
45012002	Yaa lunama bifu bya ntaangu yimayi ko , ngo kasi beenee bakituka mu nkitukulu ya kiluunsi , mpisi lufyongokono bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , kwakubwete , kwatya na kuri na nyirimunu yakuka .
45012003	Mukwongo , me nyileele ti , mu bweese bu bari baha kuri me , kuri mpisi muutu mu beenu , mu kuhele kuba na ndyaatulu ya masiiku , yalutila kiteesu , ngo beenee na ndyaatulu ya madyeele , bunu buri kiteesu kya kanyi , dyaha Nzaambi kuri muutu-muutu .
45012004	Mukwongo , bunu bu turi na binamu byalaka mu nyutu mosi , ngo binamu byobinso byahele kuba na kisalu kimosi ,
45012005	bunubwo se , beetuneenu turi balaka , ngo turi nyutu mosi mu Kiristo , na mpisi muutu wuri kinamu mu nyutu mbaasi .
45012006	Turi na bikabu byasobokono , bunu buri bweese bu bari batuha . Mbuti mbikululu , lo yiba bunu bu yelemini mu kanyi ;
45012007	mbuti kisalu , lo mu kisalu ; mbuti muyikisi , lo mu nyikusulu ;
45012008	mbuti musyaamisi , lo mu nsyamusunu ; mukabiri , lo kaheele mu mutima-kikabu ; mutwaalisi , lo katwaalisila mu kuheme ; ngaa-ngebe , lo kasalila mu kiminu .
45012009	Ntiilu yiba yahele na bumpitu-bumpyoongo . Yitikee mamabi , kaangamee mu mamabwe .
45012010	Mu mitariri ntiilu ya kimpaangi , beenee na bundeembu beenu na beenu , silisineenu bukwa beenu na beenu kunsa lukiinsu .
45012011	Beenee na kuheme nkani ka bulyeebu ko , salilee Mfumu mu mpeeve ya bumfifu .
45012012	Beenee na kiminu mu nsiitu , beenee na nkindusulu-mutima mu mpasi , beenee basyaama mu lusaambulu .
45012013	Bakisee bangisi mu manzala maaku , namitinee mu ntambukulu banzeense .
45012014	Sakumunee babo bakwelukwaamisa , basakumunee yaa lubabulula mampopi ko .
45012015	Monee kiminu na babo bari mu kiminu , dilee na babo bari mu kudila .
45012016	Beenee na nyukusunu beenu na beenu , yaa luba na masiiku ko , ngo tambukilee ma kuluka . Yaa lumonoko ba bangaa-madyeele mu beenu-meene ko .
45012017	Yaa lwebvutula bubi mu bubi kuri muutu ko , sakee kuyirika mamabwe ha busu bwa baatu bobanso ;
45012018	mbuti bwadzuka , na diri mu miswa mya beenu , lo beenee na kiyeengi na baatu bobanso .
45012019	Banduku ba mutima , yaa lubvutula kitete ko , ngo hemesee nkesi dza Nzaambi dzisala , bukuri dyatinu ti : « Me nyibvutula kitete , me nyikabula museendu , » bu leele Mfumu .
45012020	Kasi mbuti mutaatu waaku wuri na nzala , lo muha byandya ; mbuti wuri na mpwiisu , lo wumuha maampa ma kunwa ; bukuri wubaanaa wuyirika ma bubwo , lo makeengele ma mbaawu , wuri mu kukutukisa ha yulu mutu waandi .
45012021	Yaa tala ko ti mamabi makubwiisa , ngo ye bwiisa mamabi mu mamabwe .
45013001	Mpisi muutu kaba watumuma kuri batumi ba kikuutu . Bukuri kwahele lutumu , mbuti kari lwafumuna kuri Nzaambi ko . Ntumu dzodzinso Nzaambi wadzisuusa .
45013002	Hango , wunde wutungukila lutumu , lo telemisi kitaatu kuri lutumu lwa Nzaambi ; na babo bangaa-tungu sa babwa mu mutsuundu bo-meene .
45013003	Mukwongo , batumi bari ba kumwiinina boomo ko , mbuti mu biyiriki byabibwe , ngo mu biyiriki byabibi . Buri ye tiiri kubata lutumu ko ? Yirika mamabwe , na ye sa wataambula masiiku kuri lutumu ;
45013004	bukuri lwo luri mu kisalu kya Nzaambi , mu ntoono bubwe bwa ye . Mbuti ye wuyirika mamabi , lo bata , bukuri kari kwa buunu ko , lutumu lukwenata mbeesi yayila . Mukwongo , lwo luri mu kisalu kya Nzaambi , lubvutulaa kitete mu nkesi kuri wunde wuyirika mamabi .
45013005	Hango-nkuumbu , diri mufunu mu kutumuma , kari munu mu kubata nkesi ko , ngo kasi mu dyaambu ditariri nsimunu .
45013006	Mu ntoono yiyo se , beenu lukoofutaa mpaku ; bukuri bo se bari mu kisalu kya Nzaambi , na bakaangama mu kisalu kikyo .
45013007	Bvutuleenu kuri bobanso bi bari na miswa : mpaku kuri wu luyelemini kufuta mpaku ; mukesu kuri wu luyelemini kufuta mukesu ; kibvumi kuri wu luyelemini kubvumina ; lukiinsu kuri wu luyelemini kukiinsa .
45013008	Yaa lweba na bibiimbu bya baatu ko , mbuti ka kya kutilisina beenu na beenu ko , bukuri wutyaanaa mbaasi , wukukisaa mangisi .
45013009	Mukwongo , mangisi mari ti : « Yaa ta kimpala ko , yaa dzusa ko , yaa yiba ko , yaa nyiima ko » , na makaka , mari makufuka mu maampu mamama : « Tya mbaasi yaaku , bunu ye-meene . »
45013010	Ntiilu yaa yirikaa mamabi kuri mbaasi ko ; ntiilu ngo nkukusulu mangisi .
45013011	Yabee kuri ti , ntaangu yimwaatubuka , kyeki kilookolo ki luyelemini kuba naana , bukuri mu lumalu , mvuukulu yeki yibvuriri bebele na beetuneenu , ti na mu ntaangu yi twasiiriri kanyi .
45013012	Butsuku bweki la , bwiisi bweki bebele mu kukya . Ngo tulooseenu biyiriki bya mampimbisi , na tulwaatee binwaanunu bya buungi .
45013013	Twedyaatileenu bunu buyelemini mu mwiini-ngeembe : kwahele ndiilu ya mawaamba , nkolulu malu , kimpala , buyala , mayumu na musoki ,
45013014	ngo kasi lwaateenu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , na yaa lweyirika ma tiiri muswinyi ko , mu kuhele kuyukutisa nyiimunu .
45014001	Taambulee wunde wuri na bubolo mu kanyi , kwahele kusaana ma kakweleele .
45014002	Wamosi wutsima ti , lo diiri kwaandi byobinso ; wakaka bu kari na bubolo wukwedya binkoolo .
45014003	Wukoodyaa , yaa kanyaafuna wuri kakoodyaa ko . Wuri kakoodyaa ko , yaa katsuundisa wukoodyaa , bukuri Nzaambi wamutaambula .
45014004	Ye na wuri , mu kutsuundisa kisari kya ŋani ? Kaba wateleme bunu pe wabwa , lo mitariri mfumu yaandi . Ngo sa kaba wateleme , bukuri Mfumu wuri na lutumu mu kumutelemese .
45014005	Mukwongo , wamosi wusoolo kiluumbu ki kabvuriri kutya ti na kiluumbu kyakaka ; wakaka wusoolo kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu ; mpisi muutu wasingumina mu kitsimi kya nde-meene .
45014006	Wunde wukweswaasisa biluumbu , wubiswaasisa mu ntoono Mfumu ; wunde wukwedya , wudya mu ntoono Mfumu , bukuri wubvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi ; wunde wahele kwedyaa , wahele kudya mu ntoono Mfumu , na nde se wubvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi .
45014007	Mukwongo , kuri ti mosi ko mu beetu wuri bumwooyo mu nde-meene , na kuri se ti mosi ko wufwa mu nde-meene .
45014008	Bukuri , mbuti turi bamwooyo , lo turi bamwooyo mu ntoono Mfumu ; na mbuti tufwiiri , lo mu ntoono Mfumu tufwiila . Ngo ti hayuku turi bamwooyo , ti hayuku turi bafwa , lo turi baatu ba Mfumu .
45014009	Bukuri mu didyo , Kiristo kari kafwiila na kari wamwooyo , mpisi heki kaba na lutumu ha yulu bafwa na bamwooyo .
45014010	Ye buri wutsuundisa mpaangi yaaku ? Bunu pe , ye buri wunyaafuna mpaangi yaaku ? Mukwongo , beetu-banso sa twateleme ha busu bwa mutsuundu wa Nzaambi .
45014011	Bukuri diri dyatinu ti : « Me nyiri mwooyo , bu leele Mfumu : maboongo momanso sa matsukumina me , na ndima dzodzinso sa dzaha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi . »
45014012	Hango-nkuumbu , mpisi muutu mu beetu sa katambikisa mabuungu ma nde-meene [ kuri Nzaambi ] .
45014013	Ngo yaa twetsuundisinee beetu na beetu ko ; kasi tumonee dyo mufunu mu kuhele kusiila mbaasi nkakusulu , bunu pe mu kuhele kumubumisa makya .
45014014	Me nyaari , na nyiri na nsiitu mu Mfumu Yesu , ti kuri kyasumuka mu kyo-meene ko ; ngo mbuti muutu habaanaa wusa kitsimi ti kitotolo ki kyasumuka , lo mu nde kyeki kyasumuka .
45014015	Ngo mbuti mu ntoono byandya , mpaangi yaaku wuri na ngebe , lo ye wahele kudyaatila bunu buri ntiilu . Mu ntoono ya byandya , yaa suumbula wunde wuri Kiristo wamufwiila ko .
45014016	Kikyo kiri kyakibwe kuri beenu , yaa kiba kitoolo kya nsaanunu kuri bambaasi ko .
45014017	Mukwongo , Kimfumu kya Nzaambi kiri mu byandya na mu nwiinu ko , ngo nsungumunu , kiyeengi , na kiminu mu Mpeeve Yangisi .
45014018	Wunde wusalila Kiristo mu kiteesu kikyo , lo wabweeye kuri Nzaambi , na wataambulu kuri baatu .
45014019	Hango-nkuumbu , hemese tusakee mamo ma kiyeengi , na ma ntuungulu ya beetu na beetu .
45014020	Mu ntoono byandya , yaa dzusa kisalu kya Nzaambi ko . Mukwongo , byobinso byatsyeemeke , ngo kasi buri bwabubi kuri muutu mu kudya byandya , mbuti wubumisa mbaasi makya .
45014021	Buri bwabubwete mu kuhele kudya toongo , na kuhele kunwa malu , na kubisa byobinso biri lo bibwiisiri mpaangi yaaku mu masumu .
45014022	Kebe kanyi di wuri na dyo mu ye-meene , ha busu bwa Nzaambi . Kiminu kuri wunde wahele kubaka kibila mu ma katambukiri nde-meene .
45014023	Wunde wuri na maketi-keti mu bi kadya , lo wuri na kibila , bukuri ma kayirika mahele kufumuna mu kanyi . Mpisi mahele kufumuna mu kanyi , lo masumu mari .
45015001	Beetuneenu turi na makwa , tuyelemini kukuunda bubolo bwa babo bahele na makwa , na kuhele kweyirika mabweeye kuni kuri beetu-meene .
45015002	Mpisi muutu mu beetuneenu kayirika ma kiminu kuri mbaasi yaandi , mu ntoono mamabwe mu ntuungulu .
45015003	Mukwongo , Kiristo kasii saka ma kiminu mu nde-meene ko , ngo kasi bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Bitari bya babo batuka ye , byabwiilikila mu me . »
45015004	Mukwongo , momanso ma batekisiri kutina , bamatinini mu ntoono nyikusulu ya beetuneenu , mpisi heki , tubaka nsiitu mu kifiki na mu nsyamusunu ya Matinu .
45015005	Nzaambi ya kifiki na ya nsyamusunu , kasa kuri ti beenu luba na nyukusunu beenu na beenu , bunu buri kutya kwa Kiristo Yesu ,
45015006	mpisi heki , mu mutima mosi na mu munwa mosi , beenu lukeembese wuri Nzaambi na Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
45015007	Hango-nkuumbu , yendee lwetaambula bambaasi beenu na beenu , bunu bwa lutaambula Kiristo se mu ntoono nkeembu Nzaambi .
45015008	Mukwongo , me nyileele ti , Kiristo wayisa kuba kisari kya bateende bubakala , mu ntoono ngwanwa ya Nzaambi , mu kukukisa nsiilulu dzi basiriri bataayi .
45015009	Makaanda ngo mari , makeembese Nzaambi mu ntoono mutima waandi wangebe , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Hango-nkuumbu , me sa nyadumusa ye ha kakati dya makaanda , na me sa nyayimbila mu ntoono nkuumbu yaaku . »
45015010	Matinu mabweese kuleele ti : « Makaanda , monee kiminu , kintwaari na baatu baandi ! »
45015011	Na ti : « Makaanda momanso , siikeenu Mfumu , na baatu bobanso bamudumusa . »
45015012	Esaya wubweese kuleele ti : « Sa kwapala mutwiikila mu Yesayi , wuteleme mu kutuma makaanda , na makaanda sa masa nsiitu mu nde . »
45015013	Hemese Nzaambi ya nsiitu kaluulusa mu kiminu kyokinso , na kiyeengi mu kanyi , mpisi luba lwabuukula mu nsiitu , mu mpinu dza Mpeeve Yangisi !
45015014	Mu mitariri beenu , bampaangi baami , me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti , beenu se lwaluula mu mutima-bubwe , lwaluulusu mu nyaabulu yoyinso , na lwakuka mu kwelubusina beenu na beenu .
45015015	Me nyalutinini mu kibakala mwamumosi , mu nzala kulubaambula mwooyo , mu ntoono bweese bwa mpa Nzaambi ,
45015016	mu kuba mu kisalu kya Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono makaanda , bu nyayekele nyutu mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi , mpisi makaanda maba kikabu kyataambulu , kyasakumunu kuri Mpeeve Yangisi .
45015017	Hango , me nyiri na kimweese mu Kiristo Yesu , mu mya Nzaambi .
45015018	Mukwongo , mbuti me nyitsiitsa kudzoonso , lo mu mya yirikiri Kiristo mu me , mu kuri ti makaanda matumuma , mu maampu na mu biyiriki ,
45015019	mu mpinu dza bidiimbu na dza bimaangu , mu mpinu dza Mpeeve ya Nzaambi . Mu didyo , me kuholosono ku Yerusalemi na ku lumperi natee ku nkoonsi ya Iluriko , nyakukisila kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo .
45015020	Mu didyo , me nyaba na musoongo mu kweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete , mumwo muri bakiri bahele kutaanguna Kiristo , mpisi heki me mpele kutuunga ha yulu lufulu lwa ŋani .
45015021	Ngo kasi , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Babo bari basii kubayaabisa nde ko , sa bamumono , na babo bari basii kuyuka badzoonsolo mu nde ko sa babakula . »
45015022	Mu didyo , me bankakisila mbala dzalaka mu kwiisa kuri beenu .
45015023	Ngo kasi mu lumalu , bukuri nsiiri na kibeendu kya kusalila mu mankoonsi mamo ko , nyiri na musoongo walaka mu kwiisa kuri beenu , kuholosono mibvu myalaka .
45015024	Mu ntaangu yi nyikweende me ku Espanya , mukwongo , nyitsima ti sa nyalumono ha nyiluta , na bumeeni kumono kiminu mu kuba na beenu mwaa-ntaangu , tumi lumpa biri mufunu mu budyeengi bwaami kukwo .
45015025	Mu lumalu , me nyeensi ku Yerusalemi , mu kweesalila bangisi .
45015026	Mukwongo , bari Makedonya na bari Akaya , bamwiini ti buri bwabubwete , mu kusoongo kintwaari mu ntoono bawelu bangisi ba ku Yerusalemi .
45015027	Bo bamwiini ti buri bwabubwete , na babee na kibiimbu kuri bo ; bukuri mbuti makaanda mataamburi mamabwe ma kimpeeve kuri bo , lo mo se mayelemini kubasalila , mu bya mbakulu ya muswinyi .
45015028	Me manaa kuyirika mamo , na manaa kubaha lubakusu lulwo , me sa ndutula kuri beenu ha nyikweende ku Espanya .
45015029	Me nyaari ti , ha nyikwiisa kuri beenu , me sa nyiisa kuri nyaluula mu lusakumunu lwa Kiristo .
45015030	Bampaangi , me nyilusyaamisa , mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , na mu ntiilu ya Mpeeve , mu kunwaana kintwaari na me , mu nsaambulu kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono me .
45015031	Mpisi heki me mvuuka mu myooko mya bangooyi bari ku Yudaya , na lubakusu lu nyinata me ku Yerusalemi , luba lwataambulu kuri bangisi .
45015032	Mpisi heki me nyiisa mu kiminu kuri beenu , na mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , me mpuuma na beenu .
45015033	Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi kaba na beenu-banso ! Amene .
45016001	Me nyiluheeri ntumunu mu ntoono Foyibe , kibusi kyeetu , nde se kisari kari mu dibuundu dya Kengereya ,
45016002	mpisi heki lumutaambula mu Mfumu , mu kiteesu kyayelemene kya bangisi , na lumubakisa mu musamu ngo musamu , wu kaba na nzala beenu ; bukuri nde wabeeri mubakisi wa baatu balaka , na wa me-meene .
45016003	Heenee mboto kuri Piriska na kuri Akila , bambaasi baami ba kisalu mu Kiristo Yesu ,
45016004	bari mu ntoono kidziingu kya me , baketi kuhoomboso kidziingu kya bo-meene ; kari wunu me nyibvutula matoondo kuri bo ko , ngo se na mabuundu momanso ma makaanda .
45016005	Heenee se mboto kuri dibuundu dikookutukinaa mu nzo bo . Heenee mboto kuri Epayineto , nduku yaami ya mutima , nde wuri watete mu Asya , mu kusiila kanyi mu Kiristo .
45016006	Heenee mboto kuri Mariya , nde wasala kwalaka mu ntoono beenu .
45016007	Heenee mboto kuri Anderoniko bo na Yunya , bo bari kaanda dyaami , na bambaasi baami ba mu boroko , baatu ba mvuumfu ha kakati dya bantumu , bo batekisiri kuba mu Kiristo ti na me .
45016008	Heenee mboto kuri Ampilyato , nduku yaami ya mutima mu Mfumu .
45016009	Heenee mboto kuri Urbano , mbaasi yeetu ya kisalu mu Kiristo , na kuri Estaki , nduku yaami ya mutima .
45016010	Heenee mboto kuri Apele , nde wasoongiri bimbaangi byaandi mu Kiristo . Heenee mboto kuri babo bari mu nzo Aristobulo .
45016011	Heenee mboto kuri Erodyono , kaanda dyaami . Heenee mboto kuri baatu ba Narkiso bari mu Mfumu .
45016012	Heenee mboto kuri Tirifayina na Tirifosa , bo basala kwalaka mu Mfumu . Heenee mboto kuri Peresi , nduku ya mutima , nde wasala kwalaka mu Mfumu .
45016013	Heenee mboto kuri Lufo , wasoolu mu Mfumu , na kuri nguri yaandi yiri se nguri me .
45016014	Heenee mboto kuri Asinkirito , kuri Felengo , kuri Ereme , kuri Patoroba , kuri Erema , na kuri bampaangi bari kintwaari na bo .
45016015	Heenee mboto kuri Filolongo na kuri Yulya , kuri Nere bo na kibusi kyaandi , kuri Olimpa , na kuri bangisi bari kintwaari na bo .
45016016	Heelesenee mboto beenu na beenu , kuri mu nyumutunu yangisi . Mabuundu momanso ma Kiristo maluheeri mboto .
45016017	Bampaangi , me nyilusyaamisa mu kusa madyeele , mu baatu bakwesa nkabunu na bakwelubumusa makya , mu nyikusulu dzi luri lwataambula ; batekelee mbisa ;
45016018	bukuri baatu ba bubwo bahele kusalila Mfumu yeetu Kiristo , ngo kasi myooyo mya bo-meene , na mu maampu mamabwe na mu nzoonsulu dzalupyelu , bo bakwewuna baatu bahele kulubuka .
45016019	Mukwongo , bintambukulu byeenu byayabakana kuri bobanso . Ngo me nyimono kiminu mu ntoono beenu , me ntiiri ti beenu luba na madyeele mu mamabwete , na luba kutsyeemeke kwahele mamabi .
45016020	Mwaa kidzika kyantele , Nzaambi ya kiyeengi sa kakosono Saatana kunsa bitaambi byeenu . Bweese bwa Mfumu yeenu Yesu buba na beenu !
45016021	Timoteho , mbaasi yaami ya kisalu , wuluheekiri mboto ; Lukyo , Yasoni na Sosipatoro bari kaanda dyaami se , baluheekiri mboto .
45016022	Me se Teretyo , mutini mukaanda wumawu , nyiluheekiri mboto mu Mfumu .
45016023	Ngayo , wataambula me na wutaambula dibuundu dyodinso wuluheekiri mboto . Erasto , musweeki mboongo dza bvula , wuluheekiri mboto , Kwarato , mpaangi yeetu se wuluheekiri mboto . [
45016025	Kuri wunde wakuka mu kulukumisa , bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete , wu nyikwenata mu nyaabusulu Yesu Kiristo , bunu buri nyabusulu mpaanu dzasweeku , kuholosono mu mantaangu mahele mbandukulu na manunu .
45016026	Mpaanu dzidzo dzamonokono mu lumalu , mu matinu ma babikiri , mu lutumu lwa Nzaambi yahele mbandukulu na manunu , mu kuri ti makaanda momanso mabaka nyaabulu na matumuma mu kanyi .
45016027	Kuri Nzaambi , ndemosi ngaa-madyeele , mu Yesu Kiristo , kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu mantaangu momanso ! Amene .
46001001	Me , Pawulo , nyataambula mbila bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , mu kuba ntumu Kiristo Yesu , beetu na mpaangi Sosetene ,
