46001002	tutina kuri dibuundu dya Nzaambi diri ku Korinto , kuri ba bari basakumuna mu Yesu Kiristo , bataambula mbila mu kuba bangisi , kintwaari na bobanso bateelaa nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu mpisi kibeendu , Mfumu bo , yiri ya beetu se .
46001003	Bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba na beenu .
46001004	Me nyibvutulaana matoondo mantaangu momanso , kuri Nzaambi yaami mu beenu , mu ntoono bweese bwa luha Nzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu ,
46001005	bukuri mu nde , beenu lwayeki bisina mu momanso , mu maampu momanso na mu nyaabulu yoyinso .
46001006	Mu didyo beenu luri lwasa kanyi dya makwa , mu kimbaangi ki bari bata mu Kiristo ha kakati dya beenu ,
46001007	kuri lo beenu luri ti na kikabu kimosi ki luri kyo pe ko , buluri mu kwekiingila monokunu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
46001008	Nde ngo wulukumisa natee kunu manunu , mpisi heki luba bahele maseembu mu kiluumbu kya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
46001009	Nzaambi wakwiikama , nde waluteele mbila mu kuba kintwaari na mwaana waandi Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu .
46001010	Bampaangi , me nyiluyingukila mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , yukusuneenu beenu na beenu , na yaa kuba nkabunu ha kakati dya beenu ko ; beenee kintwaari mu mpeeve mosi na mu kitsimi kimosi .
46001011	Mukwongo , bampaangi , me nyayukiri kuri baatu ba mu kaanda dya Kolowe ti , kuri nkalikisi ha kakati dya beenu .
46001012	Bu ntiiri kuleele ti : ha kakati dya beenu , wamosi wuleele ti : « me nyiri kwaami wa Pawulo » ; wakaka ti : « me wa Apolo » ; wakimi ti : « me wa Kefa » ; wuni ti : « me wa Kiristo » .
46001013	Buri Kiristo wakabulu ? Buri Pawulo bakomini ha yulu kuruwa mu beenu ? Hoti mu nkuumbu ya Pawulo beenu bari balubotoko ?
46001014	Me nyitoondo kuri Nzaambi , bukuri nyahele kubotoko ti mosi mu beenu , mbuti ka wunu Kirispo na Ngayo ko ;
46001015	Mu didyo , kuri wutsiitsa kuleele ko ti , mu nkuumbu me beenu luri lwataambula mbotokulu .
46001016	Kindeele , me nyabotikiri se kaanda dya Estefana . Ha mambisa haho , nsimini ti kuri muutu mukimi wu nyiri nyabotoko me ko .
46001017	Mukwongo , Kiristo wahele kuheeke me mu kubotoko , kasi mu kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete , ngo kwahele kusalila madyeele ma nzoonsulu , mpisi heki kuruwa dya Kiristo di hele kuba dyabuunu .
46001018	Mukwongo , maampu ma kuruwa bubwo bulawuku , kuri baatu bari mu kudziimbila ; kasi mu beetu turi babvuukusu lo dzidzo mpinu dza Nzaambi .
46001019	Bukuri diri dyatinu ti : « Me sa nsyaamuna nyaabulu ya bangaa-nyaabulu , me sa ndooso madyeele ma bangaa-madyeele . »
46001020	Ngaa-nyaabulu wuri kuri ? Mutini-mangisi wuri kuri ? Ngaa-bunzoonsi mu ntaangu yi wuri kuri ? Buri Nzaambi wahele kukitula nyaabulu ya nsi yimayi kuri yeki bulawuku ?
46001021	Mukwongo , bukuri nsi mu nyaabulu ya nde-meene wahele kuyaaba Nzaambi , kunsa nyaabulu ya Nzaambi . Nzaambi wamono dyo dyadibwete mu kubvuukisa , mu bulawuku bwa nyikusulu , baatu basiila kanyi .
46001022	Bayudayo baloombo bidiimbu , na Bahelene basaka nyaabulu .
46001023	Ngo kasi beetu , turi mu kweyaabisa Kiristo wakomono ha yulu kuruwa , Bayudayo babumina makya mu musamu wunde , na bangooyi bamono ti bulawuku ,
46001024	kasi kuri bataambula mbila , Bayudayo na Bahelene , Kiristo ngo mpinu na nyaabulu ya Nzaambi .
46001025	Bukuri bulawuku bwa Nzaambi bubvuriri madyeele ti na baatu , na buyonsi bwa Nzaambi bubvuriri makwa ti na baatu .
46001026	Bampaangi , monee mbeti mbila beenu : ha kakati dyabeenu kwahele bangaa-madyeele balaka mu muswinyi , kwahele bangaa-mpinu balaka , kwahele balaka bari mu lwambwe .
46001027	Kasi , Nzaambi wasoolo bitotolo bya bulawuku ha nsi , mu kudzusa bangaa-madyeele nsoni ; Nzaambi wasoolo bya buyonsi ha nsi , mu kudzusa bangaa-makwa nsoni ;
46001028	Bitotolo bya hele mufunu na bya nyaafunu ha nsi , bya hele kuyirima , Nzaambi wabisoolo mu kuri ti katsyaamuna bibyo byayirima ,
46001029	mpisi heki muutu ka hele kusa masiiku ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
46001030	Nde wasa kuri ti beenu luba mu Kiristo Yesu , wuri wayeki nyaabulu yeetu yifumuna kuri Nzaambi , nsungumunu , bungisi na nkuululu ,
46001031	mpisi heki diba bunu bwatinu ti : « mpisi wusa kimweese , lo kasiila kyo mu Mfumu . »
46002001	Bampaangi , ha nyayisiri me kuri beenu , nyasii kwiisa mu kuluyaabisa mpaanu dza Nzaambi , mu lunaaku lwa nzoonsulu bunu pe lwa madyeele ko .
46002002	Bukuri me nyasii tsima kuyaaba kitotolo ti kimosi ha kakati dya beenu ko , mbuti ka Yesu Kiristo , wu bakomini ha yulu kuruwa .
46002003	Na ha busu bwa beenu , me nyaba na buyonsi , na boomo , na mantekete .
46002004	Mu maampu na mu nyaabusulu dzaami , mwaba mwahele nzoonsulu dza madyeele dziri lo baatu bataambula , ngo kasi nsoongulu ya mpinu dza Mpeeve ,
46002005	mpisi heki kanyi dya beenu di hele kuba kunsa madyeele ma baatu , ngo diba kunsa mpinu dza Nzaambi .
46002006	Madyeele ma turi mu kweyikisa beetu ha kakati dya baatu babuuka , mari madyeele ma ntaangu yimayi ko , mari se ma bamfumu ba ntaangu yimayi , bari mu kweende kumfukusulu ko ;
46002007	ngo kasi , beetu turi mu kweyikisa madyeele ma Nzaambi masweeku kunsa mpaanu , mari Nzaambi watekisiri kutaasila mo mu nkeembu yeetu tekesele mu bibvu .
46002008	Kuri ti mosi mu bamfumu ba ntaangu yimayi wayaaba mo ko ; bukuri , mbuti baba bayaaba , nkani basii komono Mfumu ya nkeembu ha yulu kuruwa ko .
46002009	Kasi , bunu bu diri dyatinu ti : « Mimyo miri miisu mya hele kumono , makutu ma hele kuyuka na miri muutu wahele kutsima mu mutima , Nzaambi wayirikisa myo mu ntoono babo bamutiiri . »
46002010	Ngo kuri beetu , Nzaambi kari kayaabisa myo mu Mpeeve ; bukuri Mpeeve wufyongokinaa myominso , ti hayuku myamusundu mya Nzaambi .
46002011	Mukwongo , nani mu baatu yaari mya muutu , mbuti ka mpeeve ya muutu yiri mu nde-meene ko ? Bunubwo se , mya Nzaambi kuri muutu wu mi yaari ko , mbuti ka Mpeeve ya Nzaambi ko .
46002012	Ngo beetu twahele kutaambula mpeeve ya nsi ; kasi Mpeeve yafumuna kuri Nzaambi , mpisi heki tuyaaba bikabu bya bweese bwa Nzaambi .
46002013	Ngo mamo ma turi mu kweleele beetu , kari mu bitoolo biyikisa madyeele ma kimuutu ko , ngo mu bitoolo biyikisa Mpeeve . Beetu tukwebaangula mya Mpeeve mu kimpeeve .
46002014	Muutu wuri na bitsimi bya kimuutu , lo kataambula mya Mpeeve ya Nzaambi ko ; bukuri kuri nde bubwo bulawuku , nde lo katsiitsa kuyaaba ko , bukuri mimyo mu kimpeeve bayelemini kumifyongokono .
46002015	Muutu wa kimpeeve wutsuundisa myominso , ngo nde-meene kuri muutu wumutsuundisa ko .
46002016	Mukwongo , « na wayaaba kitsimi kya Mfumu ? Na wutsiitsa kumuyikisa ? » Beetu ngo bari , turi na kitsimi kya Kiristo .
46003001	Me ngo wuri , bampaangi , me nyasii bangusina kuludzoonsolo bunu ti kuri baatu bakimpeeve ko , ngo bunu ti kuri baatu ba muswinyi , bunu ti kuri mwaa-baala bansoombo mu Kiristo .
46003002	Me nyalunwiisiri beene , nkani ka byandya bya kuba me nyaluheeri ko , bukuri beenu lwaketi kubibangusina ko . Ti mu lumalu beenu lo lwahele kubibangusina ,
46003003	bukuri beenu lwakiri baatu ba muswinyi . Mukwongo , habaanaa kuri bukwa , na mayumu ha kakati dya beenu , buri lo kari baatu ba muswinyi luri ko ? Na kari mu kimuutu luri mu kwedyaatila ko ?
46003004	Mukwongo , muutu habaana wuleele ti : « Me nyiri wa Pawulo » na wakaka ti : « Me nyiri wa Apolo » , buri beenu kari kimuutu luri na kyo ko ?
46003005	Heki Apolo nki ? Pawulo nki ? Bisari biri beenu mu byo luri lwataambula kanyi , bunu bwaheeriri Mfumu kuri muutu-muutu .
46003006	Me nyakunini , Apolo wanyaka maampa , ngo Nzaambi wabuukisa .
46003007	Mu didyo , mukuni kari kitotolo ko , na munyaki-maampa se kari kitotolo ko , ngo wuri mufunu Nzaambi wukoobuukisaa .
46003008	Mukuni na munyaki-maampa boboolo muutu mosi , mpisi muutu sa kataambula mufutu waandi , bunu buri kisalu kyaandi .
46003009	Bukuri beetu turi bakwesala kintwaari na Nzaambi . Beenu luri nseke Nzaambi , na luri nzo ya Nzaambi .
46003010	Bunu buri bweese bwa Nzaambi bu kari kampa , me nyatuunga lufulu bunu mutuungi-manzo wamadyeele , ngo muutu mukimi wuri mu kutuunga ha yulu . Ngo mpisi muutu kasa madyeele , mu ntuungulu yi kari mu kutuungula ha yulu .
46003011	Mukwongo , kuri muutu wutsiitsa kutunga lufulu lukimi ko , ha teke lufulu lweki haho , ngo Yesu Kiristo .
46003012	Ngo mbuti muutu wutuunga ha yulu lufulu lulwo , mu woolo , mu palata , mu matari ma ntalu , mu miti , mu nsyeri ,
46003013	lo kisalu kya mpisi muutu sa kyaba kyamonokono . Mukwongo , kiluumbu sa kyasoongo , bukuri kisalu sa kyayabakana mu mbaawu , mbaawu sa yatsiitsa kumono bunu buri kisalu kya mpisi muutu .
46003014	Mbuti kisalu kyatuunga muutu ha yulu lufulu , kiri bunu bu kiri , lo nde sa kataambula mufutu .
46003015	Mbuti kisalu kya muutu kinyeengini , lo nde sa kabwilikila yitila , nde-meene ngo wuri sa kabvuuka kuri bunu nde pariri kunsa mbaawu .
46003016	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti beenu luri nzo-Nzaambi , na ti Mpeeve Nzaambi yadzakala mu beenu ?
46003017	Mbuti muutu tsyaamini nzo-Nzaambi , lo Nzaambi se sa kamutsyaamuna ; bukuri Nzo-Nzaambi yiri yangisi , na beenu yo luri .
46003018	Muutu yaa kawunukina nde-meene ko : mbuti ha kakati dya beenu , muutu wutsima ti nde ngaa-madyeele mu ntaangu yimayi , lo kaba kilawuku mpisi heki kaba ngaa-madyeele .
46003019	Mukwongo , madyeele ma nsi yimayi ngo bulawuku ha busu bwa Nzaambi . Bukuri diri dyatinu ti : « Nzaambi wubakaa bangaa-madyeele mu mweete wabo-meene . »
46003020	Dya bweese kutina ti : « Mfumu yaari bitsimi bya bangaa-madyeele , nde yaari ti byabuunu . »
46003021	Hango , yaa kuba muutu wusiila kimweese mu baatu ko , bukuri byobinso bya beenu :
46003022	Kaba Pawulo , Apolo , Kefa , nsi , bumwooyo , lufwa , bitotolo bya ntaangu yimayi , bunu pe bya ku mankula , byobinso bya beenu ;
46003023	beenu luri baatu ba Kiristo , na Kiristo wa Nzaambi .
46004001	Mu didyo , baatu bayelemini kutuhololo bunu bisari bya Kiristo , na bakebi ba mpaanu dza Nzaambi .
46004002	Hango , misiiri mi bari mu kuloombo kuri bakebi , miri ti baba bakwiikama .
46004003	Me ngo wuri , kuri mufunu walaka ko mu kuri ti me mba watsuundusu kuri beenu , bunu pe mu nsundusulu ya baatu . Me nyahele kutsuundisa nyutu me-meene .
46004004	Mukwongo , me ngo wuri nyahele kuyaaba ntoono , ngo kasi kari mu bubwo me nyiri nyalulukusu ko ; wutsuundisa me ngo wuri Mfumu .
46004005	Hango , yaa lutsuundisa muutu ko , tekesele ntaangu yitubuka , natee Mfumu wiisiri . Nde mbasi-tsuku wuyaabisa mansweeki mari ku mampimbisi , na kusoongo bitsimi bya mitima . Haho , mpisi muutu kataambula masiiku kuri Nzaambi .
46004006	Bampaangi , mu ntoono beenu me mporiri kifwaani mu Apolo na mu me-meene , mpisi heki mu beetu , beenu luyika ntoono yiri ti : « Kupala pe ku mbasi mamo matinu » , mpisi heki luhele kusa masiiku mu mosi kuri wakaka .
46004007	Mukwongo , na wumono kuri ti ye bvuriri ? Nki ye wuri na byo , biri kari kutaambula wuri wataambula ko ? Na mbuti kutaambula wuri wabitaambula , buri wuri mu kusa kimweese bunu ti wahele kutaambula ?
46004008	Beenu lweki lwayukuta , beenu lweki bisina , beenu luri mu kubyaala kwahele beetu , ngo mbuti heki ti luri mu kubyaala , lo mu kuri ti beetu se tubyaala kintwaari na beenu .
46004009	Mukwongo , me bu nyimono , lo bunu ti Nzaambi wamonokoso beetuneenu bantumu bunu ti baatu bampotulu , bunu babari bakesele mukanu wa lufwa , bukuri twayeki bunu baatu babari mu kuseyesele ha busu bwa nsi , ha busu bwa bambasi , na ha busu bwa baatu .
46004010	Beetu turi bilawuku mu ntoono Kiristo , kasi beenu luri bangaa-madyeele mu Kiristo ; beetu turi na buyonsi , kasi beenu luri na makwa ; beenu luri bakeembusu kasi beetu turi banyaafunu .
46004011	Natee mu kilookolo kimaki , beetu tukwefwa nzala na mpwiisu , turi mpene , bakwetulata , tukweyiima ,
46004012	na turi mu kwemono mpasi mu kwesala mu myooko mya beetu-meene . Bakwetutuka , ngo beetu tukwesakumuna ; turi bakwaamusu , ngo beetu tukwekuunda ;
46004013	bakwetufutukila , ngo beetu tukwesyaamisa . Beetu twayeki mutsyeeku nsi , bitiiti biri baatu bobanso babilooso , natee mu lumalu .
46004014	Me nyiri mu kulutinina misamu mimami , kari mu kuludzusa nsoni ko , kasi mu kululubula bunu baala baami ba mutima .
46004015	Mukwongo , lu ti hayuku lwiisiri kubaka mafuunda ma bayikisi mu Kiristo , lo luri na bataayi balaka ko , bukuri mu Kiristo Yesu , me nyalubutiri mu nyabusulu Musamu Wamubwete .
46004016	Ngo me nyilusyaamisa mu kuba basoombisiri ba me .
46004017	Hango-nkuumbu , me nyaluheekiri Timoteho , mwaana waami wa mutima na wakwiikama mu Mfumu . Nde sa kalubaambula mwooyo mu manzila maami mu Kiristo [ Yesu ] , bunu bu nkooyikisilaa me kwokunso , mu mpisi dibuundu .
46004018	Babamosi basii masiiku , kutsima ti kampe me nyikwiisa kuri beenu ko .
46004019	Ngo mbuti Mfumu tiiri , me sa mwasila na kwiisa kuri beenu , na sa nyaaba nki bangaa-masiiku babo bari bakuka mu kuyirika , nkani ka mi bakwedzoonso bo mimyo ko .
46004020	Bukuri Kimfumu kya Nzaambi kiri mu mya kudzoonso ko , ngo mu mya kuyirika .
46004021	Ngo beenu nki lutiiri ? Kuri ti me nyiisa kuri beenu na lukwaasulu , hoti na ntiilu , na mpeeve ya bumpoombo .
46005001	Bari mu kweleele ti , ha kakati dya beenu kuri buyala ; buyala buri , ti ha kakati dya bangooyi kwahele mya bubwo ; kuri lo muutu wakitula mukasi taayi weki mukasi nde .
46005002	Ngo beenu , ha kibeendu kya kuba mu ngebe mpisi heki , wukweyirika ma bubwo , kaba wayisulu ha kakati dya beenu , beenu kusa masiiku ?
46005003	Me ngo wuri , mu muswinyi nyahele na beenu , kasi mu kimpeeve nyiri na beenu ; me mwaatsuundisa wukweyirika mya bubwo , bunu ti me nyiri ha kakati dya beenu .
46005004	Mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu , bu luri lwakutukuna na kiluunsi kya me , mu mpinu dza mfumu yeetu Yesu ,
46005005	yekeleenu muutu wa bubwo kuri Satana , mpisi muswinyi kaba wafuukusu , na kiluunsi kiba kyabvuukusu mu kiluumbu kya Mfumu .
46005006	Kimweese kya beenu kiri kyakibwe ko . Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba , ti mwaa-ndaambu lufunusu yikootoombolaa mbanda yoyinso ?
46005007	Ngo yisileenu lufunusu lwalukulu , mpisi beenu luba mbanda yamoono , bukuri mu beenu lufunusu lwo pe . Mukwongo , Kiristo Paaka dyeetu , wayeki wadzusu mu kumuha bunu kikabu .
46005008	Mu didyo , tuseeneenu munkeembu kwahele kuba na lufunusu lwalukulu , bunu pe lwa mamabi na lwa mutima-bubi , ngo kasi kuri turi na mampa mahele lufunusu , ma nsyemukunu na ma ngwanwa .
46005009	Me nyalutinini dyo mu mukaanda ti , yaa lwebvuutuna na biyala ko .
46005010	Me nyahele kudzoonsolo nkati mu biyala bya nsi yimayi , bunu pe bangaa-nsoki-mboongo , bakwedzika bya baatu , bunu pe mu minsaambiri mya biteki , haho ngo hari lo luyelemini kupala mu nsi .
46005011	Ngo mi nyiri nyalutinini me miri ti , yaa lwebvuutuna na muutu wuleele kuri ti nde mpaangi , kasi kiyala kari , bunu pe ngaa-nsoki-mboongo , bunu pe munsaambiri-biteki , bunu pe ngaa-bitari , bunu pe mukori-malu , bunu pe wukwedzika bya baatu , muutu wa bubwo , lo beenu ti kudya pe kintwaari na nde .
46005012	Mukwongo , buri mitariri me , mu kutsuundisa bari ku mbasi ? Buri kari bari kunsa-kati beenu luyelemini kutsuundisa ko ?
46005013	Bari ku mbasi ngo bari , Nzaambi sa kabatsuundisa . Bingeenu muutu wamubi ha kakati dya beenu .
46006001	Habaanaa mosi mu beenu , wuri na musamu na muutu mukimi , buri katsiitsa kweende ku muyalu ha busu bangaa-bubayi , nkani ka ha busu bwa bangisi ko ?
46006002	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti bangisi sa batsuundisa nsi ? Ngo mbuti beenu lutsuundisa nsi , lo buri beenu lwahele kuyelemene mu kulalama misamu mya ntele ?
46006003	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , sa twatsuundisee bambasi ? Heki buri tukoono kulalama misamu mya kidziingu kimaki ?
46006004	Ngo lubaanaa luri na misamu mya kidziingu kimaki mya kulalama , beenu kweende kuri balarimi bari dibuundu wabanyaafuna ,
46006005	lo me nyileele ti , dzidzo nsoni kuri beenu . Nkati ha kakati dya beenu , kwahele ngaa-madyeele ti mosi , wuri lo lalimini musamu na kusa nyukusunu , ha kakati dya bampaangi baandi ?
46006006	Ngo mpaangi mosi lo wusa muyalu na mpaangi yakaka , na mimyo ha busu bwa bangooyi ?
46006007	Mukwongo , lubaanaa lweki na miyalu beenu na beenu , lo yiyo mbwiilulu beenu yoyinso . Buri beenu luri , misamu mya bubayi kwekuunda pe ? Buri luri kuhemene pe baluholo na byobinso bi luri na byo ?
46006008	Ngo kasi beenu lukwesalila bubayi , na kweholo bitotolo bya baatu , na mamo kweyirika kuri bampaangi .
46006009	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , bangaa-bubayi ka bataambula saala dya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko ? Yaa luwunukina kweenu ko : biyala , minsaambiri mya biteki , bangaa-kimpala , bari na manzelu ma bukyeetu , babakala kakwesa kimpala na bambaasi bakala ,
46006010	bangaa-kwiibi , bangaa-nsoki-mboongo , bakori ba malu , bangaa-bitari , na bakwedzika bya baatu , ka bataambula saala dya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko .
46006011	Babamosi mu beenu bubwo baba , kasi lwayeki lwaswaaku , lwayeki lwataambula bungisi , lwayeki lwalulukusu mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , na mu Mpeeve ya Nzaambi yeetu .
46006012	Me nyiri na miswa mu myominso , kasi myominso myahele mufunu ; Me nyiri na miswa mu myominso , kasi nyiri ntambukila kuba kunsa lutumu lwa mpisi kiba ko .
46006013	Byandya bya mwooyo biri , na mwooyo wa byandya , ngo Nzaambi sa katsyaamuna byobyoolo . Nyutu yiri ya buyala ko , ngo ya Mfumu , na Mfumu wa nyutu .
46006014	Ngo Nzaambi , wafulukisi Mfumu , sa katufulukisa mu mpinu dzaandi .
46006015	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , manyutu ma beenu ngo binamu bya Kiristo ? Buri me lo mporiri binamu bya Kiristo mu kubikitula binamu bya mukyeetu wa kiyala ? Ti bele na dyo pe !
46006016	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , wunde wubvuutini na mukyeetu wa kiyala , lo beki nyutu mosi ? Bukuri diri dyaleelu ti : « Boboolo sa baba muswinyi mosi . »
46006017	Ngo wunde wubvuutini na Mfumu , lo beki kiluunsi kimosi .
46006018	Bateenu buyala . Mpisi masumu , mari muutu wumayirika , lo mari ku mbasi nyutu . Ngo wusa buyala , wuyirikaana masumu mu nyutu ya nde-meene .
46006019	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti , nyutu beenu , ngo Nzo-nzaambi Mpeeve Yangisi , yiri mu beenu , yi luri lwataambula kuri Nzaambi , na lwahele kubweese kuba ba beenu-meene ?
46006020	Mukwongo , beenu bayeki balukuula mu ntalu yayinene . Ngo keembeseenu Nzaambi mu nyutu yeenu .
46007001	Mu mitariri misamu mi lwatinina me , buri bwabubwete kuri muutu mu kuhele kubelemene wa mukyeetu .
46007002	Ngo kasi , mu kubata buyala , mpisi bakala kaba na mukasi wa nde-meene , na mpisi mukyeetu se kaba na mulumi wa nde-meene .
46007003	Mulumi kayirika kuri mukasi waandi mamo ma kayelemini kuyirika , na mukasi se kayirika bwobumosi .
46007004	Mukasi kari na lutumu mu nyutu ya nde-meene ko , ngo mulumi ; bwobumosi se , mulumi kari na lutumu mu nyutu ya nde-meene ko , ngo mukasi .
46007005	Wuni yaa kabisa wakaka ko , mbuti ka kuri luyukusini mu mwaa-ntaangu , mpisi lukoto mu lusaambulu ; tumi lubweese kubvutukila kuba ha kimosi , mu kubata ti Satana kakwiisa kulusindukila , bu luheriri kuba na nkebulu-nyutu .
46007006	Ma nyileele mamo , mu kuri ti luba na nyukusunu , nkani ka mu kuluha lutumu ko .
46007007	Me mbee ntii kwaandi , ti baatu bobanso baba bunu me ; kasi mpisi muutu wuri na kikabu kya nde-meene kya muha Nzaambi , wamosi wuri na kimaki , wakaka wuri na kikyo .
46007008	Kuri bahele kukweele , na kuri bafwiila balumi me nyileele ti , buri bwabubwete mu kuba bunu me .
46007009	Ngo mbuti bahele kubangisina kukebe manyutu , lo bakweele ; bukuri bubvuriri bubwete mu kukweele ti na kuya mbaawu .
46007010	Ngo kasi , kuri bakweele me nyiha lutumu , kari me ko , ngo Mfumu : Mukasi yaa kahambikisa na mulumi waandi ko .
46007011	Ngo mbuti weki wahambikisa , lo kaba bunubwo kwahele kukweele , bunu pe kabweese kuyukusuna na mulumi , na mulumi yaa kasuusa mukasi ko .
46007012	Me nyileele kuri bakaka , me nkani ka Mfumu ko : mbuti mpaangi mosi wuri na mukasi wa mungooyi wutaamburi kwedzakala na nde , lo yaa kamusuusa ko .
46007013	Na mbuti wa mukyeetu wuri na mulimi wa mungooyi , wutaamburi kwedzakala na nde , lo yaa kamusuusa ko .
46007014	Bukuri mulumi wa mungooyi wataambula bungisi mu mukasi , na mukasi wa mungooyi wataambula bungisi mu mpaangi ; mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo baala beenu basumuka , ngo kasi mu lumalu bo bari bangisi .
46007015	Ngo mbuti wa mungooyi tii kuhaambuka , lo kahaambuka kwaandi ; haho ngo hari lo , mpaangi bunu pe kibusi wahele kuba wakaangama . Nzaambi waluteele mu kuba kunsa kiyeengi .
46007016	Mukwongo , ye wa mukyeetu buri wuyaabila , kampe ye sa bvuukisa mulumi waaku ? Bunu pe ye wa mubakala buri wuyaabila , kampe ye sa bvuukisa mukasi waaku ?
46007017	Mu myakaka ngo miri , hemese mpisi muutu kaba mu kiteesu kya muha Mfumu , mpisi muutu kadyaatila bunu buri mbila yamuteele Nzaambi . Mamo me nyiri mu kuloombo munsa mabuundu momanso .
46007018	Muutu wataambula mbila kuri wateendu bubakala , lo yaa kasaka kuba na sutu ko ; muutu wataambula mbila kuri wahele kuteende bubakala , lo yaa kasaka bamuteende bubakala ko .
46007019	Nteendulu bubakala yiri kitotolo ko , na kuhele kuteende bubakala kiri kitotolo ko , ngo biri mufunu kubvumina mangisi ma Nzaambi .
46007020	Mpisi muutu kanamitina kuba mu kiteesu ki kaba , ha kataamburi mbila .
46007021	Ye nkutu waba ha wataamburi mbila ? Lo yaa mono mutima mpasi ko ; ngo mbuti wiisiri kubaka bunsaalisi , lo bakila bwo ndaandu .
46007022	Mukwongo , nkutu yataambula mbila mu Mfumu , muutu wakuuluka wuri wa Mfumu ; bwobumosi se , muutu wuri bunsaalisi wataambula mbila , nkutu Kiristo kari .
46007023	Nzaambi walusuumbiri mu ntalu yalaka , ngo yaa lukituka bankutu ba baatu ko .
46007024	Bampaangi , mpisi muutu kanamitina kuba ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu kiteesu ki kaba , ha kataamburi mbila .
46007025	Mu mitariri babo bahele kukweele , me nyahele na ntumunu dza Mfumu , ngo me kitsimi nyisoongo , bunu bwa mbakila Mfumu ngebe , mu kuba muutu wu bayelemini kusikikila .
46007026	Ngo me nyitsima ti buri bwabubwete mu kuba bunubwo , mu ntoono mpasi dza ntaangu yimayi : buri bwabubwete kuri muutu mu kuba bunubwo .
46007027	Buri ye wakaangama mu wa mukyeetu ? Yaa saka kuhambikisa ko . Wahele kukaangama mu wa mukyeetu ? Yaa saka kukweele ko .
46007028	Ngo mbuti ye kweeriri , lo kari masumu yirikiri ko ; na mbuti ntuumba yanswaasa yikweeriri , lo kari masumu kayirika ko ; kasi babo bakweele sa bamono mpasi mu muswinyi , ngo me ntiiri kuluwuungula mu mpasi dzidzo .
46007029	Bampaangi , me bu ntiiri kuleele ti : ntaangu yeki yayikufi ; mu lumalu , babo bari na bakasi , baba bunu ti bahele na bakasi ,
46007030	babo bari mu kudila , baba bunu ti bahele mu kudila , babo bari mu kumono kiminu , baba bunu ti bahele kumono kiminu , babo bari mu kusuumba baba bunu ti bahele na kitotolo ,
46007031	na babo bari mu kubaka ndaandu mu nsi yimayi , baba bunu ti bahele kubaka ndaandu , bukuri nsi yamonokono yimayi yiri mu kuluta .
46007032	Me ntiiri ti beenu luhele kuba kunsa minyoongi . Wa mfuubi wusanaa minyoongi mu misamu mya Mfumu , wukwesaka bwa kubweeyile kuri Mfumu ;
46007033	ngo kasi , wakweele wuri kunsa minyoongi mu misamu mya nsi , wukwesaka bwa kubweeyile kuri mukasi waandi ,
46007034	na wuri mu kwedunga . Mukyeetu wa mfuubi na ntuumba ya nswaasa basanaa minyoongi mu misamu mya Mfumu , mpisi baba bangisi mu nyutu na mu kiluunsi , ngo kasi wakweele wusanaa minyoongi mu misamu mya nsi , wukwesaka bwa kubweeyile kuri mulumi waandi .
46007035	Me nyileele mamo mu ndaandu ya beenu-meene , kari kuri ti nyilutubula siinga ko , ngo mu kuri ti luba na mbeelu yayibwete , na kinkununu mu Mfumu kwahele kebu-kebu .
46007036	Mbuti muutu wumono kuri ti , lo wahele bweese kukuunda kuba wa nswaasa , wuri na nzala kuyukutisa mpwiisu ya muswinyi , na buyelemini kuba bubwo , lo kayirika ma katiiri , nde wahele kuyirika masumu , kakweele kwaandi .
46007037	Ngo kasi , wunde wakaanga kitsimi kya makwa kunsa mutima waandi , kuri bahele kumukwiikisa , na wuri na lutumu mu mi katiiri nde-meene , tsimini kunsa mutima waandi , ti yelemini kukiinsa bunswaasa bwaandi , lo bubwe kayirika .
46007038	Mu didyo , wunde wukweelisiri bunswaasa bwaandi lo bubwe kayirikiri ; ngo wunde wahele kubukweelese , lo bvuriri kuyirika mamabwe .
46007039	Mukyeetu wakaangama mu mulumi waandi , mu ntaangu yoyinso yiri mulumi wuri wamwooyo ; ngo mbuti mulumi fwiiri , lo mukyeetu bakiri bunsaalisi mu kukweele wu katiiri , ngo kakweele wunu wuri mu Mfumu .
46007040	Ngo mbuti mu kitsimi kya me , lo nde bvuriri kuba mu lwambwe mbuti nde namitini kuba bunu bu kari ; me nsimini ti me se nyiri na Mpeeve ya Nzaambi .
46008001	Mu musamu wutariri toongo twaha mu kikabu kuri biteki , tuyaari kuri ti beetu-banso turi na nyaabulu , ngo nyaabulu yihaanaa masiiku , kasi ntiilu yihaanaa ntuungulu .
46008002	Mbuti muutu wutsima ti nde yaari kitotolo , lo wakiri wahele kuyaaba , bunu bu bayelemini kuyaaba .
46008003	Ngo mbuti muutu tiiri Nzaambi , lo nde wayabakana kuri Nzaambi .
46008004	Mu mitariri ndiilu ya toongo twaha mu kikabu kuri biteki , tuyaari kuri ti kiteki kiri kitotolo ko mu nsi , na ka kuri nzaambi yikimi ko , mbuti ka yomosi kitsu ko .
46008005	Mukwongo , ti bukuri kuri bi bakweleele ti banzaambi ku yulu na ha butoto , mu didyo lo banzaambi balaka bari , na bamfumu se balaka bari .
46008006	Ngo kasi , mu beetu lo Nzaambi yomosi yiri , Taayi , mu nde byobinso biri byafumuna , na beetu turi ba nde ; Mfumu se yomosi yiri , Yesu Kiristo , byobinso byayirimina mu nde , na beetu turi mwooyo mu nde .
46008007	Kasi nyaabulu yahele mu bobanso , babamosi bakiri bayuku mu kwesaambila biteki natee lumalu , bakwedya toongo mu kitsimi kiri ti , twaha mu kikabu kuri biteki , na nsimunu bo yiri na buyonsi , yasumuka .
46008008	Kari byandya bisa kuri ti tukokosolo kuri Nzaambi ko : mbuti twahele kubidya , lo kuri bi tuhelele ko ; na mbuti tubidiiri , lo kuri se bi tubvula kubaka ko .
46008009	Seenee madyeele , kuri heki miswa mi luri na myo , mihele kubumisa makya kuri bari na buyonsi .
46008010	Bukuri , mbuti muutu wumono ye wuri na nyaabulu , wuri mu kudya mu nzo yi basaambilaa biteki , buri lo nsimunu nde yiri na buyonsi , yahele kumutwaalisa mu kudya toongo twaha mu kikabu kuri biteki ?
46008011	Mukwongo , mu ntoono nyaabulu ya ye , muutu wuri na buyonsi lo dziimbiri , mpaangi yiyo yiri Kiristo wamufwiila .
46008012	Mu didyo , lubaanaa lukweyirika masumu kuri bampaangi , na kwebumisa makya kuri nsimunu bo yiri na buyonsi , lo luyirika masumu kuri Kiristo .
46008013	Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti kyandya kibumisa mpaangi yaami makya , lo ngwanwa me mbweese kudya toongo mu mantaangu momanso ko , mpisi heki me mpelele kubumisa mpaangi yaami makya .
46009001	Buri me nyiri na bunsaalisi ko ? Buri me nyiri ntumu ko ? Buri me nyasii mono Mfumu yeetu Yesu ko ? Buri beenu luri kisalu kya me mu Mfumu ko ?
46009002	Mbuti mu bakaka me nyiri ntumu ko , lo mu beenu ngo bari me nyiri ntumu ; bukuri beenu luri kinyemu kya kisalu kyaami kya buntumu mu Mfumu .
46009003	Kukalila kwa nyutu yaami , kuri babo bari mu kwensuundisa kuri bumabu .
46009004	Buri beetu twahele na miswa mu kudya na mu kunwa ?
46009005	Buri beetu twahele na miswa mu kwenata kibusi kiri mukasi , bu kwesa bantumu bakaka , na bampaangi ba Mfumu , na Kefa ?
46009006	Hoti wuni me , beetu na Barnaba , twahele na miswa mu kuhele kusala ?
46009007	Na wayeki sala kisalu kya buyongolo mu mboongo dza nde-meene ? Na wayeki kuna bviinya kwahele kudya bimbutu ? Bunu pe na wayeki buungula bangoombo kwahele kudya toongo bunu pe kunwa beene dya ngoombo ?
46009008	Buri mu kimuutu me nyiri mu kuleele mimyo , hoti mangisi se mahele mu kudzoonsolo mu misamu mimyo ?
46009009	Mukwongo , mu mangisi ma Moose diri dyatinu ti : « Yaa kaanga munwa ngoombo ko , mbuti yiri mu kudzabata mankono . » Buri Nzaambi lo wutsimina bangoombo ?
46009010	Buri mimyo ngwanwa kari mu beetu kari mu kuleele ko ? Mukwongo , mu ntoono beetu miri myatinu ti : wunde wutsabaa nseke , yelemini kutsaba kuri wuri na nsiitu na wunde wudzabata mankono se yelemini kuba na nsiitu ya kubaka kikuuku kya nde .
46009011	Mbuti beetu twakunini bya kimpeeve mu ntoono beenu , buri lo weki musamu wamunene , mbuti beetu tutoriri bya ha butoto kuri beenu ?
46009012	Mbuti bakaka bari na miswa mu beenu , buri beetu lo twahele kubvula miswa ? Kasi beetu twasii salila miswa mimyo ko , ngo beetu twakuundiri momanso , mpisi tuhele kutelemese bikaku mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo .
46009013	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti babo bakoosalaa mu Nzo-nzaambi , kudyaanaa bifumuna mu Nzo-nzaambi , na babo bakooyokaa bikabu ha yulu dziku bakooholaa kikuuku kya bo ?
46009014	Bunubwo se , Mfumu kari katuma kuri ti , babo bakweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete , kidziingu kwebakila mu Musamu Wamubwete .
46009015	Me ngo wuri nyahele kusalila ntoono ti mosi , mu mi nyiri na miswa . Me nyahele kutina mamama mu kuri ti miba mya me . Mukwongo , bubwete bu mfwiiri ti na kuri ti . Kuri muutu ti mosi wukitula kimweese kya me , bunu kitotolo kyabuunu ko .
46009016	Mukwongo , mbuti me nyikweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete , lo yiri ntoono ya kimweese kuri me ko , bukuri me nyabiinduma mu mamo ; ngo kyaari kuri me , mbuti nyahele kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete .
46009017	Mukwongo , mbuti me nyikwesala mu kutya kwa me-meene , lo me mbakiri mufutu ; ngo mbuti kari mu kutya me-meene ko , lo kini kisalu kibari bampa nyikwesala .
46009018	Hango museendu me nki nde ? Mu kuha kwa mungengi , Musamu Wamubwete wu nyikweyaabisa , mu kuhele kusalila miswa mi nyiri na myo mu Musamu Wamubwete .
46009019	Bukuri me nyiri mu bunsaalisi kuri bobanso , ngo kasi , me-meene nyataambula kuba nkutu ya bobanso , mpisi heki me mbaka baatu balaka .
46009020	Kuri Bayudayo , me nyayeki bunu Muyudayo , mpisi heki me mbaka Bayudayo ; kuri baatu bari kunsa mangisi , bunu me nyiri kunsa mangisi , ti hayuku me-meene nyahele kunsa mangisi , mpisi heki me mbaka babo bari kunsa mangisi ;
46009021	kuri bahele na mangisi bunu me nyahele na mangisi , mpisi heki me mbaka babo bahele na mangisi ; ti hayuku me nyahele kuba , muutu wahele na mangisi ma Nzaambi , ngo wuri kunsa mangisi ma Kiristo .
46009022	Me nyayeki kuri bari na buyonsi bunu me nyiri na buyonsi , mpisi heki me mbaka babo bari na buyonsi ; me nyayeki myominso kuri bobanso , mpisi heki mu nzelu ngo nzelu , me mvuukisa babamosi .
46009023	Me nyikweyirika momanso mamo , mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , mpisi heki me mbaka kikuuku .
46009024	Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti badzumuni ba ntiinu , bobanso bakoodzumunaa ntiinu kunsa mbasi , ngo kasi muutu mosi kitsu wubaka kimbwanga ? Beenu se dzumukineenu bubwo , mpisi lubaka kimbwanga .
46009025	Mpisi wukotaana mu kimpa kya ntiinu , lo wukebaanaa mangisi mu myominso . Bo bayirikaa mimyo , mpisi bataambula lukoongolo lukoobiiyaa , ngo kasi beetu luri lwabiiya ko .
46009026	Ngo mu bubwo , me nyiri mu kudzumuna , kari bunu ti mu muyooyolo ko , mu bubwo me nyiri mu kulatila , kari bunu ti mu kingye-kingye ko ;
46009027	ngo me nyiri mu kwebamisa nyutu me-meene , na nyayidzitikila misiinga , mpisi heki me-meene mpele kuba ha luteke , ha mambisa ma kuyikisa bakaka .
46010001	Bampaangi , me ntii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu : bakuutu beetu bobanso baba kunsa mposi ya tuti , na balutila ha kakati dya mubu .
46010002	Bobanso bataambula mbotokulu mu Moose , kunsa tuti na mu mubu .
46010003	Bobanso badiiri byandya byobimosi bya kimpeeve ,
46010004	na bobanso banwa maampa momamosi ma kimpeeve ; bukuri bo baba kwenwaa maampa mu tari dya kimpeeve , dyaba kweyendaa na bo ; tari didyo dyaba Kiristo .
46010005	Kasi balaka mu bo , bari Nzaambi kasii mono kiminu mu bo ko , bukuri bawii kufwa mu nsi yankatu .
46010006	Misamu mimyo ngo kifwaani kuri beetu , kuri heki tuhele kuba bakwenyiima mamabi , bunu bwaba kwenyiimaana bo .
46010007	Yaa luba bakwesaambila biteki ko , bunu babamosi mu bo , bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Baatu bamanaa kudzakala mu kudya na kunwa , ha batelemini mu kusakana . »
46010008	Yaa tuyekelee manyutu mu buyala ko , bunu bwayirikiri babamosi mu bo , kuri mu kiluumbu kimosi , mafuunda makuumi moolo na matatu ma baatu bafwiiri .
46010009	Yaa tubwiisa Kiristo mu nsindukulu ko , bunu bwaba sa babamosi mu bo , na bafwiiri mu misya mya banyoko .
46010010	Yaa lumunguta ko , bunu babamosi mu bo bamungutini , na mufuukisi wubadzusiri .
46010011	Misamu mimyo myayirimini mu bo , mpisi miba kifwaani , na miri myatinu mu kuba nyikusulu kuri beetu , bari tweki mu mantaangu ma manunu .
46010012	Mu didyo , wunde wutsima ti wateleme , kasa madyeele kahele kubwa .
46010013	Nsindukulu dzi lubwanikina na dzo , dzahele kuba dzaluta kiteesu , ngo dzayelemene mu baatu . Nzaambi wakwiikama , nde kaha miswa ko ti beenu luba lwasindukulu mu kiteesu kibvuriri makwa na beenu , ngo kunsa nsindukulu , nde sa kuluha mpwaani ya kupalila , kuri lubangisina kukuunda .
46010014	Hango-nkuumbu , banduku baami ba mutima , ya lwekokosolo ku bakwesaambila biteki ko .
46010015	Me nyiri mu kuludzoonsolo bunu ti kuri baatu bari na nyukulu , fyongokineenu beenu-meene mi nyileele me .
46010016	Mbasa ya lusakumunu yi tusakumunaana , yiri kintwaari na makila ma Kiristo . Mpa yi tubukunaana yiri kintwaari na nyutu Kiristo .
46010017	Bukuri , mpa mosi kitsu yiri , ngo beetu turi balaka mu nyutu mosi kitsu , bukuri tukabulaana mpa yo yimosi .
46010018	Monee meti Isaheli mu muswinyi : babo badyanaa byaha mu bikabu , bari kintwaari na dziku .
46010019	Ngo me ndeele ti kwe ? Buri toongo twaha mu kikabu turi mufunu , hoti biteki biri mufunu ?
46010020	Bu ntii kuleele ti , bi bakoohaanaa bibyo , kuri mampeeve mamabi babihaanaa , nkani ka kuri Nzaambi ko . Ngo me ntii ko ti beenu luba kintwaari na mampeeve mamabi .
46010021	Beenu kalutsiitsa kunwa mbasa ya Mfumu , na mbasa ya mampeeve mamabi ko ; beenu kalutsiitsa kudya kintwaari ha taabala na Mfumu , na kudya se kintwaari ha taabala na mampeeve mamabi ko .
46010022	Hoti bukwa bwa Mfumu tutii kubvulumina ? Buri beetuneenu tubvuriri makwa na nde ?
46010023	Myominso miri miswa , ngo myominso myahele mufunu ; myominso miri miswa , ngo myominso myahele kutuunga .
46010024	Muutu yaa kesaka ndaandu yini ya nde-meene ko , ngo kesaka se ya mukimi .
46010025	Dyeenee mpisi bi bayarikaa ha dzaandu , kwahele kweha bifuuri , ngo kuri mutima waholo ;
46010026	bukuri butoto , na byobinso biri ha butoto , biri bya Mfumu .
46010027	Mbuti mosi mu bangooyi , wuluteeriri mbila na lutaamburi kweende , lo dyeenee mpisi bi baluheeri , kwahele kuha bifuuri , ngo beenee na mu mutima waholo .
46010028	Kasi mbuti muutu wululeeriri ti : « Tu toongo tuha mu kikabu kuri biteki » , lo yaa ludya ko , mu ntoono nde wuluyaabisiri , na mu ntoono nsimunu .
46010029	Nsimunu yi nyiri mu kudzoonsolo me , kari ya nde-meene ko , ngo ya muutu mukimi . « Bukuri nki , bunsaalisi bwa me buri bwatsuundusu mu nsimunu ya muutu mukimi ?
46010030	Mbuti me nyibvutulaa matoondo mu bi nyidya , lo buri bateesele me mamabi , mu mi nyiri mu kubvutula matoondo ? »
46010031	Ngo ti hayuku luri mu kudya , ti hayuku luri mu kunwa , ti hayuku ntoono yikimi luri mu kuyirika , lo yirikeenu momanso mu nkeembu ya Nzaambi .
46010032	Yaa lwebumisa baatu makya ko , ti Bayudayo , ti Bahelene , ti dibuundu dya Nzaambi ,
46010033	ngo beenee bunu me , wuri mu myominso , nyisakaa kubweeye kuri bobanso . Me nyahele kusaka ndaandu ya wunu me-meene kitsu , ngo ndaandu ya balaka , mpisi baba babvuukusu .
46011001	Beenee minsombisiri mya me , bunu bu nyikwesombosolo me se Kiristo .
46011002	Me nyilusiika bu lukootsiminaa me mu myominso , na bu luri lwakebe kikulu bunu bu nyalutubukiri kyo .
46011003	Ngo me ntiiri ti beenu luyaaba , ti Kiristo ngo mfumu mpisi wa mubakala ; mfumu wa mukyeetu ngo wa mubakala ; mfumu Kiristo ngo Nzaambi .
46011004	Mpisi mubakala wusaambila , bunu pe wubikula kuri mutu wafuka , lo wahele kukiinsa mfumu yaandi .
46011005	Mpisi mukyeetu wusaambila , bunu pe wubikula kuri mutu wahele kufuka , lo wahele kukiinsa mfumu yaandi , bukuri lo nde wuri bwobumosi na kuri watebe kungulu .
46011006	Mbuti mukyeetu wahele kufuka mutu , lo hemese katebe mfu . Ngo mbuti diri dyansoni , kuri wa mukyeetu mu kuba kuri watebe mfu bunu pe wuri na kungulu , lo hemese kafuka mutu .
46011007	Wa mubakala ngo wuri , wahele kuyelemene mu kufuka mutu , bukuri nde ngo kifwaani na nkeembu ya Nzaambi ; kasi wa mukyeetu , ngo wuri nkeembu wa mubakala .
46011008	Bukuri , kari wa mubakala wapalila mu wa mukyeetu ko , ngo wa mukyeetu wapalila mu wa mubakala ;
46011009	na kari wa mubakala bari bayirika mu ntoono wa mukyeetu ko , ngo wa mukyeetu bari bayirika mu ntoono wa mubakala .
46011010	Hango-nkuumbu , wa mukyeetu yelemini kuba na kidiimbu kya lutumu ha yulu mutu , mu ntoono bambasi .
46011011	Ngo kasi , mu Mfumu , kuri wa mukyeetu ko kwahele wa mubakala , na kuri wa mubakala ko kwahele wa mukyeetu .
46011012	Mukwongo , bunu buri wa mukyeetu wapalila mu wa mubakala , bunubwo se wa mubakala wabutuka mu wa mukyeetu , na byobinso byafumuna kuri Nzaambi .
46011013	Beenu-meene yirikee kutala : buri lo bwabubwete ti wa mukyeetu kasaambila Nzaambi , kuri mutu wahele kufuka ?
46011014	Buri nsi yo-meene yahele kuluyikisa , ti diri dyansoni kuri wa mubakala mu kuba na mfu dzadzila ,
46011015	kasi wa mukyeetu , mbuti wuri na mfu dzadzila , lo yiyo nkeembu kuri nde ? Bukuri nde bamuheeri mfu dzadzila bunu kitambala .
46011016	Ngo mbuti kuri muutu wutii kusa nkalikisi mu mimyo , lo beetu twahele na kifu kikyo , na mabuundu ma Nzaambi se mahele na kifu kikyo .
46011017	Mu myeki kwiisa mi , me nyahele kulusiika , ngo nyiri na misamu mya kululeele , bukuri beenu bu lukookutukunaa , kari mu kuyirika mibvuriri bubwete ko , ngo kasi mu kuyirika mibvuriri bubi .
46011018	Dyatete diri , me nyiri mu kuyukaa ti , beenu bu lukookutukunaa mu dibuundu , lo ha kakati dya beenu hari nkabunu ; me nyitsima ti musamu wunde kampe wangwanwa .
46011019	Mukwongo , nkabunu se yiyelemini kuba ha kakati dya beenu , mpisi heki bakuma mu nsindukulu , bamonoko ha kakati dya beenu .
46011020	Ngo beenu , bu lukookutukunaa ha kimosi , kari byandya bya Mfumu lukoodya ko ;
46011021	bukuri mu ntaangu ya kudya , muutu-muutu wutekisilaana kudya byandya bya nde-meene , na wamosi bu kari na nzala , wakaka wakolo malu .
46011022	Buri beenu lwahele na manzo ma kudiila na ma kunwiina ? Hoti beenu dibuundu dya Nzaambi luri mu kwesaana , na nsoni luri mu kudzusaa bahele na kitotolo ? Me nyiluleele ti kwe ? Nyi lusiika ? Me nyahele kulusiika mu mimyo .
46011023	Mukwongo , me nyataamburi kuri Mfumu , mimyo mi nyiri nyatubula kuri beenu ti : Mfumu Yesu , mu butsuku bu baba muyekele , nde waholo mpa
46011024	na bu kabvutula matoondo , wabukuna yo na waleele : « Yimayi ngo nyutu yaami , me mpeeri mu ntoono beenu ; seenee bumabu mu kubambukila me mwooyo . »
46011025	Nde wasa bunubwo se mu mbasa , kamana kudya , waleele : « Yimayi ngo mbasa ya lulelusunu lwamoono , mu makila maami ; seenee bumabu mpisi ntaangu yi lutsiitsa kunwa yo , mu kubambukila me mwooyo . »
46011026	Mukwongo , mpisi ntaangu yilutsiitsa kudya mpa yimayi , na kunwa mbasa , lo beenu luyaabisaana lufwa lwa Mfumu natee ku kakwiisa .
46011027	Hango-nkuumbu , mpisi wunde wudya mpa , bunu pe wunwa mbasa ya Mfumu kwahele kuyelemene , lo bakiri kibila mu nyutu na mu makila ma Mfumu .
46011028	Ngo mpisi muutu , kafyongokono mu mutima waandi , tumi kadya mpa yi , na kanwa mbasa yi ,
46011029	bukuri wunde wudya na kunwa kwahele kufyongokono nyutu Mfumu , lo wuri mu kudya na kunwa mutsuundu mu nde-meene .
46011030	Mu didyo , ha kakati dya beenu , hari bangaa-bipfuumi na babeeru , na balaka na balaka , bamwaafwa .
46011031	Mbuti tufyongokini mitima myeetu , lo tuba batsuundusu ko .
46011032	Ngo tubaanaana twatsuundusu kuri Mfumu , lo turi basuunguku , mpisi bahele kutukesele mukanu kintwaari na nsi .
46011033	Mu didyo , bampaangi baami , lubaanaana lukutukini mu kudya , lo kingisineenu beenu na beenu .
46011034	Mbuti muutu wuri na nzala , lo kadya ku nzo , mpisi luhele kukutukunaa mu kubwa mu mutsuundu . Mu misiiri ngo miri , me sa nyirika ha nyikwiisa .
46012001	Bampaangi , mu ntoono ya bikabu bya kimpeeve , me ntii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu .
46012002	Ha lwaba lwakiri bangooyi , beenu luyaari dyaburi lwaba luri lwatwaalusu , mu kweyende kuri biteki , byahele na mbeembu .
46012003	Hango-nkuumbu , me ntii kuluyaabisa ti , kuri muutu ko mu Mpeeve ya Nzaambi wuleele ti : « Yesu kabwilikila mpopi ! » , na kuri muutu ko wutsiitsa kuleele ti : « Yesu Mfumu ! » , mbuti Mpeeve Yangisi yahele kumutwaalisa .
46012004	Bikabu bya bweese biri mu bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , ngo Mpeeve yiniyo ;
46012005	Bisalu biri mu bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , ngo Mfumu yiniyo ;
46012006	Biyiriki biri mu bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , ngo Nzaambi yiniyo , yiyirikaa momanso mu bobanso .
46012007	Kuri muutu-muutu Mpeeve yamonokono mu kikabu , mu ntoono ya mamo mari mufunu .
46012008	Mukwongo , kuri wamosi Mpeeve waha maampu ma madyeele , kuri wakaka maampu ma nyaabulu bu tiiri Mpeeve yiniyo ,
46012009	kuri mukimi kanyi mu Mpeeve yiniyo , kuri wakaka se bikabu bya kubelekise babeeru , mu Mpeeve yo yimosi ,
46012010	kuri wakaka nyirikulu bimaangu , kuri wakaka mbikululu , kuri wakaka mfyongokunu mampeeve , kuri wakaka mandiinga ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , kuri wakaka kubaangula mandiinga .
46012011	Myominso mimyo , yini Mpeeve yo yimosi na yiniyo yikwemiyirika , na yikwekabula bunu bu katiiriri kuri muutu-muutu .
46012012	Mukwongo , bunu buri nyutu yiri mosi ngo binamu byalaka , na bunu buri binamu bya nyutu biri byalaka ngo mu nyutu mosi , bunubwo se buri mu Kiristo .
46012013	Bukuri beetu-banso batubotoko mu Mpeeve yomosi , mu nyutu yomosi , ti Bayudayo , ti Bahelene , ti bankutu , ti baatu bari na bunsaalisi , na beetu-banso batunwiisa mu Mpeeve yomosi .
46012014	Mukwongo , nyutu yahele kuba kinamu kimosi , ngo binamu byalaka .
46012015	Ngo mbuti kuulu kuleeriri ti : « Me bukuri nyiri kooko ko , lo me nyahele mu nyutu » , buri mu bubwo lo nde hotiri kuba mu nyutu ?
46012016	Na mbuti kutu dileeriri ti : « Me bukuri nyiri diisu ko , lo me nyahele mu nyutu » , buri mu bubwo lo nde hotiri kuba mu nyutu ?
46012017	Heki mbuti nyutu yoyinso kuba diisu , lo kuyukula buri ? Na mbuti kuba kutu , lo mfuku kuyukila buri ?
46012018	Ngo mu lumalu , Nzaambi wasuusa mpisi kinamu mu nyutu bunu bu katiiriri .
46012019	Mbuti byobinso byaba kinamu kimosi , lo nyutu hari yaketi kuba ?
46012020	Kasi mu lumalu , binamu byalaka biri , ngo nyutu yomosi .
46012021	Diisu lo dibangusina kuleele kuri kooko ko ti : « Me nyiri na nzala ye ko ! » , Bunu pe mutu se , lo kabangusina kuleele kuri miilu ko ti : « Me nyiri na nzala beenu ko ! »
46012022	Ngo kasi binamu bya nyutu , byamonokono kuri ti bibvuriri buyonsi , biri mufunu .
46012023	Bibyo bi tumono kuri ti , bya lukiinsu lwantele mu nyutu , bibyo ngo bi turi mu kuha lukiinsu lwalunene ; na bibyo bya kibvumi kyantele , ngo bi tubvuminaa kwalaka ,
46012024	ngo bya kibvumi kyalaka byahele na nzala kibvumi kyeetu . Kasi Nzaambi wayirika nyutu mu kiteesu kya kuha lukiinsu lubvuriri bunene , kuri binamu byahele na lwo ,
46012025	mpisi kuhele kuba nkabunu mu nyutu , ngo kasi binamu biba na kintwaari , na kwetsimina bambasi byo na byo .
46012026	Mu didyo , kinamu kimosi kibaanaa kimono mpasi , lo binamu byobinso bimono mpasi ; na kinamu kimosi kibaanaa kyakeembusu , lo binamu byobinso bimono kiminu .
46012027	Beenu luri nyutu Kiristo , na mpisi muutu kinamu kya nyutu .
46012028	Mu dibuundu , Nzaambi bakasuusiri , dyatete bantumu , dyamoolo babikiri , dyamatatu bayikisi , tumi bangaa-bimaangu , bari na bikabu bya kutsinikisa babeeru , bya kubakisa baatu , bya kutwaalisa , bya mandiinga ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu .
46012029	Buri bobanso bantumu ? Buri bobanso babikiri ? Buri bobanso bayikisi ? Buri bobanso bangaa-bimaangu ?
46012030	Buri bobanso bari na bikabu bya kutsinikisa babeeru ? Buri bobanso bakwedzoonso mandiinga ? Buri bobanso bakwebaangula mandiinga ?
46012031	Beeneenu na kuheme mu bikabu bibvuriri bunene . Tumi me mbweese kulusoongo nzila yibvuriri bubwete .
46013001	Mbuti me nyidzoonsaa mandiinga ma baatu , na ma bambasi , ngo nyahele na ntiilu , lo me nyeki nguunga bunu pe ngomo yi bari mu kusika .
46013002	Mbuti me nyiri na kikabu kya kubikula , nyikwebakula mpaanu dzodzinso , nyiri na nyaabulu yoyinso , na nyiri na kanyi dyodinso kuri lo , nyinaanguna na milaandu , ngo nyahele na ntiilu , lo me nyiri wabuunu .
46013003	Mbuti me nkabiri byobinso bi nyiri na byo , kuri bari na nzala , na mbuti me nyekiri nyutu yaami mpisi nsa kimweese , ngo nyahele na ntiilu , lo myominso mimyo , myahele kubakisa me mu ntoono ti mosi .
46013004	Ntiilu yiri na nkindusulu-mutima , yayibwete , yahele na musoki , ntiilu yahele na nzala-kubila , yahele na masiiku ,
46013005	yayirikaa dya nsoni ko , yasakaa ndaandu ya nde-meene ko , yabakaa nkesi ko , yakebaa makooti ko ,
46013006	yamonaa kiminu mu bubayi ko , ngo yimonaa kiminu mu ntoono ngwanwa ,
46013007	yifuka myominso , yisiila kanyi mu myominso , yiri na nsiitu mu myominso , yikuunda myominso .
46013008	Ntiilu yawaa ko , mbikululu sa dzawa , mandiinga sa mawa , nyaabulu sa yawa .
46013009	Bukuri , mwaa ndaambu kitsu tuyaari , na mwaa ndaambu kitsu tukoobikulaa .
46013010	Ngo mbasi-tsuku , nyirimunu yakuka yiisaana , lo bibyo bya ndaambu sa byawa .
46013011	Ha nyaba mwaa-kilesi , me nyaba kwedzoonsaa bunu mwaa-kilesi , nyaba kwetsimaa bunu mwaa-kilesi , nyaba madyeele ma mwaa-kilesi ; ngo bu nyeki wa mukuutu , me mwaasiisa myominso mya bulesi .
46013012	Mukwongo , mu lumalu turi mu kwemono mu lumweenye , ngo twahele kuyirika kumono , ngo mbasi-tsuku sa twamono mu miisu na miisu . Mu lumalu me nyaari mwaa-ndaambu , ngo mbasi-tsuku sa Nyirika kuyaaba , bunu bu bari bayirika kuyaaba me se .
46013013	Mu lumalu , byo bitatu bibyo biri : kanyi , nsiitu na ntiilu ; ngo mu byo , kibvuriri bunene ntiilu .
46014001	Namitinee kusalila ntiilu , beenee na kuheme mu bikabu bya kimpeeve , mbiki ti mu mbikululu .
46014002	Mukwongo , wudzoonso mu mandiinga , wahele kudzoonso kuri baatu , ngo kuri Nzaambi ; bukuri kuri muutu ko wubakula ma kaleele , koomosoko mu Mpeeve , nde wuri mu kuleele misamu mya mpaanu .
46014003	Ngo wunde wubikula , wudzoonsaa kuri baatu misamu mya ntuungulu , mya nsyamusunu , na mya nkumusunu .
46014004	Wudzoonsaa mu mandiinga , wubakaa ntuungulu ya nde-meene , kasi wunde wubikulaa wuhaanaa ntuungulu kuri dibuundu .
46014005	Me ntii ti beenu-banso lwedzoonso mu mandiinga , ngo mvuriri kutya kuri ti beenu lwebikula . Wubikulaa bvuriri na wudzoonsaa mu mandiinga , sati kuri ti nde-meene wubaangula , mpisi heki dibuundu dibaka ntuungulu .
46014006	Ngo mu lumalu bampaangi , mbuti me nyiisaa kuri beenu , kuludzoonsolo mu mandiinga , lo nkya mufunu me nyiba na nde kuri beenu , mbuti nyahele kudzoonso mu kutubula nyaabusulu , bunu pe nyaabulu , bunu pe mbikululu , bunu pe nyikusulu ?
46014007	Bunubwo se , buri mu bisikulu bipalisaa mbeembu , bu siiri nseembe , bunu pe ngoomfi , mbuti byahele na minyiingu myasoboko , lo buri bayaabila munyiingu wa nseembe na ya ngoomfi ?
46014008	Mukwongo , mbuti mukoonsi wahele kupalisa mbeembu yayibwete , lo na wuyirima mu kweende ku mudziingu ?
46014009	Beenu se bwobumosi , mbuti ludzoonso mu ndiinga misamu miri baatu bahele kubakula , lo buri bayaabila mi baleele ? Lo buni beenu ludzoonso kwa buunu .
46014010	Mandiinga ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ha nsi , ngo buri , kuri ti yimosi yahele na mambangukulu ?
46014011	Ngo mbuti me nyahele kuyaaba ndiinga yidzoonso muutu , lo me nyiri munzeense kuri nde , na nde wuri munzeense kuri me .
46014012	Hango beenu se , bukuri luri na kuheme mu bikabu bya kimpeeve , sakee kuba babuukula mu bya ntuungulu ya dibuundu .
46014013	Hango-nkuumbu , wunde wudzoonsaa mu mandiinga , kasaambila , mpisi kabaangula .
46014014	[ Mukwongo ] , mbuti me nyisaambila mu mandiinga , lo kiluunsi kya me se kiri mu lusaambulu , kasi madyeele ma me mahele mu kusala .
46014015	Hango nsiila buri ? Me nyelemini kusaambila mu Mpeeve , ngo nyelemini kusaambila se mu madyeele ; me nyelemini kuyimbila mu Mpeeve , ngo nyelemini kuyimbila se mu madyeele .
46014016	Bukuri mbuti ye wuri mu kuha lusakumunu [ mu ] Mpeeve , lo muutu wabuunu wadzakala , buri kutambukila ti « Amene » , mu mvutukulu matoondo ya ye , bukuri nde wahele kuyaaba , ma wuri mu kuleele ?
46014017	Mukwongo , ye wuri mu kubvutula matoondo kwakubwe , kasi mbaasi wahele kubaka ntuungulu .
46014018	Me nyibvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , bukuri me mvuriri kudzoonso mu mandiinga ti na beenu-banso .
46014019	Ngo ha lukutukunu , me mvuriri kutya kuleele mantoono mataanu mu madyeele , mpisi me nyikisa se bambaasi , ti na kuleele fuunda dya mantoono mu ndiinga .
46014020	Bampaangi , yaa luba mwaa-baala mu nsimunu ko ; mu mitariri mamabi , beenee mwaa-baala , ngo mu nsimunu , beenee bakuutu .
46014021	Mu Mangisi mwatina ti : « Me sa nzoonso kuri kaanda dimadi mu baatu ba ndiinga yikimi , na mu minwa mya banzeense , ngo kasi ti mu bubwo , bo baywiila me ko , bu leeriri Mfumu . »
46014022	Mu didyo , kikabu kya mandiinga ngo kidiimbu kuri bangooyi nkani ka kuri bangaa-kanyi ko ; na mbikululu ngo kidiimbu kuri bangaa-kanyi , nkani ka kuri bangooyi ko .
46014023	Ngo mbuti heki , dibuundu dyodinso dyakutukuna ha kibeendu kimosi , na bobanso bari mu kudzoonso mu mandiinga , ngo baatu babuunu , bunu pe bangooyi bakotiri , buri lo bahele kuleele kuri beenu ti bilawuku ?
46014024	Ngo mbuti , bobanso bari mu kubikula , na mungooyi bunu pe muutu wabuunu kotiri , lo nde bakiri maseembu , na nsundusulu kuri bobanso ;
46014025	mansweeki ma mutima waandi lo mamonikini , na katsukaa busu ha nsi , saambiri Nzaambi na yaabisiri ti : " Ngwanwa Nzaambi wuri ha kakati dya beenu ! "
46014026	Bampaangi , nki kwaandi ? Mu ntaangu yi lukutukunaa beenu , mosi wuri na mukuunga , wakaka wuri na nyikusulu , mukimi wuri na nyabusulu , wuni wuri na ma kuleele mu ndiinga , wakaka wuri na mambangukulu : myominso miyirimina mu ntuungulu .
46014027	Mbuti muutu wudzoonso mu ndiinga , baba boolo bunu pe batatu , lo muutu-muutu kaba na kilookolo kyaandi , na kuba muutu wubaangula .
46014028	Ngo mbuti , kwahele wubaangula , lo bawura ha lukutukunu , muutu-muutu kadzoonso kuri nde-meene na kuri Nzaambi .
46014029	Babikiri ngo bari , boolo bunu pe batatu badzoonso , na baatu bakaka bafyongokono .
46014030	Mbuti kuri muutu mukimi wadzakala , ngo kabakiri nyabusulu , lo watete wuri mu kudzoonso kawura .
46014031	Mukwongo , beenu-banso lo lubikuri mosi-mosi , mpisi heki bobanso bataambula nyikusulu na nsyamusunu .
46014032	Mampeeve ma babikiri mari matumuma kuri babikiri ,
46014033	bukuri Nzaambi , kari Nzaambi ya kisaangila ko , ngo ya kiyeengi . Bunu buri mu mabuundu momanso ma bangisi ,
46014034	bakyeetu bawura mu nkutukunu ; mukwongo , bo bahele na miswa mya kudzoonso , kasi bayelemini kuba batumuma , bunu bu leele se Mangisi .
46014035	Mbuti bari na ma batii kuyika , lo bafuula balumi ba bo-meene mu manzo , bukuri bwahele kuyelemene ti , mukyeetu kadzoonso ha lukutukunu .
46014036	Buri maampu ma Nzaambi kuri beenu mari manangukina ? Hoti kuni kuri beenu mari matubuka ?
46014037	Mbuti muutu wutsima ti nde mubikiri , bunu pe wa kimpeeve , lo kayaaba ti , ma nyiri mu kutinini beenu mamama , lutumu lwa Mfumu luri .
46014038	Ngo mbuti muutu wahele kuyaaba , lo nde se wahele kuyabakana .
46014039	Mu didyo , bampaangi baami , beeneenu na kuheme mu kubikula , na yaa lwekabukisa nzoonsulu mu mandiinga ko ,
46014040	ngo myominso milutila bunu bwayelemene , na kunsa bunkete .
46015001	Bampaangi , me nyilubaambula mwooyo mu Musamu Wamubwete wu nyiri nyaluyaabisa , wu luri lwataambula , wu luri lwasikikila .
46015002	Mu nde beenu lutaambula mvuukulu , mbuti lumukebiri mu kiteesu ki nyiri nyaluyaabisila nde ; mbuti kari bubwo ko , lo kwa buunu luri lwasiila kanyi .
46015003	Mukwongo , me nyalutubukiri hani tete , ma nyataamburi me se ti : Kiristo wafwa mu ntoono masumu ma beetu , bunu buri Matinu ;
46015004	wadziiku na wafulukusu mu kiluumbu kyabitatu , bunu buri Matinu .
46015005	Nde wamonokono kuri Kefa , tumi kuri kuumi na boolo ;
46015006	tumi , nde wamonokono ha kimosi kuri bampaangi , baluta lutaangu lwa nkama taanu , mu bo kwakiri bari mwooyo natee lumalu , ngo babamosi bayeki bafwa .
46015007	Tumi , nde wamonokono kuri Yakobo , tumi kuri bantumu bobanso .
46015008	Ha mambisa ma bobanso , nde wayisa kumonokono kuri me se , nyiri bunu mwaa-mwaana wabutuka kwahele kukukisa mangoondo .
46015009	Bukuri me nyiri wubvuriri buntele mu bantumu , me nyahele kukuka ti banteele ntumu , bukuri me nyakwaamisini dibuundu dya Nzaambi .
46015010	Mu bweese bwa Nzaambi , me nyiri bu nyiri , na bweese bwaandi ku nyiri me , bwasii ba bwabuunu ko , kasi me nyabvula kusala na bobanso , ngo kari me ko , kasi bweese bwa Nzaambi buri mu me .
46015011	Ngo ti diba me , ti diba bo , bu turi twayabisila beetu , bunubwo se beenu luri lwasiila kanyi .
46015012	Mbuti bakweyaabisa Kiristo , lo bukuri wafuluka mu bafwa , ngo dyaburi babamosi mu beenu bakweleele ti , mfulukulu ya bafwa yiri ko ?
46015013	Mbuti mfulukulu ya bafwa yo pe , lo Kiristo se wahele kufuluka .
46015014	Na mbuti Kiristo wahele kufuluka , lo nyabusulu yeetu yabuunu , na kanyi dyeenu se dyabuunu .
46015015	Beetu lo tweki bambaangi ba Nzaambi bampya , bukuri tutaanaa kimbaangi kyampya ti Nzaambi wafulukisa Kiristo , kuri nde wahele kumufulukisa ; mbuti ngwanwa ti bafwa bakoofuluka ko .
46015016	Mukwongo , mbuti bafwa bakoofuluka ko , lo Kiristo se wahele kufuluka .
46015017	Mbuti Kiristo wahele kufuluka , lo kanyi dyeenu dyabuunu , na beenu lwakiri kunsa masumu meenu ,
46015018	na babo bafwa kuri bari na kanyi mu Kiristo , lo badziimbila .
46015019	Ngo mbuti nsiitu dzi turi na dzo mu Kiristo , munu mu ntoono kidziingu kimaki , lo beetu tubvuriri manyoongi mu baatu bobanso .
46015020	Ngo mu lumalu Kiristo wafuluka mu bafwa , nde ngo watete mu bafwa .
46015021	Hango , bukuri lufwa lwafumuna mu muutu mosi , mu muutu mosi se mfulukulu ya bafwa yiri yafumuna .
46015022	Mukwongo , bunu bu fwiilaa baatu bobanso mu Adami , bunubwo se , bobanso sa baba bamwooyo mu Kiristo ;
46015023	ngo muutu-muutu ha kibeendu kyaandi , Kiristo ngo watete , tumi bari mu Kiristo , mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi .
46015024	Tumi manunu yiba , mu ntaangu yi kabvutula kimfumu kuri wunde wuri Nzaambi na Taata , kamanaa kutsyaamuna kikuutu kyokinso , lutumu lwolunso , na mpinu dzodzinso .
46015025	Bukuri nde yelemini kutuma , natee ku kasuusiri bataatu baandi bobanso , kunsa bitaambi byaandi .
46015026	Mutaatu wampotulu wa kutsyaamuna ngo lufwa .
46015027	Mukwongo , « Nzaambi wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi byaandi . » Ngo habaanaa baleele ti : « Byobinso biri kunsa lutumu lwaandi . » , lo diri na pwelelee ti , wungu-wungu wunde , wasuusiri byobinso kunsa lutumu lwa Kiristo .
46015028	Ngo byobinso bibaanaa byeki byasuusa kunsa lutumu lwaandi , haho nde-meene Mwaana se , kaba kunsa lutumu lwa wunde , wasuusiri byobinso kunsa lutumu lwa Mwaana , mpisi heki Nzaambi kaba byobinso , mu bitotolo byobinso na mu baatu bobanso .
46015029	Mbuti kari bubwo ko , lo babo bakootaambulaa mbotokulu ha kibeendu kya baatu bafwa , lo nki basa ? Mbuti ngwanwa ti bafwa bahele kufuluka , lo mu nkya ntoono bari mu kutaambulaana mbotokulu ha kibeendu kya bo ?
46015030	Na beetu-meene se , mu nkya ntoono tukookotaa mu nsisi mpisi ntaangu ?
46015031	Mpisi kiluumbu me nyiri muutu wafwa ; mu didyo , bampaangi , me nyisiingisa kimweese kyaami mu beenu , kikyo ki nyiri na kyo mu Kiristo Yesu Mfumu Yeetu .
46015032	Mbuti mu kimuutu , me nyanweeni na baatu bari makwa bunu bibulu ku Efeso , lo nkya ndaandu me nyiri nyabaka ? Ngo mbuti heki ti bafwa bahele kufuluka , lo « tudyeenee na tunweenee kweetu , bukuri bweepari sa twafwa . »
46015033	Yaa luwunukina kweenu ko : « Kimbaasi kyakibi kikoobiyisa bifu byabibwete . »
46015034	Nkati bvutukee ha lwaba , na yaa lubwa mu masumu ko , bukuri babamosi bahele na nyaabulu Nzaambi , me nyiludzusa nsoni .
46015035	Ngo muutu lo wufuula ti : " Bafwa dyaburi bafulukila ? Nkya nyutu bakwiisa na yo ?
46015036	Ye dzeeke dya muutu ! Bibyo bi wukuna ye lo biri menene ko , mbuti byahele kufwa ;
46015037	na bibyo bi wukuna ye , kari muti wu wuri mu kukiinga ko , ngo nkono saangu , bunu pe ya muti mukimi .
46015038	Tumi Nzaambi kaha nkono yiyo nyutu bu katiiri , na kuri mpisi nkono , nyutu ya nde-meene .
46015039	Manyutu momanso mahele kuba momamosi , ngo nyutu ya baatu yikimi , ya bibulu yikimi , ya banoni yikimi , na ya bansu se yikimi .
46015040	Manyutu ma ku yulu mari , manyutu ma ha butoto se mari , ngo kuseme kwa manyutu ma ku yulu , kwasoboko na kuseme kwa manyutu ma ha butoto .
46015041	Kuseme kwa ntaangu kukimi , kuseme kwa ngoondo kukimi , na kuseme kwa bambwetete se kukimi ; bukuri mpisi mbwetete se yasobokono na yakaka mu kuseme .
46015042	Bunubwo se buri mu mfulukulu ya bafwa . Nyutu bayidziikaa kunsa mbolulu , ngo yifulukaana kuri yahele kubweese kubolo ;
46015043	bayidziikaa kwahele lukiinsu , ngo yifulukaana kunsa nkeembu ; bayidziikaa mu buyonsi , ngo yifulukaa kunsa mpinu ;
46015044	bayidziikaa ya muswinyi , ngo yifulukaana ya kimpeeve . Mbuti nyutu ya muswinyi yiri , lo nyutu ya kimpeeve se yiri .
46015045	Hango-nkuumbu , diri dyatinu : « Muutu watete , Adami , waba muutu wamwooyo » ; ngo Adami dyansukulu , mpeeve yihaanaa bumwooyo .
46015046	Ngo kari wa kimpeeve watekesele ko , ngo kasi wa muswinyi ; tumi wa kimpeeve keki kwiisa .
46015047	Muutu watete wafumuna mu butoto , wa tubuumbu , waboolo wafumuna ku yulu .
46015048	Bunu buri muutu wa tubuumbu , bunubwo se buri baatu ba tubuumbu ; bunu buri muutu wa ku yulu , bunubwo se buri , baatu ba ku yulu .
46015049	Bunu bu turi mu kifwaani kya muutu wa tubuumbu , bunubwo se tuba mu kifwaani kya muutu wa ku yulu .
46015050	Ngo bampaangi , me bu nyiri mu kuleele ti : muswiini na makila ka bitsiitsa kukondolo saala dya kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko , na mbolulu ka yiri nkondolo kiteesu kyahele mbolulu ko .
46015051	Me nyiluyaabisa musamu wa mpaanu : beetu-banso tuwa kufwa ko , ngo kasi beetu-banso sa twakituka .
46015052	Mu kilookolo kimosi , mu mbwatukulu diisu , mu mvumvuri yampotulu . Bukuri mvumvuri bu yibwa , bafwa sa bafuluka na nyutu yahele mbolulu , na beetuneenu sa twakituka .
46015053	Mukwongo , nyutu ya mbolulu yimayi , yiyelemini kulwaata kiteesu kyahele mbolulu , na nyutu yifwaanaa yimayi , yiyelemini kulwaata kiteesu kyahele mfwiilu .
46015054	Mbasi-tsuku nyutu yibolaa yimayi , yilwaataana kiteesu kyahele mbolulu , na nyutu yifwanaana yimayi , yilwaataana kiteesu kyahele mfwiilu , haho ngo hayirima maampu matina ti : « Lufwa balumingutini kunsa ndulukulu ! »
46015055	« Lufwa , ndulukulu ye yiri hari ? Lufwa , kiba kya ye kiri hari ? »
46015056	Kiba kya lufwa ngo masumu , na mpinu dza masumu ngo mangisi .
46015057	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , nde kootuhaanaa ndulukulu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
46015058	Hango , bampaangi baami ba mutima , beeneenu na keketee , na ngwii , salee kisalu kya Mfumu , mu kiteesu kyalutila mu mantaangu momanso , bu luyaari kuri ti kisalu kyeenu mu Mfumu , ka kiri kyabuunu ko .
46016001	Mu mitariri ntolulu mboongo mu ntoono bangisi , beenu se yirikeenu bunu bu nyatumini me , kuri mabuundu mari ku Ngalatya .
46016002	Mpisi kya lumiingu , muutu-muutu mu beenu kawuunguka ku nzo yaandi , bibyo bi kabangusini kukebe , mpisi bahele kukiinga ku nyikwiisa me mu kutolo mboongo .
46016003	Mu ntaangu yi nyitubuka me , me sa nyaheeke baatu ba luri lwasoolo , na mikaanda mpisi banata bikabu bya beenu ku Yerusalemi .
46016004	Mbuti bwayelemene ti me se nyeende , lo sa beende kintwaari na me .
46016005	Me sa nyiisa kuri beenu ha nyilutila ku Makedonya ; bukuri me ku Makedonya nyilutila .
46016006	Mbuti buri bwadzuka , lo me sa nyadzakala kuri beenu , kampe sa nyalutisa se ntaangu ya kyoosi , mpisi lumbakisa mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaami , kwo ngo kwo ku nyibangisina kwe .
46016007	Bukuri me nyahele kutya kulumono hani ha nyiluta mu nzila , nyiri na kitsimi kya kudzakala mwaa-mantaangu kuri beenu , mbuti Mfumu heeri miswa .
46016008	Me sa nzakala ku Efeso , natee haba munkeembu wa Pantekote ,
46016009	bukuri mweelu weki wadzibula kuri me na waangalaa , mu kusala kwakubwe , ti bukuri bataatu balaka .
46016010	Mbuti Timoteho wiisiri kuri beenu , lo talee , yaa kaba na boomo ko kuri beenu ; bukuri nde wuri mu kwesala kisalu kya Mfumu bunu me .
46016011	Muutu yaa kamunyaafuna ko , ngo mubakisee mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaandi mu kiyeengi , mpisi nde kiisa kuri me , bukuri me nyiri mu kumukiinga , me na bampaangi .
46016012	Nkani mu mitariri mpaangi yeetu Apolo , me nyamusyaamisini kwalaka , mpisi kiisa na bampaangi kuri beenu , ngo nde wahele kutya kwiisa mu lumalu , kabakaa ntaangu tumi mbasi-tsuku kiisa .
46016013	Beenee naana , teleme na keketee mu kanyi , lwatee kibakala , beenee na makwa .
46016014	Hemese myominso mya beenu myeyirimina kunsa ntiilu .
46016015	Me nyilusyaamisa bampaangi : beenu luyaa kuri ti baatu ba mu nzo Estefana , ngo batete bayiingiri madyeele mu Akaya ; na bo bayekele manyutu mu kisalu kya bangisi .
46016016	Beenu se beeneenu batumuma kuri baatu ba bubwo , na kuri mpisi wunde wukwesala na kwemono mpasi kintwaari na bo .
46016017	Me nyimono kiminu mu nyisulu Estefana , na Fortunato , na Akayako , bukuri bo bayisiri mu kuyiingisa beenu luri bo pe .
46016018	Mukwongo , bo badzuunisini bitsimi bya me na bya beenu se . Yabukilee baatu ba bubwo .
46016019	Mabuundu ma ku Asya maluheekiri mamboto . Akila bo na Piriska , na dibuundu dikutukunaana mu nzo bo , baluheekiri mamboto malaka mu Mfumu .
46016020	Bampaangi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto . Helesenee mamboto beenu na beenu mu nyumutunu yangisi .
46016021	Taambuleenu mboto ya mu kooko kwa me-meene Pawulo .
46016022	Mbuti kuri wuri katii Mfumu ko , lo kabwilikila mpopi ! Marana ta !
46016023	Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu buba na beenu .
46016024	Me nyilutiiri beenu-banso mu Kiristo Yesu .
47001001	Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , na Timoteho mpaangi , kuri dibuundu dya Nzaambi diri ku Korinto , na kuri bangisi bobanso bari mu Akaya dyodinso .
47001002	Bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
47001003	Kaba wasakumunu , Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , Taayi diri na ngebe na diri na mboondulu yoyinso ,
47001004	nde kookutuboondaa mu mpasi dzeetu dzodzinso , mpisi heki mu mboondulu yi tutaambula beetu-meene kuri Nzaambi , tubangisina kuboondo babo bari kunsa mpasi dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu .
47001005	Mukwongo , bunu bufununa mpasi dza Kiristo mu beetu , bunubwo se bufununa mboondulu yeetu mu Kiristo .
47001006	Ngo mbuti beetu turi mu mpasi , lo mu kuri ti beenu lubaka mboondulu na mvuukulu ; mbuti turi na mboondulu , lo mu kuri ti beenu lubaka mboondulu , yiluha makwa ma kukuunda mpasi dzodzimosi , dzi turi mu kumono beetu se .
47001007	Na beetu turi na nsiitu ya makwa mu ntoono beenu , bu tuyaari kuri ti , bunu bu luri kintwaari na beetu mu mpasi , bunubwo se luri kintwaari mu mboondulu .
47001008	Mukwongo , bampaangi , beetu tutii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu , mu mpasi dzi twamono beetu ku Asya : beetu twabamini mu kiteesu kibvuriri makwa , na twaba na kitsimi ko ti , lo tubweesiri kuba bamwooyo .
47001009	Kasi beetu mu beetu-meene , twataamburi mukanu wa lufwa , mpisi heki tuhele kusiila nsiitu mu beetu-meene , ngo mu Nzaambi wufulukisaa bafwa .
47001010	Nde watukuuriri mu lufwa lwa bubwo , na mbasi-tsuku wutukuula , mu nde turi twasa nsiitu ti sa kabweese kutukuula .
47001011	Beenu se luri kintwaari , bu luri mu kusaambilaa mu beetu , mpisi heki bweese bu tutaambula beetu , mu ntoono lusaambulu lwa baatu balaka , buba dyaambu dya mvutukulu matoondo kuri beetu .
47001012	Mukwongo , kimweese kyeetu ngo kimbaangi kya nsimunu yeetu , beetu twadyaatiri ha nsi , na ha busu bwa beenu , mu nkulukulu na mu nsyemukunu ya Nzaambi , kari mu madyeele ma kimuutu ko , ngo mu bweese bwa Nzaambi .
47001013	Beetu turi na misamu mikimi mi tulutinina ko , ha yulu mi luri mu kutaanga na kubakula ; ngo me nsimini ti beenu sa lwayirika kubakula kwakubwe ,
47001014	bunu bu lumwaabakula kwa ndaambu , ti beetu turi kimweese kya beenu , bunu bu luba beenu se kuri beetu , mu kiluumbu kya Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
47001015	Mu nsiitu dzidzo , me nyabee nyatya kutekesele kwiisa kuri beenu , mpisi heki lutaambula bweese mu lwadzoolo .
47001016	Tumi nyisikaa kuri beenu , nyeende ku Makedonya , na nyisikaa ku Makedonya mbweese kwiisa kuri beenu , na beenu lumbakisa mu kunamitina budyeengi bwaami , ku Yudaya .
47001017	Buri me ntyaanaa bubwo kuyirika , lo budzeeke nyiri mu kusoongo ? Hoti ma ntii me mamo , mu kimuutu me nyimatiiriri , mpisi heki mu me muba : « heehe lo heehe » na « pele lo pele » ?
47001018	Nzaambi wakwiikama , ma turi mu kuleele kuri beenu , mahele kuba « heehe » na « pele » .
47001019	Bukuri , Mwaana Nzaambi , Yesu Kiristo wu turi twayaabisa kuri beenu , me na Silvano na Timoteho , nde kasii kuba : « heehe » na « pele » ko .
47001020	Mukwongo , nsiilulu dza Nzaambi dzodzinso mu nde dini « heehe » diri , Mu didyo se beetu tukooleelaa ti « Amene » kuri Nzaambi , mu kumuha nkeembu .
47001021	Wunde wukookumisaa beetu na beenu mu Kiristo , na watukila maasi , ngo Nzaambi ;
47001022	nde se watusa kinyemu kyaandi , na wasuusa bidiimbu bya Mpeeve munsa mitima myeetu .
47001023	Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , me nyilaba maalu mu kidziingu kya me-meene ti : me nyasii bweese kwiisa ku Korinto ko , mu kulubatisa misamu .
47001024	Kari kuri ti beetu , turi na lutumu mu kanyi dya beenu ko , ngo beetu tukwesala kintwaari na beenu , mu kuri ti beenu lumono kiminu , bukuri beenu lwateleme na keketee mu kanyi .
47002001	Mukwongo , me nyamwiini dyo ti bwabubwete , mu kuhele kubweese kwiisa kuri beenu , mpisi luhele kukoto mu ngebe .
47002002	Bukuri , mbuti me nyilukotisiri mu ngebe , lo na wubweese kuha me kiminu , mbuti kari wunde wumwaakotoso mu ngebe ko ?
47002003	Me nyatinini mimyo , mu kubata kuri ti babo baketi kuha me kiminu , bankotoso mu ngebe mu ntaangu yi nyikwiisa . Me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti , kiminu kya me , kya beenu-banso se .
47002004	Mukwongo , mu mpasi dzalaka na mutima kinkuukulu , na mu mansangasa malaka me nyalutinini ; kari mu kulukotoso mu ngebe ko , ngo mu kuri ti luyaaba ntiilu ya bunsaalisi yi nyiri na yo mu beenu .
47002005	Mbuti kuri muutu wasakisiri ngebe , lo kari me kakotisiri mu ngebe ko , ngo babamosi mu beenu , bunu pe beenu-banso mbuti nyahele kusa mansaalisi .
47002006	Muutu wa bubwo wayelemene kutaambula biŋaŋunu kuri baatu balaka .
47002007	Beenu ngo bari , siilee wa bubwo mpemisi , na muboondeenu mpisi kahele kudyaama kunsa ngebe dzibvuriri bunene .
47002008	Hango-nkuumbu , me nyilusyaamisa mu kusoongo kimbaangi kya ntiilu yeenu mu nde .
47002009	Bukuri mu bubwo me nyalutinini , mpisi me nyilutsiitsa , mu kuyaaba , kari beenu luri na bintambukulu mu myominso .
47002010	Beenu lusiilaa muutu mpemisi , lo me se nyimusiriri mpemisi ; mukwongo , mpemisi ngo yiri me nyasa , na mbuti nyasiila muutu mpemisi mu musamu , lo mu ntoono beenu , ha busu bwa Kiristo ,
47002011	mpisi heki tuhele kubwa mu mawunu ma Satana , bukuri bitsimi bya nde tubiyaari .
47002012	Me nyatubuka ku Torowasi , mu kweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , na Mfumu wanzibukila mweelu ,
47002013	ngo mpeeve me yaba yahele na kidzuunu , bukuri nyasii mono Tito mpaangi yaami ko , hango , me nsiisaana bari ku Torowasi , ha nyeki kweendaana ku Makedonya .
47002014	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi ! Nde wuri mu mpisi ntaangu wutululukisaa mu Kiristo , na wukwepukulaa mu mpisi kibeendu , mfuku ya nyaabulu yaandi mu beetu .
47002015	Bukuri beetuneenu ngo mfuku yayibwete ya Kiristo , kuri Nzaambi , ha kakati dya babvuuka na badziimbila ;
47002016	mu bamosi mfuku ya lufwa yihaanaa lufwa , mu bakaka mfuku ya bumwooyo yihaanaa bumwooyo . Ngo na wakuka mu mimyo ?
47002017	Mukwongo , beetu turi bunu bakaka bakweyarika maampu ma Nzaambi ko ; ngo kasi mu ngwanwa , mu nkuumbu ya Nzaambi na ha busu bwaandi , beetu turi mu kwedzoonsolo mu Kiristo .
47003001	Buri tubweese kubaandika kusaka lutumu mu beetu-meene ? Hoti bunu babamosi , turi na nzala mukaanda wa ntumunu wa kulusoongo , bunu pe kululoombo ?
47003002	Mukaanda beetu ngo beenu , watinu mu mitima myeetu , wayabakana na wataangu kuri baatu bobanso .
47003003	Nkati diri dyayabakana ti , beenu ngo mukaanda Kiristo wu turi twatubula beetu , wahele kuba watinu mu ntiinta yapiinda , ngo mu Mpeeve Nzaambi yamwooyo ; wahele kuba watinu mu bibari bya malweende , ngo mu mabaya ma mitima mya muswinyi .
47003004	Yiyo ngo nsiitu yi turi na yo , mu Yesu Kiristo kuri Nzaambi .
47003005	Ka kuri ti lo tuyirikiri kitotolo mu makwa ma beetu-meene ko , ngo makwa meetu mafumunaa kuri Nzaambi ,
47003006	nde watuha makwa mu kuba bisari bya lulelusunu lwamoono , kari mu kisoni ko , ngo Mpeeve , bukuri kisoni kidzusaa , kasi Mpeeve yihaanaa bumwooyo .
47003007	Ngo mbuti kisalu kya lufwa , kyatinu mu bisoni ha yulu malweende kyabakiri nkeembu , yiri baala ba Isaheli baba bahele kubangisina kusungumina kisoosi ku busu bwa Moose bwaba semaana , mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele ,
47003008	lo kisalu kya Mpeeve sa kyabvula nkeembu .
47003009	Mukwongo , mbuti kisalu kya kukesele baatu mukanu kyabakiri nkeembu , lo kisalu kya kululukisa baatu sa kyabvula nkeembu .
47003010	Mukwongo , bibyo bi bakeembisiri , byasii baka nkeembu yayelemene na nkeembu yibvuriri bunene yimayi ko .
47003011	Bukuri , mbuti bibyo byahele kudziingila byabakiri nkeembu , lo bibyo bidziingulaana sa byabvula nkeembu .
47003012	Bu turi na nsiitu dza bubwo , ngo turi mu kwesalila mu nsiitu dzodzinso .
47003013	Beetu twahele kusa bunu Moose , waba fukaana nsaanda ku busu bwaandi , mpisi heki baala ba Isaheli bahele kumono nsukulu ya bibyo byahele kudziingula .
47003014	Ngo kasi bo bari kunsa lubu . Natee mu kiluumbu ki , bo bu bataangaa lulelusunu lwalukulu , lo nsaanda yiyo yahele kuyisika , bukuri yo kuyisikila mu Kiristo .
47003015	Ngo kasi natee mu kiluumbu ki , bo bu bataangaa mikaanda mya Moose , lo nsaanda yafuka mitima mya bo .
47003016	Ngo , « babaanaa basyeetukiri kuri Mfumu , lo nsaanda yiyisikiri . »
47003017	Mfumu ngo Mpeeve , haho hari Mpeeve ya Mfumu , haho se hari bunsaalisi .
47003018	Beetu-banso bari busu bwahele kufuka nsaanda , nkeembu ya Mfumu yiri mu kuseme mu beetu , bunu ti mu lumweenye , mu kifwaani kikyo turi twakituka mu nkeembu na nkeembu , mu Mfumu wuri Mpeeve .
47004001	Hango-nkuumbu , bu turi na kisalu kimaki , beetu twahele kuholo-bito , bukuri mu ngebe dza Nzaambi turi twakitaambula .
47004002	Ngo kasi beetu twabisa mansweeki mansoni , tukwedyaatila kwahele mawunu , na twahele kwekitula maampu ma Nzaambi , ngo mu nsoongulu ngwanwa , beetu turi mu kwesaka kuri ti baatu batufyongokono , ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
47004003	Ngo mbuti Musamu Wamubwete wa beetu wasweeku , lo mu bakweyende ku nzimbukulu kari kasweeku ,
47004004	mu baatu bahele na kanyi , bari nzaambi ya nsi yi wayeki wabiiyisa madyeele ma bo , mpisi bahele kutalila buungi bwa Musamu Wamubwete , wa nkeembu ya Kiristo , nde wuri kifwaani kya Nzaambi .
47004005	Mukwongo , beetu twahele kweyaabisa mi tariri beetu-meene , ngo Yesu Kiristo Mfumu turi mu kweyaabisa ; beetu-meene ngo turi bisari bya beenu mu ntoono Yesu .
47004006	Bukuri Nzaambi waleeriri ti : « Mu mampimbisi , buungi sa bwaseme ! » Nde wasemini mu mitima myeetu , mu kusoongo nteendele ya nyaabulu nkeembu Nzaambi , ku busu bwa Yesu Kiristo .
47004007	Beetu tukwenata busina bumabu , mu bisa bya tubuumbu , mpisi heki mpinu dza kiteesu kyalutila , dziba dza Nzaambi nkani ka dza beetu ko .
47004008	Beetu batuswetekese mu mpele ngo mpele , ngo twahele kunyifuka , turi mu kwedunga , ngo twahele kukoono ,
47004009	bakwetulaanda , ngo bahele kutubakila , batubwiisa ha nsi , ngo bahele kututsuumbula .
47004010	Mantaangu momanso , tukwenata mwomunso , lufwa lwa Yesu mu nyutu yeetu , mpisi heki bumwooyo bwa Yesu se , buba bwamonokono mu nyutu yeetu .
47004011	Mukwongo , mantaangu momanso beetuneenu bamwooyo , turi bayekulu mu lufwa mu ntoono Yesu , mpisi heki bumwooyo bwa Yesu , buba bwamonokono mu nyutu yeetu ya lufwa .
47004012	Mu didyo lufwa luri mu kusala mu beetu , ngo bumwooyo buri mu kusala mu beenu .
47004013	Bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Me nyasii kanyi , hango-nkuumbu nyadzoonsiri . » Beetu se , mu mpeeve yo yimosi ya kanyi , twasa kanyi , hango-nkuumbu turi mu kudzoonso ,
47004014	bu tuyaari kuri ti , wunde wafulukisi Mfumu Yesu , sa kafulukisa beetu se kintwaari na Yesu , na sa katusuusa ha kimosi na beenu bebele na nde .
47004015	Mukwongo , myominso mimyo miri mu ntoono beenu , mpisi heki bweese buhamisaana mu baatu balaka , mvutukulu matoondo se yiba yabuukula mu nkeembu ya Nzaambi .
47004016	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu twahele kuholo-bito . Ngo ti hayuku nyutu yeetu ya ku mbasi yiri mu kwekuuka , lo nyutu ya kunsa-kati yiri mu kwekitukaa yamoono mu kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu .
47004017	Mukwongo , mpasi dzeetu dzaleenge mu ntaangu yi , dziri mu kubuta kilemu kya nkeembu ha yulu nkeembu , yahele manunu kuri beetu .
47004018	Beetu twahele kutala bitotolo bibyo byamonoko , ngo bibyo byahele kumonoko ; bukuri bibyo byamonoko byahele kudziingula , ngo kasi bibyo byahele kumonoko , bidziingulaa kwakinkulu .
47005001	Mukwongo , beetu tuyaari ti , mbuti nzo yeetu ya musaampu ya ha butoto ha yitsyaamukini , lo turi na nzo ya mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi mu mayulu , yahele kuba yatuungu mu myooko mya baatu .
47005002	Mu didyo beetu tukwekuuma , na turi na musoongo walaka mu kulwaata nzo yeetu ya ku yulu ,
47005003	kuri heki , ti hayuku twahele kulwaata kinkuta , bahele kutumono kimpene .
47005004	Mukwongo , bu turi munsa musaampu wumawu , tukwekuuma kunsa kilemu , bukuri twahele kutya kusyonono kinkuta , ngo tutiiri kulwaata kikimi ha yulu , mpisi heki bikoofwa biba byadyaama kunsa bumwooyo .
47005005	Wunde watuyirika mu kutaambula mamo ngo Nzaambi , nde watuha bidiimbu bya Mpeeve .
47005006	Ngo beetu twaluula mu nsiitu mu mantaangu momanso , na tuyaari ti , bu turi mu nyutu yimayi , turi ku bunzeense la na Mfumu ;
47005007	bukuri beetu mu kanyi turi mu kwedyaatila , nkani ka mu mwiinunu ko .
47005008	Beetu twaluula mu nsiitu , na tumono kuri ti , bubvuriri bubwete mu kupala mu nyutu yimayi , na kweende mu kudzakala kuri Mfumu .
47005009	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu di tutiiri mu kubweeye kuri nde , ti tuba mu nyutu yi , bunu pe tupala mu yo .
47005010	Bukuri beetu-banso tuyelemini kuteleme ha busu bwa mutsuundu wa Kiristo , mpisi heki muutu-muutu kataambula , museendu wa ma kari kayirika , mu nyutu yaandi , mamabwe bunu pe mamabi .
47005011	Ngo bu tuyaari buri kibvumi kya mfumu , beetu tusakaana kuri ti baatu babakula dyo . Nzaambi wutuyaari nkati kwafwaana ; na me nsimini ti mu mitima myeenu beenu se luyaari kwafwaana .
47005012	Beetu twahele na nzala kubweese kuba , na ntumunu mu beetu-meene kuri beenu , ngo tutiiri kuluha mpwaani , ya kuba na kimweese mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki luba na mvutu ya kuha kuri babo bakwesa kimweese kya ku mbasi , nkani ka kya mitima ko .
47005013	Mukwongo , mbuti beetu twabeeri madzeeke , lo mu ntoono Nzaambi ; ngo mbuti turi na madyeele , lo mu ntoono beenu .
47005014	Bukuri ntiilu ya Kiristo yatusweeteke , na tuyaari dyo mu ngwanwa ti , muutu mosi kitsu wafwiila mu bobanso , ngo bobanso se bafwa .
47005015	Nde wafwiila mu bobanso , mpisi heki bamwooyo bahele kubweese kuba bamwooyo mu bo-meene , ngo mu wunde wafwiiri na wafulukiri mu ntoono bo .
47005016	Hango-nkuumbu , kubandika lumalu beetu twahele kuyaaba muutu mu muswinyi ; na mbuti twayaaba Kiristo mu muswinyi , lo mu lumalu twahele bweese kumuyaabila bubwo .
47005017	Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti muutu wuri mu Kiristo , lo nde kiyiriki kyamoono ; byabikulu byayeki byaluta , byamoono byayiingina .
47005018	Byobinso byafumuna kuri Nzaambi , nde wabweese kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya beetu , na nde-meene mu Kiristo , na watuha kisalu kya kubweese kwesuusa nyukusunu .
47005019	Mukwongo , Nzaambi waba mu Kiristo , mu kubweese kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya nsi na nde-meene , kwahele kutaangula baatu lumvuki lwa bo , na kusuusa mu beetu maampu ma kubweese kusa nyukusunu .
47005020	Beetuneenu ngo turi bamonikisi ba Kiristo , buni ti Nzaambi wuri mu kulusyaamisa mu beetu ; beetu tuluyiingikila mu nkuumbu ya Kiristo , taambulee kubweese kuyukusuna na Nzaambi .
47005021	Wunde waba wahele na masumu , nde wamusa ngaa-masumu mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki mu nde , tubeenee nsungumunu ya Nzaambi .
47006001	Ngo bukuri tukwesala kintwaari na nde , beetu tulusyaamisa mu kuhele kuhololo kwa buunu , bweese bwa Nzaambi buluri lwataambula .
47006002	Bukuri nde wuleele ti : « Mu ntaangu yayelemene , me nyikuhaanaa mvutu , mu kiluumbu kya mvuukulu , me nyikubakisaana . » Mono mu lumalu , yi ngo ntaangu nkati yayelemene ; mono mu lumalu , ki ngo kiluumbu kya mvuukulu .
47006003	Beetu twahele kubumisa muutu makya mu ntoono ti mosi , mpisi heki kisalu kihele kuba kyasaanu .
47006004	Ngo kasi mu myominso , beetu tutiiri kumonokono beetu-meene bunu bisari bya Nzaambi , kunsa kifiki kyalaka , mu mpasi , mu manyoongi , mu kinkuukulu ,
47006005	mu biwa , mu maboroko , mu nwanusunu , mu bisalu byamakwa , mu kwekyeelele bwiisi , mu maloomi ,
47006006	mu nsyemukunu , mu nyaabulu , mu nkindusulu-mutima , mu mbweeyulu-mutima , mu Mpeeve Yangisi , mu ntiilu yahele bumpitu-bumpyoongo ,
47006007	mu maampu ma ngwanwa , mu mpinu dza Nzaambi ; mu kuba na binwaanunu bya nsungumunu , bya kooko kwalubakala na bya kooko kwalumoso ,
47006008	mu nkeembu na mu nsaanunu , mu mvuumfu yayibi na yayibwe , bunu bangaa-mpya koomosoko turi bangaa-ngwanwa ,
47006009	bunu ba bahele kuyaaba koomosoko twayaabakana kwalaka ; bunu beki mu kufwa koomosoko turi mwooyo , bunu ba bari mu kulata ngo bahele kubadzusa ;
47006010	bunu bari mu ngebe , koomosoko bari mu kiminu ; bunu bari kunsa buwelu bwa makwa , koomosoko bakwekabula busina ; bunu bahele na kitotolo , koomosoko bari na byobinso .
47006011	Beetu twadzoonsiri kuri beenu , bari Korinto , mitima myeetu myabeeri myadzibulu na pwelelee .
47006012	Beetu twahele kaanga mitima mu beenu , ngo beenu-meene lwakaanga mitima myeenu .
47006013	Me nyiludzoonsolo bunu baala baami , beenu se mu kuha mvutu , dzibulee mitima .
47006014	Yaa luba mu kihaangu kimosi na bangooyi ko ; mukwongo , nki byantwaari ha kakati dya nsungumunu na bubayi , bunu pe nki byantwaari ha kakati dya buungi na mampimbisi ?
47006015	Nkya nyukusunu yiri ha kakati dya Kiristo na Belyari , bunu pe nki byantwaari ha kakati dya ngaa-kanyi na mungooyi ?
47006016	Nkya nyukusunu yiri ha kakati dya Nzo ya Nzaambi na biteki ? Bukuri beetuneenu turi Nzo ya Nzaambi yamwooyo , bunu bwaleele Nzaambi ti : « Me sa nzakala ha kakati dya bo , na me sa nyeyende na bo , Me sa mba Nzaambi bo , na bo sa baba baatu baami . »
47006017	Hango nkuumbu , Mfumu ti : « Paleenu ha kakati dya bo , na haambikiseenu na bo . Yaa lubelemene kitotolo ti kimosi kya sumuka ko , na me sa nyalutaambula .
47006018	Me sa mba Taayi kuri beenu , na beenu sa lwaba baala ba babakala , na ba bakyeetu kuri me , Mfumu Ngaa-mpinu wuleele . »
47007001	Ngo banduku ba mutima , bukuri turi na nsiilulu dza bubwo , tutsyeemekeenu mu mamviindu momanso ma muswinyi na ma kiluunsi , na tukukiseenu bungisi kunsa kibvumi kya Nzaambi .
47007002	Taambulee beetu mu mitima myeenu ; beetu twasii yirikila muutu mamabi ko , twasii maana kuholo bya muutu ko , na twasii diila muutu manene ko .
47007003	Me nyahele kuleele bubwo mu kulukesele mukanu ; bukuri me nyatekisiri kuleele ti , beenu luri mu mitima myeetu , ti mu lufwa ti mu bumwooyo .
47007004	Me nyiri na nsiitu yalaka mu beenu , nyiri na kimweese kyalaka mu beenu , me nyaluula mu mboondulu , me kiminu kyabuukula kunsa mpasi dzeetu dzodzinso .
47007005	Mukwongo , beetu tutubukaana ku Makedonya , twasii baka ntaangu ya kuwuumisa manyutu meetu ko , ngo kasi , kwokunso mpasi na mpasi ; nwaanunu ku mbasi , boomo kunsa mitima .
47007006	Ngo Nzaambi wuboondaana bakuluka , watuboondiri mu nyisulu Tito ,
47007007	kari munu mu nyisulu nde ko , ngo se na mu mboondulu yi kabakiri nde kuri beenu ; nde watuyaabisiri musoongo wu luri na nde , bidilu byeenu , na kuheme ku luri na kwo mu me , na mu didyo me nyabweesiri kumono kiminu kibvuriri bunene .
47007008	Ngo mbuti me nyalumonisini ngebe mu mukaanda waami , lo me nyahele kunyoongo mu didyo ; lu ti hayuku nyanyoongini ha nyamwii kuri ti , mukaanda wunde waluhee ngebe mu mwaa-ntaangu .
