47007009	Mu lumalu , me nyimono kiminu ; kari bukuri beenu lwamwii ngebe ko , ngo bukuri lwamwii ngebe mu kuyiinga madyeele ; mukwongo , beenu lwamwii ngebe bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , mpisi heki mu kibari kya beetu , beenu luhele kutaambula mamabi .
47007010	Bukuri ngebe dza ntiilu ya Nzaambi , dzibutaa nyiingulu madyeele , mu kubaka mvuukulu kwahele kunyoongo ; ngo kasi ngebe dza nsi dzibutaa lufwa .
47007011	Sa monee mu lumalu , nkya kifiki ngebe dza ntiilu ya Nzaambi dzibutiri mu beenu : nkya mampemisi , nkya minyoongi , nkya boomo , nkya musoongo , nkya kuheme , nkya maseembu ! Mu myominso beenu lwasoongiri ti , lwahele na kibila mu musamu wunde .
47007012	Ngo mbuti me nyalutinini , lo kari mu ntoono muyiriki-mamabi , bunu pe mu ntoono wunde wu bari bayirikila mamabi ko , ngo mu kusoongo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , kuheme ku luri na kyo mu beetu .
47007013	Mu didyo , beetu twabakiri mboondulu . Ha yulu mboondulu yiyo , beetu twabweesiri kumono kiminu kyalaka , mu kiminu kyabeeri na Tito , bukuri beenu-banso lwadzuunisini bitsimi byaandi .
47007014	Ngo mbuti ha busu bwa nde , me nyasoongiri kimweese mu ntoono beenu , lo me nyasii mono nsoni mu mimyo ko , ngo kasi bunu buri ngwanwa yoyinso yi turi twaleele kuri beenu , bunubwo se kimweese ki twasoongiri kuri Tito mu ntoono beenu , kiri kyangwanwa .
47007015	Nde wuri na musoongo walaka mu beenu , mbiki ti ha kabaambuka nde mwooyo mu kutumuma kwa beenu-banso , na bu lwasiiri mu kumutaambula mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu .
47007016	Me nyimono kiminu , bu nyiri na nsiitu mu beenu mu myominso .
47008001	Beetu tuyaabisa kuri beenu , bampaangi , bweese bwa Nzaambi bwataamburi mabuundu mari ku Makedonya .
47008002	Kunsa mpasi dzi bari babwanikina na dzo , kiminu kya bo kya mansaalisi , na buwelu bwa bo bwa musundu , byabwookoso busina mu mpeelu bikabu bya bo ,
47008003	bunu bwaba lubaku lwa bo , me nyi bateele kimbaangi ti , bo baheeri mu kiteesu kyalutila lubaku lwa bo , mu bunsaalisi .
47008004	Bo batuyingukiri kwalaka , kuri ti bo se babaka bweese bwa kuha lubakusu , mu kisalu kitariri bangisi .
47008005	Bo bayirika ma lutila kiteesu ti na ma twaba twatsima beetu , bo batekisiri kuha mitima kuri Mfumu , tumi kuri beetu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi .
47008006	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu twasyaamisini Tito , mpisi kamana kisalu kya lubakusu kikyo , ki kamwaabaandika kuri beenu .
47008007	Ngo bukuri beenu luri na byobinso byabuukula : kanyi , lungweensu , nyaabulu , kuheme mu myominso , na ntiilu yi luri na yo mu beetu ; lo beenee se babuukula mu bweese bubwo .
47008008	Me nyahele kuluha lutumu , kasi me nyiludzoonsolo mu kuheme kya bambaasi , mu kuri ti beenu se lusoongo bungwanwa bwa ntiilu yeenu .
47008009	Mukwongo , beenu luyaari bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo : nde waba kisina , kasi mu ntoono beenu , walwaata buwelu , mpisi heki mu buwelu bwaandi , beenu luba bisina .
47008010	Me nyiluha kitsimi kya mu mimyo : mukwongo , myayelemene mu beenu mimami , beenu lwaba batete kari munu mu kutolo lubakusu ko , ngo na mu kubaka kitsimi kya bubwo , kuholosono mu mubvu wayooko .
47008011	Ngo mu lumalu , kuundulee kisalu kikyo , mpisi heki mamo ma lutiiri kukukisa , bunu buri lubaku lweenu , mayelemene na kifiki kya kutya kweenu .
47008012	Bukuri mbuti bitsimi biri byabibwete , lo bataamburi kikabu , bunu buri bi tubakiri nkani ka mu bi tuheriri kubaka ko .
47008013	Mukwongo , ka kuri ti beenu ngo bari lukoto mu mpasi , heki bakaka babaka lubakusu ko , ngo kasi mu kusa nsiisa ;
47008014	mu ntaangu ya lumalu , bibyo bi luri na byo bya mansaalisi , sa byabakisa babo bahele na kitotolo , mpisi heki ha luba beenu se kuri kitotolo pe , bi baba na bo bya mansaalisi bibakisa beenu , mpisi heki kuba nsiisa ,
47008015	bunu buri matinu : « Wunde waba na byalaka , kasii ba na bya mansaalisi ko ; na wunde waba na byantele , kasii ba na bi kaheriri ko . »
47008016	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi , wasa mu mutima Tito , kuheme kwokumosi na ku turi na beetu mu beenu .
47008017	Nde wataamburi mbila yeetu mu kuheme kwokunso , na nde-meene wabakiri kitsimi kya kwiisa kuri beenu .
47008018	Beetu twaheekiri mpaangi mosi , yikweyende kintwaari na nde , mpaangi yiyo mabuundu momanso mari mu kumusiikaana , mu dyaambu ditariri Musamu Wamubwete .
47008019	Kari minimyo ko , ngo mabuundu mamo mamusooriri se mu kweyende na beetu , mu kisalu kya lubakusu ki turi mu kwesala , mu kusaka nkeembu ya Mfumu nde-meene , na mu kusoongo kifiki kyeetu .
47008020	Beetu tukwebata maseembu , mu mitariri bwa kusalila mboongo dzalaka dzi bari batuha ;
47008021	bukuri beetu tutiiri kuyirika mamabwe , kari hani ha busu bwa Mfumu ko , ngo se na ha busu bwa baatu .
47008022	Beetu twaheekiri mpaangi yeetu mu kweyende na bo , mu mantaangu malaka , beetu twamutsitsiri , mu kumono buri kuheme kyaandi , ngo mu lumalu kuheme kwaandi kweki kwabvulila mu ntoono nsiitu dzalaka dzikari na dzo mu beenu .
47008023	Ti hayuku mu ntoono Tito wu turi kintwaari , mbaasi yaami ya kisalu ku luri beenu ; ti hayuku bampaangi beetu , bantumu ba mabuundu , bobanso bakwesala mu nkeembu ya Kiristo .
47008024	Yirikee kusoongo , ha busu bwa mabuundu , kidiimbu kya ntiilu yeenu , na kimweese kyeetu mu beenu kuri bo .
47009001	Mu mitariri kisalu kya mbakusulu bangisi , me nyahele kumono mufunu mu kulutinina .
47009002	Mukwongo , me nyaari kifiki kya beenu , na mu kyo me nyiri na kimweese mu beenu kuri bari Makedonya . Bari ku Akaya beki bayirima kuholosono mubvu wayooko , na kuheme kwa beenu kwaheeri nsyamusunu kuri balaka mu bo .
47009003	Ngo me nyaluheekiri bampaangi babo , mpisi heki kimweese kya beetu mu beenu , kihele kuba kya buunu mu ntoono yiyo , na kuri ti beenu luba bayirima , bunu bu nyabee leele ;
47009004	mu kubata kuri ti , mu nsiitu dza bubwo beetu tufwa nsoni , mu kuhele kuleele ti beenu lufwa nsoni , mbuti heki bari Makedonya biisaana kintwaari na me , bamwii kuri ti beenu lwahele kuyirima .
47009005	Ngo me nyamwii mufunu , mu kuloombo kuri bampaangi babo , mpisi batekesele kwiisa kuri beenu na batekesele kuyirikisa bikabu bya lubakusu bi luri lwasa nsiilulu , mpisi heki lubakusu lulwo luba bunu kikabu kya bunsaalisi nkani ka kya lukakutu ko .
47009006	Yaabee ti : Wunde wukuna mwaa-kwantele sa katolo se mwaa-kwantele , na wunde wukuna kwalaka sa katolo se kwalaka .
47009007	Mpisi muutu kaha bunu bu kari katsima kunsa mutima waandi , kwahele nyoongunu bunu pe mu kukwiikisa ; bukuri Nzaambi tiiri wunde wuhaanaa mu kiminu .
47009008	Nzaambi wakuka mu kululuulusa mu mabweese ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , mpisi heki mu mantaangu momanso beenu luba na byakuka , na luba se na bya mansaalisi mu kweyirika momanso mamabwe ,
47009009	bunu bu diri dyatinu : « Nde kookabulaa , nde koohaanaa kuri bawelu , nsungumunu yaandi yinamitina kwakinkulu . »
47009010	Wunde wuhaanaa nsaangi kuri mukuni , na byandya bya kudya , sa kaluha nsaangi , sa kafunisa dzo , na sa kamenise bimbutu bya nsungumunu yeenu .
47009011	Beenu sa lwaba bisina mu myominso , mpisi lweha bikabu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , bisa kuri ti mu kisalu kya beetu , baatu babvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi ;
47009012	bukuri kisalu kikyo kya ntolulu bikabu , kari lunu lubakusu kiha kuri bangisi ko , ngo se kisa kuri ti , baatu babvutula matoondo malaka kuri Nzaambi .
47009013	Bamonaa bubwe bwa kisalu kikyo , bo sa bakeembese Nzaambi , mu ntoono kutumuma ku luri mu kusoongo beenu , mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , na mu kukabula lubakusu lweenu kintwaari na bo , na baatu bobanso .
47009014	Mu nsaambulu dza bo mu beenu , bo sa basoongo musoongo walaka wu bari na nde , mu ntoono bweese bwa mansaalisi bwaluha Nzaambi .
47009015	Matoondo kuri Nzaambi mu ntoono kikabu kyaandi kyankimukunu !
47010001	Me Pawulo , nyilusyaamisa me-meene mu bundeembu , na mu mutima-bubwete wa Kiristo . Bakweleele ti , me nyiri na nsoni habaanaa nyiri ha kakati dya beenu , ngo kasi nyakasuka habaanaa nyiri la na beenu ;
47010002	me nyisaambila mu kuri ti , mpele kuba nyakasuka ha nyikwiisa kuri beenu , mu kitsimi kya kusoongo ti nyakasuka , ha busu bwa bakweleele ti , beetu tukwedyaatila mu kimuutu .
47010003	Mukwongo , mu kimuutu turi mu kwedyaatila , ngo kari mu kimuutu turi mu kwenwaanina ko .
47010004	Bukuri binwaanunu bituri mu kwenwaanina kikiindu , biri bya kimuutu ko ; ngo kasi bya mpinu dza Nzaambi , byakuka mu kutsyaamuna bisweemunu bya makwa . Beetu tukwetsyaamuna nzoonsulu dzadzibi ,
47010005	na mpinu dzodzinso dza masiiku dzikwetungukula nyaabulu ya Nzaambi , mpisi tukitula bitsimi bya baatu kuri heki batumuma kuri Kiristo ,
47010006	na tuba twayirima mu kuseembe babo bahele kutumuma , mu ntaangu yiri beenu-banso lumwaamana kutumuma .
47010007	Yirikee kutala bitotolo bunu bu biri . Mbuti muutu wumono dyo ti nde wuri wa Kiristo , lo kayirika kuyaaba ti nde bukari wa Kiristo beetu se turi ba Kiristo .
47010008	Mukwongo , ti bukuri me nyasii mwaa-kimweese mu bumfumu bwa tuha Mfumu , mu kulutuunga nkani ka mu kulutsyaamuna ko , lo me nyiri na nsoni mu mimyo ko .
47010009	Me ntii kumonokono , buni ti me nyilusa boomo mu mikaanda myaami ko ;
47010010	bukuri bakweleele ti , mikaanda mimyo miri na musundu na mya makwa , koomosoko nde-meene mu kumumono wahele na makwa , na nzoonsulu dzaandi dzahele kitotolo .
47010011	Ngo mpisi wunde wuleele bubwo lo kayaaba ti : bu nyiri me mu maampu ma nyitina mikaanda kuri nyiri la , bunu bubwo se nyiri mu biyiriki ha busu bwa beenu .
47010012	Beetu ka tutsiitsa kuba nsiisa , bunu pe kusaka nsobokoso , dzi turi na dzo na baatu bamosi , bakweha ntumunu mu bo-meene ko . Baatu babo bahele kubakula , bukuri bo bakweteese bambaasi mu kiteesulu kya bo-meene , na bakwesaka nsobokoso ha kakati dya bo-meene .
47010013	Beetu ngo bari twahele kusa kimweese kwa mansaalisi , ngo beetu kusiila bunu buri kiteesu kya kisalu kya tuha Nzaambi , mu kutubuka natee kuri beenu .
47010014	Mukwongo , beetu twahele kuluta mandilu , ngo beetu twatubuka na Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo natee kuri beenu .
47010015	Beetu twahele kusa kimweese kya mansaalisi mu bisalu bya ŋani , ngo beetu turi na nsiitu ti kanyi dya beenu dihamisaana , lo kisalu kya beetu se sa kyahamisa kubuuka bunu buri kiteesu ki turi twatsima ,
47010016	mu kweyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete mu mankoonsi mabvuriri la na beenu , kwahele kusa kimweese mu biteesu bya ŋani mu bisalu byeki byayirima .
47010017	Ngo kasi , « wunde wutiiri kusa masiiku , lo kasa masiiku mu Mfumu . »
47010018	Mukwongo , kari wunde wusalaa mu ntumunu ya nde-meene bateela kimbaangi ko , ngo wunde wasala mu ntumunu ya Mfumu .
47011001	Mbuti beenu lo lukuundiri mwaa-bulawuku bwa me , lo katee kukuunda me .
47011002	Mukwongo , me nyilusiila bukwa mu kiteesu kya bukwa bwa Nzaambi , bukuri me nyaluyakisa mu lulelusunu lwa makweele kuri bakala dimosi , bunu mwaa-ntuumba ya nswaasa yatsyeemeke ya kusoongo kuri Kiristo .
47011003	Ngo bunu bwaba wuna nyoko Eva mu lupyelu lwaandi , me nyibata ti bitsimi bibiya na biba la na nkulukulu na nsyemukunu ha busu bwa Kiristo .
47011004	Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wiisiri kuri beenu , wuluyaabisiri Yesu dikimi diri beetu twasii yaabisa ko , bunu pe lutaamburi mpeeve yasoboko na yiyo yi lwataamburi , bunu pe Musamu Wamubwe wasoboko na wunde wu lwataamburi , lo beenu mya bubwo ngo miri lukuundaa .
47011005	Mukwongo , me nsimini ti nyahele kubvula buntele , na bantumu ba beenu babanene babo , mu ntoono ti mosi .
47011006	Mbuti mu mya kudzoonso me nyahele na lungweensu , ngo kari mu mya nyaabulu ko ; mimyo beetu twasoongo mu mpisi mpwaani , na mu biteesu byobinso kuri beenu .
47011007	Hoti masumu me nyiri nyayirika mu kuba wakuluka me-meene , mpisi beenu luba lwadzaangusu , bukuri twaluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete kwa mungengi ?
47011008	Me nyakuukusa mabuundu makaka , mu kutaambula mufutu kuri bo mu kusalila beenu .
47011009	Ha nyaba kuri beenu , bu nyaba na nzala lubakusu , me nyasii diila muutu manene ko ; ngo me nyataambula lubakusu kuri bampaangi bafumini ku Makedonya ; mu myominso me nyabisiri kuri ti beenu lumbuungula , na sa nyanamitina kubisa ntoono yiyo .
47011010	Yiyo ngwanwa ya Kiristo yiri mu me , kuri muutu wudika me ko mu kuba na kimweese kikyo mu mankoonsi ma Akaya .
47011011	Bukuri nki ? Mu kuri ti me nyahele ku lutya ? Nzaambi yaari .
47011012	Ma nyiri mu kuyirika , me sa mbweese kumayirika , mpisi me nyisila mpwaani , kuri babo batiiri kubaka mpwaani ya kusa kimweese bunu beetu .
47011013	Bukuri baatu babo ngo bantumu bampya , bisari byamawunu , bikweswemekene mu kifwaani kya bantumu ba Kiristo .
47011014	Diri dya nkimukunu ko , bukuri Satana nde-meene wuswemekinaa mu kifwaani kya mbasi ya buungi .
47011015	Ngo diri dyansisi ko , mbuti bisari bya nde se bikweswemekene mu kifwaani kya bisari bya nsungumunu . Nsukulu bo sa yaba bunu buri biyiriki byaaku .
47011016	Me nyibweese kuleele ti , ya kuba muutu wuhololo me bunu kilawuku ko , ngo mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo taambulee me bunu kilawuku , mpisi me se mba na mwaa-kimweese .
47011017	Ma nyiri mu kuleele , me nyahele kuleele mo bunu bu tiriri Mfumu , ngo bunu ti kunsa bulawuku , mu nsiitu yiyo ya kuba na kimweese .
47011018	Ngo bukuri baatu balaka bakwesa kimweese mu muswinyi , me se sa nsa kimweese .
47011019	Mukwongo , beenu luri na madyeele , lukwekuunda mu ntiilu ya beenu-meene , babo bahele na madyeele !
47011020	Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wulusiiri bunkutu , mbuti muutu wuludiila manene , mbuti muutu horiri bi luri na byo , mbuti muutu wubilika mu beenu , na mbuti muutu wululeti ku busu , lo beenu lukuunda momanso mamo .
47011021	Me nyiri na nsoni mu kuleele mimyo , beetuneenu twasoongiri buyonsi . Ngo me nyiri mu kudzoonsolo bunu ti kunsa bulawuku . Mbuti muutu wakuka mu mpisi diba , lo me se nyakuka .
47011022	Bo Bahebeleho bari ? Me se . Bahisaheli bari ? Me se . Basundukila mu Abalaami bari ? Me se .
47011023	Bisari bya Kiristo bari ? Me nzoonsulu bunu kilawuku , mu kuleele ti me mvuriri na bo ; mu bisalu bya makwa , me mvuriri na bo ; mu maboroko , me mvuriri na bo ; mu nkuba kubwilikila , me mvuriri na bo ; na me mvuriri kuba mu nsisi dza lufwa mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu .
47011024	Mbala taanu , me nyiri nyabwilikila nkwaasulu makuumi matatu na wa kuri Bayudayo ;
47011025	mbala tatu me bari bandata nkwaasulu , mbala mosi me bari bandatila mu matari , mbala tatu me nyiri nyadyaama mu bwaatu , butsuku na mwiini me nyiri nyalutisa kunsa maampa .
47011026	Me nyasa budyeengi bwa mu miilu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakoto mu nsisi dza manyari , mu nsisi dza bangaa-bumfuna , mu nsisi dza ba turi kitsuumbu kimosi , mu nsisi dza makaanda , mu nsisi dza kunsa bvula , mu nsisi dza ku nsi yankatu , mu nsisi dza mu mubu , mu nsisi dza bampaangi bampya .
47011027	Me nyasala na nyamono mpasi , me nyakyeelele bitulu bya bwiisi ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakolo nzala na mpwiisu , nyakoto maloomi ntaangu ngo ntaangu , nyakuukila kyoosi na nyaba mpene .
47011028	Nyahele kutaanga kwaandi ti mi siiri , ngo musamu wu mbinikini me mpisi kiluumbu , musoongo wu nyiri na nde mu mabuundu momanso .
47011029	Na wuri na buyonsi , kuri lo me se nyahele kuba na buyonsi ? Na wubwa kuri lo me mutima wahele kusa mambaawu ?
47011030	Ngo mbuti mu kusa kimweese , lo me nsiiri kimweese mu misamu mitariri buyonsi bwaami .
47011031	Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu Yesu , nde wasakumunu mu mibvu ngo mibvu , yaari kuri ti me nyahele kusa mpya .
47011032	Ku Damasiko mfumu yaba mumonikisi mbyaasi Areta , watelemisi bari Damasiko mu kukebe bvula mpisi bansiimba .
47011033	Ngo me bansudukila munsa mpiri , mu mwaa-mweelu wantele , waba mu kibaka kya lupaangu , na me nyapatika mu myooko mya nde .
47012001	Buri me nsa kimweese ? Kwahele mufunu ! Ngo me nzoonsulu mu mitariri mamono-miisu , na manyabusulu ma Mfumu .
47012002	Me nyaari muutu mosi mu Kiristo wuri , mibvu kuumi na mina mimwaaluta , kari mu nyutu yaandi , kari kwahele nyutu yaandi me nyaari ko , ngo Nzaambi yaari , muutu wunde bamunaakisa natee ku yulu dya matatu .
47012003	Ngo me nyaari ti muutu wunde , ti diba mu nyutu yaandi , ti diba kwahele nyutu yaandi , me nyahele kuyaaba , ngo Nzaambi yaari
47012004	kuri ti bamunaakisa ku paradiso , na nde wayuka mantoono mahele ndelulu , mari muutu ti mosi wakiri kubaka pe miswa mya kuleele .
47012005	Mu muutu wa bubwo , lo me nsiiri kimweese , ngo mu me-meene me nyahele kusa kimweese mbuti ka mu buyonsi bwaami ko .
47012006	Mukwongo , mbuti me ngo mbeeri nyatya kusa kimweese , nkani me nketi kuba kilawuku ko , bukuri ngwanwa me nyileele . Me nyibisa kwaami mu kubata kuri ti , baatu bahele kumono me , mu kiteesu kibvuriri na mimyo mi bamono mu me , bunu pe mi bayuka kuri me .
47012007	Mu ntoono manyabusulu mankimukunu . Hango-nkuumbu , mu kuri ti me mpele kuba na masiiku , me bankotoso lunseende mu nyutu , mbasi ya Satana yikwendata , mpisi heki me mpele kuba na masiiku .
47012008	Me nyayingukiri Mfumu mbala tatu , mpisi kayisila mpasi dzidzo mu me .
47012009	Ngo nde wandeele ti : « Bweese bwa me bwakuka mu ye , bukuri mpinu dzaami dzimonokinaa kunsa buyonsi . » Ngo me mvuriri kutya kusa kimweese mu buyonsi bwaami , mpisi heki mpinu dza Kiristo dzidzakala mu me .
47012010	Hango-nkuumbu , me nyimono kiminu mu buyonsi , mu bitari , mu mbamusunu , mu nkwamusunu na kinkuukulu mu ntoono Kiristo ; bukuri me mbaanaa nyiri na buyonsi , lo haho ngo ha nyiri na makwa .
47012011	Me nyeki kilawuku bukuri beenu lwankwikisiri . Mukwongo me nyaketi kubaka ntumunu kuri beenu , bukuri me nyahele kubvula buntele , na bantumu ba beenu babanene babo , mu ntoono ti mosi , ti hayuku nyiri wabuunu .
47012012	Bidiimbu bisoongo kuri ti me ntumu , byayirimini ha kakati dya beenu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu : bidiimbu , biyiriki byankimukunu , na bimaangu .
47012013	Mukwongo , nki beenu luri lwabaka biri mwaa-byantele , ti na biri na mabuundu makaka , buti ka kuri ti , me nyahele kuludiila manene ko ? Hemesenee me mu bubayi bubwo .
47012014	Yimayi ngo mbala yatatu , me mwaayirima mu kwiisa kuri beenu , ngo nyahele kwiisa kuludiila manene ; bukuri me bi nyiri na nzala byo kari bitotolo bya beenu ko , ngo beenu-meene . Mukwongo , kari baala bayelemini kuwungukila babuti bitotolo ko , ngo babuti bayelemini kuwungukila baala bitotolo .
47012015	Me ngo wuri , nyiri na kutya mu kuha bi nyiri na byo , na sa nyaha kidziingu kyaami mu ntoono miheebulu mya beenu . Habaanaa me nyiri na ntiilu yalaka mu beenu , buri lo beenu ntiilu yantele luba na yo mu me ?
47012016	Ngo leelee kwaandi ti , beenu lwahele kubuungula me , ngo me bu nyiri ngaa-lupyelu , nyiri nyalubaka mu mawunu .
47012017	Buri me manene nyiri nyaludiila , ha lumbisa lwa mosi mu baatu ba nyiri nyaluheekele ?
47012018	Me nyayingukiri Tito , na nyamuheekiri kuri beenu kintwaari na mpaangi mosi ; buri Tito waludiiriri manene ? Buri beetu na nde twasii dyaatila mu kitsimi kimosi ko ? Bunu pe mu bitaambi bimosi ko ?
47012019	Kuholosono na kidzika , beenu kutsima ti beetu manyutu turi mu kukalila ha busu bweenu . Ngo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu Kiristo , beetu turi mu kudzoonso ; na myominso mimyo , banduku ba mutima mu ntoono ya kulutuunga .
47012020	Mukwongo , me nyibata kuri ti , ha nyikwiisa me mpele kulumono mu kiteesu ki ntiiriri me ; na beenu se luhele kumono me mu kiteesu ki lutiiriri beenu . Me nyibata ti ha kakati dya beenu , haba mayumu , musoki , mankesi , nkalikisi , makele , kintori , kinwa , na kisaangila .
47012021	Me nyibata kuri ti , ha nyibweese kwiisa , Nzaambi kankulula ha busu bwa beenu , na me nkoto bufwiiri , mu ntoono balaka bayirikiri masumu mu ntaangu yayikulu , na bahele kuyiinga madyeele mu kuhoto kuyirika , mya nsumukunu , mya kimpala na mya buyala .
47013001	Yimayi ngo mbala yatatu me nyeki kwiisa kuri beenu ; « Mu munwa wa bambaangi boolo bunu pe batatu musamu ndemunso sa kawa . »
47013002	Me nyaleeriri ha busu bwa beenu , mu luyisu lwadzoolo , na lumalu se nyibweese kuleele kuri nyahele ha busu bwa beenu , kuri bayirikiri masumu mu ntaangu yaluta , na kuri bobanso bakaka ti , mbuti me bweesiri kwiisa lukimi lo nyiluhemese ko ,
47013003	bukuri beenu luri mu kusaka kimbaangi ti Kiristo wudzoonsaa mu me . Nde wahele na buyonsi kuri beenu , ngo kasi wusoongaa mpinu dzaandi mu beenu .
47013004	Mukwongo , nde bamukomini ha kuruwa mu ntoono buyonsi , ngo kasi wuri mwooyo mu mpinu dza Nzaambi . Na beetu se turi na buyonsi mu nde , ngo kasi sa twaba mwooyo mu mpinu dza Nzaambi kuri beenu .
47013005	Fyongokinee mitima myeenu beenu-meene , mu kumono kari luri mu kanyi , tswiikiseenu mitima myeenu ; hoti lwahele kubakula beenu-meene , ti Yesu Kiristo wuri mu beenu ? Mbuti pele , lo beenu lwahele kuba batswiikama .
47013006	Me nsimini ti , sa lwabakula ti beetu ngo bari , turi batswiikama .
47013007	Ngo beetu tusaambila Nzaambi , mpisi beenu luhele kuyirika ntoono ti mosi yayibi ; kari mu kuri ti beetu twaswiikama tumonokono ko , ngo mu kuri beenu luyirika mamabwe , ti hayuku beetu turi bunu twahele kuswiikama .
47013008	Bukuri beetu turi na di tubangisina kuyirika ko , mu kunwaanisa ngwanwa , ngo kasi beetu kubangisina kusalila ngwanwa .
47013009	Mukwongo , beetu tumonaa kiminu mpisi ntaangu yiri , beetu turi na buyonsi kasi beenu luri na makwa ; mi turi mu kusambikilaa beetu miri ti beenu lubaanguka .
47013010	Hango-nkuumbu , bu nyiri la na beenu me nyilutinina misamu mimyo , mpisi heki ha nyiba ha busu bwa beenu , me mpele kusalila kibakala , bunu buri lutumu lwa mpa Mfumu , mu kutuunga nkani ka mu kutsyaamuna ko .
47013011	Mu misiiri ngo miri , bampaangi , monee kiminu , sakeenu kuba babaanguka , syamisinee beenu na beenu , beenee kitsimi kimosi , beenee na kiyeengi , na Nzaambi ya ntiilu na ya kiyeengi sa kaba na beenu .
47013012	Helesenee mamboto beenu na beenu , mu nyumutunu yangisi . Bangisi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto .
47013013	Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , ntiilu ya Nzaambi , na kintwaari kya Mpeeve Yangisi biba na beenu-banso .
48001001	Me Pawulo ntumu , kari bu tiiri baatu bunu pe muutu ko , ngo bu tiiriri Yesu Kiristo na taayi Nzaambi wamufulukisa mu bafwa .
48001002	Mu kintwaari na bampaangi bobanso bari na me , turi mu kutina kuri mabuundu ma mu nkoonsi ya Ngalatya .
48001003	Bweese na kiyeengi , bifumunaa kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
48001004	Yesu Kiristo wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono masumu ma beetu , mpisi heki katukuula mu ntaangu yayibi yimayi , bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi wuri Taayi dyeetu .
48001005	Kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu mibvu ngo mibvu ! Amene .
48001006	Me nyimono dyo dya nkimukunu , ti mu mawasu-mawasu , beenu lutekele mbisa , kuri wunde waluteele mbila mu bweese [ bwa Kiristo ] , mu ntoono Musamu mukimi Wamubwete .
48001007	Mukwongo , kuri Musamu mukimi ko , mbuti ka bangaa-kisaangila ko , batiiri kukitula Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo .
48001008	Ngo ti hayuku beetu , bunu pe mbasi ya ku mayulu wuluyaabisiri Musamu Wamubwete wasoboko na wunde wu turi twaluyikisa , lo kabwilikila mpopi !
48001009	Bunu bu twaleele , na mu lumalu nyibweese kuleele ti : mbuti muutu wuluyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wasoboko na wunde wu luri lwataambula , lo kabwiilikila mpopi !
48001010	Mukwongo , mu lumalu , me nsalila makwa mu kuyirika ma tiiri baatu hoti ma tiiri Nzaambi ? Buri haho mbweeyulu kuri baatu nyisaka ? Mbuti mbee nyakiri kwesaka mbweeyulu kuri baatu , lo nketyee kuba nkutu Kiristo ko .
48001011	Kuri beenu bampaangi nyiyaabisa ti : Musamu Wamubwete wu nyiri nyayaabisa kari bu tiiriri baatu ko .
48001012	Nyahele se kutaambula nde kuri muutu ; kuri muutu ti mosi se ko wanyikisa nde , ngo me nyataambula nde mu nyabusulu ya nde-meene Yesu Kiristo .
48001013	Beenu lwayukiri bwaba ndyaatulu yaami , mu ntaangu yi nyaba mu Nzaambi Bayudayo . Me nyakwaamisa dibuundu dya Nzaambi mu kiteesu kyabvulila , na nyadibamisa .
48001014	Mu kinzaambi kya Bayudayo , me nyaba mvuriri kiteesu na ba turi kiseendu kimosi , ba kitsuumbu kya me . Me nyaba nyakaangama kwalaka mu kikulu kya bakuutu baami .
48001015	Ngo [ Nzaambi ] , wansoolo kuholosono mu mwooyo nguri yaami , wanteele mbila mu bweese bwaandi , bu kamono dyo ti dyadibwete ,
48001016	mu kumonokoso Mwaana waandi kuri me , mpisi heki me nyimuyaabisa ha kakati dya makaanda ; ha nsi na nsi , me nyasii loombo ndoongi kuri muutu ko .
48001017	Me nyasii kweende se ku Yerusalemi kuri bantumu batekisiri mu kisalu na me ko , ngo me nyateleme na nyayende ku nsi ya Arabya , na nyabweese kubvutuka ku Damasiko .
48001018	Tumi , mibvu mitatu bu myaluta , me nyatoomboko ku Yerusalemi mu kuyaabisina na Kefa , na nyadzakala kuri nde biluumbu kuumi na bitaanu .
48001019	Me nyasii mono bantumu bakaka ko , ngo wuni Yakobo , mpaangi Mfumu .
48001020	Ma nyiri mu kutinina beenu , nkati ha busu bwa Nzaambi , me nyahele kusa mpya .
48001021	Tumi , ha nyeki kweendana , mu nkoonsi ya Sirya na ya Kilikya .
48001022	Mabuundu ma Kiristo ma ku Yudaya , maba mahele kunyaaba mu kidziri .
48001023	Ngo bo bunu bu bayukiri ti : « Wunde waba kwetukwamisaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , mu lumalu weki kweyikisa kanyi di kaba kwebamisaana haba tete . »
48001024	Mabuundu mamo masiika Nzaambi mu ntoono me .
48002001	Ha mambisa ma kuumi na mina mya mibvu , me nyabweese kutoomboko ku Yerusalemi beetu na Barnaba , nyaholo se Tito .
48002002	Me nyatoomboko kukwo , bunu bwaba nyaabusulu , me nyabaangula kuri bo Musamu Wamubwete , wu nyiri mu kweyikisa ha kakati dya makaanda ; nyabaangula se mu buwungu-buwungu kuri bakuutu ba kibvumi , mu kubata kuri ti kisalu ki nyiri mu kusala , bunu pe ki mwaamana kusala kikwiisa kuba kyamungengi .
48002003	Tito , Muhelene waba na me , basii kumukwiikisa kuteende bubakala ko .
48002004	Kwaba kwaandi na bampaangi bampya , ba mumpitu , bayolimiki ha kakati dya beetu mu kwetukete kunsa bunsaalisi bweetu , bu turi na bwo mu Kiristo Yesu , mpisi heki batusa bankutu ,
48002005	ngo kasi kuri bo , ti mu kilookolo kimosi , beetu twasii kubaheele nyutu ko , mpisi heki ngwanwa ya Musamu Wamubwete yisa kikuundi kuri beenu .
48002006	Kwaba se baatu ba lukiinsu , ngo me nyasii mono byasobokono mu bo ko ; Nzaambi ka koomonaa buri muutu ko . Kuri me , bakuutu ba kibvumi babo basii nkwiikisa ntoono ti mosi ko .
48002007	Ngo kasi , bo bamwiini kuri ti me bampeeri Musamu Wamubwete mu kunata kuri bahele kuteende bubakala , bunu bu baheeri se , Musamu Wamubwete kuri Petelo , mu kunata kuri bateende bubakala .
48002008	Bukuri wunde wasariri mu Petelo , kuri ti kaba ntumu kuri bateende bubakala , wasariri se mu me , kuri ti me mba ntumu kuri makaanda .
48002009	Yakobo , Kefa na Yowane , bari kubahololo bunu makuunsi , bamanaa kubakula ti me bampeeri bweese , batuha mamboto , beetu na Barnaba mu kusoongo kidiimbu kya nyukusunu , mpisi heki beetu tweende kuri makaanda , na bo beende kuri bateende bubakala .
48002010	Ngo kasi , kunu kuloombo batuloombo ti tubambukila bawelu mwooyo . Dyaambu didyo , me se nyaba nyasiila mutima , mu kudiyirika .
48002011	Ntaangu ya yisiri Kefa ku nsi ya Antyoke , me nyamutungukila ha kidziri , bukuri nde waba wayelemene kutaambula maseembu .
48002012	Tekesele baatu bafumini kuri Yakobo batubuka , nde wadya ha kimosi na bahele kuba Bayudayo . Ngo baatu babo bamanaa kutubuka , nde wakoso nyutu na weki kweba luteke-luteke , mu kubata bakwesyaamisa nteendulu bubakala .
48002013	Bayudayo bakaka se basalila bubwo kintwaari na nde . Barnaba se wayendekele mu kitukulu kya bo mu bumpitu-bumpyoongo .
48002014	Kasi me monaana ti , bahele kwedyaatila kunsa ngwanwa ya Musamu Wamubwete , me nyaleele kuri Kefa ha busu bwa bobanso ti : « Mbuti ye Muyudayo , wahele kwedyaatila bunu Muyudayo kasi bunu muutu wahele kuba Muyudayo , lo dyaburi ye wutsiitsa kukwiikisa bahele kuba Bayudayo mu kuba na mbeelu Bayudayo ? »
48002015	Beetuneenu twabutuka Bayudayo , twahele kufumuna mu kaanda dya bahele kuba Bayudayo , bangaa-masumu .
48002016	Tuyaari se ti , muutu wahele kuba walulukusu mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , ngo mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo . Na beetu twasa kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu , mpisi heki tuba twalulukusu mu kanyi mu Kiristo , nkani ka mu biyiriki bya Mangisi ko , bukuri mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , lo kuri muutu ti mosi ko wuba walulukusu .
48002017	Na mbuti heki mu kusaka kuba balulukusu mu Kiristo , tumonokini beetu-meene se , ti turi bangaa-masumu , buri lo Kiristo beeri kisari kya masumu ? Pele , kuri ti bele ko .
48002018	Mukwongo , mbuti heki , me nyeki bweese kutuunga bibyo bi nyiri nyatsyaamuna , lo me-meene nkitukiri musinini Mangisi .
48002019	Mukwongo , mbuti mu mitariri Mangisi , lo me nyafwa mu Mangisi , mpisi heki me mba mwooyo mu Nzaambi . Me bayeki bankomono ha kuruwa kintwaari na Kiristo .
48002020	Me nyiri mwooyo , ngo kari me ko , kasi Kiristo wuri mwooyo mu me . Mi nyikwemono me lumalu , mu kidziingu kya me mu muswinyi , me nyikwenata myo mu kanyi di nyiri na dyo mu Mwaana Nzaambi , wantya na wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono me .
48002021	Me nyahele kulooso bweese bwa Nzaambi . Mukwongo , mbuti ndulukulu yiri mu ntoono Mangisi , lo Kiristo kwa buunu kari kafwiila .
48003001	Sa beenu bari Ngalatya bimpuumbulu ! Na waluloko ? Buri kari ha miisu mya beenu , bari bayirika kubaangula bunu bu bakomini Yesu Kiristo ha yulu kuruwa ko ?
48003002	Yaabiseenu me ntoono mosi : Mpeeve yi luri lwataambula , haho mu biyiriki bya mangisi , hoti mu ma luri lwayuka ma kanyi ?
48003003	Nkati ngwanwa ti beenu bimpuumbulu luri ? Bu lwabaandikiri mu Mpeeve , ngo mu lumalu lweki manisa mu muswinyi ?
48003004	Buri momanso ma luri lwayika mamo mabuunu ? Heki mbuti ngwanwa ti mabuunu !
48003005	Wunde wuri mu kuluha Mpeeve , na wuri mu kweyirika bimaangu ha kakati dya beenu , haho mu biyiriki bya mangisi , hoti mu Maampu ma luri lwayuka ma kanyi ?
48003006	Ngo bukuri Abalaami kasaana kanyi mu Nzaambi , mu didyo bari bamutaangula mamo bunu nsungumunu ,
48003007	lo yaabeenu ti , babo bari na kanyi ngo baala ba Abalaami .
48003008	Matinu bu matekisiri kuyaaba , ti Nzaambi wululukisaana bahele kuba Bayudayo mu kanyi , matekisiri se kuyaabisa Musamu Wamubwete wumawu kuri Abalaami ti : « mu ye makaanda momanso sa maba masakumunu . »
48003009	Mu kiteesu kikyo , baatu bari mu kanyi , bari basakumunu ha kimosi na Abalaami ngaa-kanyi .
48003010	Bobanso bari mwooyo mu biyiriki bya Mangisi , bari kunsa mpopi ; bukuri dyatinu ti : « Mpisi wunde wahele kukwiikama , mu kukukisa momanso matinu mu mukaanda Mangisi , lo kaba kunsa mpopi . »
48003011	Diri dya ngwanwa , kuri muutu ko wuba walulukusu ha busu bwa Nzaambi , mu Mangisi , bukuri diri dyatinu se ti : « Ngaa-kusuunguma sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi . »
48003012	Ngo Mangisi mahele kufumuna mu kanyi ; kasi : « Wunde wumakukisa sa kaba mwooyo mu mo . »
48003013	Kiristo watukuula mu mpopi ya Mangisi , bu kabwilikila mpopi mu ntoono beetu , bukuri dyatinu ti : « Mpisi wunde wu bari bamanika ha yulu muti , lo kabwilikila mpopi . »
48003014	Mu bubwo , mu Kiristo Yesu , lusakumunu lwa Abalaami luri lwatubuka natee kuri bahele kuba Bayudayo , mpisi heki tutaambuleenu Mpeeve yi bari batusa lusiilulu mu kanyi .
48003015	Bampaangi , me nyidzoonso bunu budzoonsolaana baatu : mu misiku mya muutu mu masaala , kuri muutu mukimi wutsiitsa kuyisila bunu mpe kuteeteke ntoono ti mosi ko .
48003016	Nsiilulu basii dzo kuri Abalaami na kuri wapalila mu nde . Bahele kuleele ti : « kuri bapalila mu nde » , bunu ti kuri baatu balaka , ngo kuri muutu mosi , « na kuri wapalila mu ye » , ngo Kiristo .
48003017	Me bu nyiiri mu kuleele ti : lulelusunu lwa Nzaambi lu katekesele kukaanga , ka lutsiitsa kuba lwayaalu kuri Mangisi ko mayisa , ha mambisa ma nkama na makuumi matatu ma mibvu , mu kubwiisa lusiilulu .
48003018	Mukwongo , mbuti saala kubakula mu mangisi , lo ka dibweese kufumuna mu lusiilulu ko ; ngo mu lusiilulu Nzaambi kari kaha bweese kuri Abalaami .
48003019	Ngo Mangisi ma nki kwaandi ? Mo mari mu kubweeseme mu kuri ti lumvuki lumonokono , natee kukwiisa kiseendu ki basiiriri lusiilulu . Bambasi bayaabisa Mangisi mamo mu kooko kwa munkabu-kati .
48003020	Munkabu-kati mbuti kibari kimosi , lo nde pe ; ngo Nzaambi nde-kaka wuri .
48003021	Buri Mangisi mari kitaatu na nsiilulu [ dza Nzaambi ] ? Pele , kuri ti bele ko ! Mukwongo , mbuti kuri ngisi yi baheeri yakuka mu kuha kidziingu , lo ngwanwa nsungumunu yikwiisikilaa mu Mangisi .
48003022	Ngo kasi , Matinu masoongo ti , bobanso bakaangama kunsa masumu , mpisi heki mu kanyi mu Yesu Kiristo , lusiilulu luba lwaha kuri bangaa-kanyi .
48003023	Tekesele kanyi dikwiisa , beetu twaba munsa boroko dya mangisi , batuduka ha kimosi , mu ntoono kanyi dyaba dyayelemene kuyabakana .
48003024	Mu didyo , Mangisi maba mukebi weetu natee ha yisiri Kiristo , mpisi heki mu kanyi , tuba twalulukusu .
48003025	Kanyi bu dyayisa , beetu twasaala kunsa lutumu lwa mukebi ko .
48003026	Mukwongo , beenu-banso luri baala ba Nzaambi , mu kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu ,
48003027	bukuri , beenu-banso lwabotoko mu Kiristo , na lwalwaata Kiristo .
48003028	Kwa saala Muyudayo ko , Muhelene ko , nkutu ko , muutu wuri na bunsaalisi ko , kwahele bakala , kwahele mukyeetu , bukuri beenu-banso luri mosi mu Kiristo Yesu .
48003029	Mbuti beenu luri ba Kiristo , lo lwapalila mu Abalaami , bakondiri ba saala bunu buri lusiilulu .
48004001	Mu lumalu me nyileele ti : mu ntaangu yonso yiri mukondiri-saala wakiri mwaa-mwaana , lo wahele kusobokono na nkutu mu ntoono ti mosi , lu hayuku nde mfumu mu byobinso .
48004002	Ngo kasi , lo wuri kunsa lutumu lwa babuukisi na batwaalisi , natee kukuka kiteesu kya leeriri taayi dyaandi .
48004003	Beetu se bwobumosi , bu twaba twakiri mwaa-baala , twaba kunsa bunkutu bwa misamu mya nsi .
48004004	Ngo ntaangu bu yakuka , Nzaambi waheeke Mwaana waandi , wabutuka mu wa mukyeetu , na watumuma mu Mangisi ,
48004005	mpisi heki , kakuula bari kunsa Mangisi , na tutaambuleenu kiteesu kya kuba baala .
48004006	Ngo bukuri beenu luri baala , Nzaambi waheeke Mpeeve ya Mwaana waandi , munsa mitima myeetu , yiri mu kubikisa ti : « Aba , ho Taata ! »
48004007	Mu didyo , ye wahele kubweese kuba nkutu ngo wuri mwaana ; na mbuti ye wuri mwaana , lo wuri se mukondiri-saala mu Nzaambi .
48004008	Kasi mu ntaangu yayikulu , bu lwaba lwahele kuyaaba Nzaambi , beenu lwaba bankutu , kuri bibyo biri byahele kuba Nzaambi mu ngwanwa .
48004009	Ngo mu lumalu , bu lumwaayaaba Nzaambi , dibvuriri bubwete diri lumwaayabakana kuri Nzaambi , dyaburi beenu lubweese kubvutuka kuri bitotolo byahele makwa na byabuunu , mu nzala kubweese kuba bankutu kuri byo ?
48004010	Beenu luri mu kwebvumina biluumbu , mangoondo , mantaangu na mamvula .
48004011	Ngo me nyiri na boomo mu ntoono beenu , ti mpasi dzi nyiri nyamono mu beenu , dzikwiisa kuba kwaandi dzabuunu .
48004012	Bampaangi , me nyikuyingukila , beeneenu bunu me , bukuri me se , nyiri bunu beenu . Beenu lwahele kunyirikila ntoono ti mosi yayibi .
48004013	Beenu luyaari ti , me nyaluyaabisiri Musamu Wamubwete , mu lwatete , kuri lo nyabeele mu muswinyi .
48004014	Mu ntoono nyutu me , beenu lwakoto mu mpasi , ngo lwasii nyaafuna me na kundobokolo mante ko , kasi beenu , lwantaambula bunu Mbasi Nzaambi , bunu Kiristo Yesu .
48004015	Hango lwambwe lwa beenu hari luri ? Mukwongo , me lo nyiluteeriri kimbaangi ti , mbuti bwakuka , nkani haba beenu lwaketi kuhokolo miisu myeenu na kumpa myo .
48004016	Buri me mutaatu beenu nkitukiri , bukuri me nyiri mu kululeele ngwanwa ?
48004017	Bo bari na kuheme mu beenu , ngo kari mu kusaka bubwe bwa beenu ko . Bo batiiri kulutatula na me , mpisi heki beenu luba na kuheme mu bo .
48004018	Diri dyadibwete , mu kuba na kuheme mu mamabwete , mantaangu momanso , nkani ka munu mu mantaangu mari , me nyiri ha busu bwa beenu ko .
48004019	Baala baami , me nyiri mu kubweese kumono misoongo mya mbutulu , natee kuyirima Kiristo munsa beenu .
48004020	Me mbee ntiiri kwaandi kuba na beenu lumalu , na kuyiinga nzoonsulu yaami , bukuri me nyidunga mu ntoono beenu .
48004021	Leelee meti me , beenu lutiiri kuba kunsa Mangisi , buri beenu lwahele kuyuka mamo maleele Mangisi ?
48004022	Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : Abalaami wabuta baala boolo , mosi mu mukyeetu wa nkutu , wakaka mu mukasi wahele kuba nkutu .
48004023	Ngo wunde wu kabakiri mu nkutu wabutuka mu muswinyi , kasi wunde wu kabakiri mu mukasi wahele kuba nkutu , wabutuka bunu bwaba lusiilulu .
48004024	Bakyeetu babo bari bunu nkuma : bari mu kusoongo ndelusunu dzoolo . Lulelusunu lwamosi lwafumuna ku mulaandu wa Sinayi , mu mbutukulu ya bunkutu , ngo Angara .
48004025	Angara mulaandu wa Sinayi mu nsi ya Arabya ; nde wafwanikina na Yerusalemi dya lumalu , bukuri nde na baala baandi , bankutu bari .
48004026	Yerusalemi dya ku yulu diri na bunsaalisi , dyo diri nguri beetu .
48004027	Mukwongo , diri dyatinu ti : « Keembe kwaaku , ye wa kisita , wuhelaa kubuta ! Fula miloolo mu kiminu , ye wuhelaa kumono misoongo mya mbutulu ; bukuri mukyeetu wafuukila bvuriri baala na mukyeetu wuri na mulumi . »
48004028	Ngo bampaangi , beenu se luri baala ba lusiilulu bunu buri Isaki .
48004029	Ngo bunu buri mu ntaangu yayikulu , wabutuka mu muswinyi , wakwaamisini wabutuka mu mpeeve , bunubwo se buri mu lumalu .
48004030	Ngo Matinu nki mari mu kuleele ? « Binga nkutu na mwaana waandi , mpisi heki mwaana nkutu kahele kukondolo saala , bo na mwaana mukyeetu wahele kuba nkutu . »
48004031	Hango-nkuumbu , bampaangi , beetuneenu ka turi baala ba mukyeetu wa nkutu ko , ngo baala ba mukyeetu wahele kuba nkutu .
48005001	Kiristo watukuula mpisi tuba na bunsaalisi . Ngo telemee na ngwii , na yaa lubweese kukoto mu kihaangu kya bunkutu ko .
48005002	Yukeenu , me Pawulo , bu nyiri mu kuleele ti : mbuti beenu lutaamburi ti baluteende bubakala , lo Kiristo kasiiri mufunu kuri beenu ko .
48005003	Me nyibweese kutswiikisa dyo , kuri mpisi muutu wutaambula kuteende bubakala ti , lo yelemini se kukukisa Mangisi momanso .
48005004	Beenu lukwesaka kuba balulukusu mu Mangisi , lwayeki lwatabula kintwaari na Kiristo , lwayeki lwadziimbisa bweese .
48005005	Mukwongo , mu Mpeeve , beetu turi mu kwekiingila nsungumunu yi turi twasiila nsiitu mu kanyi .
48005006	Bukuri , mu Yesu Kiristo , kuteende bubakala bunu pe kuhele kuteende bubakala ka biri mufunu ko , ngo biri mufunu , kanyi disoongaana biyiriki mu ntiilu .
48005007	Beenu lwaba kwedzumuna kwakubwe ; ngo na walukabukisi mu kuhele kutumuma kuri ngwanwa ?
48005008	Muyooyolo wunde , wahele kunaangukina kuri wunde waluteele mbila .
48005009	« Mwaa-ndaambu lufunusu , lutoombolaana mbanda mampa yoyinso » .
48005010	Me nyiri na nsiitu mu Mfumu mu ntoono beenu , ti beenu ka luba na bitsimi bikimi ko . Wunde wukotoso kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu , sa kabwilikila maseembu , bwooso kabeele .
48005011	Me ngo wuri , bampaangi , mbuti me nyakiri mu kweyikisa nteendulu bubakala , lo mu nkya ntoono bari mu kubweese kwenkwaamisa ? Haho ngo hari lo , musamu kuruwa wahele kubweese kubumisa baatu makya .
48005012	Hemese babo bakwekotoso kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu , bahokolo manyutu bo-meene .
48005013	Mukwongo , bampaangi , beenu baluteele mbila mu kuba mu bunsaalisi . Ngo kasi , bunsaalisi bubwo yaa buba mpwaani ya kwedyaatila mu kimuutu ko ; ngo kunsa ntiilu yendee lwesalisina beenu na beenu .
48005014	Bukuri Mangisi momanso mari makuka mu dyaambu dimosi , ngo dimadi : « Tya mbaasi yaaku bunu ye-meene . »
48005015	Ngo mbuti beenu lukwetatikaa na lukwekaakila bambaasi beenu na beenu , lo seenee madyeele , mpisi heki luhele kwefwilisina beenu na beenu .
48005016	Ngo kasi me nyiluleele ti : dyaatileenu mu Mpeeve , na luba ti bele na dyo pe , mu kuyukutisa nyiimunu dza muswinyi .
48005017	Bukuri muswinyi wukwenyiima mari kitaatu na Mpeeve ; ngo Mpeeve se wukwenyiima mari kitaatu na muswinyi ; mukwongo , bo batelemese kitaatu , wamosi mu wakaka , mpisi heki luhele kubangisina kuyirika ma lutiiri .
48005018	Ngo mbuti beenu luri lwatwaalusu kuri Mpeeve , lo lwahele bweese kuba kunsa lutumu lwa Mangisi .
48005019	Biyiriki bya muswinyi byayabakana , ngo bi : kimpala , nsumukunu , buyala ,
48005020	nsambukulu-biteki , buloki , lubelu , kitaatu , bukwa , kituunsi kya nkesi , kubakana , nkabunu , mpambukusu ,
48005021	musoki , nkolulu malu , ndiilu ya mawaamba , na myominso myafwanikina na mimyo . Me nyilulubula mu mimyo , bunu bu nyatekesele kululeele ti , bayirikaana mya bubwo , ka bakondolo saala dya Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ko .
48005022	Kasi kimbutu kya Mpeeve ngo : ntiilu , kiminu , kiyeengi , nkindusulu-mutima , mbweeyulu-mutima , nzala-baatu , kanyi ,
48005023	bundeembu , nkebulu-nyutu . Mangisi mahele kitaatu na mya bubwo .
48005024	Babo bari ba Kiristo [ Yesu ] , bayeki bakomono muswinyi na mantiilu , na nyiimunu dzaandi .
48005025	Mbuti turi mwooyo mu Mpeeve , lo tudyaatilee se mu Mpeeve .
48005026	Yaa tubeenee bangaa-masiiku ko , beetu na beetu bisoombolo pe , musoki pe .
48006001	Bampaangi , mbuti muutu bamutangusini wuyirika mamabi , lo beenu bakimpeeve suungukeenu wa bubwo , mu mpeeve ya bundeembu , ngo ye-meene se , sa madyeele mpisi hele kubwa mu nsindukulu .
48006002	Yendeenu lwenatisina binati beenu na beenu , mu bubwo , beenu lukukisa Mangisi ma Kiristo .
48006003	Mukwongo mbuti muutu wutsima ti wuri mufunu , koomosoko wabuunu , lo nde wuwunukinaana .
48006004	Hemese mpisi muutu kayirika kutala kisalu kyaandi , tumi yiyo yiba ntoono ya kimweese mu nde-meene , nkani ka mu mukimi ko .
48006005	Mukwongo , mpisi muutu kanaanguna kilemu kya nde-meene .
48006006	Hemese wunde wu bayikisa Maampu , kaha kikuuku kya byobinso bikari na byo , kuri wunde wumuyikisa .
48006007	Yaa luwunukina kweenu ko , bakoosiila Nzaambi munsiku ko ; bukuri , mamo ma kunaa muutu mani mamo se katolo .
48006008	Bukuri wunde wukuna mu kimuutu kya nde-meene , sa katolo mu kimuutu mbiiyulu ; na wunde wukuna mu Mpeeve , sa katolo mu Mpeeve , kidziingu kyahele manunu .
48006009	Tweyirikeenu mamabwe , yaa tuholo-bito ko , bukuri ntaangu bu yikuka , sa twatolo , mbuti twahele kubwoongolo .
48006010	Mu didyo , ha twakiri na ntaangu , tuyirikeenu mamabwe kuri baatu bobanso , ngo bvula-bvula kuri baturi kintwaari mu kanyi .
48006011	Monee , buri bunene bwa bisoni bi nyiri mu kutina mu kooko kwaami .
48006012	Bobanso bari na nzala-kubila mu muswinyi , batiiri kulukwiikisa kuteende bubakala , mpisi heki bahele kuba bakwaamusu mu ntoono ya kuruwa dya Kiristo .
48006013	Mukwongo , bateende bubakala bahele kubvumina Mangisi bo-meene , ngo kasi bo batiiri ti beenu luba lwateende bubakala , mpisi babilika mu manyutu ma beenu .
48006014	Me ngo wuri , nyahele kusa nzala-kubila mu kitotolo , mbuti kari mu kuruwa dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo ko , mu dyo , nsi yayeki yakomono mu ntoono ya me , na me bankomono mu ntoono ya nsi .
48006015	Mukwongo , kuba wateende bubakala bunu pe kuhele kuba wateende bubakala kuri mufunu ko ; ngo biri mufunu kuba kiyiriki kyamoono .
48006016	Na bobanso basalila mu ngisi yiyo , kiyeengi na ngebe biba kuri bo , na kuri Isaheli dya Nzaambi .
48006017	Mu misiiri ngo miri , muutu yaa kansiila nduungusu ko , mukwongo , me nyiri na bidziminu bya Yesu mu nyutu yaami .
48006018	Bampaangi , bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu ! Amene .
49001001	Me Pawulo , ntumu Yesu Kiristo , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , kuri bangisi bari ku Efeso , na kuri bakwiikama mu Kiristo Yesu ,
49001002	bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba na beenu .
49001003	Kaba wasakumunu , Nzaambi wuri Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , nde watusakumuna mu nsakumunu dzodzinso dza kimpeeve , kunu kinsongi-yulu mu Kiristo .
49001004	Mu nde , Nzaambi watusoolo , tekesele nyirikulu nsi , mu kuba bangisi na bahele na mi babaseembele , ha busu bwaandi kunsa ntiilu .
49001005	Nzaambi watutaasiri mu kuba baala baandi ba kubuukisa mu Yesu Kiristo , bunu buri bweese bwa ntiilu yaandi ,
49001006	mu kuha ndumusu ya nkeembu ya bweese bwaandi , bu kari katuha kwa mungengi mu mwaana waandi wa mutima .
49001007	Mu nde , beetu turi na nkuululu mu makila maandi , na mpemusunu ya lumvuki , bunu buri busina bwa bweese bwaandi ,
49001008	bu kari kabwookoso mu beetu , kunsa nyaabulu yoyinso na madyeele .
49001009	Nde watuyaabisa mpaanu dza kutya kwaandi , bunu buri kiminu kyaandi ki kasoongiri mu Kiristo ,
49001010	mu ntoono kitsimi kya nkukulu mantaangu : kukutukisa byobinso mu Kiristo , biri ku mayulu na biri ha butoto mu nde .
49001011	Mu nde , beetu twataambula saala mu nteelulu wari , batekesele kutusoolo , bunu buri bitaasi bya wunde wuyirikaana momanso , bunu buri kutya kwaandi ,
49001012	mu kuri ti tuha ndumusu ya nkeembu yaandi , bu twatekesele kusa nsiitu mu Kiristo .
49001013	Mu nde , beenu luri lwayuka maampu ma ngwanwa , Musamu Wamubwete wa mvuukulu yeenu . Mu nde se , bu lwasiiriri kanyi , balusiiri kidiimbu mu Mpeeve Yangisi ya lusiilulu .
49001014	Mpeeve yiyo , yitukebelaa saala dyeetu , natee mu nkuululu yi tubaka mu ntoono ndumusu ya nkeembu yaandi .
49001015	Hango-nkuumbu , me se bu nyayukiri badzoonsolo mu ntoono kanyi dyeenu mu Mfumu Yesu , na ntiilu yeenu mu bangisi bonso ,
49001016	nyahele kuhoto kubvutula matoondo mu ntoono beenu . Me nkoolubaambukilaa mwooyo mu nsaambulu dzaami ,
49001017	mpisi heki Nzaambi ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , Taayi dya nkeembu , kaluha mpeeve ya madyeele na ya nyabusulu , mu kuyaaba nde .
49001018	Hemese Nzaambi katsyeemese mwiinunu yeenu mu mitima , mpisi lubakula nkya nsiitu yiri mu mbila yikari kaluteele , nkya busina bwa nkeembu yiri mu saala dyaandi , ha kakati dya bangisi ,
49001019	na nkya nzaangumunu , ya bvulula , ya mpinu dzaandi , mu ntoono beetu basiila kanyi , bunu buri mpinu dza makwa ma lutumu lwaandi ,
49001020	dzi kari kamonokoso mu Kiristo , bu kamufulukisi ha kakati dya bafwa , na bu kamudzakisa ha lubakala lwaandi kunu kinsongi-yulu .
49001021	Kiristo wuri ha yulu kikuutu kyokinso , lutumu lwolunso , mpinu dzodzinso , kimfumu kyokinso , na mpisi nkuumbu yibatsiitsa kutaanguna ; kari munu mu ntaangu yimayi ko , ngo se na mu ntaangu yikwiisa .
49001022	Nzaambi wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi bya Kiristo , na wamusuusa mu kuba mutu ha yulu dibuundu dyodinso ,
49001023	diri nyutu yaandi , nduululu ya wunde wuluulusaa byobinso mu bobanso .
49002001	Beenu lwaba lwafwa mu ntoono lumvuki lweenu , na mu masumu meenu ,
49002002	mu mo , beenu lwaba kwedyaatilaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , bunu buri bifu bya nsi yimayi , bunu buri lutumu lwa mfumu mpinu dza kingye-kingye , mpeeve yiyo yiri mu kwesala mu lumalu , ha kakati dya baala ba tungu .
49002003	Beetu-banso se twaba kintwaari na bo , na twaba kwedyaatilaana mu ntaangu yayikulu , bunu buri nyiimunu dza muswinyi weetu , mu kweyirika matiiri muswinyi na bitsimi byeetu byabibi . Mu mbeelu yeetu , twaba baala bayelemene kubwiilikila nkesi dza Nzaambi bunu bakaka .
49002004	Ngo Nzaambi waluula mu ngebe , mu ntoono ntiilu yaandi yayinene , yikari katutiila ,
49002005	bu twaba twafwa mu lumvuki , nde watuha mwooyo mu Kiristo . Mu bweese beenu luri lwabvuukila .
49002006	Mu Kiristo Yesu , Nzaambi watufulukisa ha kimosi na nde , na watudzakisa ha kimosi na nde kunu kinsongi-yulu ,
49002007	mu kusoongo mu mantaangu makwiisa , busina bwabuukula bwa bweese bwaandi , mu mbweeyulu-mutima waandi kuri beetu mu Kiristo Yesu .
49002008	Mukwongo , mu bweese beenu luri lwabvuukila mu ntoono kanyi , kari mu beenu-meene ko , ngo kikabu kya Nzaambi ;
49002009	kari mu biyiriki ko , mpisi heki muutu kahele kusiika .
49002010	Mukwongo , beetu turi biyiriki bya Nzaambi , nde watuyirika mu Kiristo Yesu , mu kuba na biyiriki byabibwete , bi kari katekesele kuyirika , mpisi tubisalila .
49002011	Hango-nkuumbu , baambukeenu mwooyo ti , beenu mu ntaangu yayikulu , lwaba bangooyi mu muswinyi , bahele kuteende bubakala , mu mwiinunu ya babo bateende bubakala , mu nteendulu ya myooko mya baatu .
49002012	Baambukeenu mwooyo ti lwaba , mu ntaangu yiyo kwahele Kiristo , bahele kuba na miswa mu kudzakala mu nsi ya Isaheli , banzeense mu ndelusunu dza lusiilulu , bahele na nsiitu na bahele na Nzaambi mu nsi .
49002013	Kasi mu lumalu , mu Kiristo Yesu , beenu bari mu ntaangu yayikulu lwaba la , lweki bebele mu makila ma Kiristo .
49002014	Mukwongo , nde ngo kiyeengi kyeetu : nde wasa kuri ti baba boolo , beki mosi , na mu nyutu yaandi , nde wabwiisa kibaka kya mpambukusu ngo lubelu .
49002015	Nde wayisila lutumu lwa Mangisi na misiku , mpisi heki mu nde-meene , nde kayirika mu bo boolo , muutu ndemosi wamoono , mu kusa kiyeengi ,
49002016	na mu kusa nyukusunu ha kakati dya bamosi na bakaka , mu nyutu yomosi kintwaari na Nzaambi mu kuruwa , mu dyo , nde kari kamana lubelu .
49002017	Bu kayisa , nde wayaabisa Musamu wa kiyeengi kuri beenu lwaba la , na kuri baba bebele .
49002018	Bukuri mu nde , beetu turi na miswa , bamosi na bakaka , mu Mpeeve yomosi , mu kuba hari Taata .
49002019	Mu didyo , beenu lusii banzeense , na minzakikiri ko , kasi lweki bangaa-nsi kintwaari na bangisi , baatu bari mu kaanda dya Nzaambi .
49002020	Beenu lwatuunguma ha yulu lufulu lwa bantumu na babikiri , Kiristo Yesu nde-meene ngo tari dya ha kuumbu .
49002021	Mu nde , ntuungulu yoyinso yasuunguma na deredee , yiri mu kunaaka mu kuba Nzo-nzaambi yangisi mu Mfumu .
49002022	Mu nde , beenu se luri lwatuunguma mu kintwaari , mu kuba nzo yi dzakalaa Nzaambi mu Mpeeve .
49003001	Mu ntoono yiyo , me Pawulo , nyiri boroko dya Yesu Kiristo , mu beenu makaanda .
49003002	Kampe beenu lwayukiri , bunu buri kisalu kya bweese bwa Nzaambi kibari baha me , mu ntoono beenu .
49003003	Me nyataambula mpaanu mu nyabusulu , bunu bu nyatekisiri kulutinina mu bukufi .
49003004	Lumanaa kutaanga , beenu sa lwabakula nkya madyeele me nyiri na mo , mu mitariri mpaanu dza Kiristo ,
49003005	dziri mu biseendu byalabuka , basii yaabisa dzo kuri baala ba baatu ko , ngo mu lumalu , Mpeeve mwaayaabisa dzo kuri bantumu baandi bangisi , na kuri babikiri .
49003006	Mu nzila ya Musamu Wamubwete , makaanda se meki bakondiri ba saala mu kintwaari , bari mu nyutu mosi , na bataambula ha kimosi na Bayudayo , lusiilulu luri mu Yesu Kiristo .
49003007	Mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , me nyayeki kisari , bunu buri kikabu kya bweese bwa Nzaambi bu baheeri kuri me , bunu buri kisalu kya mpinu dzaandi .
49003008	Kuri me wu bvuriri buntele mu bangisi bobanso , bari baha bweese bumabu , bwa kuyaabisa kuri makaanda busina bwa Kiristo bwahele mbangukulu ,
49003009	na mu kuyirika kubaangula kuri bobanso bunu buri kisalu kya mpaanu ki bari basweeke , kuholosono mu mibvu , mu Nzaambi , wuri nde muyiriki bitotolo byobinso .
49003010	Mu lumalu , mu nzila ya dibuundu , batumi na bamfumu ba kinsongi-yulu bamwaayaaba madyeele ma Nzaambi ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ,
49003011	bunu buri bitaasi bya mpisi mibvu , bikari kayirika mu Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yeetu .
49003012	Mu kanyi mu nde , beetu turi na bunsaalisi bwa kudzoonso na kukokosolo kuri Nzaambi mu nsiitu dzodzinso .
49003013	Hango , me nyiloombo ti yaa luholo-bito ko , mu ntoono mpasi dzaami , dzi nyiri mu kwemono me mu beenu ; mpasi dzidzo ngo nkeembu yeenu .
49003014	Mu didyo , me nyitsukuma ha busu bwa Taata ,
49003015	kuri nde , mpisi kaanda ku mayulu na ha butoto , diri dyataambula nkuumbu .
49003016	Nde , mu Mpeeve yaandi , kaluha makwa mu muutu wa kunsa-kati , bunu buri busina bwa nkeembu yaandi mu mpinu .
49003017	Nde kadzakisa Kiristo kunsa mitima myeenu mu kanyi , na luba lwamene myaansi na lwatuunguma kunsa ntiilu ,
49003018	mpisi heki luba na makwa , ma kubakula mu kintwaari na bangisi , bunu buri bunene , bula , nzangumunu na musundu ,
49003019	luyaaba ntiilu ya Kiristo , yalutula nyaabulu . Mu bubwo beenu luba lwaluula natee mu nduululu yoyinso ya Nzaambi .
49003020	Kuri wunde wakuka mu kuyirika , kwakinkulu , ha yulu momanso ma tuloombaa bunu pe ma tutsimaa , bunu buri mpinu dzikwesala mu beetu ,
49003021	kuri nde kuba nkeembu , mu dibuundu na mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono biseendu byobinso , mu bibvu ngo bibvu , bunubwo . Amene .
49004001	Me nyilusyaamisa , me nyiri boroko mu ntoono Mfumu , mu kudyaatila mu kiteesu kyayelemene na mbila yiyo yibari baluteele ,
49004002	mu nkulukulu yoyinso , mu bundeembu , mu nkindusulu-mutima , mu kwekuunda bambaasi beenu na beenu mu ntiilu .
49004003	Salilee makwa , mu kukebe kintwaari kya Mpeeve , mu musiinga wa kiyeengi .
49004004	Nyutu mosi yiri , na Mpeeve se mosi , bunubwo se bari baluteele mu nsiitu mosi , ya mbila yeenu .
49004005	Mfumu mosi , kanyi dimosi , mbotokulu yimosi ,
49004006	Nzaambi mosi yiri , Taayi dya bobanso , wutuma bobanso , wukwesala mu bobanso , na wuri mu bobanso .
49004007	Kuri mpisi muutu mu beetu , bari baha bweese , bunu buri kiteesu kya kikabu kya Kiristo .
49004008	Hango-nkuumbu , diri dyaleelu ti : « Bu kamana kunwaata ku yulu , nde wakaanga bunkutu , na waha bikabu kuri baatu . »
49004009	Ngo , « nde wanwaata » , lo mambangukulu ti ki ? Ti nde katekisilaana kukulumuka mu mankoonsi ma ku nsuku butoto tumi keki nwaata .
49004010	Wunde wakulumuki , wunu nde se wanweeti kunu kinsongi-yulu , mpisi heki nde kaluulusa nsi na yulu .
49004011	Na nde-meene wasa kuri ti , babamosi baba bantumu , bakaka babikiri , bakimi madingisi , bakaka se batari , na bakimi se bayikisi .
49004012	Mimyo , mu kusa kuri ti , bangisi baba bayirima mu kusa kisalu , kya ntuungulu nyutu ya Kiristo ,
49004013	natee bu tutubukiri beetu-banso , mu kintwaari kya kanyi na kya nyaabulu Mwaana Nzaambi , mu muutu wabuuka , mu kiteesu kya kuba na mutele wasuka wa Kiristo .
49004014	Haho lo tubweese kuba baala , banyingusu na bakweyende mu mpisi kiteembu kya nyikusulu dza kimpa kya baatu , mu lupyelu lwa bo ko , na mu mawunu na lumvuki lwa bo .
49004015	Ngo kasi habaanaa tukwedzoonso ngwanwa mu ntiilu , lo tukwebuuka mu nde mu momanso ; nde Kiristo , wuri mutu .
49004016	Mu nde nyutu yoyinso yiri yayirima , na yasokomo kwakubwete , mu biyikulu byobinso byayikwaata , bunu buri kisalu kyayelemene na mpisi muutu , na yikwebuuka mu ntuungulu ya yo-meene kunsa ntiilu .
49004017	Mu didyo , me nyileele na nyitswiikisa mu Mfumu ti , yaa lubweese kwedyaatila bunu bangooyi ko bakwedyaatila mu madyeele ma bo-meene mahele mufunu .
49004018	Madyeele ma bo mayeki mamabi , bo banzeense mu mwooyo wa kinzaambi , mu ntoono kuhele kwa nyaabulu , na mu ntoono nkubusulu mutima yi bari na yo .
49004019	Bo basaala na nsoni mu bo-meene ko , bayeki bayekele manyutu maaku mu buyala , mu kweyirika nsumukunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu mu kiteesu kya makwa .
49004020	Ngo beenu kari bubwo ko , luri lwayika mu kuyaaba Kiristo .
49004021	Mbuti heki beenu lwayuka mi kari kaleele nde-meene , na mu nde , beenu baluyikisa , bunu buri ngwanwa yiri mu Yesu ,
49004022	lo luyelemini kuyisila ndyaatulu yatekesele ya mu muutu wamukulu , wukwesumuka mu nyiimunu dza mawunu .
49004023	Kitukeenu baatu bamoono , mu mpeeve ya madyeele meenu ,
49004024	na lwaatee muutu wamoono , wayiriku bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , kunsa nsungumunu na bungisi byangwanwa .
49004025	Hango-nkuumbu , hotee mpya , dzoonsee ngwanwa mpisi muutu kuri mbaasi yaandi , bukuri turi binamu bamosi na bakaka .
49004026	Bu lubakiri nkesi , yaa lubwa mu masumu ko : ntaangu yaa yidyaama , kuri beenu bunu bu luri na nkesi ko ,
49004027	yaa luha mpwaani kuri dyabulu ko .
49004028	Ngaa-kwiibi ya kabweese kuyiba ko , ngo kamono mpasi mu kusala bunu buyelemini , mu myooko mya nde-meene , mpisi heki kabaka kya kuha kuri wunde wuri na nzala kubaka .
49004029	Yaa kupala ntoono ti mosi yayibi mu munwa weenu ko , ngo mbuti kuri yipala , lo yiba yayibwete , yiri mufunu mu ntuungulu , mpisi yiha bweese kuri babo bayuka .
49004030	Yaa lunyoongoso Mpeeve Yangisi ya Nzaambi ko , mu yo beenu bari balusa kidiimbu mu kiluumbu kya nkuululu .
49004031	Mpisi musamu wankari , wa kabala , wa nkesi , kuyaama , bitari , na mpisi mamabi , biba byayusula ha kakati dya beenu .
49004032	Beeneenu na mbweeyulu-mutima mu beenu na beenu , bangaa-bundeembu , kwehemesene beenu na beenu , bunu bwa luhemesene Nzaambi mu Kiristo .
49005001	Beeneenu minsombisiri mya Nzaambi bunu baala ba mutima ;
49005002	na dyaatileenu kunsa ntiilu , bunubwo se Kiristo kari kalutiila , na kayekele nyutu yaandi kuri Nzaambi mu kikabu na mu kumudzusa , mu ntoono beetu , bunu mananaasi ma mfuku yayibwete .
49005003	Buyala , na nsumukunu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , bunu pe ntiki-mboongo , yaa biba ha kakati dya beenu ko , bubwo bwayelemene kuri bangisi .
49005004	Mantoono mamabi , nzoonsulu dza budzeeke bunu pe dzansoni , byahele kuyelemene ha kakati dya beenu ; ngo kasi byayelemene mvutukulu matoondo .
49005005	Mukwongo , yaabeenu dimadi : mpisi kiyala , bunu pe wasumuka , bunu pe ngaa-lukakutu , yiyo nsambukulu-biteki , lo wabubwo wahele na saala mu Kimfumu kya Kiristo bo na Nzaambi .
49005006	Yaa kuba muutu wuluwuna mu misamu myahele mufunu ko , bukuri mu mimyo nkesi dza Nzaambi dzikwiisaana ha yulu baala ba nko .
49005007	Yaa luba mfuundu mosi na bo ko .
49005008	Mu ntaangu yayikulu beenu lwaba mampimbisi ; mu lumalu beenu lweki buungi mu Mfumu . Yendee lwedyaatila bunu baala ba buungi .
49005009	Mukwongo , kimbutu kya buungi kiri mu nyirikulu momanso ma mbweeyulu , ma nsungumunu , na ma ngwanwa .
49005010	Yaabeenu kuswaasisa mari mamabwe ha busu bwa Mfumu ,
49005011	na yaa lweba kintwaari mu biyiriki byahele mufunu bya mampimbisi ko , ngo kasi bitungukilee .
49005012	Mukwongo , diri dyansoni mu kudzoonsolo ma bari mu kweyirika bo mu nsweeki .
49005013	Momanso ma bari batungukila mamo , mari mamonokono ha buungi ,
49005014	bukuri momanso ma baanaa mamonokono lo meki buungi . Hango-nkuumbu , kaleele ti : « Siimbika , ye wuri tolo , teleme ha kakati dya bafwa , na Kiristo kasemese buungi bwaandi ha yulu ye . »
49005015	Ngo seenee madyeele na bunkete mu ndyatulu yeenu , yaa luba bunu biwulu ko , ngo beenee bunu bangaa-madyeele ,
49005016	bayaari kubakila ndaandu mu ntaangu yimayi , bukuri biluumbu biri byabibi .
49005017	Hango-nkuumbu , yaa luba madzeeke ko , ngo kasi bakuleenu buri kutya kwa Mfumu .
49005018	Yaa lwekolo malu ko , mu mo mu kwiisikila nzimbusulu , kasi beenee baluula mu Mpeeve .
49005019	Syamisineenu beenu na beenu mu mikuunga mya nkeembu , mu mikuunga mya mbambukulu mwooyo , na mikuunga mya kimpeeve , yimbileenu na siikeenu Mfumu mu mutima weenu ndemunso .
49005020	Bvutulee matoondo mpisi ntaangu , mu myominso , kuri Taayi Nzaambi , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
49005021	Yende lwetumuma bamosi kuri bakaka , mu kibvumi kya Kiristo .
49005022	Bakasi batumuma kuri balumi ba bo-meene bunu ti kuri Mfumu ,
49005023	bukuri mulumi ngo mutu mukasi , bunu Kiristo se wuri mutu dibuundu , nde Mubvuukisi nyutu ;
49005024	ngo kasi bunu bu tumumaana dibuundu kuri Kiristo , bunu bwo se , bakasi bayelemini kutumuma kuri balumi baaku mu myominso .
49005025	Balumi , tyeenee bakasi beenu , bunubwo se Kiristo kari watya dibuundu , na wayekele nyutu yaandi mu ntoono dyo .
49005026	Nde wadisa dyangisi mu kuditsyeemese mu nswaakulu ya maampa , kunsa Maampu ;
49005027	mpisi kamonokoso kuri nde-meene , dibuundu dyakeembusu , dyahele na mpita bunu pe mihonyi , bunu pe kitotolo kyafwanikina na bibyo , ngo kasi diba dyangisi na dyahele maseembu .
49005028	Balumi se bunubwo , bayelemini kutya bakasi ba bo-meene , bunu bu batiiriri manyutu ma bo-meene . Wunde wutiiri mukasi wa nde-meene , lo nyutu ya nde-meene katiiri .
49005029	Mukwongo , kuri muutu wutsiitsa kubele nyutu ya nde-meene ko , kasi nde wudiisila na wusaana bunkete mu yo ; bunubwo se Kiristo kakoosiilaa mu dibuundu .
49005030	Bukuri beetuneenu turi binamu bya nyutu yaandi .
49005031	Mu didyo , wabakala sa kasiisa taayi na nguri yaandi , na sa kakaangama na mukasi waandi , na boboolo sa baba muutu mosi .
49005032	Mpaanu dzimadzi dziri dzadzinene ; na me bu nyiri mu kuleele ti , mimyo mitariri Kiristo na dibuundu .
49005033	Ngo kasi mitariri se mosi-mosi mu beenu , mpisi muutu mu beenu katya mukasi wa nde-meene , bu katiiriri nyutu ya nde-meene ; na mukasi kabvumina mulumi .
49006001	Baala , tumumeenu mu Mfumu kuri bataayi na banguri beenu , bukuri mamo masuunguma .
49006002	« Bvumina taayi dyaaku na nguri yaaku » , lulwo ngo lutumu lwatete luri na lusiilulu :
49006003	« mpisi heki ye ba mu lwambwe , na ba na kidziingu kyakila ha butoto . »
49006004	Bataayi , yaa lwebakisa baala beenu nkesi ko , ngo babuukiseenu kunsa nyikusulu na mandoongi ma Mfumu .
49006005	Bankutu , tumumeenu kuri bamfumu beenu ba muswinyi , mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu , kunsa nkulukulu mutima , bunu ti kuri Kiristo .
49006006	Kari hana ha miisu mya bo ko , bunu ti mu nzala kubweeye kuri baatu , ngo bunu bankutu ba Kiristo bari mu kuyirika kutya kwa Nzaambi , mu mutima wamutsiina .
49006007	Basalileenu mu mutima-bubwete , kuri bunu beenu lusalila Mfumu nkani ka baatu ko ,
49006008	bu luyaari ti mpisi muutu , mbuti yirikiri mamabwe , lo sa kamataambula kuri Mfumu , ti kaba nkutu bunu pe kahele kuba nkutu .
49006009	Beenu se bamfumu , yirikeenu bwobumosi kuri bankutu beenu , mu kuhele kwesalila kibakala , bu luyaari ti , na bo na beenu luri na Mfumu yiri mu mayulu , na kuri nde kimpengeki kyo pe .
49006010	Mu misiiri ngo miri , yendee lwebakila makwa mu Mfumu , mu makwa ma mpinu dzaandi .
49006011	Lwateenu binwaanunu bya Nzaambi , mu kubangisina kuteleme na ngwii ha busu bwa biyiriki bya dyabulu .
49006012	Bukuri kikiindu ki turi na kyo , kari kya kunwaanisa muswinyi na makila ko , ngo kasi kya kunwaanisa bakuutu , batumi , na bamfumu ba nsi ya mampimbisi yimayi , kya kunwaanisa mampeeve mamabi mari ku kinsongi-yulu .
49006013	Hango-nkuumbu , holeenu binwaanunu bya Nzaambi , mpisi heki lubangusina kusa bunkuri mu kiluumbu kyakibi , na kuba bateleme na ngwii , bu lumeeni kuyirika momanso .
49006014	Telemeenu na ngwii , lwateenu ngwanwa ngo musweele mu luketu lweenu , na lwaateenu nsungumunu ngo kinkuta kya mu ntulu kya mukaanda kibulu .
49006015	Lwaateenu se masapaatu mu miilu , ngo malwangukila ma kunata Musamu Wamubwete wa kiyeengi .
49006016	Mu mpisi diba , kwaateenu kikakusulu kya kanyi , mu kyo beenu lubangusina kudzimisa misomono mya mbaawu mya Ngaa-bubi .
49006017	Na taambuleenu mpu ya kiseengu ya mvuukulu , na mbeesi yayila ya Mpeeve ngo Maampu ma Nzaambi .
49006018	Mu nsaambulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu na ndoombulu , saambileenu mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu mu Mpeeve . Mu didyo , beenee naana , beenee na kifiki , loombee mu bangisi bobanso ,
49006019	na mu me se , mpisi heki me bampa dyaambu dya kuleele , mu ntaangu yintiiri kudzibula munwa waami , mu kuyaabisa mu bunsaalisi mpaanu dza Musamu Wamubwete .
49006020	Mu Musamu wunde , me nyiri mumonikisi wuri mu bikonyi , mpisi heki me nzoonsolo , mu bunsaalisi bunu bu nyelemini kuyikisa .
49006021	Me ntiiri ti beenu se luyaaba misamu mitariri me , mi nyiri mu kusalila . Tikiko , mpaangi ya mutima , na kisari kyakwiikama mu Mfumu , sa kaluyaabisa myominso mimyo .
49006022	Me nyamuheekiri kuri beenu mu ntoono yiyo , mpisi heki beenu luyaaba misamu mitariri beetu , na kasyaamisa mitima myeenu .
49006023	Kiyeengi , ntiilu na kanyi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba kuri bampaangi .
49006024	Bweese buba kuri bobanso , batyaanaa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu ntiilu yiri yabiiyaa ko .
50001001	Pawulo na Timoteho , bankutu ba Yesu Kiristo , kuri bangisi mu Kiristo Yesu bari ku Filipo , bari kintwaari na bakuutu ba dibuundu na bisari :
50001002	bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo biba na beenu .
50001003	Me nyibvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi yaami , mu mpisi ntaangu yi nyibambukilaa beenu mwooyo .
50001004	Mantaangu momanso ma nyisaambilaa me mu beenu-banso , nyisambikilaa mu kiminu ,
50001005	mu ntoono kintwaari , ki luri mu kusoongaa beenu kuri me mu Musamu Wamubwete , kuholosono kiluumbu kyatete natee mu lumalu .
50001006	Me nyiri na nsiitu mu dimadi : wunde wabaandika kisalu kyakibwe mu beenu , sa kamana kyo natee mu kiluumbu kya Yesu Kiristo .
50001007	Buri bwa yelemene ti , me nyetsima ma bubwo mu beenu-banso , bukuri me nyalusuusa mu mutima waami . Ti hayuku me nyiri mu boroko , nyiri mu kukalala nyutu , na nyiri mu kusyaamisa Musamu Wamubwete , lo beenu-banso luri kintwaari mu bweese bwa me .
50001008	Mukwongo , Nzaambi mbaangi yaami , me nyilutiiri beenu-banso kwalaka mu lusaambu lwa Kiristo Yesu .
50001009	Di nyiri mu kwesaambikila me diri ti : ntiilu yeenu yihamisa kubvuriri mu nyaabulu yangwanwa , na mu mbakululu yoyinso ,
50001010	mu kuyaaba kusobokoso miri mufunu . Mu bubwo beenu luba batsyeemeke , na kuhele kuba na mi baluseembele mu kiluumbu kya Kiristo ,
50001011	na luba lwaluula mu biyiriki bya nsungumunu bifumunaana mu Yesu Kiristo , mu nkeembu na ndumusu bya Nzaambi .
50001012	Bampaangi , me ntiiri ti beenu luyaaba ti : mimyo mitariri me , myadziburi nzila kuri ti Musamu Wamubwete keende ku mankula .
50001013	Mu didyo , boroko dya me mu Kiristo , diri dyayabakana kuri bobanso mu nzo yoyinso ya miyalu , na mu bibeendu byakaka byobinso ,
50001014	na balaka mu bampaangi , ba mwaasiila nsiitu mu Mfumu , mu ntoono boroko dya me , na babweese kubaka kibakala mu kuyikisa maampu kwahele boomo .
50001015	Bamosi bari mu kweyaabisila Kiristo mu bukwa na mu nkalikisi , ngo bakaka mu mutima-bubwete .
50001016	Babamosi mu ntiilu , bu bayaari kuri ti , mu ntoono ya kukalila Musamu Wamubwete me nyiri mu boroko ,
50001017	ngo bakaka kweyaabisila Kiristo mu nkalikisi , kwahele kuba na mu mutima watsyeemeke ; bo batiiri kuhamisa mpasi dza me mu boroko .
50001018	Mukwongo nki ? Kiteesu bwooso kibeele , ti kiba mu kumana mafuumbu , ti kiba mu ngwanwa , lo ngo bukuri Kiristo bari mu kwemuyabikisa , na mu didyo me nyiri na kiminu . Kasi me sa mbweese kuba na kiminu ,
50001019	bukuri me nyaari ti mimyo sa myatwaala mvuukulu kuri me , mu ntoono lusaambulu lwa beenu na lubakusu lwa Mpeeve ya Yesu Kiristo .
50001020	Bunu buri ma nyiri mu kwekiinga , na ma nyiri nyasiila nsiitu , me ka nyiba na nsoni mu ntoono ti mosi ko . Ngo kasi mu nsiitu dzodzinso , bunu mu mpisi ntaangu na mu lumalu , Kiristo sa kaba wakeembese mu nyutu yaami , mu kidziingu kyaami bunu pe mu lufwa lwaami .
50001021	Bukuri ku nyiri me , kuba mwooyo ngo Kiristo , na kufwa ngo ndaandu .
50001022	Ngo mbuti kuba mwooyo mu muswinyi , diri ndaandu mu kisalu ku nyiri me , lo nki me nyisoolo ? Nyahele kuyaaba .
50001023	Me nyiri mu kudunga ha kakati dya manzala mo moolo : me nyiri na nzala kweende , na kuba na Kiristo , bukuri bubwo bubvuriri bubwete ;
50001024	ngo kuba mwooyo mu muswinyi , bubvuriri mufunu mu ntoono beenu .
50001025	Didyo ngo diri me mwaabakula , me nyaari ti sa nyaba mwooyo na sa nzakala na beenu-banso , mu ntoono yiri ti beenu lubuuka , na lumono kiminu mu kanyi dyeenu ,
50001026	mpisi heki , kimweese kya beenu mu me , kihamisa mu Kiristo Yesu , mu ntoono yiri ti me nyibweese kuba ha kakati dya beenu .
50001027	Beenu ngo bari dyaatileenu mu kiteesu kyayelemene na Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , mpisi heki , ti hayuku me nyiisiri kulumono , bunu pe nyahele kuba na beenu , me nyuka ti beenu luri na keketee mu mpeeve yomosi , na luri mu kwenwaana mu kitsimi kyokimosi , mu ntoono kanyi mu Musamu Wamubwete ,
50001028	kwahele kubata bataatu mu ntoono ti mosi . Kuri bo kikyo ngo kidiimbu kya nzimbukulu , ngo kuri beenu kya mvuukulu , na mimyo mifuminaa kuri Nzaambi .
50001029	Bukuri beenu baluha bweese mu ntoono Kiristo , kari munu mu kusiila kanyi mu nde ko , ngo na mu kumono mpasi se mu ntoono nde ,
50001030	mu kwenwaana kikiindu kyokimosi ki luri lwamono mu me , na ki luri mu kweyuka natee lumalu ti me nyiri mu kwenwaana .
50002001	Ngo mbuti kuri nsyamusunu mu Kiristo , mbuti kuri mboondulu mu ntiilu , mbuti kuri kintwaari mu Mpeeve , mbuti kuri lusaambu na ngebe ,
50002002	lo kukiseenu kiminu kya me , mu kuba ndyaatulu mosi , ntiilu mosi , mutima mosi , kitsimi kimosi , na kuba na kintwaari .
50002003	Yaa lwesalila kunsa nwaanusunu ko , bunu pe mu nzala-kubila yabuunu ko , ngo kasi mu nkulukulu , holulee bambaasi bunu ti bo babvuriri na beenu .
50002004	Mpisi muutu mu beenu yaa kasaka ndaandu yini ya nde-meene ko , ngo kasaka se ndaandu ya bambaasi .
50002005	Dyaatileenu bubwo ha kakati dya beenu , bunu bwayelemene mu Kiristo Yesu .
50002006	Nde wuri bu kaba mu kinzeri kya Nzaambi , kasii saka kuba nsiisa na Nzaambi ko .
50002007	Ngo nde-meene wasokomono nyutu yaandi , waholo kinzeri kya nkutu , mu kufwanikina na baatu , na mu nzelu yaandi wamonoko bunu muutu .
50002008	Nde wakuluka nde-meene , mu kuba watumuma natee mu lufwa , lufwa lwa ha yulu kuruwa .
50002009	Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi kari kamudzaangisa , na kamuha nkuumbu yibvuriri na mankuumbu momanso ,
50002010	mpisi heki mu nkuumbu ya Yesu , maboongo momanso matsukuma , ku yulu , ha butoto , na ku nsuku butoto ,
50002011	na ndima dzodzinso dzileele ti Yesu Kiristo ngo Mfumu , mu nkeembu ya Taayi Nzaambi .
50002012	Mu didyo , banduku baami ba mutima , bunu bu lukootumumaa mu mpisi ntaangu , kari hani ha busu bwa me ko , ngo mu lumalu , bvulee kutumuma , me bu nyiri nde pe . Salilee mu kibvumi na mu ntekutulu , mu kubaka mvuukulu ya beenu-meene ,
50002013	bukuri Nzaambi koosalaa mu beenu , na kusa kuri ti , lutya na lusala bunu buri kutya kwaandi kwakubwete .
50002014	Yirikee momanso kwahele kwemunguta na kwahele nkalikisi ,
50002015	mpisi luhele kuba na mi baluseembele , luhele kuba na kinsaangi-nsobo , luba baala ba Nzaambi bahele na mi babaseembele , ha kakati dya kiseendu kya baatu bawumuka na bababi . Ha kakati dya baatu babo , beenu luri mu kweseme bunu byuufu bya mbaawu mu nsi ,
50002016	bu luri lwakaangama mu maampu ma mwooyo . Mu mimyo me nyiba na kimweese mu kiluumbu kya Kiristo , bukuri me nyasii kudzumuna kwa buunu ko , na nyasii mono mpasi kwa buunu ko .
50002017	Ngo ti hayuku makila ma me bamayitiri ha yulu kikabu kya kuha kuri Nzaambi , mu kisalu kya kanyi dya beenu , lo me nyimono kiminu , nyimono kiminu ha kimosi na beenu-banso .
50002018	Bwobumosi beenu se monee kiminu , monee kiminu ha kimosi na me .
50002019	Me nyiri nsiitu mu Mfumu Yesu , ti sa nyaluheeke Timoteho mu mawasu , mpisi heki me se mba nyasyaamusu , mu mampolo ma nyitaambula mu ntoono beenu .
50002020	Mukwongo , me nyahele na muutu mukimi ha yulu nde , wuri bitsimi byobimosi na me , wutsiminaa misamu mitariri beenu mu ngwanwa .
50002021	Bobanso kwenama misamu mini mya bo-meene , nkani ka mya Yesu Kiristo ko .
50002022	Ngo beenu luyaari ma kari kayirika nde : bunu bu buyirikaa mwaana kuri taayi , nde wasala kintwaari na me mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete .
50002023	Nde me nyitsima kuheeke kuri beenu , me manaa kumono na pwelelee bunu bulutila misamu mitariri me .
50002024	Me nyiri na nsiitu mu Mfumu ti , me-meene sa nyiisa mu mawasu .
50002025	Ngo me nyamwii ti diri mufunu , mu kubvutula Epaforodito kuri beenu , mpaangi na mbaasi yaami ya kisalu na ya binwaanunu , ntumu yi lwampeekiri mu kumbakisa ,
50002026	bukuri nde wuri na nzala beenu yalaka , na wuri mu kubamaa , bukuri beenu lwayukiri ti nde wabee wabeele .
50002027	Mukwongo , nde wabee wabeele , na ha ntele hasiiri nkani wafwiiri , ngo kasi Nzaambi wamubakiri ngebe , kari wunu nde ko , ngo na me se , mpisi heki me mpele kuba na kyaari ha yulu kyaari .
50002028	Ngo me nyeki hebele mu kumuheeke kuri beenu , mpisi heki bu lumumwiini , beenu lubweese kumono kiminu , na me mba na kyaari kyantele .
50002029	Ngo mutaambulee mu kiminu kyokinso mu Mfumu , na beenee na lukiinsu mu baatu ba bubwo ,
50002030	bukuri mu kisalu kya Kiristo , nde kakokosirye bebele na lufwa , na kakotisirye kidziingu kyaandi mu mpasi , mpisi kasalila me , ha kibeendu kya beenu .
50003001	Mu misiiri ngo miri , bampaangi baami , monee kiminu mu Mfumu . Me nyahele kuholo-bito mu kulutinina misamu myomimosi mimyo , miha nsiitu kuri beenu .
50003002	Seenee madyeele mu bambwa , seenee madyeele mu bisari byabibi , seenee madyeele mu nteendulu bubakala yampya .
50003003	Mukwongo , bateende bubakala ngo beetuneenu , tusaambilaa mu Mpeeve ya Nzaambi , tumonaa kimweese mu Kiristo Yesu , na tuhelaa kusiila nsiitu mu muswinyi ,
50003004	ti bukuri me-meene nyasiila nsiitu se mu muswiini . Mbuti muutu mukimi wutsima ti wasa nsiitu mu muswinyi , lo me mvuriri na nde .
50003005	Me banteendiri bubakala kiluumbu kya mpoomo , nyiri mu kitsuumbu kya Isaheli , mu kaanda dya Benyamini , Muhebeleho wabutuka mu Bahebeleho . Mu mitariri mangisi , me Mufarisi ,
50003006	mu kifiki , me mukwaamisi dibuundu , mu mitariri nsungumunu mu mangisi , me nyiri na mi banseembele ko .
50003007	Kasi bibyo byaba ndaandu kuri me , me nyamono kuri ti byafuukila , mu ntoono Kiristo .
50003008	Ngo kasi nyimono se ti byobinso byafuukila , ha busu bwa nyaabulu yibvuriri bunene mu Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yaami . Mu ntoono nde , byobinso bi nyaba na byo nyamana kubibwoongolo , na me nyibimono bunu bitiiti byaloosu , mpisi heki me mbaka Kiristo ,
50003009	na bamwiinina me mu nde , kuri nyahele na nsungumunu ya me-meene , yiri kubakila kari mu mangisi ko , ngo yiri kubakila mu kanyi mu Kiristo , yifumunaa kuri Nzaambi , yatuunguma ha yulu kanyi .
50003010	Me ntii kuyaaba nde , na kuyaaba mpinu dza mfulukulu yaandi , na kuba kintwaari mu mpasi dzaandi , mu kunama kifwaani kya nde mu lufwa lwaandi ,
50003011	mbuti bwakuka ti me se ntubuka mu mfulukulu ya bafwa .
50003012	Pele , me nyahele kuleele ti mwaabakila bunu pe mwaatubuka ha ndilu , ngo nyiri mu kudzumuna mu nsiitu ya kwekwaata , bukuri me se Kiristo Yesu wayeki wankwaata .
50003013	Bampaangi , me-meene ngo wuri nyitsima ti nyakiri kukwaata pe ; ngo musamu mosi me mbinikini : kudzimikina myominso miri ku mambisa , mu kunama miri ku mankula ,
50003014	nyiri mu kudzumuna mu kutubuka ha ndilu , mu kubaka kimbwanga kya mbila ya ku yulu , ya Nzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu .
50003015	Ngo beetu-banso bu turi baatu bayirima , tubeenee na mbeelu ya bubwo ; na mbuti luri mu kiteesu kya mbeelu yikimi , lo Nzaambi sa kaluyaabisa dyo .
50003016	Ngo mu ha tumwaatubukee hamaha , tudyaatilee ha kimosi .
50003017	Bampaangi , beenee bakwesombosolo me , talee bakwedyaatila mu kifwaani ki luri mu kumono mu beetu .
50003018	Mukwongo , bunu bu nyaba kweluleelaana mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu , na mu lumalu se nyiluleele kunsa kidilu ti , balaka bakwedyaatila mu butaatu bwa kuruwa dya Kiristo .
50003019	Nsukulu bo ngo mfuukulu , Nzaambi bo ngo mwooyo waaku , na nkeembu bo kumwiina kunsa mya nsoni myaaku , bo bakwenama mya nsi .
50003020	Mukwongo , bula bweetu ngo mayulu , kukwo kuri Mubvuukisi wu turi mu kwekiinga , Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
50003021	Nde mbasi-tsuku wukitula nyutu yeetu ya manyoongi , kuri yiba bunu buri nyutu ya nde ya nkeembu , bunu buri mpinu dzi kari na dzo , mu kusuusa byobinso kunsa lutumu lwaandi .
50004001	Mu didyo , bampaangi baami ba mutima , ba ntiiri kwalaka , beenu luri kiminu kyaami na lukoongolo lwaami ; ngo banduku ba mutima , beenee na keketee mu Mfumu .
50004002	Me nyisyaamisa Evodya na Sintike mu kuba na nyukusunu mu Mfumu .
50004003	Heehe , me nyiloombo kuri ye se , mbaasi yaami ya kisalu ya ngwanwa ti , bakisa bakyeetu babo , bo banweeni kintwaari na me , mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , kintwaari se na Kelema na bambaasi ba me bakaka ba kisalu , bari mankuumbu mari mu mukaanda wa mwooyo .
50004004	Monee kiminu mu Mfumu mu mpisi ntaangu ; me nyibweese kuleele , monee kiminu .
50004005	Hemesee bundeembu bweenu buba bwayabakana kuri baatu bobanso . Mfumu weki bebele .
50004006	Yaa luba na boomo mu ntoono ti mosi ko ; ngo mu myominso , hemesee ndoombulu dzeenu dziba dzayabakana kuri Nzaambi , mu nsaambulu , mu nyingukulu na mu mvutukulu matoondo .
50004007	Tumi kiyeengi kya Nzaambi kibvuriri na madyeele momanso , sa kyakebe mitima myeenu , na bitsimi byeenu mu Kiristo Yesu .
50004008	Mu misiiri ngo miri bampaangi , myominso miri myangwanwa , myominso myalukiinsu , myominso myasuunguma , myominso myatsyeemeke , myominso mi batiiri , myominso myamibwe mu kuleele , na mbuti kuri manzelu mamabwete , na myayelemene kusiika , lo tsiminee myominso mimyo .
50004009	Mamo ma luri lwayika , ma luri lwataambula , ma luri lwayuka , na ma luri lwamono kuri me , salilee mo ; tumi Nzaambi ya kiyeengi kaba na beenu .
50004010	Me nyamwiini kiminu kyalaka mu Mfumu , bu lwabweesiri kutsimina me lolo di . Lwaba kwaandi na kitsimi , ngo mpwaani yaba yo pe .
50004011	Kari mu nzala kubaka ko me nyileele bubwo , ngo bukuri me nyayika kuba mu kiminu , kunsa biteesu byobinso bi nyiri .
50004012	Me nyaari kuba kunsa buwelu , na nyaari kuba se kunsa byabuukula ; mu byobinso na mu myominso , me bansaatsa mu kuba wayukuta na mu kukolo nzala , kuba kunsa byabuukula na kuba na nzala kubaka .
50004013	Me lo nyakuka mu myominso , mu wunde wumpaana makwa .
50004014	Ngo beenu lwayirikiri mamabwe , mu kukabula mpasi dza me .
50004015	Beenu bari Filipo luyaari se ti , mu mbandukulu Musamu Wamubwete , me manaa kupala mu nsi ya Makedonya , kwasii ba dibuundu ti dimosi ko , dyatolo mboongo na dyapalisa mboongo mu me , mbuti ka beenu kitsu ko .
50004016	Bukuri bu nyaba nyakiri ku Tesalonika , beenu lwampeeke lubakusu , mbala mosi bunu pe dzoolo .
50004017	Kari kuri ti me nyisaka bi bankabula ko , ngo me nyisaka kuri ti ndaandu yiba yabuukula kuri beenu .
50004018	Me nyataambula byobinso , na nyiri na byabuukula , me nyaluula bu nyataamburi bi lwampeekiri kuri Epaforodito , biri bunu mananaasi ma mfuku yayibwete , kikabu kya kudzusa kyataambulu na kyabweeye kuri Nzaambi .
50004019	Nzaambi yaami sa kayukitisa manzala meenu momanso , bunu buri busina bwaandi kunsa nkeembu mu Kiristo Yesu .
50004020	Nkeembu kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dyeetu mu bibvu ngo bibvu . Amene .
50004021	Henee mboto kuri mpisi wangisi mu Kiristo Yesu . Bampaangi bari na me baluheekiri mamboto .
50004022	Bangisi bobanso baluheekiri mamboto , bvulu-bvulu ba mu nzo Kayisari .
50004023	Bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu .
51001001	Me Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , na Timoteho mpaangi ,
51001002	kuri bampaangi bangisi na bakwiikama mu Kiristo , bari ku Kolosayi , bweese na kiyeengi kuri beenu bifumunaa kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi biba na beenu .
51001003	Beetu tubvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , bu tusaambilaa mu beenu mantaangu momanso .
51001004	Beetu twayukiri badzoonsolo mu kanyi di luri na dyo mu Kiristo Yesu , na mu ntiilu yi luri na yo mu bangisi bobanso ,
51001005	mu ntoono nsiitu yibari balusweekele mu mayulu , yi luri lwatekesele kuyuka , mu maampu mangwanwa ma Musamu Wamubwete .
51001006	Musamu meene watubuka natee kuri beenu , bwobumosi se kari mu nsi yansiina , wuri mu kwebuta bimbutu na wuri mu kwebuuka ; bunubwo se kari mu kwesala mu beenu , kuholosono kiluumbu ki luri lwayuka , na ki luri lwabakula bweese bwa Nzaambi kunsa ngwanwa .
51001007	Epafara , nduku yeetu ya kisalu ya Mutima , bunubwo se kari kaluyikisa , nde wuri kuri beenu kisari kyakwiikama kya Kiristo .
51001008	Nde wamonikisi kuri beetu , ntiilu yaluha Mpeeve .
51001009	Mu didyo se beetu , kuholosono kiluumbu kitwayukiri mamo , twahele kuhoto kusaambila mu beenu , na kuloombo kuri ti , luba lwaluula mu nyaabulu ya kutya kwaandi , mu madyeele momanso na mbakukulu ya kimpeeve ,
51001010	kuri ti beenu lwedyaatila mu nzelu yayelemene mu Mfumu , mu kubweeye kuri mu myominso , mu kubuta bimbutu mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete , na kubuuka mu nyaabulu ya Nzaambi .
51001011	Mu bubwo beenu luba na mpinu mu myominso bunu buri makwa ma nkeembu yaandi , mu kuba na kifiki na kukiindisa mutima mu myominso . Mu kiminu ,
51001012	bvutuleenu matoondo kuri Taata , wasa kuri ti luba bakuka mu kutaambula kikuuku kya saala dya bangisi kunsa buungi .
51001013	Nde watupalisa mu lutumu lwa mampimbisi , na watunata mu Kimfumu kya Mwaana wa ntiilu yaandi .
51001014	Mu nde , beetu turi na nkuululu na mpemisi ya masumu .
51001015	Kiristo ngo kidzisi kya Nzaambi wuri bamumonaa ko . Nde ngo watete wabutuka mu biyiriki byobinso ,
51001016	bukuri mu nde , bitotolo byobinso bari babiyirikila , mu mayulu na ha butoto , bi bamonaa na biri bamonaa ko , ti mamboloko , ti bumbyaasi , ti bimfumu , ti lutumu . Bitotolo byobinso mu nde , na mu ntoono nde , bari babiyirikila .
51001017	Tekesele byobinso biba , lo nde wuri , na bitotolo byobinso biri na kidziingu mu nde .
51001018	Nde ngo mutu nyutu , nyutu ngo dibuundu . Nde wuri mbandukulu , watete wafuluka mu bafwa , mpisi heki mu byobinso nde kaba watete .
51001019	Bukuri Nzaambi watiiri kudzakisa nduululu yoyinso ya kinzaambi kyaandi mu nde ,
51001020	na mu kasa nyukusunu ya bitotolo byobinso mu nde , na mu ntoono nde . Nde wasa kiyeengi ha kakati dya bitotolo biri ha butoto na biri ku mayulu , mu makila ma mwaana waandi ha lukuruwa .
51001021	Beenu se mu ntaangu yaluta , lwaba banzeense na bataatu mu bitsimi , mu ntoono biyiriki byabibi .
