51001022	Kasi mu lumalu , Nzaambi wasa nyukusunu mu lufwa lwa mwaana waandi mu nyutu ya muswinyi , mpisi kalumonokoso bangisi , bahele mi babaseembele , na bahele na mi babafuundila , ha busu bwaandi .
51001023	Ngo luyelemini kunamitina kuba batuunguma , na kuba na keketee mu kanyi , kwahele kusasika mu nsiitu ya Musamu Wamubwete wu luri lwayuka , wu bari bayaabisa kuri biyiriki byobinso ha butoto , na wu nyayeki me Pawulo kisari .
51001024	Mu lumalu , me nyimono kiminu , kunsa mpasi mu ntoono beenu , na me nyiri mu kukukisa mpasi dza mbamunu Kiristo , mu muswinyi waami , mu ntoono nyutu yaandi , ngo dibuundu .
51001025	Mu dyo , me nyayeki kisari , bunu buri bitsimi bya Nzaambi , bikari kaha kuri me , mu ntoono beenu , mu kukukisa maampu ma Nzaambi ,
51001026	mpaanu dza Nzaambi dzaba dzasweeku , kuholosono mu mibvu na mu biseendu , dzeki dzayabakana mu lumalu kuri bangisi baandi .
51001027	Kuri bo , Nzaambi katiiri kuyaabisa , ha kakati dya makaanda , bunu buri busina bwa nkeembu ya mpaanu yimayi . Mpaanu yiyo ngo Kiristo mu beenu , nsiitu ya nkeembu .
51001028	Nde beetu turi mu kweyaabisa , mu kulubula mpisi muutu , na kuyikisa mpisi muutu , mu madyeele momanso , mpisi muutu kaba nyirimunu yakuka mu Kiristo .
51001029	Mu bubwo se , me nyiri mu kubama , mu kwenwaana bunu buri makwa maandi , mari mu kwesala mu me , mu mpinu .
51002001	Mukwongo , me ntiiri ti beenu luyaaba , nkya mudziingu me nyiri mu kwenwaana , mu ntoono beenu , mu ntoono bari ku Lahodikya , na mu ntoono babo bakiri kidziri kya me kumono pe mu muswinyi .
51002002	Me ntiiri ti mitima mya bo miba myasyaamusu , baba babvuutuna mu kintwaari kunsa ntiilu , na mu kubaka busina bwobunso bwa nduululu ya madyeele , mu nyaabulu mpaanu dza Nzaambi , ngo Kiristo ,
51002003	mu nde mwaswekeme busina bwobunso bwa madyeele , na bwa nyaabulu .
51002004	Me nyiri mu kuleele mamo , mpisi heki muutu kahele kaluwumuna mu nzoonsulu dza lupyelu .
51002005	Mukwongo , mbuti heki mu nyutu ya muswinyi me nyahele kuba na beenu , ngo mu kimpeeve nyiri kintwaari na beenu , lo me nyimono kiminu , mu kumono ti beenu luri na bunkete , na luri babukekete mu kanyi dyeenu mu Kiristo .
51002006	Ngo bu lwayeki lwataambula Kiristo Yesu Mfumu , dyaatilee mu nde ,
51002007	bu lwayeki lwamene myaansi , lwatuungu mu nde , na lwasyaamusu mu kanyi , bunu bu bari baluyikisa , bvutuleenu matoondo ha yulu matoondo .
51002008	Seenee madyeele , muutu mu beenu kahele kubwa mu mweete wa madyeele ma nzoonsulu , na mu mawunu mabuunu , bunu buri kikulu kya baatu , na bunu buri bitotolo bya nsi , byahele kuba mu Kiristo .
51002009	Bukuri mu nyutu ya nde , mwadzakala nduululu yoyinso ya kinzaambi ,
51002010	na mu nde beenu lwayeki lwaluula mu byobinso , nde wuri Mfumu ha yulu bobanso bari na kimfumu na bari na lutumu .
51002011	Mu nde se , beenu bari baluteende bubakala , mu nteendulu yahele kuba ya myooko mya baatu , ya nyubukulu nyutu ya muswinyi , ngo mu nteendulu ya Kiristo .
51002012	Beenu baludziikiri mu mampeembe kintwaari na nde , mu mbotokulu ; mu nde se , beenu bari balufukisa mu kanyi , mu mpinu dza Nzaambi wamufulukisi mu bafwa .
51002013	Beenu lwaba lwafwa mu ntoono lumvuki lweenu , na bukuri lwaba lwahele bateende bubakala mu muswinyi weenu , ngo Nzaambi walusa bamwooyo kintwaari na Kiristo , mu kuluhemesene lumvuki lweenu lwolunso .
51002014	Nde wayaala mukaanda wamubi wa mfuundulu bunu buri mangisi , wayisila nde mu kumukomono ha kuruwa .
51002015	Bu kasyoonono kimfumu kya bakuutu na batumi , wabayanika mu kuba basaana ha busu bwa baatu , wabakoko bunu maboroko kunsa ndulukulu yaandi .
51002016	Ngo yaa kuba na muutu wulutsuundisa mu ntoono byandya na nwiinunu ko , bunu pe mu ntoono munkeembu , bunu pe mu ntoono ngoondo yamoono , bunu pe mu ntoono kiluumbu kya mpuumunu .
51002017	Byobinso bibyo kini kifwaani kya bitotolo bikwiisa ku mankula ; ngo byangwanwa biri mu Kiristo .
51002018	Yaa lutala ko ti babo bakwemono kiminu mu kiteesu kya nkulukulu , na mu kwesaambila bambasi , baluwuungula . Bo bakwekengese bitotolo kwa buunu , na bakwesiika mu bitsimi bya kimuutu kyaaku .
51002019	Bo bahele kukaangama na mutu , bwakaangama nyutu yoyinso , mu biyikulu na misiinga mya nyutu , kuri nyutu yikwebuuka mu mbuukulu yifumunaa kuri Nzaambi .
51002020	Mbuti beenu lufwa na Kiristo mu mya nsi , dyaburi beenu luri mu kwetumuma mu mya nsi bunu ti beenu luri mwooyo mu mya nsi ?
51002021	" Yaa holo , yaa biimba , na yaa belemene ko ,
51002022	byobinso bibyo bikoofuuka mu kubisalila , bunu buri mangisi na nyikusulu dza baatu .
51002023	Byobinso bibyo bisoongo madyeele mu nsambukulu , mu nkulukulu , na nkwamusunu nyutu ; koomosoko byahele na ndaandu , ti hayuku biyukitisaa muswinyi .
51003001	Mbuti beenu lwafulukusu na Kiristo , lo sakeenu bya ku yulu , kukwo kwadzakala Kiristo ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi .
51003002	Bvuleenu kusaka bya ku yulu , nkani ka bya ha butoto ko .
51003003	Bukuri beenu lwafwa , na kidziingu kyeenu kyasweeku kintwaari na Kiristo mu Nzaambi .
51003004	Mu ntaangu mbasi-tsuku yi monokono Kiristo , nde wuri kidziingu kyeenu , beenu se kintwaari na nde sa lwamonokono mu nkeembu .
51003005	Ngo hoteenu kusalila bifu bya nsi : buyala , nsumukunu , mantiilu mamabi , nyiimunu dzadzibi , na ntiki-mboongo yiri nsambukulu-biteki .
51003006	Mu ntoono mimyo , nkesi dza Nzaambi dzibwaanaa ha yulu baala ba tungu .
51003007	Beenu se mu ntaangu yayikulu , lwaba kwedyatilaana mu bifu bibyo , bu lwaba mwooyo mu byo .
51003008	Ngo mu lumalu , bwoongoleenu byobinso bibyo : nkesi , kituunsi , mutima-bubi , bitari , dzoonsolo dza nsoni mu minwa myeenu .
51003009	Yaa lwesilisina mpya ko beenu na beenu , bu lwayeki lwapala mu muutu wa mukulu , na mu biyiriki byaandi ,
51003010	na bu lwayeki lwalwaata muutu wamoono , wubweese kukituka wamoono , mu kubaka nyaabulu mu kifwaani kya wamuyirika .
51003011	Mu didyo , kwasaala Muhelene na Muyudayo ko , wateendu bubakala na wahele kuteende bubakala ko , munzeense , Musikite , nkutu , muutu wuri bunsaalisi ko ; ngo Kiristo wuri byobinso na wuri mu bobanso .
51003012	Ngo bu luri lwasoolu kuri Nzaambi , luri bangisi , na lwatya kuri nde , beeneenu na mutima wa ngebe , wa mbweeyulu , wa nkulukulu , wa bundeembu na wa nkindusulu .
51003013	Yendeenu lwekuunda bambaasi beenu na beenu , na kwehemesene beenu na beenu . Mbuti mosi mu beenu wuri na mwaa munyoongi mu mbaasi , lo bunu bwaluhemesene Mfumu , beenu se seenee bubwo .
51003014	Ha yulu momanso mamo , salilee ntiilu ngo musiinga wa nyirimunu yakuka .
51003015	Hemese kiyeengi kya Kiristo , ki bari baluteelele mbila mu nyutu mosi , kituma mitima mya beenu . Beeneenu bayaari kubvutula matoondo .
51003016	Hemese maampu ma Kiristo madzakala mu beenu mu busina . Mu madyeele momanso , yikisineenu na lubusineenu beenu na beenu , mu mikuunga mya ndoombulu , mya ndumusu na mya kimpeeve . Yimbikilee Nzaambi mikuunga mya matoondo mu mitima myeenu .
51003017	Na momanso ma lutsiitsa kuyirika mu nzoonsulu , bunu pe mu biyiriki , yirikilee momanso mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu , mu mvutukulu matoondo mu nde , kuri Taata Nzaambi .
51003018	Bakasi , beenee batumuma kuri balumi beenu , bunu bwayelemene mu Mfumu .
51003019	Balumi , tyeenee bakasi beenu , na yaa lwebanyokono ko .
51003020	Baala , tambukilee mu momanso kuri bataayi na banguri beenu , bukuri buri bwabubwete mu Mfumu .
51003021	Bataayi , yaa lwebakisa baala beenu nkesi ko , mpisi bahele kuholo-bito .
51003022	Bankutu , tambukilee mu momanso , kuri bamfumu beenu ba muswinyi , kari hani ha busu bwa bo ko , mu nzala kubweeye kuri baatu , ngo mu nkulukulu na mu kibvumi kya Mfumu .
51003023	Mamo ma lutsiitsa kuyirika , yirikilee mo mu mutima wamutsiina , bunu ti kuri Mfumu , nkani ka kuri baatu ko ,
51003024	bu luyaari ti , sa lwataambula kuri Mfumu museendu ngo saala . Beenee bakwesalila Mfumu Kiristo .
51003025	Mukwongo , wunde wusalila bubayi sa kataambula mamo ma kari kayirika ma bubayi ; ka kuba munsoori mu baatu ko .
51004001	Bamfumu , yirikeenu kuri bankutu beenu ma suunguma na mayelemene , bu luyaari ti beenu se luri na Mfumu ku mayulu .
51004002	Syaamee mu lusaambulu , beenee naana mu lwo , mu mvutukulu matoondo .
51004003	Mu ntaangu yo yimosi , saambilee se na mu beetu , mpisi heki Nzaambi katuha mpwaani ya kuyikisa maampu , na kuyaabisa mpaanu dza Kiristo , bukuri mu ntoono mpaanu dzidzo me nyiri mu boroko .
51004004	Saambilee mpisi heki me mbaangula mpaanu dzidzo , bunu bunyelemini kuyikisa .
51004005	Dyaatilee mu madyeele ha busu bwa baatu ba ku mbasi ; salilee ntaangu .
51004006	Ma lukwedzoonso beenu maba ma bweese mu mantaangu momanso , matwa mungwa , mu kuyaaba bunu bwayelemene kuha mvutu kuri mpisi muutu .
51004007	Mu misamu mitariri me , Tikiko sa kaluyaabisa , nde wuri mpaangi ya mutima , kisari kyakwiikama na mbaasi ya kisalu mu Mfumu .
51004008	Me nyamuheekiri kuri beenu mu ntoono yiyo , mpisi heki beenu luyaaba misamu mitariri beetu , na kasyaamisa mitima myeenu .
51004009	Nde bo na Onesimo , mpaangi yakwiikama na ya mutima , wuri mosi mu beenu , sa baluyaabisa misamu myominso miri kumaku .
51004010	Aristarako , mbaasi yaami yi turi mu boroko , wuluheekiri mboto . Malako , mpaangi Barnaba , nde se wuluheekiri mboto . Mu ntoono ya nde , beenu lwataamburi ntumunu ; mbuti wiisiri kuri beenu , lo mutaambuleenu .
51004011	Yesu , wubateelaa ti Yusto , nde se wuluheekiri mboto . Mu bateende bubakala , banabo kitsu bakwesala kintwaari na me mu ntoono Kimfumu kya Nzaambi ; bo ngo babeeri mboondulu ku nyiri me .
51004012	Epafara , wa beenu-meene wuluheekiri mboto . Nde nkutu Kiristo Yesu , wukwelunwanikina mpisi ntaangu mu nsaambulu , mpisi heki beenu luteleme nangwii , luba bakuka mu kuyirika momanso matiiri Nzaambi .
51004013	Mukwongo , me nyimuteele kimbaangi ti , nde wuri mu kwebama kwalaka mu ntoono beenu , na mu bari ku Lahodikya , na mu bari ku Yerapoli .
51004014	Luka , mubuki-babeeru , nduku yeetu ya mutima , bo na Dema baluheekiri mboto .
51004015	Henee mamboto , kuri bampaangi ba ku Lahodikya , kuri Nimfa na kuri dibuundu dikutukunaa mu nzo nde .
51004016	Bu lumeeni kutaanga mukaanda wumawu , lo seenee kuri ti kaba wataangu se kuri dibuundu dya bari ku Lahodikya ; na mukaanda wa bari ku Lahodikya beenu se lumutaanga .
51004017	Leeleenu kuri Arkipo ti : Sa madyeele mu kisalu ki wuri wataambula mu Mfumu , mpisi sala kyo kwakubwete .
51004018	Taambuleenu mboto ya mu kooko kwa me-meene Pawulo . Baambukeenu mwooyo ti me nyiri mu boroko . Bweese buba na beenu !
52001001	Pawulo , Silvano na Timoteho , kuri dibuundu dya Tesalonika , mu Taata Nzaambi na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo : bweese na kiyeengi biba na beenu .
52001002	Beetu tubvutulaana matoondo mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi , mu beenu-banso , na twahele kuhoto kuluyekelaana mu nsaambulu dzeetu .
52001003	Beetu tubaambukaana mwooyo mu biyiriki bya kanyi dyeenu , mu kisalu kya ntiilu yeenu , na mu kifiki kya nsiitu dzeenu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi .
52001004	Bampaangi batya kuri Nzaambi , beetu tuyaari nsoolulu yeenu .
52001005	Mukwongo , Musamu beetu Wamubwete wahele kutubuka kuri beenu , munu mu nzoonsulu kitsu , ngo se mu mpinu , mu Mpeeve Yangisi na mu nyukusulu ya musundu , bunu bu luyaari bu twaba beetu ha kakati dya beenu , mu ntoono beenu .
52001006	Na beenu lwayeki minsombisiri mya beetu na mya Mfumu , bu lwataamburi Maampu kunsa mpasi dzalaka , mu kiminu kya Mpeeve Yangisi .
52001007	Mu didyo , beenu lwayeki kifwaani kuri bobanso basiila kanyi , bari ku Makedonya na bari ku Akaya .
52001008	Bukuri , kuholosono kuri beenu , kari mani Maampu ma Mfumu mayukukuna , mu Makedonya na mu Akaya ko , ngo kanyi dyeenu mu Nzaambi se dyayabakana mwomunso , kuri lo beetu twahele kubweese kwaandi ti kudidzonsolo .
52001009	Bukuri bobanso bakwedzoonsolo mu beetu , mu ntambukulu yi lwatutaamburi ha twayisiri kuri beenu , na bunu bu luri lwasiisila beenu biteki na kusyeeteke kuri Nzaambi , mu kusalila nde , Nzaambi ya mwooyo na ya ngwanwa ,
52001010	na mu kwekiingila Mwaana waandi wufumuna ku mayulu , wu kafulukisi mu bafwa , Yesu , nde wutukuula mu nkesi dzikwiisa .
52002001	Bampaangi , beenu-meene luyaari dyo ti nyisulu beetu kuri beenu yasiiri kuba yabuunu ko .
52002002	Bunu bu luyaari , beetu twamono mpasi na batubamisa ku Filipo , ngo Nzaambi yeetu watusyaamisa mu kuyikisa Musamu waandi Wamubwete kunsa nwaanusunu dzamakwa .
52002003	Mukwongo , nyikusulu dza beetu ka dziri dza nzimbusulu ko , dza nsumukunu bunu pe dza mawunu ko .
52002004	Ngo bukuri Nzaambi watufyongokini mu kutuyakisa Musamu Wamubwete , beetu tukweyikisa kari mu kubweeye ha busu bwa baatu ko , ngo ha busu bwa Nzaambi , nde wufyongokinaa mitima myeetu .
52002005	Bunu bu luyaari , beetu twasii salila mu nzoonsulu dza lupyelu ko , bunu pe mu buungu dya ntiki-mboongo ko , Nzaambi mbaangi .
52002006	Beetu twasiiri saka masiiku mafumuna kuri baatu ko , mafumuna kuri beenu , bunu pe kuri bakimi ko .
52002007	Twaba kwaandi lo twakuka mu kuri ti beenu lutubuungula , bu turi bantumu ba Kiristo , ngo kasi beetu twaba twaluula mu bundeembu ha kakati dya beenu , bunu musoombi wubuungulaana baala ba nde-meene .
52002008	Mu musoongo wu turi na nde mu beenu , beetu turi na kiminu mu kuluha , kari wunu Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi ko , ngo na kidziingu kya beetu-meene se , bukuri beenu luri bampaangi ba mutima .
52002009	Mukwongo , baambukeenu mwooyo , bampaangi , mu kisalu kya makwa na mpasi dza beetu : beetu twaluyikisa Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi , mu kwesala butsuku na mwiini , mpisi heki ti mosi mu beenu kahele kutubuungula .
52002010	Beenu luri bambaangi , Nzaambi se mbaangi : ndyaatulu beetu yaba yangisi , yasuunguma , na yahele maseembu ha busu bwa beenu basiila kanyi .
52002011	Beenu luyaari se ti , beetu twaba kuhololo mosi mosi mu beenu bunu bu hololaana taayi baala baandi .
52002012	Beetu twaba kweluboondaana , kwelusyaamisaana , na kweluyingukilaana mu kuba na ndyaatulu yitiiri Nzaambi , nde wuri mu kuluteele mu kimfumu na mu nkeembu yaandi .
52002013	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu tubvutulaana matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu , bukuri maampu ma Nzaambi ma luri lwayuka kuri beetu , beenu lwamataamburi , kari bunu maampu ma baatu ko , ngo bunu bu mari maampu ma Nzaambi ma ngwanwa , ma kwesala mu beenu basiilaana kanyi .
52002014	Mukwongo , bampaangi , beenu lweki minsombisiri mya mabuundu ma Nzaambi , mari mu nkoonsi ya Yudaya , masiila kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu , bukuri beenu se lwabamini kuri ba beenu-meene ba luri nsi mosi , mu misamu myomimosi mya bamini mabuundu mamo kuri Bayudayo .
52002015	Bo ngo baba dzusa Mfumu Yesu na babikiri , na bakwaamisini beetu . Bahele kubweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na bo ngo bataatu ba baatu bobanso .
52002016	Bakwetukabukisa kuyikisa bangooyi mpisi bahele kubvuuka . Mu didyo bo bari mu kukukisilaana kiteesu kya masumu maaku , mpisi ntaangu . Ngo ku manunu nkesi dza Nzaambi dzi mwaa kubatubukila .
52002017	Bampaangi , beetu ngo bari , bu twaba la na beenu mu mwaa ntaangu , mu manyutu nkani ka mu mitima ko , mu musoongo walaka wu twaba na nde , twabaka kitsimi kya makwa mu kuri ti tumoneenu mu miisu na miisu .
52002018	Mu didyo , beetu twaba na nzala kwiisa kuri beenu , mbiki ti me Pawulo , mbala mosi bunu pe dzoolo , ngo Satana watukabukisi .
52002019	Mukwongo , beenu luri nsiitu yeetu , kiminu kyeetu , bunu pe lukoongolo lweetu lwa ndulukulu , ha busu bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi .
52002020	Mukwongo , beenu luri nkeembu yeetu na kiminu kyeetu .
52003001	Hango , bu twakonini kukiingila , beetu twamono dyo ti bwabubwete mu kusaala beetu bakaka ku Atena ,
52003002	na kuheeke mpaangi yeetu Timoteho , nde wukwesala kintwaari na Nzaambi mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Kiristo , mu kulukumisa na kulusyaamisa mu kanyi dyeenu ,
52003003	mpisi heki muutu kahele kubwa mu ntoono manyoongi ma ntaangu yimayi . Mukwongo , beenu-meene luyaari ti mu bubwo turi mwooyo .
52003004	Mu ntaangu yi twaba twakiri kuri beenu , beetu twaba kwelulubulaana ti , bee batumonisini manyoongi ; ngo bunubwo se mimyo mi mwaakututubukila , na beenu luyaari .
52003005	Hango-nkuumbu , me nkoonaa kukiinga , ha nyaheekiri Timoteho mu kwiisa kuyaaba bunu buri kanyi dya beenu , mu kubata kuri ti Musindukiri kakwiisa kulusindukila na kisalu kya beetu kihele kuba kya buunu .
52003006	Ngo mu lumalu , Timoteho bu kabeeri kuri beenu mwaakwiisa bvutuka kuri beetu , na watuyaabisiri musamu wamubwete mu ntoono kanyi na ntiilu yeenu , na ti , beenu bunu luri lwakebe bitsimi byabibwete mu beetu , na luri na nzala beetu kumono , bunu bu turi na beetu se nzala kulumono .
52003007	Mu didyo , bampaangi , kunsa mpasi dzeetu na manyoongi meetu , beetu twabakiri mboondulu mu beenu mu ntoono kanyi dyeenu .
52003008	Ngo mu lumalu , beetu turi mwooyo bukuri beenu lwakwiikama mu Mfumu .
52003009	Nkya matoondo beetu tutsiitsa kubvutula kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono beenu , mu kiminu kyokinso ki turi mu kumono mu dyaambu dya beenu , ha busu bwa Nzaambi yeetu ?
52003010	Butsuku na mwiini , beetu turi mu kwesaambilaana kwalaka mpisi tubweese kulumono na kukukisila mari mu kuhele mu kanyi dyeenu .
52003011	Hemese Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi nde-meene na Mfumu yeetu Yesu batudzibukila nzila mu kwiisa kuri beenu .
52003012	Hemese Mfumu kabuukisa na kabweese ntiilu yi luri na yo beenu na beenu , na mu baatu bobanso , bunu bu tulutiiriri beetu seenee .
52003013	Hemese nde kakumisa mitima myeenu , mpisi heki beenu luba bangisi na bahele maseembu ha busu bwa Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , mu ntaangu ya nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu kintwaari na bangisi baandi bobanso . [ Amene ] .
52004001	Mu misiiri bampaangi , beetu tululoombo na tulusyaamisa mu Mfumu . Bu lwayeki lwayika kuri beetu ndyaatulu yayelemene mu kubweeye kuri Nzaambi , bunubwo se luri mu kwedyaatila , ngo bweeseenu kutoombolo kiteesu .
52004002	Mukwongo , beenu luyaari nkya nyikusulu beetu turi twaluha mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
52004003	Kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri ti , beenu luba bangisi na luhele kwesalila buyala .
52004004	Mpisi muutu mu beenu kayaaba kuhololo mukasi waandi , kunsa bungisi na lukiinsu ,
52004005	kwahele kuba mu lutumu lwa mantiilu mamabi , bunu bangooyi bari bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi .
52004006	Mu dyaambu di , yaa kuba wuyirika ma lumvuki kuri mpaangi yaandi , bunu pe kumuwuna ko , bukuri beetu twatekesele ku luyaabisa na kusiingisa dyo ti : Mfumu wubvutulaana mamabi kuri bayirikaana ma bubwo .
52004007	Mukwongo , Nzaambi ka siiri kututeele mbila mu kuba kunsa nsumukunu ko , ngo mu kuba kunsa bungisi .
52004008	Hango-nkuumbu , mpisi wunde wubisa nyikusulu dzimadzi , lo kari muutu kabisiri ko , ngo Nzaambi wuhaanaa Mpeeve yaandi Yangisi kuri beenu .
52004009	Mu dyaambu dya ntiilu ya kimpaangi , beenu luri na nzala kuri ti ba lutinina ko , bukuri beenu-meene lwayeki lwayika kuri Nzaambi bwa kutilisina beenu na beenu .
52004010	Bubwo se beenu luri mu kuyirikaana kuri bampaangi bobanso bari ku Makedonya , ngo beetu tulusyaamisa bampaangi , mu kubweese kutoombolo kiteesu ,
52004011	mu kweba na nzala kunata kidziingu kunsa kidzuunu , na kwenama misamu mini mya beenu-meene , na kwesala mu myooko mya beenu-meene bunu bu turi twalutuma dyo .
52004012	Mpisi heki luba na ndyaatulu yayelemene ha busu bwa baatu bari ku mbasi , na muutu kahele kulubuungula .
52004013	Bampaangi , beetu tutii ko ti beenu luba kunsa lubu , mu mitariri babo ba mwaafwa , mpisi luhele kwenyoongo bunu bakaka bahele na nsiitu .
52004014	Mbuti tusiila kanyi ti Yesu wafwiiri na wafulukiri , lo tusiileenu se kanyi ti Nzaambi sa kafulukisa mu Yesu , babo bafwiiri kuri bari na kanyi mu nde .
52004015	Mukwongo , mi turi mu kuleele beetu , bunu buri maampu ma Mfumu , mimami : beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo natee mu nyisulu Mfumu , ka tuba ku mankula ma babo bafwa ko .
52004016	Bukuri Mfumu nde-meene , mu kidiimbu kya nyaabusulu , mu mbeembu ya mukuutu bambasi , mu munyiingu mvumvuri ya Nzaambi , sa kasunduka mu mayulu , na babo bafwiila mu Kiristo sa batekesele kufuluka ;
52004017	tumi beetuneenu tuba twakiri mwooyo , batunaanguna ha kimosi na bo mu matuti , mu kubwaana Mfumu mu kingye-kingye , na kuba kintwaari na Mfumu mantaangu momanso .
52004018	Hango-nkuumbu , yendeenu lwebondosono beenu na beenu mu maampu mamo .
52005001	Mu ntoono ya mantaangu na bilookolo , bampaangi , beenu ka luri na nzala kuri ti balutinina ko .
52005002	Mukwongo , beenu-meene luyirikiri kuyaaba ti , kiluumbu kya Mfumu sa kiisa bunu ngaa-kwiibi mu butsuku .
52005003	Mbasi-tsuku haleele baatu ti : turi na kiyeengi , turi na kidzuunu , hanaho se mfukusulu yibabwilikila na sisuu , bunu bu kwiisikila misoongo mya mbutulu kuri mukyeetu wuri na yimi , ngo bo ka batsiitsa kubvuuka ko .
52005004	Ngo kasi , bampaangi , beenu lwahele kunsa mampimbisi kuri heki kiluumbu kikyo kiisa kuri beenu na sisuu buni ngaa-kwiibi .
52005005	Mukwongo , beenu-banso luri baala ba buungi na baala ba mwiini . Beetuneenu ka turi baatu ba butsuku bunu pe ba mampimbisi ko .
52005006	Hango-nkuumbu , yaa tubweeneenu tolo bunu bakaka ko , ngo tubeenee naana na kuba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene .
52005007	Bukuri bangaa-tolo , butsuku bakoobwaana tolo , na binwi bya malu , butsuku bakookolaa malu .
52005008	Ngo beetuneenu turi baatu ba mwiini , tubeeneenu na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene twahele kukolo malu , twalwaata kanyi na ntiilu bunu kinkuta kya mu ntulu kya mukaanda kibulu , na twalwaata nsiitu ya mvuukulu bunu mpu ya kitari .
52005009	Bukuri Nzaambi kasiiri kututaasila mu kubwilikila nkesi ko , ngo kutaambula mvuukulu mu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
52005010	Nde wafwa mu ntoono beetu , mpisi heki , ti hayuku turi naana ti hayuku twabwa tolo , lo tubeeneenu mwooyo kintwaari na nde .
52005011	Hango-nkuumbu , syamisineenu beenu na beenu , na tuungusineenu beenu na beenu bunu bu luri mu kwesalila .
52005012	Bampaangi , beetu tululoombo mu kwebvumina babo bari mu kwesala ha kakati dya beenu , bakwelutwaalisa mu Mfumu na bakwelulubula .
52005013	Namitineenu kubvula kwebasiila mutima na kwebatya , mu ntoono kisalu ki bari na kyo . Beeneenu na kiyeengi beenu na beenu .
52005014	Beetu tulusyaamisa , bampaangi : seembeenu babo bari kunsa kisaangila , syaamiseenu bari na boomo , kumiseenu bari na bubolo , beeneenu na nkindusulu-mutima mu bobanso .
52005015	Taleenu yaa kuba muutu wubvutula bubi mu bubi ko , ngo namitineenu kweyirika mamabwete , ha kakati dya beenu na beenu na kuri bobanso .
52005016	Beeneenu na kiminu mpisi ntaangu .
52005017	Saambileenu kwahele manunu .
52005018	Bvutuleenu matoondo mu myominso , bukuri bubwo buri kutya kwa Nzaambi kuri beenu mu Yesu Kiristo .
52005019	Yaa ludzimisa Mpeeve ko .
52005020	Yaa lusaana mbikululu ko ,
52005021	ngo fyongokineenu myominso , lukebe myamibwete .
52005022	Yaa luyirika ti dimosi dyadibi ko .
52005023	Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi nde-meene , kalusa bangisi mu kiteesu kyakuka , na bumuutu bwa beenu bwobunso , kiluunsi , muheebulu na nyutu , biba byakebu kwahele maseembu , mu nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
52005024	Wunde wuri mu kuluteele mbila wakwiikama , sa kakukisa momanso .
52005025	Bampaangi , saambileenu se mu beetu .
52005026	Heeneenu mamboto kuri bampaangi bobanso mu nyumutunu yangisi .
52005027	Me nyiluyingukiri mu nkuumbu Mfumu : taangiseenu mukaanda wumawu kuri bampaangi bobanso .
52005028	Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu .
53001001	Pawulo , Silvano na Timoteho kuri dibuundu dya bari Tesalonika , mu Nzaambi Taayi dyeetu , na mu Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
53001002	Bweese na kiyeengi bifumini kuri Nzaambi Taayi [ dyeetu ] , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
53001003	Bampaangi , Beetu tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo mpisi ntaangu kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono beenu . Buri bwabubwete , bukuri kanyi dya beenu diri mu kwebuuka kwalaka , na ntiilu yi luri na yo mu bambaasi yiri mu kwehamisa mu muutu-muutu .
53001004	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu turi na kimweese mu beenu ha kakati dya mabuundu ma Nzaambi , mu ntoono kifiki kyeenu na kanyi dyeenu , kunsa nkwamusunu dzeenu dzodzinso , na manyoongi ma luri mu kwekuunda .
53001005	Kikyo kidiimbu kya mutsuundu Nzaambi wasuunguma , mpisi luba lwamonoko ti lwayelemene mu kimfumu kya Nzaambi , ki luri mu kwemwiina mpasi .
53001006	Mukwongo , diri dyasuunguma ti Nzaambi kabvutula manyoongi kuri babo bakwelusoongo manyoongi ;
53001007	na kaha mpuumunu , kuri beenu luri mu kwemono manyoongi , na kuri beetu . Mimyo mbasi-tsuku sa myaba ha monokono Mfumu Yesu mu mayulu na bambasi ba mpinu dzaandi ,
53001008	kunsa mbaawu ya mile , mu kubvutula bubi kuri babo bahele kuyaaba Nzaambi , na bahele kutumuma mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Mfumu yeetu Yesu .
53001009	Bo sa bataambula maseembu ma mfukusulu yahele manunu , la na busu bwa Mfumu , na la na nkeembu ya makwa maandi ,
53001010	mbasi-tsuku ha kakwiisa , mu kiluumbu kikyo , mu kuba wakeembusu mu bangisi baandi , na mu kuba wasiika mu bobanso basiilaana kanyi , bukuri beenu lwasiiriri kanyi mu kimbaangi kyeetu .
53001011	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu tunamitina kusaambila mu beenu , mpisi heki Nzaambi yeetu kamono ti , beenu lwayelemene na mbila yi kari kaluteele , na mu mpinu dzaandi kakukisa nzala yoyinso yakuyirika mamabwe yiri mu beenu , na kisalu kya kanyi .
53001012	Bubwo , nkuumbu Mfumu yeetu Yesu , yiba yakeembese mu beenu , na beetu se tuba twakeembese mu nde , bunu buri bweese bwa Nzaambi yeetu , na bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo .
53002001	Ngo mu mitariri nyisulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , na kukutukuna kuri nde , bampaangi , beetu tululoombo ti :
53002002	yaa luwasula kumono mutima mambaawu ko , na yaa luba na boomo ko mu mbikululu , mu nyikusulu , bunu pe mu mukaanda wu baleele ti wafumuna kuri beetu ; bunu ti kiluumbu kya Mfumu ki mwaakwiisa .
53002003	Muutu yaa kaluwuna mu ntoono ti mosi ko . Kiteesu kya nyekululu kanyi mu Nzaambi kyakiri kutekesele kwiisa , na muutu wahele na mangisi wakiri kumonokono , mwaana wa mfukusulu .
53002004	Wunde wutelemese kitaatu , na wudzaangama ha busu bwa mpisi ki baleeriri ti Nzaambi bunu pe ki basaambilaana , natee mu kiteesu kya kudzakala mu nzo Nzaambi , na kuleele nde-meene ti nde ngo Nzaambi .
53002005	Beenu lwahele kubaambuka mwooyo ti me nyaluyaabisiri dyo , ha nyaba nyakiri kuri beenu ?
53002006	Ngo mu lumalu beenu luyaari kikyo kyamukangikila , mpisi nde kaba kumonokono munu mu kilookolo kya nde-meene .
53002007	Mukwongo , mpaanu ya mamabi yeki mu kwesala ; ngo kasi wunde wamukangikila yelemini kuba wayisila .
53002008	Tumi , wahele na mangisi kaba wamonokono , na hanaho Mfumu [ Yesu ] kamudzusula mu muheebulu wupala mu munwa waandi , na kamudziimbisila mu kumonokono kwa nyisulu yaandi .
53002009	Nyisulu wahele na mangisi sa yayirimina mu makwa ma Saatana , mu biyiriki bya mpinu , na bidiimbu , na bimaangu byampya ,
53002010	na kunsa mawunu momanso , ma bubayi kuri babo bari mu kudziimbila , bukuri bahele kutaambula ntiilu ya ngwanwa mu kuba babvuuka .
53002011	Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi wuri mu kubaheekele makwa ma kuwumuka , mpisi basiila kanyi mu mpya .
53002012	Mpisi heki , bobanso bahele kusa kanyi mu ngwanwa , ngo bamono kiminu mu bubayi , baba batsuundisa .
53002013	Beetu ngo bari , tuyelemini kubvutula matoondo kuri Nzaambi mpisi ntaangu , mu ntoono beenu bampaangi batya kuri Mfumu , bukuri Nzaambi walusoolo bunu mintekesele , mu kuba babvuuka kunsa bungisi buluha Mpeeve , na kanyi mu ngwanwa .
53002014	Mu didyo , Nzaambi kari kaluteele mbila mu Musamu Wamubwete wu turi twaluyikisa , mu kubaka nkeembu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
53002015	Hango-nkuumbu , bampaangi , beenee bakwiikama na kebeenu kikulu ki lwataamburi kuri beetu , mu ndzonsulu bunu pe mu mukaanda .
53002016	Hemese Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo nde-meene , na Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , watutya na watuha mu bweese bwaandi , mboondulu ya bibvu ngo bibvu na nsiitu yayibwete ,
53002017	kaboondo mitima myeenu , na kalukumisa mu biyiriki byobinso , na mu nzoonsulu dzadzibwete .
53003001	Mu misiiri , bampaangi , saambileenu mu beetu , mpisi heki maampu ma Mfumu maba mayabakana na maba makeembele bunu bu mari kuri beenu .
53003002	Saambileenu se mpisi heki beetu tukuuluka mu myooko mya baatu bangaa-kibakala na bari na mutima-bubi ; bukuri bobanso bahele na kanyi .
53003003	Ngo Mfumu wakwiikama , nde sa kalukumisa na kulukala mu Ngaa-bubi .
53003004	Beetu turi na kanyi mu Mfumu mu ntoono beenu , bukuri mamo ma turi mu kulutumaa , beenu luri mu kumayirakaa , na sa lwanamitina kumayirika .
53003005	Hemese Mfumu kutwaalisa mitima myeenu mu ntiilu ya Nzaambi , na mu kifiki kya Kiristo .
53003006	Bampaangi , beetu tululoombiri mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu kutatuku la na mpisi mpaangi yi kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila , kwahele kuyelemene na kikulu ki lwataambula kuri beetu .
53003007	Beenu-meene luyaari bunu bwa kusombosolo beetu . Bukuri beetu twasii kunatina kidziingu kunsa kisaangila ha kakati dya beenu ko .
53003008	Beetu twasii kudya byandya bya muutu kwa buunu ko ; ngo kunsa kisalu kya makwa na kunsa mpasi , butsuku na mwiini , beetu twasala mpisi heki mu beenu , muutu kahele kutubuungula .
53003009	Kari bukuri ti beetu twaba twahele na miswa ko , ngo beetu twaba tutiiri kulusoongo mu beetu-meene kifwaani kyayelemene kunama .
53003010	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yi twaba kuri beenu , beetu twaba luleelaana ti : mbuti muutu katiiri kusala ko , lo yaa kadya se ko .
53003011	Ngo beetu turi mu kweyuka ti bakaka mu beenu , bari mu kwedyaatila kunsa kisaangila , bahele kwesala , kasi bakwenama misamu myominso .
53003012	Beetu tuloombo na tusyaamisa baatu ba bubwo , mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo ti : basala mu kidzuunu mu kubaka bya kudya bya bo-meene .
53003013	Beenu ngo bari , bampaangi , yaa luholo-bito ko mu kuyirika mamabwe .
53003014	Mbuti kuri muutu wahele kutambikila ma turi mu kuleele beetu mu mukaanda wu , lo kebee dyo mu kuhele kubweese kuba kintwaari na wa bubwo , mpisi kamono nsoni .
53003015	Ya lumuhololo bunu mutaatu ko , ngo museembeenu bunu mpaangi .
53003016	Hemese Mfumu ya kiyeengi , nde-meene kaluha kiyeengi , mu mantaangu momanso na mu myominso . Mfumu kaba na beenu-banso .
53003017	Mboto yi ya mu kooko kwa meme Pawulo , kidiimbu mu mpisi mukaanda , wunkootinaa kiri bumabu .
53003018	Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo buba na beenu-banso .
54001001	Pawulo , ntumu Yesu Kiristo , bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu , na lwa Yesu Kiristo , nsiitu yeetu .
54001002	Kuri Timoteho mwaana wangwanwa mu kanyi : bweese , ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Kiristo Yesu , Mfumu yeetu , biba na ye .
54001003	Bunu bu nyabee kuleele , ha nyabee kweende me ku Makedonya , dzakala ku Efeso , mpisi heki wedika babamosi , yaa beyikisa nyikusulu dzikimi ko ,
54001004	yaa bakaangama mu bimpa , na mu miloongo mya kinkaaka myahele kusuka ; myominso mimyo mitwaalaana nkalikisi , ha kibeendu kya kukukisa kitsimi kya Nzaambi kiri mu kanyi .
54001005	Mufunu ntumunu yimayi , wuri mu kuri ti luba na ntiilu yifumunaa mu mutima watsyeemeke , nsimunu yayibwete , na kanyi dyahele bumpitu-bumpyoongo .
54001006	Babamosi bayeki batatuka la na mamo , na badziimbila kunsa nzoonsulu dzahele mufunu .
54001007	Bo batiiri kuba bayikisi ba mangisi , kasi bahele kubakula mi bari mu kuleele , na mi bari mu kuyirika kutswiikisa .
54001008	Beetu tuyaari kuri ti mangisi mari mamabwete , mbuti muutu wumasalila kwakubwete .
54001009	Tuyaabeenu ti mangisi bahele kumaha mu ntoono basuunguma , ngo mu ntoono bahele na mangisi , na bahele kutumuma , bahele na kinzaambi , bangaa-masumu , bahele na kanyi , bangaa-saana , bakwedzusa bataayi na banguri , badzusi ba baatu ,
54001010	bangaa-buyala , babakala bakweta kimpala na bambaasi babakala , baatu bakweyarika bankutu , bangaa-mpya , bakwelaba-maalu ma mpya , na bakweyirika mari kitaatu na nyikusulu dzadzibwete ,
54001011	dzayelemene na Musamu Wamubwete wu bari bayakisa me , wa nkeembu ya Nzaambi ya kiminu .
54001012	Me nyibvutula matoondo kuri wunde wampa makwa , Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu , bukuri nde wamwiini ti me nyayelemene mu kunsuusa mu kisalu .
54001013	Mu ntaangu yaluta me nyaba ngaa-bitari , ngaa-nkwaamusu , na ngaa-kinwa , kasi nde wambakila ngebe , bukuri me nyaba nyahele na nyaabulu , na nyaba kweyirika mamo kwahele kanyi .
54001014	Ngo bweese bwa Mfumu yeetu bwabuukila , ha kimosi na kanyi na ntiilu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu .
54001015	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi , na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso ti : Kiristo Yesu wayisa ha nsi mu kubvuukisa bangaa-masumu , mu bo me watete .
54001016	Hango-nkuumbu , me bambakila ngebe , mpisi heki mu me watete , Kiristo Yesu kasoongo kifwaani kya nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso , kuri basiila kanyi mu nde , mu kutaambula kidziingu kyahele manunu .
54001017	Kuri Mbyaasi ya mantaangu momanso , yiri kafwaana ko , bamumonaa ko , Nzaambi yomosi kitsu , kuba lukiinsu na nkeembu mu bibvu ngo bibvu , Amene .
54001018	Ntumunu yi nyiri mu kuha kuri ye mwaana waami Timoteho , bunu buri mbikululu dzi bari batekesele kuleele mu ntoono ye , kuri ti , mu dzo , ye nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete ,
54001019	bu wuri na kanyi na nsimunu yayibwete . Nsimunu yiyo babamosi bayeki bayilooso , na mu mitariri kanyi bo bayeki bapatuka mu maampa .
54001020	Mu bo , kuri Imenayo na Alekandere , ba nyiri nyayekele kuri Satana , mpisi baba baseembu na bahele kubweese kwesaana Nzaambi .
54002001	Me nyilusyaamisa tekesele myominso , mu kusa ndoombulu , nsaambulu , nyingukulu , na mvutukulu matoondo mu baatu bobanso ,
54002002	mu bambyaasi , na mu bobanso bari na lutumu , mpisi tubeeneenu na kidziingu kya mpolo na kidzuunu , kunsa kinzaambi kyokinso na lukiinsu lwolunso .
54002003	Mamo mari mamabwete na ma kiminu ha busu bwa Nzaambi mubvuukisi weetu ,
54002004	nde tiiri ti baatu bobanso babvuuka na biisa kunyaabulu ya ngwanwa .
54002005	Mukwongo , Nzaambi mosi kitsu yiri , na munkabu-kati se mosi kitsu wuri , ha kakati dya Nzaambi na baatu , munkabu-kati wunde muutu kari , ngo Kiristo Yesu .
54002006	Nde waheeri kikori ngo nyutu yaandi , mu kukuula baatu bobanso , kikyo ngo kimbaangi mu ntaangu yayelemene .
54002007	Mu kimbaangi kikyo me bari bansuusa mu kuba dingisi na ntumu , mu kweyikisa makaanda mu nzila ya kanyi na ya ngwanwa ; me ngwanwa nyiri mu kuleele , nyahele kufuta mpya .
54002008	Ngo me ntiiri ti babakala besaambila mu mpisi kibeendu , kuri banaanguna myooko myatsyeemeke , kwahele nkesi na nkalikisi .
54002009	Me ntiiri se ti bakyeetu baba na ndwaatulu yayelemene , ya kibvumi na ya soongolo . Yaa babweeye mu mimpandi , mu bitotolo bya woolo bunu pe misaanga , na binkuta bya ntalu yalaka ko ,
54002010	kasi byayelemene kuri bakyeetu basalilaa kibvumi kya Nzaambi , ngo mu kubweeye mu biyiriki byabibwete .
54002011	Wa mukyeetu kanama nyikusulu kuri wawura , mu kutumuma kwokunso .
54002012	Me nyahele kuha miswa kuri wa mukyeetu mu kuyikisa , ti mu kutuma wa mubakala , ngo kaba wawura .
54002013	Mukwongo , watete wu bayirikiri Adami , tumi Eva .
54002014	Kari Adami watambukiri mawunu ko , ngo kasi wa mukyeetu watambukiri mawunu na kusinina mangisi .
54002015	Ngo nde sa kaba wabvuuka mu ntoono mbutulu , mbuti namitini kuba mu kanyi , mu ntiilu , na mu bungisi , kunsa nkulukulu .
54003001	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi . Mbuti muutu wuri na nzala kusala kisalu kya bukuutu bwa dibuundu , lo kisalu kyakibwete katiiri .
54003002	Mukuutu dibuundu yelemini kuba wahele na di bamuseembele , mulumi wuri na mukasi mosi , wuri na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , wasoongolo , wakiinsuma , mutaamburi-banzeense , wakuka mu kuyikisa ;
54003003	yaa kaba yaa-kinwi ko , yaa kaba se ngaa-bikiindu ko , ngo kasi kaba wadzuuna , wahele kweyumusa baatu , na wahele na ntiki-mboongo .
54003004	Nde yelemini se kutwaalisaa nzo ya nde-meene kwa kubwete , wusuusaa baala kunsa lutumu na kunsa kibvumi kyokinso .
54003005	Mukwongo , mbuti muutu wahele kuyaaba kutwaalisa nzo ya nde-meene , lo buri katsiitsa kutwaalisila dibuundu dya Nzaambi ?
54003006	Yaa kaba se wamoono mu dibuundu ko ; mpisi heki masiiku mahele kumudzusa miisu , na kahele kubwa mu mutsuundu wu batsuundisila dyabulu .
54003007	Yelemini kuba se na kimbaangi kyakibwete kimuteelile bari ku mbasi , mpisi kahele kufwa nsoni na kubwa mu siinga dya dyabulu .
54003008	Bisari se bwobumosi , bayelemini kuba bakiinsuma , bahele na ndima dzoolo , bahele na nwiinunu malu ya makwa , na bahele kwebakila mboongo mu bumbabu .
54003009	Bayelemini kukebe mpaanu dza kanyi mu mutima wa mutsiina .
54003010	Bayelemini kutekesele kubafyoongokono ; tumi basala kisalu kya dibuundu , mbuti bahele na mi babaseembele .
54003011	Bakyeetu se bwobumosi , bayelemene kuba bakiinsuma , bahele na makele , bari na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , bakwiikama mu myominso .
54003012	Bisari biyelemini kuba , balumi bari mukasi mosi , batwaalisa baala na manzo ma bo-meene kwa kubwete .
54003013	Mukwongo , babo basala kisalu kya dibuundu kwa kubwete , bataambulaana lukiinsu lwalubwete bo-meene , na nsiitu dzadzinene kunsa kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu .
54003014	Me nyikutinina misamu mimami , bu nyiri na nsiitu mu kwiisa kuri ye mu mawasu ;
54003015	mpisi heki , ti hayuku me nziingiri mu kwiisa , lo ye yaaba bunu bwa kudyaatila mu nzo ya Nzaambi , yiri dibuundu dya Nzaambi yamwooyo , kuunsi na kitsuku kya ngwanwa .
54003016	Diri dyayabakana ti , mpaanu dza kinzaambi dziri dzadzinene : Kiristo , wamonikini mu muswinyi , Mpeeve wasoongiri kuri ti nde wasuunguma , bambasi bamumono , bamuyabikisa kuri makaanda , bamusiila kanyi mu nsi , bamunata ku yulu mu nkeembu .
54004001	Mpeeve wuyirika luleele ti : mu mantaangu ma nsukulu , babamosi sa bayekele kanyi , mu kukaangama mu mampeeve ma mawunu , na mu nyikusulu dza mampeeve mamabi ,
54004002	mu bumpitu-bumpyoongo bwa bangaa-mpya , bayeki na bidiimbu byasa mu kiseengu kya mbaawu , mu mitima mya bo-meene ,
54004003	bakwekabikisa nkweelulu , na bakweha mangisi mu byandya biri Nzaambi wayirika , mu kuri ti baatu bakwiikama na bamwayaaba ngwanwa , badya mu mvutukulu matoondo .
54004004	Mukwongo , mpisi kiyiriki kya Nzaambi kyakibwete , kuri kya kulooso ko mbuti bakihoriri mu mvutukulu matoondo ;
54004005	bukuri byobinso bibakaa bungisi mu maampu ma Nzaambi na mu lusaambulu .
54004006	Wubaangulaana misamu mimyo kuri bampaangi , lo ye sa ba kisari kyakibwete kya Kiristo Yesu , kyadiisulu mu maampu ma kanyi , na mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete , dzi wuri mu kunama kwa kubwete .
54004007	Ngo looso mankuma ma bungooyi na ma bakyeetu ba binuni . Yende wetsitsikila bwa kubeele na kinzaambi ye-meene .
54004008	Mukwongo , kutsitsikila kwa nyutu , kuri mufunu mu myantele ; ngo kasi kuba na kinzaambi kuri mufunu mu myominso , kuri na lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya lumalu , na kya ku mankula .
54004009	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi , na kumataambula mu mutima ndemunso .
54004010	Mukwongo , mbuti turi mu kwebama na kwenwaana , lo bukuri twasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi yamwooyo , yiri mubvuukisi baatu bobanso , mbiki ti bari na kanyi .
54004011	Ye yelemini kutuma na yikisa misamu mimyo .
54004012	Muutu yaa kasaana butuuti bwa ye ko , ngo soongo kifwaani kuri bangaa-kanyi , mu nzoonsulu , mu ndyaatulu , mu ntiilu , mu kanyi , na mu bungisi .
54004013	Natee ku nyikwiisa me , sa mutima mu ntaangulu , mu nsyamusunu , na mu nyikusulu .
54004014	Yaa nyaafuna kikabu kya bweese kiri mu ye ko , ki bari bakuha mu mbikululu , mu ntetukulu myooko mya kintwaari kya bakulu ba babakala .
54004015	Salila mamo , heele mutima mpisi bobanso bamono ti kisalu kya ye kiri mu kubuuka .
54004016	Sa madyeele ye-meene , na mu nyikusulu . Namitina kusalila bubwo ; bukuri wusalilaana bubwo , lo ye sa wabvuuka ye-meene , na sa wabvuukisa babo bakuywiila .
54005001	Yaa seembe wa kinuni mu kibakala ko , ngo musyaamisa bunu ti taayi , hololo minkuula bunu bampaangi ,
54005002	bakyeetu babuuka , bahololo bunu banguri , bantuumba bunu bibusi , kunsa bungisi bwobunso .
54005003	Kiinsa bafwiilila balumi , bari bafwiiri bangwanwa .
54005004	Mbuti mufwiiri wuri na baala bunu pe bateekulu , lo batekesele kuyika bwa kusalila kinzaambi mu nzo ya bo-meene , na mamo ma bayelemini kuyirika kuri bataayi na banguri , bukuri mimyo myabweeye ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
54005005	Wunde wuri mufwiiri wangwanwa , lo wunde wayeki wasaala nde mukaka , wasa nsiitu mu Nzaambi , na wunamitinaana mu ndoombulu na mu nsaambulu , butsuku na mwiini .
54005006	Ngo kasi , mufwiiri wuri na kidziingu kya minkeembu , lo wafwa ti hayuku wuri mwooyo .
54005007	Mimyo ye yelemini kubatuma , mpisi bahele kuba na mi babaseembele .
54005008	Mbuti muutu wahele kwebuungula ba nde-meene , mbiki ti ba mu nzo yaandi , lo nde tunini kanyi dyaandi na bvuriri mutima-bubi ti na mungooyi .
54005009	Mufwiiri mu kuba watinu nkuumbu mu mukaanda , yelemini kuba na mibvu myaluta makuumi masaamunu , na waba mukasi wa bakala dimosi ,
54005010	wayabakana mu biyiriki byabibwete , wayeki wabuukisa baala , wataambula banzeense , waswaaka miilu mya bangisi , wabakisa bari mu ngebe , na wasa mutima mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete .
54005011	Ngo kasi , bwafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba , lo ye kusa kubawuungula , bukuri mbuti bo batelimisi kitaatu na Kiristo mu ntoono manzala maaku , lo beki na nzala kukweele ,
54005012	na bari kunsa mutsuundu , bukuri bamwaayekele kanyi dyatete .
54005013	Ha yulu haho se , bilyeebe bari , bo misamu kweyaabila mu kweyende kyaatu-kyaatu mu manzo ma baatu ; ngo kari bini bilyeebe bari ko , kasi bangaa-lusuku na bangaa-kintori se , bakweleele myahele kuyelemene .
54005014	Ngo me ntiiri ti bafwiiri bakiri mu buntuumba bakweele , babuta baala , batwaalisa manzo maaku , na yaa baha mpwaani ti mosi ko kuri mutaatu mu kudzoonso mamabi .
54005015	Mukwongo , bafwiiri babamosi beki bawumuka mu kwenama Satana .
54005016	Mbuti kuri mukyeetu ngaa-kanyi wuri na bafwiiri mu kaanda , lo kababakisa , na yaa kayekele kisalu kuri dibuundu ko , mpisi heki dibuundu kabakisa babo bari bafwiiri bangwanwa .
54005017	Bakulu ba babakala bari mu kwetwaalisa kwa kubwete , bayelemini kutaambula lukiinsu lwa biteesu byoolo , mbiki ti bakwemono mpasi mu maampu na mu nyikusulu .
54005018	Mukwongo , Matinu maleele ti : « Ngoombo mbuti yiri mu kudzabata mankono , lo kumukaanga pe munwa . » Na ti : « Kisari kiyelemini kubaka mufutu waandi . »
54005019	Yaa taambula ko ti bafuunda mukulu-bakala kuri ye , mbuti ka ha busu bwa bambaangi boolo bunu pe batatu ko .
54005020	Babwiiri mu masumu , lo baseembe ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , mpisi baatu bakaka se baba na boomo .
54005021	Me nyi kuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , na ha busu bwa bambasi ba Nzaambi ba bari basoolo ti , salila momanso mamo kwahele munsoori na kwahele bubayi .
54005022	Yaa tetekele muutu myooko mu mawasu-mawasu ko , na yaa ba kintwaari mu masumu ma ŋani ko ; kebe nyutu yaaku kunsa bungisi .
54005023	Yaa bweese kunwa mani maampa kitsu ko , ngo yende wenwa se mwaa-malu , mu ntoono bubeeru bwa kifunda , na mpololo-bito ya kinsosi-kinsosi .
54005024	Masumu ma baatu babamosi , mari mayabakana tekesele bateleme ku mutsuundu ; ngo kasi kuri bakaka , mo kuyabakana ha mambisa .
54005025	Bwobumosi se , biyiriki byabibwete biri byayabakana ; ngo byakaka byahele kuyabakana se , ka bitsiitsa kuba byasweeme ko .
54006001	Bobanso bari mu kihaangu kya bunkutu , bahololo bamfumu baaku mu lukiinsu lwolunso , mpisi heki nkuumbu Nzaambi na nyikusulu bihele kuba byasaanu .
54006002	Babo bari bamfumu baaku basiilaa kanyi , yaa babanyaafuna ko bukuri ti bampaangi , ngo kasi babasalila kubvuriri bubwete , bukuri mamabwe mabayirika mamo , kuri bampaangi ba mutima , bangaa-kanyi bari mu kuyirika . Mamo ye yelemini kuyikisa na kutuma .
54006003	Mbuti muutu wuri na nyikusulu dzikimi , na wahele kukaangama mu maampu mamabwete ma Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , na mu nyikusulu dzayelemene na kinzaambi ,
54006004	lo nde masiiku ma mudzusa miisu , na kayaa kitotolo ko . Nde wuri na bubeeru bwa nkalikisi na mayumu mu misamu . Kukwo kukoofuminaa musoki , nkalikisi , bitari , nsimunu mamabi ,
54006005	mayumu mahele kuwa ma baatu ba biwulu , bari madyeele mamabi , na bahele na ngwanwa , bakwetsima ti kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu .
54006006	Mukwongo , kinzaambi nzila ya kubakila ndaandu , mbuti ye kiminu kwemono munu mu biwuri na byo .
54006007	Bukuri twasii twaala kitotolo mu nsi yi ko , mu didyo se katutsiitsa kunata kitotolo ko .
54006008	Habaanaa turi na byandya na binkuta , lo twemono kiminu mu bini bibyo .
54006009	Ngo babo bari na nzala busina , bakoobwaanaa mu nsindukulu , mu myeete , na mu mburi nyiimunu dza buwulu na dzadzibi , dzikotisaana baatu kunsa mfukusulu na nzimbusulu .
54006010	Mukwongo , ntiilu ya mboongo ngo mwaansi wa momanso mamabi ; babamosi bakaangama mu yo , bayeki badziimbisa kanyi , na bakomono manyutu maaku mu mburi manyoongi .
54006011	Ngo ye muutu Nzaambi , bata misamu mimyo . Yende wesaka nsungumunu , kinzaambi , kanyi , ntiilu , nkindusulu-mutima , bundeembu .
54006012	Nwaana nwaanunu yayibwete ya kanyi , kwaata kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso ki bari bakuteelele mbila , na ki wuri wateele kimbaangi kyakibwete ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka .
54006013	Me nyikuloombiri ha busu bwa Nzaambi , nde wuhaanaa kidziingu kuri bitotolo byobinso , na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , wateeri kimbaangi kyakibweete ha busu bwa Pontyo Pilato :
54006014	kebe lutumu kwahele kuba mviindu , na kwahele kuba mi bakuseembele , natee ha kwiisa kumonokono Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
54006015	Nde mbasi-tsuku , wunde wuri mu lwambwe , wuri mutumi mosi kitsu , mbyaasi ya bambyaasi na Mfumu ya bamfumu , kasoongo mu mantaangu mayelemene .
54006016	Kuri wunde wuri , wunu nde kitsu wuri kafwaana ko , wadzakala kunsa buungi buri bwa kukokosolo pe , wuri muutu ti mosi kamumwii ko , na katsiitsa kumumono ko , kuba lukiinsu na mpinu dzahele manunu . Amene .
54006017	Leele kuri bisina bya ntaangu yimayi , yaa baba na masiiku ko , na yaa basiila nsiitu mu busina bwa mwaa-ntaangu mosi ko , ngo basiila nsiitu mu Nzaambi , nde kootuhaanaa byobinso mu busina mpisi tumono kiminu mu byo .
54006018	Baleele bayirika mamabwete , baba bisina mu biyiriki byabibwete , bangaa-kikabu , baatu bayirima mu kukabula ,
54006019	bari mu kwekutikisa busina ha lufulu lwalubwete mu bo-meene , mpisi heki mu ntaangu yikwiisa , babaka kidziingu kyangwanwa .
54006020	Ye Timoteho , kebe maampu ma bari bakuha , yende webata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dza mukangala , na nkalikisi dza madyeele mampya ,
54006021	mari babamosi munsa kwemasalila , bayeki basasika mu kanyi . Bweese buba na beenu !
55001001	Me Pawulo , ntumu Kiristo Yesu , mu kutya kwa Nzaambi , bunu buri lusiilulu lwa kidziingu kya mu Kiristo Yesu ,
55001002	kuri Timoteho , mwaana wa mutima : bweese , ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaana kuri Taata Nzaambi , na kuri Mfumu yeetu Kiristo Yesu biba na ye .
55001003	Me nkoobvutulaa matoondo kuri Nzaambi , yiyo yi nyisaambilaa mu mutima watsyeemeke , bunu bwaba saambilaa bakuutu . Nyisalilaa bubwo , mu ntaangu yi nyibambukilaa ye mwooyo , mu nsaambulu dzaami butsuku na mwiini kwahele kuhoto .
55001004	Bu nyibaambuka mwooyo mu mansangasa maaku , nyibaana na musoongo walaka wa kumono ye , mpisi mba nyaluula mu kiminu .
55001005	Me nyibaambuka mwooyo mu kanyi dyangwanwa diri mu ye , kanyi didyo dyatekisiri kuba mu Lowisi , mwankaaka yaaku ya mukyeetu , na mu nguri yaaku Enike , me nyirikiri kuyaaba ti diri mu ye se .
55001006	Mu didyo , me nyikubaambula mwooyo ti : bweese kulula mbaawu mu kikabu kya Nzaambi kiri mu ye , ki wuri wataambula mu ntetukulu myooko mya me .
55001007	Mukwongo , Nzaambi kasii kutuha mpeeve ya boomo ko , ngo ya mpinu , ya ntiilu na ya bundeembu .
55001008	Yaa ba na nsoni ko mu kuta kimbaangi mu Mfumu yeetu , bunu pe mu me nyiri mu bikonyi mu ntoono nde . Kasi mono mpasi ha kimosi na me mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete , bunu buri mpinu dza Nzaambi .
55001009	Nde watubvuukisa , na watuteele mbila yangisi , kari mu ntoono biyiriki byeetu ko , ngo kasi bunu buri bitaasi bya nde-meene na bweese bu kari katuha mu Kiristo Yesu , tekesele mantaangu mahela kuwa .
55001010	Bweese bubwo bwayabakana mu lumalu , mu monokunu Mubvuukisi weetu Kiristo Yesu , wunde wasukisa lufwa , na wasa kuri ti mu Musamu Wamubwete bumwooyo buseme na mbolulu yihele kubweese kuba .
55001011	Mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete wunde , me bayeki bansa mubikisi , ntumu na muyikisi .
55001012	Mu ntoono yiyo se , me nyiri mu kumono mpasi dzimadzi , ngo nyahele na nsoni , bukuri me nyaari mu nani me nyiri nyasa kanyi , na nyabakula ti , nde wakuka mu kukebe maampu ma kari kampa , natee mu kiluumbu kikyo .
55001013	Holo kifwaani mu maampu mangwanwa ma wuri wayuka kuri me , mu kanyi na ntiilu bya mu Kiristo Yesu .
55001014	Kebe maampu mamabwete mawuunguku mu ye , kuri Mpeeve Yangisi yidzakalaa mu beetuneenu .
55001015	Ye yaari dimadi ti bobanso bari ku Asya banyekele ; mu bo kuri Fingelo na Eremongene .
55001016	Hemese Mfumu kasa mpemisi mu nzo Onesiforo , bukuri nde wasyaamisini me mu mantaangu momanso , na kasii ba na nsoni ko mu bikonyi bya me ,
55001017	ngo nde katubukaana ku Loma , nde wasaka me mu kuheme , na wanzuukila .
55001018	Hemese Mfumu kamuha miswa mya kutaambula mpemisi kuri Mfumu , mu kiluumbu kikyo . Na kisalu kyokinso ki kari kasala nde ku Efeso , ye-meene bvuriri kuyaaba .
55002001	Hango mwaana waami , bakila makwa mu bweese buri mu Kiristo Yesu .
55002002	Myominso mi wuri wayuka kuri me , ha busu bwa bambaangi balaka , yaabisa myo kuri baatu bakwiikama , bakuka mu kuyikisa myo se kuri bakaka .
55002003	Ye se taambula mpasi bunu muyongolo wamubwete wa Kiristo Yesu .
55002004	Kuri muutu ko wuri kakotaana mu buyongolo , bweesiri kakaangama mu misamu mya kidziingu , mbuti tiiri kubweeye kuri wunde wa muholo mu kisalu .
55002005	Bakoolwiikaana mudzumuni-ntiinu mpu ya ndulukulu ko , mbuti wahele kubvumina mangisi ma ntiinu .
55002006	Muhati-manseke wukoomonaa mpasi , nde yelemini kutekesele kutaambula kikuuku kya bimbutu .
55002007	Bakula mamo ma nyileele . Mukwongo , Mfumu sa kakuha madyeele mu myominso .
55002008	Baambuka mwooyo mu Yesu Kiristo , wabutukila mu kaanda dimadi dya Davidi , nde wafuluka mu bafwa , bunu buri Musamu waami Wamubwete ,
55002009	mu ntoono musamu wunde , me nyiri mu kumono mpasi mu bikonyi , buni muyiriki-mamabi ; ngo kasi maampu ma Nzaambi mahele mu bikonyi .
55002010	Hango-nkuumbu , me nyiri mu kwekiindisa mutima mu myominso , mu ntoono basoolu , mpisi heki bo se babaka mvuukulu yiri mu Kiristo Yesu , na nkeembu ya mantaangu momanso .
55002011	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi : « Mbuti tufwiiri kintwaari na nde , lo sa twaba mwooyo kintwaari na nde se ;
55002012	mbuti tukuundiri mpasi kintwaari na nde , lo sa twatuma kintwaari na nde se ; mbuti tumutunini , lo nde se sa katutuna ;
55002013	mbuti twahele kukwiikama , nde wuri wakwiikama , bukuri nde lo kabangusina kutuna nyutu ya nde-meene ko . »
55002014	Babaambula mwooyo mu mamama , wubayingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , yaa beyumuna mu bitoolo ko . Mimyo myahele mufunu , mbuti ka wa kudziimbisa baatu bayuka myo ko .
55002015	Sa makwa ye-meene , mu kumonokono ha busu bwa Nzaambi , bunu muutu wu bamwaatsiitsa , bunu kisari kihele kufwa nsoni , kikweyikisa maampu mangwanwa mu nyikusulu dzasuunguma .
55002016	Bata nzoonsulu dza bungooyi dzamukangala , bukuri bari na nzoonsulu dza bubwo , sa bahamisa kukoto kunsa bungooyi ;
55002017	nzoonsulu dza bo dziri bunu mputa yibolosa muswinyi , yikweyalamika . Mu bo kuri Imenayo na Fileto ,
55002018	bo bayeki batatuka na ngwanwa , bu bakweleele ti mfulukulu yayeki yayirima , bakwebwiisa kanyi dya bamosi .
55002019	Diri dyangwanwa ti lufulu lwa sa Nzaambi lwa makwa lwateleme , luri na kinyemu kyatina ti : « Mfumu yaari baatu baandi , na wunde wutaangunaa nkuumbu Mfumu , yelemini kutatuka na mamabi . »
55002020	Munsa nzo yayinene , kari dzini nkoombo dza woolo na dza palata dzikoobaanaa ko , ngo kubaanaa se dza miti , na dza tubuumbu . Dzamosi badzisalilaa mu lukiinsu , ngo dzakaka badzisalilaa kwahele lukiinsu .
55002021	Ngo mbuti muutu tsyeemisini nyutu yaandi mu mamabi mamo , lo nde sa kaba lukoombo lwa lukiinsu , lwawuunguku , luri mufunu kuri Mfumu , mu kulusalila mu mpisi ma bayirikaa mamabwete .
55002022	Yitika mantiilu ma butuuti , saka nsungumunu , kanyi , ntiilu , na kiyeengi mu kintwaari na babo bayingukilaa Mfumu mu mutima watsyeemeke .
55002023	Looso nzoonsulu dza buwulu na dza budzeeke , bu yaari kuri ti dzitwaalaa bikiindu .
55002024	Kisari kya Mfumu wahele kuyelemene kunwaana , ngo yelemini kuba na musoongo mu baatu bobanso , wakuka mu kuyikisa , na wukuunda mamabi .
55002025	Nde yelemini kuyikisa bari na muhaawu , mu bundeembu kuri ti kampe Nzaambi wubaheeri nyiingulu madyeele , mu kuyaaba ngwanwa ,
55002026	na babvutukila bitsimi byabibwete , na bapala mu siinga dya dyabulu , mu kari kabakaanga , mu kuri ti bayirika ma katii nde .
55003001	Yaaba dyo ti : mu biluumbu bya nsukulu , mantaangu ma mpasi sa miisa .
55003002	Mukwongo , baatu sa baba na kifu , batiiri mboongo , bangaa-nzala-kubila , bangaa-masiiku , bangaa-saana , bari na nko kuri bataayi na banguri , bari batoonda ko , bahele kubvumina bya Nzaambi ,
55003003	bahele na ntiilu , bahele na kyaari , bangaa-makele , bahele na mangisi , bangaa-bumfuna , bataatu ba mamabwete ,
55003004	bakweyarika bambaasi , bangaa-kituunsi kya nkesi , bangaa-masiiku mabuunu , babvuriri kutya minkeembu ti na Nzaambi ;
55003005	bamonokono ti bangaa-kinzaambi , kasi bakwetuna mpinu dza kinzaambi . Tekele ba bubwo mbisa .
55003006	Bamosi mu bo bakwekoto mu manzo , na mu masiinga ma bo , bakwebangusina bakyeetu bahele kukiinsuma , bari na kilemu kya masumu , na bakwenama mantiilu ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ;
55003007	mpisi ntaangu bakweyika , ngo kasi bahele kubangisina kutubuka ku nyaabulu yangwanwa .
55003008	Bunu Yanese bo na Yamberese babanwaanisa Moose , bunubwo se baatu bamaba bakwenwaanisa ngwanwa , madyeele ma bo mabiiya , na bo babwa mu mitariri kanyi .
55003009	Ngo bo bari nyeendekele la ko , bukuri budzeeke bwa bo , sa bwamonokono ha busu bwa baatu bobanso , bunu bwaba monokono budzeeke bwa Yanese bo na Yamberese .
55003010	Ngo ye wanemi kwakubwete nyikusulu dzaami , ndyaatulu yaami , bitaasi byaami , kanyi dyaami , nkindusulu-mutima yaami , ntiilu yaami , kifiki kyaami ,
55003011	nkwamusunu na mpasi dzi nyamono me ku Antyoke , ku Ikonyo , ku Listara . Nkya nkwamusunu me nyahele kumono ! Ngo mu dzodzinso Mfumu wankuula .
55003012	Ngo bobanso batiiri kunata kidziingu kunsa kinzaambi mu Kiristo Yesu , sa baba bakwaamusu .
55003013	Ngo baatu bababi na bangaa-bumpitu-bumpyoongo , sa bahamisa kudyaatila kunsa mabvuriri bubi , mu kwewumuna baatu , bu bari bawumuka bo-meene .
55003014	Ngo ye wasiila kanyi mu ma wuri wayika , na ma wuri wabakula ti mangwanwa , bu yaari kuri na , wuri wamayikila .
55003015	Kuholosono bulesi bwaaku , Matinu Mangisi ye wumayaari , mo makuka mu kuha ye madyeele , mu kubaka mvuukulu mu kanyi mu Kiristo Yesu .
55003016	Momanso matinu , mu ntwalusulu ya Mpeeve ya Nzaambi bari bamatinina , na mari mufunu mu kuyikisa , mu kuseembe , mu kusuungika , mu kutwaalisa mu nsungumunu ,
55003017	mpisi heki muutu Nzaambi kaba wayirima , na kabaka biri mufunu mu nyirikulu momanso mamabwete .
55004001	Me nyikuyingukila ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na ha busu bwa Kiristo Yesu , nde wukwiisa kutsuundisa bamwooyo na bafwa , na mu monokunu yaandi na mu kimfumu kyaandi ,
55004002	yikisa Maampu , landukina mu ntaangu yayelemene na yahele kuyelemene , seembe , ŋaŋina , syaamisa , mu nkindusulu-mutima yoyinso kunsa nyikusulu .
55004003	Mukwongo , sa kwaba ntaangu yiri , baatu babweese kukuunda kuyuka nyikusulu dzangwanwa ko , ngo bunu buri mantiilu maaku , bo sa basaka kuba na bayikisi balaka babaleele mi batiiri kuyuka .
55004004	Bo sa babisa kuyuka ngwanwa , na sa basyeeteke mu kweyuka mankuma .
55004005	Ngo ye , ba wasoongolo mu myominso , kuunda mpasi , sa kisalu kya budingisi , kukisa kisalu kyaaku .
55004006	Mukwongo , makila ma me meki matsaamuna ha yulu kikabu , na ntaangu ya mweendu waami yimwaatubuka .
55004007	Me nyanweeni kikiindu kyakibwete , me mwaamana kudzumuna ntiinu , na nyakebe kanyi .
55004008	Mu lumalu , ba mwaampungukila mpu ya nsungumunu , mbasi-tsuku yi nyakisa Mfumu , mutsuundisi wasuunguma , mu kiluumbu kikyo ; kari kunu kuri me ko , ngo kuri bobanso se batiiri monokunu yaandi .
55004009	Ba na malwangukila mu kwiisa kuri me mu mawasu .
55004010	Mukwongo , Dema wanyekele , mu lumalu nde weki kutya kwaandi misamu mya ntaangu yimayi , na wayensi ku Tesalonika ; Kereseke ngo wuri wayensi ku Ngalatya , na Tito ku Dalamatya .
55004011	Wuni Luka kitsu wuri na me . Holo Malako , mpisi lwiisa beenu boolo , mutwaala , bukuri nde wuri mufunu kuri me , mu ntoono kisalu .
55004012	Me nyaheekiri Tikiko ku Efeso .
55004013	Mu ntaangu yi wukwiisa , ntwaalikila kiyuungu ki nyasisiri ku Torowasi ku nzo Karpo , na mikaanda , mbiki ti myayiriku mu mikaanda mya bibulu .
55004014	Alekandere , mutsuri-biseengu , wamonisini me mpasi dzalaka . Mfumu sa kamubvutukila mamo mayelemene na biyiriki byaandi .
55004015	Ngo ye se , sa madyeele mu nde , bukuri nde wanwaanisini maampu meetu mu kiteesu kyamakwa .
55004016	Ha nyaba nwaanikina me buungu dyaami mu lwatete , kuri muutu ti mosi ko wambakisiri , ngo bobanso banyekiri . Ngo yaa babaka mafuumbu mu mimyo ko .
55004017	Mfumu wambakisiri na wampeeri makwa , mpisi heki mu munwa me , maampu maba mayaabusu mu kiteesu kyakuka , na maba mayukukuna kuri makaanda momanso . Me bankuuriri mu munwa nkosi .
55004018	Mfumu sa kankuula mu momanso mamabi ma banyirikila , na sa kamvuukisa mu kunkotoso mu kimfumu kyaandi kya mayulu . Nkeembu yiba kuri nde mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene .
55004019	Ha mboto kuri Piriska , kuri Akila , na ku nzo ya Onesiforo .
55004020	Erasto wasii saala ku Korinto . Torofimo me nyamusisiri wabeele ku Mileto .
55004021	Sa makwa mu kwiisa , tekesele ntaangu ya kyoosi yitubuka . Ebulo , Pude , Lino , Kolodya , na bampaangi bobanso bakuheekiri mboto .
55004022	Hemese Mfumu kaba na kiluunsi kya ye ! Bweese buba na beenu !
56001001	Me Pawulo , nkutu Nzaambi , ntumu Yesu Kiristo mu mitariri kanyi dya basoolu ba Nzaambi , na mu mitariri nyaabulu ngwanwa bunu buri kinzaambi ,
56001002	mu nsiitu dza kidziingu kya bibvu ngo bibvu kiri Nzaambi , nde wahele kuba ngaa-mpya , wasa nsiilulu tekesele mantaangu ma bibvu ngo bibvu .
56001003	Nde wamonokoso maampu maandi , mu ntaangu yikatsimini nde-meene , mu nyaabusulu yibari batiisila me , bunu buri lutumu lwa Nzaambi , mubvuukisi weetu .
56001004	Hemese bweese na kiyeengi , bifumunaa kuri Nzaambi Taata , na kuri Kiristo Yesu Mubvuukisi weetu , biba kuri ye Tito , mwaana waami wangwanwa mu kanyi dya ntwaari .
56001005	Me nyasiisiri ye ku Kerete mu ntoono yiri ti , ye saa mana kubweeyese misiiri , na kusuusa mu mpisi bvula bakulu ba babakala , bunu bu nyakutumini me ;
56001006	mbuti kubakimini muutu wahele na ntoono yi bamuseembele , wuri na mukasi mosi , wuri na baala bari na kanyi , bahele na kibila mu ndyaatulu , bunu pe bahele na nko .
56001007	Mukwongo , mukuutu dibuundu wukebaa bya Nzaambi , kayelemini kuba na ntoono yi bamuseembele ko , wahele na masiiku , kari ngaa-mankesi ko , kari yaa-kinwi ko , kari ngaa-bikiindu ko , na kari wukwebakilaa mu bumbabu ko .
56001008	Ngo nde yelemini kuba mutaamburi-banzeense , nduku mamabwe , wasoongolo , wasuunguma , wangisi , yaa kukebe nyutu yaandi .
56001009	Nde yelemini kuba se wakaangama mu maampu ma bayelemene kusiila kanyi , mpisi kaba wakuka mu kusyaamisa baatu mu nyikusulu dzadzibwete , na mu kutungukila se babo bari na muhaawu .
56001010	Mukwongo , bangaa-nko , bangaa-nzoonsolo dzahele mufunu , na bangaa-mawunu balaka bari , mbiki ti ha kakati dya bateende bubakala .
56001011	Ba bubwo bayelemene kubakaangisa minwa , bukuri bari mu kwekotoso kisaangila munsa makaanda mansiina . Bakweyikisa myahele kuyelemene , mu kubaka mufutu wa bumbabu .
56001012	Mosi mu bo , wuri mubikiri wa bo-meene waleele ti : " Bari Kerese , mpisi ntaangu bangaa-mpya , bibulu byabibi , bilyeebe biri kisalu kunu kudya . "
56001013	Kimbaangi kimaki kiri kyangwanwa . Mu dyaambu didyo , ye yelemini kubaseembe mu makwa , mpisi baba bakuma mu kanyi ,
56001014	bahele kwekaangama mu mankuma ma Bayudayo , na mu ntumunu dza baatu babisa kusalila ngwanwa .
56001015	Kuri babo batsyeemeke , lo byobinso byatsyeemeke ; kuri babo bayeki babviimfuka na bahele na kanyi , lo kuri ti kimosi kyatsyeemeke ko ; ngo madyeele ma bo na nsimunu bo byayeki byasumuka .
56001016	Bo bakweleele ti bayaari Nzaambi , ngo mu biyiriki bo bakwemutuna . Bo bayeki nkeensu na bangaa-tungu , bakoono kuyirika ntoono ti yimosi yayibwete .
56002001	Ye ngo wuri leele , myayelemene na nyikusulu dzadzibwete .
56002002	Babakala ba binuni baba na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , baba bakiinsuma , basoongolo , bakuma mu kanyi , mu ntiilu , na mu kifiki .
56002003	Bakyeetu ba binuni se bwobumosi , mu kidziingu kya bo basoongo nzelu yayelemene mu bangisi . Yaa baba na makele ko , yaa baba bankutu ba nwiinu malu ya mawaamba ko , ngo baba bayikisi ba mamabwe ,
56002004	mpisi heki bayikisa bantuumba , bwakutiila balumi na baala ,
56002005	baba basokomo , bakiinsa manyutu maaku , bakwesa bisalu mu nzo , babweeye mutima , bakwetumuma kuri balumi baaku , mpisi heki maampu ma Nzaambi mahele kuba masaanu .
56002006	Syaamisa minkuula se bwobumosi , baba basokomo
56002007	mu myominso . Ye-meene se , soongo kifwaani mu biyiriki byabibwete , nsyemukunu na lukiinsu kunsa nyikisulu .
56002008	Maampu ma ye hemese maba matsyeemeke , mahele na bwa kumanwaanisina , mpisi heki bataatu bafwa nsoni , bahele kubaka ntoono yayibi yi batuseembele .
56002009	Bankutu baba batumuma kuri bamfumu ba bo-meene mu myominso , baba na mbweeyulu , yaa baba na muhaawu ko ,
56002010	yaa beyiba ko , ngo bamonokoso mu myominso kanyi dyadibwete , mpisi babweeyese mu myominso , nyikusulu dza Mubvuukisi weetu Nzaambi .
56002011	Mukwongo , bweese bwa Nzaambi Mubvuukisi , bwamonokono kuri baatu bobanso .
56002012	Bwo buri mu kwetuyikisa , mpisi heki bu tubisiri bungooyi na nyiimunu dza nsi , twenata kidziingu kya ntaangu ya lumalu , mu kusokomo , mu nsungumunu na mu kinzaambi ,
56002013	mu kwekiingila nsiitu yayibwete , na monokunu nkeembu ya Nzaambi wadzaangama , na ya Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo .
56002014	Nde wayekiri nyutu yaandi mu ntoono beetu , mpisi katukuula mu momanso mamabi , na kutsyemekese kaanda dya nde-meene dyasoolu , diri na kuheme mu biyiriki byabibwete .
56002015	Ye yelemini kudzoonsolo mu mamo , kusyaamisa na seembe mu lutumu lwolunso . Muutu yaa kakunyaafuna ko .
56003001	Baambula mwooyo kuri bo ti , bayelemini kuba batumuma kuri baatu balukiinsu na kuri bari na lutumu ; baba na bintambukulu , na baba bayirima mu mpisi kiyiriki kyakibwete .
56003002	Muutu kutuka pe , kuba pe bangaa-bikiindu , baba na bumpoombo , basoongo bundeembu kuri baatu bobanso .
56003003	Mukwongo , mu ntaangu yayikulu beetuneenu se twaba biwulu , bangaa-nko , badziimbila , twaba mu bunkutu bwa nyiimunu na biminu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , twaba kwelutisa ntaangu mu mamabi na mu musoki , twaba baatu bari babele na bakwebelesene bo na bo .
56003004	Ngo mu ntaangu yamonokini mbweeyulu na ntiilu ya Nzaambi Mubvuukisi weetu mu baatu ,
56003005	nde watubvuukisa , kari mu ntoono biyiriki byansuungumunu , bi twaba twayirika ko , ngo mu ngebe dzaandi , mu muswaaka wa mbutukulu yamoono , na mu nkitukulu yamoono ya Mpeeve Yangisi .
56003006	Mpeeve yiyo nde kari katsyaamuna ha yulu beetu , kwa mansaalisi mu Yesu Kiristo Mubvuukisi weetu ,
56003007	mpisi heki mu bweese bwaandi , tuba twalulukusu , na tuba bakondiri ba saala , bunu buri nsiitu dza kidziingu kya bibvu ngo bibvu .
56003008	Maampu mamama mayelemene mu kusiila kanyi , na me ntiiri ti ye yirika kutswiikisa dyaambu didyo , mpisi heki bamwaasiila kanyi mu Nzaambi , batsimina na baheele mutima mu biyiriki byabibwete . Mimyo miri myamibwete na miri mufunu kuri baatu .
56003009	Yelemini kwebata nkalikisi dza buwulu , miloongo mya kinkaaka , mayumu na kubakana mu mitariri mangisi : bibyo byahele mufunu na byabuunu .
56003010	Muutu wukwekotoso nkabunu , wumanaa kumulubula lwatete na lwadzoolo , wumuwuungiri .
56003011	Ye yaari kuri ti , muutu wa bubwo wawumuka , wuyirikaa masumu , na wabwiisa nyutu yaandi nde-meene .
56003012	Mu ntaangu yi nyisindika me Artema kuri ye , bunu pe Tikiko , lo salila makwa mu kwiisa ku nyiri me ku Nikopoli , bukuri kukwo , me nyiri nyatsima kulutisila ntaangu ya kyoosi .
56003013	Ha kuri Dzena , nzoonsi , na Apolo bibari na nzala byo mu budyeengi bwaaku , mpisi heki baba ki bahelele pe .
56003014	Baatu ba beetuneenu se , bayelemini kuyika kuheele mutima mu biyiriki byabibwete , mu kubaka bibari na nzala byo bya mufunu , mpisi heki bahele kuba baatu bahele na bimbutu .
56003015	Bobanso bari na me hamaha , bakuheekiri mboto . Ha mboto kuri banduku baturi mu kanyi . Bweese buba na beenu-banso .
57001001	Me Pawulo , boroko dya Kiristo Yesu , na mpaangi Timoteho , kuri Filemone , mbaasi yeetu ya mutima na ya kisalu ,
57001002	kuri kibusi Afya , kuri Arkipo , mbaasi yeetu ya binwaanunu , na kuri dibuundu dikutukunaana mu nzo yaaku .
57001003	Bweese na kiyeengi bifumunaana kuri Taayi dyeetu Nzaambi , na kuri Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , biba na beenu .
57001004	Me nyibvutulaana matoondo , mantaangu momanso , kuri Nzaambi yaami , bu nyikutoolaana mu nsaambulu dzaami ,
57001005	bu nkooyukaana badzoonsolo mu ntiilu na kanyi bi wuri na byo mu Mfumu Yesu , na mu ntoono bangisi bobanso ,
57001006	kuri heki kintwaari kya kanyi dyaaku , kiba na keketee mu nyaabulu mamabwe momanso , mari mu beetu mu ntoono Kiristo .
57001007	Me nyamwii kiminu kyalaka na nyataamburi mboondulu , mu ntoono ntiilu yaaku ; bukuri mu ye mpaangi , mitima mya bangisi myadzuunini .
57001008	Mukwongo , bu nyiri na nsiitu dzalaka mu Kiristo , mu kukutuma mamo ma yelemene ,
57001009	nyibweese kukuyingukila , mu ntoono ya ntiilu , bunu bu nyiri , me Pawulo mu lumalu kinuni , na se boroko dya Kiristo Yesu ,
57001010	me nyikuyingukila mu ntoono mwaana me wa mubakala , Onesimo , wu nyiri nyabuta kunsa bikonyi .
57001011	Mu ntaangu yaluta , nde waba wahele mufunu ; ngo mu lumalu , weki mufunu kuri ye na me .
57001012	Me mbweesiri kumuheeke kuri ye , nde makila ma me-meene .
57001013	Me mbeeri ntiiri kumukebe hari me-meene , mpisi heki , ha kibeendu kya ye , nde kansalila mu ntaangu yi nyiri mu bikonyi , mu ntoono Musamu Wamubwete .
57001014	Ngo me nsiiri kutya kuyirika ntoono kwahele kitsimi kya ye ko , mpisi kiyiriki kyaaku kyakibwete , kihele kuba mu kukwiikisa , ngo bunu buri nyukulu yaaku .
57001015	Kampe mu ntoono yiyo Onesimo kabeeri wahaambuka na ye mu mwaa ntaangu , mpisi heki , ye wumutaambula kwakinkulu ,
57001016	kari bunu nkutu ko ; ngo bu bvuriri bubwete ti na nkutu , mpaangi ya mutima ; mbiki ti mu me , ngo bvula-bvula mu ye , mu kimuutu na mu Mfumu .
57001017	Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti ye wuhololo me bunu mbaasi yaaku , lo mutaambula bunu me .
57001018	Mbuti nde wakuyirikila mamabi , bunu pe wuri na kibiimbu kya ye , lo ntetikele myo .
57001019	Meme Pawulo , ntinini mu kooko kwa me-meene , me sa nyafuta , mu kuhele kuleele kuri ye ti , ye-meene wuri kibiimbu kuri me .
57001020	Heehe , mpaangi , nyirikila mamo mu Mfumu . Dzuunisa mutima waami mu Kiristo .
57001021	Mu nsiitu mu bintambukulu bya ye , me nyikutinini bu nyaari ti , sa yirika mabvuriri kiteesu ti na ma nyikuleeriri .
57001022	Mu ntaangu yo yimosi , yirikila me se kibeendu ki wuntambukila ; me nyiri na nsiitu ti mu ntoono nsaambulu dzeenu , me sa bamvutula kuri beenu .
57001023	Epafale , mbaasi yaami mu Kiristo Yesu , wu turi mu boroko wukuheekiri mboto ;
57001024	Malako , Aristarako , Dema , Luka , bakwesala kintwaari na me , se ba kuheekiri mboto .
57001025	Hemese bweese bwa Mfumu Yesu Kiristo buba na kiluunsi kya beenu .
58001001	Mu ntaangu yayikulu , Nzaambi wadzoonso kuri bataayi beetu mu babikiri , mu dzoonsolo dzalaka na dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu .
58001002	Mu biluumbu bya mpotulu bimabi , nde wadzoonso kuri beetu mu mwaana wu kari kasa mukondiri bitotolo byobinso , mu nde se kari kayirika nsi .
58001003	Nde wuri kuseme kwa nkeembu yaandi , na kifwaani kya nzelu yaandi , nde wakwaata nsi mu mpinu dza maampu maandi ; bu kamana kutsyeemese baatu mu masumu , nde wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Mwa-mpuungu kunu kinsongi-yulu .
58001004	Mwaana wayeki nkati bvuriri na bambasi , ngo kari kakondolo nkuumbu yibvuriri bubwete na bo .
58001005	Mukwongo , Nzaambi wahele kuleele ti kuri mosi mu bambasi ti : « Ye wuri Mwaana me , lumalu me nyikubutiri . » Na wahele bweese kuleele ti : « Me sa nyaba Taayi kuri nde , na nde sa kaba Mwaana kuri me . »
58001006	Na mu ntaangu yi kabweese kusuusa Mwaana watete mu nsi , nde waleele ti : « Bambasi ba Nzaambi bobanso bamutsukumina . »
58001007	Mu ntoono bambasi , nde waleele ti : « Nde wusaa bambasi baandi bunu biteembu , na wusaa bisari byaandi bunu milaka mya mbaawu . »
58001008	Ngo kasi mu ntoono Mwaana , nde waleele ti : « Ho ! Nzaambi , mboloko yaaku yiri ya bibvu ngo bibvu . Na lutumu lwa Kimfumu kyaaku , lutumu lwa nsungumunu .
58001009	Ye watya nsungumunu , na wabele bubayi , mu didyo Nzaambi , Nzaambi yaaku , kari ka kukila maasi ma kiminu , na kubvula kutya ye ti na bambaasi baaku . »
58001010	Na wabweese kuleele ti : « Mfumu , ye wuri , kunu mbandukulu , wayirika butoto , mayulu ngo biyiriki bya myooko myaaku ;
58001011	byo sa byaluta , ngo kasi ye , bunu wuri , na byobinso sa byafuuka bunu binkuta ;
58001012	na ye sa wabifutuka bunu kiyuunga , na sa byakituka bunu bu kituka kinkuta , ngo kasi ye wuri bwobumosi , na mibvu mya ye miwa ko . »
58001013	Nde wahele kuleele kuri ti mosi mu bambasi ti : « Dzakala ha lubaka lwa me , natee ku nyisuusa me , bataatu baaku , baba nkata-miilu myaaku . »
58001014	Bambasi bobanso , mampeeve ma bari baheeke mu kisalu mu ntoono babo bakondolo mvuukulu .
58002001	Hango-nkuumbu , beetu tuyelemini kuhololo mu bunkete bwalaka , mamo ma turi twayuka mpisi tuhele kuwumuka .
58002002	Mukwongo , mbuti maampu mayaabisiri bambasi mayende mu mana , na mbuti bobanso basinini mangisi , na basii nko bataamburi museendu wayelemene .
58002003	Ngo dyaburi beetu tubvuukila , mbuti tunyaafuni mvuukulu yayinene yiyo , yiri Mfumu wabaandikiri kuyaabisa , tumi babo bayukiri beki tswiikisa kuri beetu ,
58002004	mu kusiingisa kimbaangi kya Nzaambi mu bidiimbu , mu bimaangu , na biyiriki bya mpinu bya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , na mu bikabu bya Mpeeve Yangisi , bunu buri kutya kwaandi .
58002005	Mukwongo , kari kuri bambasi ko , nde kari kaha lutumu lwa nsi yikwiisa , yi turi mu kudzoonsolo .
58002006	Ngo mu Matinu , muutu mosi wata kimbaangi waleele ti : « Muutu , na kari , kuri ye wumubambukila mwooyo ? Bunu pe , mwaana muutu na kari , kuri ye wumutsimina ?
58002007	Ye wamukulula mwaa-kiteesu kibvuriri buntele na kya bambasi , ye wamulwiika lukoongolo lwa nkeembu na lwa lukiinsu ,
58002008	ye wasuusa byobinso kunsa bitaambi byaandi . » Mukwongo , bu kasuusa byobinso kunsa lutumu lwaandi , lo kuri kitotolo ti kimosi ko kyahele kuba kunsa lutumu lwaandi . Mu lumalu , beetuneenu twakiri kumono pe , ti byobinso biri kunsa lutumu lwaandi ;
58002009	ngo kasi tumono kuri ti , Yesu , wunde wubakuriri mu mwaa-kiteesu kibvuriri buntele , ti na kya bambasi , mu ntoono mpasi dza lufwa , nde bamulwiika lukoongolo lwa nkeembu na lwa lukiinsu , mpisi heki mu bweese bwa Nzaambi , nde kabiimba lufwa mu ntoono baatu bobanso .
58002010	Mukwongo , bwaba bwayelemene kuri wunde wuri , byobinso biri mu ntoono ya nde , na byayirimina kuri nde , mu kunata baala balaka mu nkeembu , na kukukisa mvuukulu ya bo , mu mpasi dza wunde wabaandikiri mvuukulu yiyo .
58002011	Bukuri muhe bungisi , na bataamburi ba bungisi bobanso , bafumuna mu muutu mosi . Mu ntoono yiyo , nde wahele kumono nsoni mu ku bateele ti bampaangi baandi ,
58002012	na wuleele ti : « Me sa nyayaabisa nkuumbu yaaku kuri bampaangi baami , me sa nyakusiika ha kakati dya dibuundu . »
58002013	Na wubweese kuleele ti : « Me sa nsa nsiitu mu nde . » Wubweese kuleele ti : « Me ndewu , na baala ba mpa zaambi . »
58002014	Ngo bukuri baala babo bari na nyutu ya muswinyi na makila , na nde se wabaka nyutu ya bubwo , mpisi heki mu lufwa lwaandi , nde kamana makwa ma wunde waba na lutumu mu lufwa , ngo dyabulu ,
58002015	na kukuula , babo bari mu ntoono boomo bwa lufwa , baba kunsa bunkutu mu kidziingu kyaaku kyokinso .
58002016	Mukwongo , diri dyangwanwa ti , nde wahele kwiisa mu kubakisa bambasi ngo mu kubakisa bapalila mu Abalaami .
58002017	Mu didyo , nde kaba kafwanikina na bampaangi baandi mu myominso , mpisi kaba mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , ngaa-ngebe na wakwiikama mu kisalu kya Nzaambi , mu kufuta masumu ma baatu .
58002018	Bukuri , nde-meene bu kamono mpasi , mu nsindukulu , lo wakuka mu kubakisa babo bakotaana mu nsindukulu .
58003001	Hango , bampaangi bangisi , beenu luri kintwaari mu mbila ya ku yulu , siilee mutima mu wunde wuri ntumu , na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , wu turi twasiila kanyi , ngo Yesu .
58003002	Nde wakwiikama kuri wunde wamusooriri , « bunu bwaba Moose mu nzo yaandi yoyinso . »
58003003	Mukwongo , munkeembu wa nde bvuriri bunene ti na wa Moose , bukuri mutuungi-nzo , wubvulaa kubaka lukiinsu ti na nzo yo-meene .
58003004	Mukwongo , mpisi nzo yiri yatuungu kuri muutu , ngo watuunga byobinso Nzaambi .
58003005	Moose waba wakwiikama mu nzo yaandi yoyinso , bunu kisari mu kuta kimbaangi mu misamu mi baketi kuleele .
58003006	Ngo Kiristo , wuri bunu Mwaana mu nzo , na nzo yiyo ngo beetu , mbuti tukebiri kifiki na kimweese kya nsiitu .
58003007	Hango-nkuumbu , bunu buleele Mpeeve Yangisi : « Lolo di , mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi ,
58003008	lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko , bunu mu ntaangu ya tungu , mu kiluumbu kya nsiitsulu ku nsi yankatu ,
58003009	kuri bataayi ba beenu , baholaa , bakotisiri me mu nsindukulu , mu kutsiitsa me , na bo bamwiini biyiriki bya me ,
58003010	mu mibvu makuumi mana . Hango-nkuumbu , me nyabakiri kiseendu kikyo nkesi , na me nyaleeriri ti : " Bo bakwewumuka mu mitima mpisi ntaangu , na bahele kuyaaba manzila maami . "
58003011	Mu bubwo , me nyalabiri kunsa nkesi dzaami ti : bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko . »
58003012	Seenee madyeele , bampaangi , mpisi kuhele kuba mu beenu muutu ti mosi , wuba na mutima-bubi , wahele na kanyi , wutatuka na Nzaambi yamwooyo ,
58003013	ngo kasi , syamisineenu beenu na beenu mpisi kiluumbu , mbuti nyabusulu ya « lolo di » bunu yiri , mpisi heki ti mosi mu beenu kahele kukubisa mutima , bu kabwiiri mu mpumukunu ya masumu .
58003014	Bukuri beetu turi bakweyeende kintwaari na Kiristo , mbuti tukebiri na keketee kibeendu kyeetu ku mbandukulu natee ku manunu .
58003015	Bunu bu diri dyaleele ti : « Lolo di , mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi , lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko , bunu mu ntaangu ya tungu . »
58003016	Mukwongo , ba na bari bayukaana mbeembu bayitungukiri ? Buri kari bobanso babo bapariri mu Ngipiti , mu ntwalusulu ya Moose ko ?
58003017	Ba na nde kabakiri nkesi mu makuumi mana ma mibvu ? Buri kari babo bayirikiri masumu , bari baholaa bafwiiri mu nsi yankatu ko ?
58003018	Kuri ba na nde kalabiri ti : « Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaandi ko » , mbuti ka kuri babo basiiri nko ko ?
58003019	Na beetu tumono ti bo basii kubangisina kukoto ko , mu ntoono kuhele kwa kanyi .
58004001	Ngo tuseenee madyeele , lusiilulu lwa kukoto mu mpuumunu yaandi bu lwakiri , muutu mu beenu kahele kumono kuri ti , nde wasaala ku lumperi .
58004002	Bukuri beetuneenu , turi babo bataambula Musamu Wamubwete , bunu buri babamosi ; ngo kasi , bo basii bakila ndaandu mu maampu ma bayukiri ko , bukuri bo basii bvuutuna mu kanyi , kintwaari na bambaasi bayukiri mo ko .
58004003	Mukwongo , beetuneenu bangaa-kanyi , turi mu kukoto mu mpuumunu bunu bu kari kaleele ti : « Kunsa nkesi dzaami me nyalabiri ti : Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko ! » Ti bukuri biyiriki , byawa kuyirima kuholosono kunu mbandukulu nsi .
58004004	Mukwongo , mu Matinu mwaleele mu ntoono kiluumbu kyansaamu ti : « Na Nzaambi wawuuma mu kiluumbu kyansaamu mu bisalu byaandi byobinso . »
58004005	Na ha kibeendu kinikyo , nde bweese kuleele ti : « Bo ka bakoto mu mpuumunu yaami ko . »
58004006	Hango bukuri dyaleele kuri ti , babamosi bakoto mu mpuumunu , na babo batekisiri kutaambula Musamu Wamubwete , bakoto ko mu ntoono nko ,
58004007	nde wabweese kusoolo kiluumbu « lolo di » . Mantaangu bu maluta , nde waleele mu mikuunga mya Davidi , bunu bu katekesele kuleele ti : « Lolo di , mbuti luyukiri mbeembu yaandi lo yaa lukubisa mitima myeenu ko . »
58004008	Mukwongo , mbuti Yoswa wabakotisiri mu mpuumunu , nkani Nzaambi kaketi kudzoonsolo mu kiluumbu kikimi , ha mambisa haho ko .
58004009	Hango , kwakiri kiluumbu kya mpuumunu , mu ntoono baatu ba Nzaambi .
58004010	Mukwongo , wunde wukotiri mu mpuumunu yaandi , lo wuumini se mu bisalu byaandi , bunu bwa wuumini Nzaambi mu bisalu byaandi .
58004011	Ngo , tubingikileenu mu kukoto mu mpuumunu yiyo , mpisi heki kuhele kuba muutu wubwa bwobumosi mu nko .
58004012	Mukwongo , maampu ma Nzaambi mari mwooyo , mari na mpinu , mabvuriri kutwa ti na mpisi saabala dya mabusu moolo , dipaakaa natee haambiri kiluunsi na muheebulu , biyikulu na muluku . Mafyongokinaa , ma kwetsuna muutu , na bitsimi bya mutima .
58004013	Kwahele kiyiriki ti kimosi kyahele kumonokono ha busu bwaandi , byobinso biri mpene na byayalulu ha miisu myaandi , kuri nde mbasi-tsuku tuyalimina mabuungu .
58004014	Hango , bu turi na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wataba mayulu , Yesu , Mwaana Nzaambi , tukwaatee na keketee kimbaangi kya kanyi .
58004015	Mukwongo , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wu turi na nde , wakuka mu kutubakisa mu buyonsi bweetu . Nde bamukotoso mu nsindukulu mu myominso bunu beetuneenu , ngo kasii bwa mu masumu ko .
58004016	Hango , tukokosoleenu na nsiitu yoyinso ha teke mboloko ya bweese , mpisi tutaambulee ngebe , na bweese mu kubaka lubakusu mu ntaangu yayelemene .
58005001	Mukwongo , mpisi mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wasoolu ha kakati dya baatu , na bamusuusa mu kusala mu ntoono baatu mu mitariri Nzaambi , mpisi kaha bikabu na kadzusa bibulu byaha mu kikabu mu ntoono masumu .
58005002	Nde wakuka mu kuba na nyukulu , mu bari kunsa lubu na mu badziimbila , bukuri nde-meene se wuri kunsa buyonsi .
58005003	Mu ntoono buyonsi bubwo , nde yelemini kudzusa bibulu byaha mu bikabu mu ntoono masumu ma nde-meene na ma baatu .
58005004	Kuri muutu wutaambula lukiinsu lulwo mu nde-meene ko , ngo wunu wataambula mbila Nzaambi , bunu Aaloni .
58005005	Bunubwo se , Kiristo kasii holo mu nde-meene nkeembu ya kuba mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi ko , ngo nde wayitaambula kuri wunde waleeriri ti : « Ye ngo mwaana waami , lolo di me nyikubutiri . »
58005006	Bunu bu kari mu kuleele kwakaka ti : « Ye wuri ngaanga-zaambi mu mantaangu momanso , mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke . »
58005007	Nde wuri mu biluumbu bya kidziingu kya muswiini waandi , wasaambila na wayiingikila , mu misaakulu myamila na mansangasa , wunde waba wakuka mu kumubvuukisa mu lufwa , na nde wataambula mvutu mu ntoono kutumuma kwaandi .
58005008	Ti bukuri waba Mwaana , nde wayika kuba na bintambukila mu mi kamwiinini mpasi .
58005009	Bu kakukisa kiteesu kyaandi , nde wayeki , wunde wuhaanaa mvuukulu ya mantaangu momanso , kuri bobanso bamutambukilaa .
58005010	Nzaambi waleele mu nde ti , mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke .
58005011	Mu ntoono yiyo beetu turi na myalaka mya kuleele , na miri mpasi mu kubaangula , bukuri beenu lwayeki na lunzingu mu kubakula misamu .
58005012	Beenu nkani lwayeki bayikisi na kidzika , kasi beenu , kubweese kusaka ti nkani muutu kaluyikisa misamu , nkati mya mbandukulu mya maampu ma Nzaambi , na lweki mu kiteesu kya kutya beene , nkani ka byandya byakuba ko .
58005013	Mukwongo , mpisi wunde wakiri mu kwenwa beene , lo wakiri kuyaaba pe kusobokoso maampu ma nsungumunu , bukuri nde wakiri mwaa-mwaana wansoombo .
58005014	Ngo byandya byakuba bya baatu babuuka , bo bari mu nsalulu yaaku bayeki bayaaba kusobokoso mamabwe na mamabi .
58006001	Hango-nkuumbu , yaa tubeenee munu mu nyikusulu dzatete dza mu Kiristo ko , ngo tusakeenu nyikusulu dza baatu babuuka . Yaa tutuungee lufulu lukimi ko , mu kubweese kuyiinga madyeele , mu kusiisa biyiriki byafwa , na mu kusa kanyi mu Nzaambi ;
58006002	nyikusulu mu mitariri mbotokulu , ntetukulu myooko , mfulukulu ya bafwa , mutsuundu wa manunu .
58006003	Mimyo beetu tuyirika , mbuti heki Nzaambi heeri miswa .
58006004	Mukwongo , baatu bari , bamwaataambula buungi , bamwaabiimba kikabu kya ku yulu , bamwaataambula Mpeeve Yangisi ,
