58006005	bamwaamono luwu lwa maampu ma mamabweete ma Nzaambi , na bamwaayaaba mpinu dza nsi yikwiisa ,
58006006	ngo babwiiri , lo diri dya mpasi kuri bo mu kubweese kuyiinga madyeele . Mu didyo , mu bo-meene lo babweese kukomono Mwaana Nzaambi , na kuha nzila mu kumutuka .
58006007	Mukwongo , butoto bubaanaa bunokono mamvula mu ntaangu ngo ntaangu , lo bumenisaa bitiiti biri mufunu kuri bahati ba manseke . Butoto bubwo butaambulaa lusakumunu lwaandi kuri Nzaambi .
58006008	Ngo mbuti bwo kubuta mpaanga na minkangi , lo bwahele na mufunu , na hasii hantele lo buri kunsa mpopi , na manunu kubuyoko mbaawu .
58006009	Ngo banduku ba mutima , ti bukuri turi mu kudzoonsolo bubwo , beetu tuyirikiri kuyaaba mu mitariri beenu , ti luri mu kiteesu kibvuriri bubwete , na lwakwaata mvuukulu .
58006010	Mukwongo , Nzaambi wahele na bubayi , mu kudzimbikina kisalu kyeenu , na ntiilu yi luri lwasoongo mu nkuumbu yaandi , bu lwasariri bangisi , na bu luri mu kunamitina kubasalila .
58006011	Beetu tutiiri ti mpisi muutu mu beenu , kasoongo kifiki kyokimosi , mu kutubula nsiitu mu kiteesu kyakuka , natee kumanunu ,
58006012	mpisi luhele kuba bilyeebe , ngo luba basombisiri ba babo bari mu kanyi na nkindusulu-mutima , bataambula saala dya nsiilulu .
58006013	Mukwongo , Nzaambi kabaanaa wusa lusiilulu kuri Abalaami , bu kaba wahele na muutu wubvuriri bukuutu na nde wa kulaba , nde walaba mu nkuumbu ya nde-meene ,
58006014	waleele ti : « Ngwanwa , kusakumuna , me nyikusakumuna , na kufunusa , me nyikufunusa . »
58006015	Mu bubwo , Abalaami , bu kakiindisa mutima , wataambulaa mi bamusiiriri nsiilulu .
58006016	Mukwongo , baatu babaanaa balaba maalu , lo mu nkuumbu ya wubvuriri bukuutu , mu kumana mpaka , na kutswiikisa maalu .
58006017	Mu didyo , Nzaambi bu kaba watya kusoongo na pwelelee , kuri bakoondiri ba lusiilulu , bitaasi byaandi biri byayiingaa ko , nde walaba maalu ,
58006018	mpisi heki mu misamu myoolo miri myayiingaa ko , miri lo Nzaambi wahele kusa mpya , tutaambuleenu nsyamusunu dzalaka , mu kukwaata na keketee nsiitu dzi bari batutaasila ;
58006019	dziri bunu kinko kya kidziingu kyeetu , kyakomono mu makwa na keketee , kyakaanga natee mu nsaanda Nzo-nzaambi ya ku yulu .
58006020	Mumwo mwatekisiri kukoto Yesu mu ntoono beetu , nde wayeki mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke .
58007001	Mukwongo , Melekisedeke yimayi , waba mbyaasi Saleme , ngaanga-nzaambi ya Mwa-yulu ; nde wayende mu kubwaana Abalaami , wanangukini ku mudziingu wu kabwiisiri bambyaasi , na wamusakumuna .
58007002	Abalaami , kuri nde kaheeri kikuuku kyakuumi , mu byobinso bi kabakiri . Ngo mbuti mu kubaangula nkuumbu Melekisedeke , lo dyatete nde « mbyaasi ya nsungumunu » tumi se mbyaasi Saleme , haho lo ti « mbyaasi ya kiyeengi . »
58007003	Nde wahele na taayi , wahele na nguri , wahele na muloongo kinkaaka , wahele na mbandukulu biluumbu , wahele na manunu kidziingu , wafwanikina na Mwaana Nzaambi , nde ngaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso .
58007004	Monee buri bunene bwa wunde wuri , Abalaami , nkaaka , kaholaa wumuheeri kikuuku kyakuumi , mu bibvuriri bubwete bi kabakiri .
58007005	Baala ba Levi bo se , bataambula kisalu , bari na ntumunu mu kuyisila kikuuku kyakuumi kuri baatu , bunu buri mangisi , haho lo ti , kuri bampaangi ba bo-meene , bari bo se bapalila mu Abalaami .
58007006	Melekisedeke , wuri waba wahele mu muloongo kinkaaka kya bo , wataambula kikuuku kyakuumi kuri Abalaami , na wasakumuna wunde wataamburi nsiilulu .
58007007	Ngo , kwahele nkalikisi , wa mukuutu koosakumunaa wa kilesi .
58007008	Hamaha , kikuuku kyakuumi , baatu bari lo bafwiiri bakookitaambulaa , ngo kunii muutu wu bari baleele ti wuri mwooyo .
58007009	Lo tutsiitsiri kuleele ti , ku kimbisa kya Abalaami , Levi mutaamburi kikuuku kyakuumi , nde se waheeri kikuuku kyakuumi .
58007010	Mukwongo , nde waba wakiri mu mwooyo Abalaami nkaaka , mu ntaangu ya ba kweemubwaana Melekisedeke .
58007011	Ngo mbuti nyirimunu yakuka yaba kubakila mu kisalu kya bungaanga bwa Nzaambi mu baala ba Levi , bunu buloombolo mangisi ma baatu , lo nkya mufunu baketi kumono , mu kuba na kisari kikimi mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke , nkani ka mu kiteesu mu kya Aaloni ko wu bari basoolo ?
58007012	Mukwongo , kisalu kya bungaanga bwa Nzaambi kiyiingana , lo mangisi se mayelemini kuyiinga .
58007013	Bukuri wunde wu bari mu kudzoonsolo mu misamu mimami , wa mu kitsuumbu kikimi , kyahele na muutu wasariri kisalu kya dziku .
58007014	Mukwongo , diri dyayabakana ti Mfumu yeetu wapalila mu Yuda , kitsuumbu , kiri Moose kasii leele musamu ti mosi ko , mu mitariri bangaanga-nzaambi .
58007015	Didyo dyamonoko na pwelelee , habaanaa ngaanga-nzaambi yikimi , yiri bunu Melekisedeke , yitelemini .
58007016	Nde wuri lo weki ngaanga-nzaambi , ngo kari bunu buri ntumunu dza mangisi ma kimuutu ko , kasi bunu buri mpinu dza kidziingu kyahele manunu .
58007017	Bukuri diri dyaleele ti : « Ye wuri ngaanga-zaambi mu mantaangu momanso , mu kiteesu kya Melekisedeke . »
58007018	Mukwongo , lutumu lwalukulu lwayeki lwayisulu , bukuri lwaba lwahele na makwa , na lwahele mufunu .
58007019	Bukuri mangisi mahele kunata kitotolo ti kimosi , ku nyirimunu yakuka , ngo beetu twakoto mu nsiitu yibvuriri bubwete , mu yo beetu tukokisilaa kuri Nzaambi .
58007020	Mimyo myayirimini mu ndabulu maalu , ngo kasi bakaka bayeki bangaanga-nzaambi , kwahele kulaba maalu .
58007021	Ngo nde wayeki ngaanga-nzaambi mu ndabulu maalu ma wunde waleeriri kuri nde ti : « Mfumu wayeki walaba , kabweese kuyiinga bitsimi ko : " Ye wuri ngaanga-nzaambi mu mantaangu momanso . " »
58007022	Mu kiteesu kikyo , Yesu wayeki mutamuni lulelusunu lubvuriri bubwete .
58007023	Ngo bakaka bamaba , bari balaka mu kuba bangaanga-nzaambi , bukuri lufwa lukoobakabukisa mu kunamitina kisalu .
58007024	Ngo nde bukuri wanamitina kuba mwooyo mu mantaangu momanso , wuri na kingaanga-nzaambi kiri kyawaanaa ko .
58007025	Hango-nkuumbu , nde wakuka mu kubvuukisa kwa kinkulu , babo bakookokosolaa mu nde kuri Nzaambi , bukuri nde wuri mwooyo mu mantaangu momanso , mu kusaambila mu bo .
58007026	Mukwongo , kuri beetu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi waba wayelemene ngo wabubwo . Nde wangisi , wahele na mamabi , wahele na masumu , wahaambuka na bangaa-masumu , na bamunaakisa ku nkati yulu .
58007027	Nde wahele na nzala kusa busaanaa bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi bakaka , mu kudzusa bibulu bya kuha mu kikabu mpisi kiluumbu , dyatete mu masumu ma nde-meene , tumi mu ma baatu . Bukuri mimyo nde wayirikiri mbala mosi , bu kaheeri nyutu ya nde-meene .
58007028	Mukwongo , mangisi mabyaalisaa baatu bari na buyonsi , mu kuba bakuutu ba bangaanga-nzaambi ; ngo kasi maampu ma ndabulu maalu mayisa ha mambisa ma mangisi , mabyaalisa Mwaana , watubuka mu nyirimunu yakuka , mu mantaangu momanso .
58008001	Musamu wubvuriri mufunu , mu mi turi mu kuleele , ngo wumawu : beetu turi na mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wa bubwo , wadzakala ha lubakala lwa mboloko ya bumbyaasi mu mayulu .
58008002	Kisari mu nzo yangisi na mu musaampu wangwanwa , watuungu kuri Mfumu , nkani ka kuri muutu ko .
58008003	Mukwongo , mpisi mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , bamubyaalisaa mu kuhaanaa bikabu na kudzusaa bibulu byaha mu kikabu ; haho hari mufunu kuri nde se mu kuba na kitotolo , ki kaha .
58008004	Mbuti nde waba ha butoto , nkani kaketi kuba ngaanga-nzaambi ko , bukuri kuri bakimi bakoohaanaa bikabu bunu buri mangisi .
58008005	Bo bakoosalaa kisalu , mu kusombosolo kifwaani kya bitotolo bya ku yulu , bunu bwaba yaabisa Nzaambi kuri Moose , mu kutuunga musaampu . Nde wamuleele ti : « Yirika myominso , bunu buri kifwaani kya ma bakusoongiri ku yulu mulaandu . »
58008006	Kasi mu lumalu , nde wabaka kisalu kyasoboko , kibvuriri mufunu , bukuri nde wuri munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lubvuriri bubwete , lu basiiriri nsiilulu dzibvuriri bubwete .
58008007	Mukwongo , mbuti lulelusunu lwatete lulwo , lwaba lwahele na mya maseembu , nkani baketi kusaka lwadzoolo ko .
58008008	Ngo mu kubaŋaŋina , nde wabaleele ti : « Monee , biluumbu biri mu kukwiisa , bu leele Mfumu , me sa nyasa lulelusunu lwamoono na nzo Isaheli na ya Yuda .
58008009	Lwo lubweese kuba bunu buri lulelusunu , lu nyasiiri na bataayi ba bo ko , mu kiluumbu ki nyabakweeti mu kooko , mu kubapalisa mu nsi ya Ngipiti . Me nyabayekiri , bukuri bo-meene , basii namitina kuba mu lulelusunu lwaami ko , bu leele Mfumu .
58008010	Lulelusunu lu nyisa me na nzo ya Isaheli , luri bumabu : ha mambisa ma biluumbu bibyo , bu leele Mfumu : me sa nyabaha mangisi maami , me sa nyamatina mu mitima mya bo : me sa mba Nzaambi bo na bo sa baba baatu baami .
58008011	Ka kuba muutu ti mosi ko , wuyikisa mbaasi yi bari nsi mosi , bunu mpe wuleele kuri mpaangi yaandi ti : yaaba Mfumu ! Mukwongo , bobanso sa bayaaba me , kuholosono bilesi natee bakuutu mu bo ,
58008012	bukuri me sa nyahemesene lumvuki lwa bo , na ka nyibweese kubaambukila mwooyo mu masumu ma bo ko . »
58008013	Habaanaa wudzoonsolo mu lulelusunu lwamoono , lo nde sii kuri ti lwatete luba lwalukulu ; ngo bibyo byeki byabikulu na byanuna , byeki bele mu kudziimbila .
58009001	Lulelusunu lwatete lwaba na mikele mya lusaambulu , na nzo yangisi ya ha butoto .
58009002	Mukwongo , mu musaampu watete wu batelimisi , wu baba leelaana ti nzo yangisi , mwaba kitetukulu kya mwiinda , taabala , na mampa maha mu kikabu .
58009003	Ku mbisa nsaanda yamoolo , kwaba kihekiri ki baba teelaana ti kibeendu kyangisi na ngisi .
58009004	Mumwo mwaba dziku dya woolo , di baba yokilaana mananaasi , na sanduku dya lulelusunu dyalata woolo mpele na mpele , munsa dyo mwaba kisa kya woolo kyaba na maana , mwaba se luboto lwa Aaloni , lwaba na bifulu , na matari ma lulelusunu .
58009005	Ha yulu sanduku haba bakeluba ba biteki bya nkeembu , basa mposi ha kibeendu ki bayiitulaa makila ma ndoombulu mpemisi mu masumu . Kwahele kwaandi mufunu mu kunonono mutatu .
58009006	Bitotolo bibyo byaba byasuusa mumwo , na bangaanga-nzaambi , mu mpisi ntaangu , baba kotaana mu musaampu watete , mu kusa kisalu kyaaku .
58009007	Mu musaampu wamyoolo , wunu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , waba kotaana mbala mosi mu mubvu , na makila ma kuha kikabu mu ntoono lumvuki lwa nde-meene , na lwa baatu .
58009008	Mpeeve Yangisi yaba soongaana bubwo ti , nzila ya nzo yangisi yakiri kudzibula pe , bukuri musaampu watete waba wakiri wateleme .
58009009	Yiyo nkuma mu ntaangu ya lumalu , yisoongo ti bikabu , na bibulu byadzusu mu kikabu , byahele kukuka mu kunata mu nyirimunu yakuka , mu nsimunu yaandi , muutu wunde wukoosaambilaa .
58009010	Mimyo mini mikele mya kimuutu , mu mitariri byandya , bya kunwa na nswaakulu nyutu ya bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , mi bari baha mya kubvumina natee mu ntaangu ya nyiingulu misamu .
58009011	Kasi Kiristo wayisa bunu mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi , mu bitotolo byabibwete byeki haaka . Nde wakoto mu musaampu wubvuriri bunene , na wubvuriri kuyirima , wahele kuyirima mu myooko mya baatu , haho lo ti wahele kuba wa biyiriki bya nsi yimayi .
58009012	Nde wakoto mbala mosi mu nzo yangisi , kari na makila ma bantaba na ma bangoombo ko , ngo na makila ma nde-meene , mu kutamuna nkuululu yahele manunu .
58009013	Bukuri , mbuti makila ma bantaba , na ma bangoombo , na lufutu lwa mukasi ngoombo , lu bayitila ha yulu basumuka , lubahaanaa bungisi mu ntoono nsyemusunu ya muswiini ,
58009014	lo makila ma Kiristo , waheeri nyutu yaandi yahele na kipfuumi , mu Mpeeve ya mantaangu momanso kuri Nzaambi , mabvuriri kutsyeemese nsimunu yeetu mu biyiriki byafwa , mu kusalila Nzaambi yamwooyo .
58009015	Mu didyo , nde kari munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lwamoono , mpisi heki lufwa lwaandi , bu lwayisa mu kukuula baatu mu lumvuki lu basiiri , mu lulelusunu lwatete , babo bayuka mbila , bataambula Saala dya mantaangu momanso , di bari babasiila .
58009016	Bukuri haho hari misiku mya muutu mu masaala , diri mufunu mu kusoongo kuri ti muutu wunde wafwa .
58009017	Mukwongo , misiku mya muutu mu masaala ndaandu kuri muutu wunde weki wafwa , ngo habaanaa muutu wakiri mwooyo , lo miri ndaandu ko .
58009018	Mu didyo , lulelusunu lwatete , ka lwaketi kubaandika kwahele makila ko .
58009019	Moose , kamanaa kutaanga ntumu lumosi-lumosi , bunu buri mu mangisi , ha busu bwa bobanso , ha keki holaana makila ma baala ba bangoombo na ma bantaba , mu kusaanga na maampa , na kuholo kimpaala kya isopi kyakaanga myoosi mya bibulu myabeenge ; tumi ha kanyaka mo ha yulu mukaanda mangisi , na ha yulu baatu bobanso ,
58009020	na waleele ti : « Mamama ngo makila ma lulelusunu lwatuma Nzaambi mu beenu . »
58009021	Nde wanyaka se makila ha yulu musaampu na ha yulu bisalulu byobinso bya lusaambulu .
58009022	Byobinso mpaangi-pe biri byatsyeemusu mu makila , bunu bu loombolo mangisi , na ka kuri mpemisi ko , kwahele nsyamukunu makila .
58009023	Ngo mbuti bibyo byafwanikina na bitotolo bya ku yulu byatsyeemusu mu nzila yiyo , lo diri mufunu ti bitotolo bya ku yulu byo-meene , biba byatsyeemusu mu nzusulu bibulu bibvuriri bubwete byaha mu kikabu .
58009024	Mukwongo , Kiristo wahele kukoto mu manzo mangisi , matuungu mu myooko mya baatu , mari kini kifwaani kya nzo yangisi yangwanwa , ngo wakoto mu yulu dyo-meene , mu kumonokono lumalu ha busu bwa Nzaambi mu ntoono beetu .
58009025	Kari mu kuri ti kaha nyutu yaandi mbala dzalaka ko , bu koosaanaa mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi wukotaa mu nzo yangisi Mpisi mubvu , na makila mahele kuba ma nde-meene .
58009026	Bukuri , lo nde keti kumonaa mpasi mbala dzalaka , kuholosono kwayirimini nsi . Ngo kasi mu lumalu , Kiristo wamonokono mbala mosi , ku manunu ntaangu , mu kuyaala masumu mu mpeelu nyutu ya nde-meene bunu kikabu .
58009027	Ngo bukuri dyadzeengu kuri ti , baatu bafwa mbala mosi kitsu , ha mambisa haho , mutsuundu wiisiri ,
58009028	bunubwo se , Kiristo bamuha mu kikabu mbala mosi , mu kuyusula masumu ma fundu-fundu dya baatu , na kumonokono lwadzoolo kwahele masumu , kuri babo bamukiinga , mpisi kabaha mvuukulu .
58010001	Mangisi ma Moose mahele kusoongo bunu buri bitotolo , ngo kasi kini kifwaani kya bitotolo bikwiisa ; na nzusulu bibulu byaha mu kikabu , mpisi mubvu , kwahele manunu , yahele kubangisina kunata ku nyirimunu yakuka , babo bakokosolaa kuri Nzaambi .
58010002	Mbuti babo basambukila mu kiteesu kikyo , bakotaambulaa nsyemukunu ya masumu mbala mosi , nkani lo bahele bweese kuba kunsa kibila mu nsimunu yaaku , na nkani bayeki bahoto kuha bikabu .
58010003	Ngo nzusulu bibulu byaha mu kikabu yiyo , yikoohaanaa mbambukulu mwooyo mu masumu , mpisi mubvu .
58010004	Bukuri kuri ti bele ko ti , makila ma bangoombo na ma bantaba mayusula masumu .
58010005	Hango-nkuumbu , bu kayisa ha nsi nde waleele : « Ye wasii tya kuri ti bakudzusula kibulu na bakuha kikabu ko , ngo kasi ye wampa nyutu .
58010006	Ye wasii mono kiminu ko , mu nzusulu na nyokulu bibulu , na mu bikabu mu ntoono masumu .
58010007	Ngo me nyaleele ti : " Ho ! Nzaambi , mono , me nyiisiri , mu kuyirika kutya kwa ye , bunu bu diri dyatinu mu nkwaala mukaanda , mu ntoono me . " »
58010008	Tekesele mamo nde waleele ti : « Ye wasii tya na wasii mono kiminu ko , mu nzusulu ya bibulu na mu bikabu , mu nyokulu bibulu na mu bikabu , mu ntoono masumu . » Bikabu bibyo babihaanaa bunu bu loombolo mangisi .
58010009	Hango nde wubweese kuleele ti : « Mono , me nyiisiri mu kuyirika kutya kwa ye . » Mu didyo , nde yisiri nsambukulu yatete na suusiri nsambukulu yamoolo .
58010010	Mu kutya kukwo , beetu turi twataambula bungisi , mu Yesu Kiristo waheeri nyutu yaandi bunu kikabu lwo lumosi .
58010011	Mpisi ngaanga-nzaambi wutelemaa mpisi kiluumbu mu kusa kisalu kyaandi , na mu kudzusa bibulu byaha mu kikabu mbala dzalaka , ngo byo byahele kubangisina kuyusula masumu .
58010012	Ngo kasi , nde bu kaheeri kikabu kya kudzusa mu ntoono masumu , wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi kwakinkulu .
58010013	Mu lumalu , nde wuri mu kukiinga , natee ku basuusiri bataatu baandi , kuri baba nkata-miilu myaandi .
58010014	Mukwongo , mu kikabu kyokimosi , nde kari kanata ku nyirimunu yakuka kwakinkulu , babo ba kari kaha bungisi .
58010015	Mpeeve Yangisi se yiri mu kutuswikisila dyo . Nde wuleele ha mambisa haho ti :
58010016	« Lumalu ngo lulelusunu lu nyikaanga me beetu na bo , ha mambisa ma biluumbu bibyo , bu leele Mfumu : me sa nyabaha mangisi maami mu mitima , na me sa nyamatina mu bitsimi bya bo . »
58010017	Na ti : « Me mbweese kubambukila mwooyo , mu masumu ma bo , na mu lumvuki lwa bo , ti mu mwaa-ntaangu mosi ko . »
58010018	Ngo haho hari mpemisi , lo babweese kuha kikabu mu ntoono masumu ko .
58010019	Hango bampaangi , beetuneenu turi na nsiitu ya kukoto mu nzo yangisi mu makila ma Yesu .
58010020	Nde watudzibukila nzila yamoono na yamwooyo , ha lumbisa lwa nsaanda yiri nyutu yaandi ,
58010021	na turi na ngaanga-nzaambi yayinene , mu nzo ya Nzaambi .
58010022	Ngo hemese tukokosoleenu mu mutima wa mutsiina , na kanyi dyakuka , kuri mutima watsyeemese mu bitsimi byabibi , na nyutu yaswaaku mu maampa matsyeeme .
58010023	Hemese tukebeenu nsiitu yi turi mu kweyaabisa , kwahele mpololo-bito , bukuri wunde wasa lusiilulu wakwiikama .
58010024	Hemese tukebesenee manyutu beetu na beetu , mu kubaka nsyamusunu mu ntiilu na mu biyiriki byabibwete .
58010025	Yaa tuyekelee dibuundu dyeetu ko , buri kifu kya babamosi , ngo tusyaamisineenu beetu na beetu , bu tuyaari kuri ti kiluumbu kikokisiri .
58010026	Bukuri mbuti tunamitini mu kweyirika masumu , mu kutya kwa beetu-meene , ha mambisa ma kuyaaba ngwanwa , lo kusii nzusulu bibulu mu ntoono masumu ko ,
58010027	ngo bisiiri lo kunu kukiinga mutsuundu wansisi na mbaawu ya makwa , mbasi-tsuku yiyoko bangaa-tungu .
58010028	Mpisi wusinina mangisi ma Moose , lo kusa kumudzusa kwahele kyaari , mbuti kuri baatu boolo bunu pe batatu , bata kimbaangi mu ma kayirikiri .
58010029	Heki lo buri beenu lutsima bubeele bunene bwa maseembu , ma baha kuri wunde wusaana Mwaana Nzaambi , wunyaafuna makila ma lulelusunu ma kari kabakala bungisi , na kutuka Mpeeve ya bweese ?
58010030	Mukwongo , beetu tuyaari wunde waleele ti : « Me nyibvutula kitete , me nyiha museendu » , na wabweese kuleele ti : « Mfumu sa katsuundisa baatu baandi . »
58010031	Diri dyansisi mu kubwa mu myooko mya Nzaambi yamwooyo .
58010032	Baambukeenu mwooyo mu biluumbu byatete , biri beenu lumanaa kutaambula buungi , beenu lwakuunda kikiindu kyakinene na kya mpasi .
58010033	Mu mantaangu mamosi , baba kwelutuka na kwelukwaamisa ha busu bwa baatu ; mu mantaangu makaka beenu lwaba mu kibari kya babo ba baba yirikila ma bubwo .
58010034	Mukwongo , beenu lwakabula mpasi dza babo baba mu boroko , na beenu lwataambula mu kiminu , ti baluhosono na bitotolo byeenu , bu lwaba luyaari kuri ti luri na busina bubvuriri bubwete , na buri bwawaana ko .
58010035	Ngo yaa luyekele nsiitu yeenu ko , mu yo muri museendu wamunene .
58010036	Mukwongo , beenu luri na nzala kuba na kifiki , mu kukukisa kutya kwa Nzaambi , na kutaambula bi kari kasa lusiilulu .
58010037	Bukuri dyatinu ti : « Hasiiri hantele , mwaa ntaangu yantele , na wunde wukwiisa sa kiisa , kadziingila ko .
58010038	Ngaa-kusuunguma waami sa kaba mwooyo mu kanyi , ngo mbuti yekiri , lo muheebulu waami kamono kiminu mu nde ko . »
58010039	Beetu turi babo bakooyekelaa mu kudziimbila ko , ngo turi babo bari na kanyi mu kukala miheebulu myeetu .
58011001	Kanyi ngo nsiitu mu bitotolo bi bakookiingaa , bitotolo bya nsiitu , nkangumunu yangwanwa mu bitotolo bi bahele kumono .
58011002	Mu kanyi didyo , bari ba bateelele bankaaka kimbaangi .
58011003	Mu kanyi , beetu tukoobakalaa ti mansi mayirimini mu maampu ma Nzaambi , kuri lo bitotolo byamonokono , byayirimina mu bitotolo byahele kumonokono .
58011004	Mu kanyi , Abele kaheeri kuri Nzaambi kikabu kya kudzusa kibvuriri bubwete ti na kya Kayini . Mu kanyi didyo , nde bari bamuteelele kimbaangi ti nde wasuunguma , Nzaambi nde-meene wata kimbaangi mu bikabu byaandi . Mu kanyi didyo nde kakiri mu kwedzoonso ti bukuri wayeki wafwa .
58011005	Mu kanyi , Enoki bamunata ku yulu mpisi kahele kumono lufwa , na basii bweese kumumono ko , bukuri Nzaambi wamuneti , ngo tekesele bamunata , nde bamuteeriri kimbaangi ti wabweeye kuri Nzaambi .
58011006	Ngo mbuti kanyi dyo pe , lo kuri muutu wubweeye kuri Nzaambi ko ; bukuri wunde wukokosolo kuri Nzaambi , yelemini kutaambula ti Nzaambi wuri , na nde koohaanaa museendu kuri babo bamusakaa .
58011007	Mu kanyi , Nowa wataambula ndubululu kuri Nzaambi , mu ntoono bitotolo byaba byakiri kumonokono pe , mu mutima wa kinzaambi nde watuunga nzo ya kiluungu , mu kubvuukisa nzo yaandi ; mu kanyi nde kari kabwiisa nsi , na mu kanyi nde kayeki mukondiri saala dya nsungumunu .
58011008	Mu kanyi , Abalaami katumumini mu mbila yi kayukiri , mu kweende ku nsi yi kaba kayelemene kutaambula bunu saala , na wayende kwahele kuyaaba ku kaba kweende .
58011009	Mu kanyi , nde wayende kwedzakala ku nsi ya lusiilulu , buni ku nsi ya bunzeense , nde waba dzakalaana kunsa musaampu bunu ba Isaki na Yakobe , bari bakondiri ba saala dya lusiilulu lwo lumosi na nde .
58011010	Bukuri nde waba kiingaana bvula diri na lufulu lwamakwa , diri Nzaambi ngo muteesi na mutuungi .
58011011	Mu kanyi , Sara nde se , ti bukuri waba kisita na mibvu myaba myeki myaluta , nde wabangusini kusa busoombi , bukuri nde wamwiini ti wunde wasa nsiilulu wakwiikama .
58011012	Hango-nkuumbu , mu muutu mosi , wuri weki wayaaba lufwa , mwabutuka biseendu biri kufuna bunu bambwetete ku yulu , na bunu munyeenge mu simu dya mubu wuri bwa kutaangula pe .
58011013	Bobanso babo bafwiila mu kanyi , kwahele kutaambula bitotolo bya nsiilulu , ngo kasi , babitariri ku la na bamono kiminu mu byo , bo babakuri ti banzeense bari , na bidyeengi ha butoto .
58011014	Mu nzoonsulu dza bubwo , bo baba soongaa ti bakwesaka nsi .
58011015	Ngo mbuti baba kwetsimaana nsi yi basiisiri , nkani baketi kubaka ntaangu ya kubvutuka ;
58011016	kasi mu lumalu , bo bari mu musoongo mu nsi yibvuriri bubwete , haho lo ti nsi ya ku yulu . Hango-nkuumbu , Nzaambi wahele na nsoni mu bo , kuri ti bamuteele Nzaambi bo , bukuri nde wayeki wabayirikila bvula .
58011017	Mu kanyi , Abalaami ba mutsiitsa , kari lo heeri mwaana mu kikabu , na nde waha Isaki , mwaana waandi ndemosi , bukuri wataamburi nsiilulu
58011018	mu nde dzileele ti : « Mu Isaki , ye wubaka baala . »
58011019	Nde waba na kitsimi ti , Nzaambi wakuka mu kufulukisa muutu wafwa , mu didyo nde kabweesiri kubaka mwaana waandi , bunu ti nkuma .
58011020	Mu kanyi , Isaki se wasakumuna Yakobe na Esawu , mu ntoono kidziingu kikwiisa .
58011021	Mu kanyi , Yakobe bu kaba mu kufwa , wasakumuna mosi mosi mu baala ba Yosefi , na nde watsukuma kuri wasikima mu nto luboto lwaandi .
58011022	Mu kanyi , Yosefi bu kaba weki ku nsukulu kidziingu kyaandi , wanzoonsolo mu mpalulu baala ba Isaheli , na waha ntumunu mu mitariri biyisi byaandi .
58011023	Mu kanyi , Moose kamana kubutuka , taayi na nguri bamusweekiri mu mangoondo matatu , bukuri bamwiini bubwe bwa mwaana , na basii ba na boomo ko mu musiku wa mbyaasi .
58011024	Mu kanyi , Moose kamana kubuuka , wabisiri bamuteele ti nde mwaana wa mwaana Falaho wa mukyeetu .
58011025	Nde wasooriri mu kumono mpasi kintwaari na baatu ba Nzaambi , ti na kukeembe mu masumu , mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele .
58011026	Nde wamwiini ti , kuba wasaanu bunu Kiristo , bubwo busina bubvuriri bunene ti na busina bwa ku Ngipiti . Bukuri nde waba talilaana museendu .
58011027	Mu kanyi , nde wasisa Ngipiti , kwahele kubata nkesi dza mbyaasi ; bukuri nde waba wateleme na keketee , bunu muutu wuri mu kumono wunde wuri bamumonaa ko .
58011028	Mu kanyi , nde wayirika Paaka na nyakunu makila , mpisi heki mudzusi kahele kubelemene baala ba bo , babutuka batete .
58011029	Mu kanyi , bo basabukiri mubu wabeenge , bunu bakwedyaata ha butoto bwakana , kasi bari Ngipiti batsiitsaana kusabuka , bawii kudyaama mu maampa .
58011030	Mu kanyi , bibaka bya Yeriko byabwiiri , bamanaa kubidyengekele mu biluumbu nsaamu .
58011031	Mu kanyi , Lakabi ngaa-buyala , kasii fwa ko , kintwaari na bangaa-tungu , bukuri nde wataamburi bakoondolo ba mansweeki mu kiyeengi .
58011032	Nki nyibweese kuleele ? Mukwongo , ntaangu yo pe mu kudzoonsolo mu myominso mitariri Ngedehoni , Baraki , Samsoni , Yefeta , Davidi , Samweli , na babikiri ,
58011033	bo bari mu kanyi , babwiisa bimfumu , basalila nsungumunu , bataambula bi babasiiriri nsiilulu , bakaanga minwa mya bankosi ,
58011034	badzimisa mambaawu mamakwa , babvuuka mu lufwa lwa mu saabala , babweese kubaka makwa ha mambisa ma buyonsi , basoongo bunkanyi mu mudziingu , bayitikisa mikaangu mya bayongolo mya banzeense .
58011035	Bakyeetu babweese kutaambula mfulukulu baatu baaku baba bafwa . Bakaka babanyonyo manyutu , ngo babisiri kuri ti babakuula , mpisi babaka mfulukulu yibvuriri bubwete .
58011036	Bakimi , bamono mpasi dza munsiku na dza nkwaasulu , natee se na dza mu bikonyi na dza mu boroko ;
58011037	babamosi babadzusula mu matari , babatabala mu kwaasa , bafwiila mu saabala , bani babakweyimaana kuri balwaata mikaanda mya bimeeme bunu pe mya bantaba , kwahele kuba na kitotolo , kuri babakwaamisa na bababamisa .
58011038	Nsi yaba yahele kuyelemene mu bo , babakweyimaana mu mansi mankatu , mu milaandu , mu mantari na miduku .
58011039	Bobanso babateeriri kimbaangi kya kyakibweete , mu ntoono kanyi dyaaku , kwahele kutaambula bi babasiiriri lusiilulu .
58011040	Nzaambi waba wataasila kitotolo kibvuriri bubwete , mpisi heki bo bahele kutubuka mu nyirimunu yakuka kwahele beetu .
58012001	Mu didyo , beetuneenu se , bukuri bambaangi balaka batudyengekele , tuloosee mpisi kilemu na masumu mahele na mpasi mu kutunzungukila , na tudzumunee ntiinu mu kifiki , mu kiteesu ki bari batutakala .
58012002	Tusyeetulee kisoosi kuri Yesu , mubaandiki na mukukisi kanyi , nde wuri , ha kibeendu kya kiminu ki bamusoongiri , wakuunda mpasi dza kuruwa , bu ka nyaafuna nsoni , na wadzakala ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi na lwa mboloko yaandi .
58012003	Beenee na bitsimi mu wunde wakuunda nwanusunu dza bangaa-masumu , mpisi luhele kuholo-bito , na bitsimi byeenu bihele kubvutuka mambisa .
58012004	Beenu lwakiri kutanda mpe mu kunwaanisa masumu , natee mu kiteesu kya makila .
58012005	Beenu lwadzimikini nsyamusunu dzi bari baluha bunu ti kuri baala : « Mwaana waami , yaa nyaafunaa nseembulu dzi kuseembele Mfumu ko , na yaa holo-bito ko mbuti nde wukuŋaŋana .
58012006	Mukwongo , Mfumu kooseembaana wu katiiri , nde wulataa mpisi mwaana wu Kakootaambulaa . »
58012007	Mu nsungukulu ya beenu-meene , beenu luri mu kwekuunda mpasi , Nzaambi wuhololo beenu buni baala baandi . Mukwongo , nkya mwaana wuri taayi kamuseembaa ko ?
58012008	Mbuti beenu bakooluseembaa bunu bu baseembelaa baala bobanso ko , lo beenu luri baala bangwanwa ko , ngo baala bari taayi wahele kubayaaba .
58012009	Beetuneenu twaba na bataayi ba muswinyi , baba kwetuseembaana , na twaba babvuminaana ; ngo dyaburi tuhele kubvula kutumuma kuri Taayi dya mampeeve , mpisi tuba mwooyo ?
58012010	Bo baba kwetuseembaana mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele , bunu bu baba kwemwiinaa bo , ngo kasi Nzaambi kutuseembe mu ndaandu ya beetu-meene , mu kuri ti katuha bungisi .
58012011	Mpisi nseembulu hatete dzikoomonokaa bunu ntoono ya kiminu ko , ngo bunu ya ngebe , kasi ku mankula dzikoobutaa kimbutu kya kiyeengi na kya nsungumunu kuri babo bataamburi nyikusulu .
58012012	Hango-nkuumbu , kumisee myooko myeenu myahele makwa , na maboongo meenu makwetekete .
58012013	Suungukee manzila ma lukwedyaatila mu miilu myeenu , mpisi heki mubeeru kuulu kahele kusuumbuka ngo katsiinika .
58012014	Namitinee kwesa kiyeengi na bobanso , na kweba kunsa bungisi , buri , mbuti buheriri , lo kuri muutu ti mosi ko wumono Mfumu .
58012015	Seenee madyeele , mpisi muutu kahele kubisa bweese bwa Nzaambi , na kuhele kuba mwaansi wankari wumene mu kukotoso kisaangila , na kubiyisa baatu balaka .
58012016	Yaa kuba muutu ti mosi , wakiyala bunu pe , wahele kwebvumina bitotolo byangisi , bunu Esawu wayarikiri bukuutu bwaandi mu kilaambu kimosi .
58012017	Mukwongo , beenu luyaari ti , ha mambisa haho , nde bu katiiri kutaambula lusakumunu bunu saala , bamuwuungula . Nde kasii baka mpwaani ti mosi ko , ya kuyiinga kitsimi kya taayi , ti bukuri wasaka lusakumunu lulwo mu mansangasa .
58012018	Beenu lwasii kokosolo bebele na kitotolo , kiri lo bakikweeti ko , kiri mu kuya mbaawu , kunsa butsuku na mampimbisi , na kiteembu kya makwa ,
58012019	na mbeembu ya mvumvuri , na lusuku lwa makwa lwa bitoolo kuri babo baba yukaana , bayingukila kuri bahele bweese kubaleele ntoono ti mosi ha yulu haho .
58012020	Bukuri baba bahele kubangisina kukuunda lutumu lumalu : « Mpisi wubelemene mulaandu , ti hayuka kibulu , lo kumudzusila mu matari . »
58012021	Mi bamwiini myaba mibvuriri nsiisi , na Moose waleele ti : « Me nyiri na kinkuukulu na nyiri mu kutekete . »
58012022	Ngo kasi beenu lwakokosiri bebele na mulaandu wa Syoni , na bvula dya Nzaambi ya mwooyo , Yerusalemi dya ku yulu , na mafuunda ma bambasi makutukina mu munkeembu ,
58012023	bebele na dibuundu dya babutuka batete , batinuma ku mayulu , na Nzaambi mutsuundisi wa bobanso , na biluunsi bya basuunguma batubuka ku nyirimunu ,
58012024	bebele na Yesu munkabu-kati wa lulelusunu lwamoono , na makila ma nyakunu mabvuriri kudzoonso kwakubwe , ti na makila ma Abele .
58012025	Seenee madyeele , mu kuhele kubisa kuyuka wunde wudzoonso . Bukuri mbuti , babo babisiri kuyukula wunde waba balubulaana ha butoto , basii bvuuka mu nseembulu ko , lo beetuneenu se , tubvuuka mu nseembulu ko , mbuti tubisiri kuywiila wunde wudzoonso ku mayulu .
58012026	Mu ntaangu yayikulu , mbeembu yaandi yatembisiri butoto ; ngo mu lumalu nde wasa lusiilulu , wuleele ti : « Me sa nyabweese kuteembese lukimi , kari bunu butoto ko ngo na yulu se . »
58012027	Ntoono yiri ti : « Nde wubweese kuteembese lukimi » , yisoongo kuri ti , bitotolo bi bayirikiri sa byanyingina na kukituka , mpisi heki bibyo biri byanyingina ko binamitina kuba .
58012028	Ngo bukuri sa twataambula kimfumu kiri kyaningina ko ; tubvutulee matoondo na tusalilee Nzaambi bwayelemene , kunsa kinzaambi na mu kibvumi .
58012029	Mukwongo , Nzaambi yeetu , nde mbaawu yikoonyengisaa .
58013001	Hemese ntiilu ya kimpaangi yinamitina kuba .
58013002	Yaa ludzimikina ntambukulu banzeense ko , bukuri mu yo , baatu babamosi bataamburi bambasi kwahele kuyaaba .
58013003	Tsiminee bari mu boroko , bunu ti beenu se luri kintwaari na bo mu boroko , tsiminee babo ba bakwekwaamisa , bunu ti beenu se luri nyutu mosi na bo .
58013004	Hemese makweele maba makiinsa kuri bobanso , na mbuka ya makweele yaa yiba yasumunu ko , bukuri Nzaambi sa katsuundisa biyala na bangaa-kimpala .
58013005	Ndyaatulu yeenu , yaa yiba yatwaalusu mu ntiki-mboongo ko , monee kiminu mu bini bi luri na byo . Bukuri nde-meene Nzaambi waleele ti : « Me nyikupatila ko , me nyikuyekele ko . »
58013006	Mu didyo , beetu turi na nsiitu mu kuleele ti : « Mfumu ngo mubakisi waami , me nyiba na boomo ko ; muutu lo nki kasa me ? »
58013007	Tsiminee babo bakwelutwaalisa , bo baluyaabisa maampu ma Nzaambi . Monee bwaba nsukulu kidziingu kya bo , na namee kifwaani kya kanyi dya bo .
58013008	Yesu Kiristo wuri bwobumosi dzoono , lumalu na na mu mantaangu momanso .
58013009	Yaa lutala ko ti , baluwumuna mu nyikusulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu dzanzeense . Bukuri buri bwabubwete , ti mutima kaba wasyaamusu mu bweese , nkani ka mu mangisi ma byandya , mari babo bakoomabvuminaa , babakilaa mo ndaandu ko .
58013010	Beetuneenu turi na dziku , diri bisari bya musaampu , byahele na miswa mu kudiila byandya haho .
58013011	Mukuutu bangaanga-nzaambi koonataa makila ma bibulu mu nzo yangisi , mu ntoono mpemusunu masumu , ngo byo-meene bibulu kubiyokolo ku mbisa bula .
58013012	Mu didyo se Yesu , mu kuri ti kaha bungisi kuri baatu mu makila ma nde-meene , nde wamono mpasi ku mbisa bvula .
58013013	Hango , tupaleenu ku mbisa bula mu kwemubwaana , na kutaambula kuri ti tuba basaanu bunu nde .
58013014	Bukuri ka turi na bula bwakinkulu ko , ngo turi mu kwesaka bula bwa ntaangu yikwiisa .
58013015	Mu nde , tuhenee kikabu kya ndumusu ya mpisi ntaangu kuri Nzaambi , haho lo ti , mikuunga misiika nkuumbu yaandi .
58013016	Yaa ludzimikina nyirikulu mamabwe ko , na kwebakisina beenu na beenu , bukuri Nzaambi wumonaa kiminu mu bikabu bya bubwo .
58013017	Beenee na bintambukulu kuri babo bakwelutwaalisa , na beenee batumuma kuri bo . Mukwongo , bo bakwekebe miheebulu mya beenu , bukuri bo sa batambikisa mabuungu . Seenee bubwo mpisi bo besala kisalu mu kiminu , nkani ka mu kwekuuma ko , bukuri babaa bakwekuuma , lo mimyo myahele ndaandu kuri beenu .
58013018	Saambileenu mu beetu . Mukwongo , beetu tuyirikiri kuyaaba ti turi na nsimunu yayibwete , mu nzala kuba na ndyaatulu yayibwete mu myominso .
58013019	Me nyiluyingukila kwalaka ti saambileenu , mpisi heki me mwasula na kubvutuka kuri beenu .
58013020	Hemese Nzaambi ya kiyeengi , wafulukisi mu bafwa Mfumu yeetu Yesu , mutari wamunene , mu ntoono makila ma lulelusunu lwa na mu mantaangu momanso ,
58013021	kaluha makwa ma kuyirika myominso myamibwete , mu kukukisa kutya kwaandi , kayirika mu beetu mamo mamabwete , ha busu bwa Yesu Kiristo , kuri nde kuba nkeembu mu bibvu ngo bibvu . Amene !
58013022	Bampaangi , me nyiluloombo ti kuundeenu maampu mamama ma nsyamusunu , bukuri mwaa-myantele me nyiri na myo mya kulutinina .
58013023	Yaabee ti mpaangi yeetu Timoteho bamupalisiri mu boroko , mbuti wasiri na kwiisa kuri me , lo sa twiisa beetu na nde mu kulumono .
58013024	Heenee mamboto kuri batwaalisi beenu bobanso , na kuri bangisi bobanso . Bampaangi bari Italya ba luheekiri mboto .
58013025	Bweese buba na beenu-banso !
59001001	Me Yakobo , nkutu Nzaambi na ya Mfumu Yesu Kiristo , kuri makaanda kuumi na moolo matsamukina mu mansi , mboto yeenu !
59001002	Bampaangi baami , lubaanaa lukotiri mu nsindukulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , lo monee kiminu kyalaka ,
59001003	bu luyaari ti , nsiitsulu ya kanyi dyeenu yibutaa kifiki .
59001004	Kifiki kiyelemini kusala kisalu kyakuka , mpisi beenu luba na nyirimunu yayibwete , na luba bakuka kuri luhele kuhelele kitotolo ti kimosi .
59001005	Ngo mbuti muutu mu beenu wahele na madyeele , lo kaloombo kuri Nzaambi , wuhaanaa kuri bobanso kwa mungengi , na kwahele biŋaŋunu , na sa kamuha mo .
59001006	Ngo kasi , kaloombo mu kanyi kwahele kuketekese , bukuri wunde wuketekesaana wafwanikina na mupaku maampa wa mubu , waningusu na wanaangunu mu kiteembu .
59001007	Mukwongo , muutu wa bubwo , lo yaa katsima kwaandi ko ti , lo taamburi kitotolo kuri Mfumu .
59001008	Wunde muutu ngaa-maketi-keti , wukwewunga mu manzila maandi momanso .
59001009	Hemese mpaangi ya muwelu , kaba na kimweese bu bamudzaangisiri ,
59001010	ngo kasi wa kisina kaba na kimweese bu bamukuriri , bukuri nde sa kaluta bunu kifulu kya kitiiti .
59001011	Mukwongo , ntaangu yipariri na mwiini wamakwa , yikanisini kitiiti , kifulu kyaandi kisonokini na bubwete bubeeri na kifulu buwiiri . Bwobumosi se wa kisina sa kakuuka kunsa bisalu byaandi .
59001012	Muutu wukuunda nsindukulu wuri mu lwambwe , bukuri bu bameeni kumutsiitsa , nde sa kataambula lukoongolo lwa bumwooyo lwataambukila Nzaambi kuri bamutyaanaa .
59001013	Muutu wukotiri mu nsindukulu , yaa kaleele ko ti : " Nzaambi wuri mu kunsidukula " ; bukuri Nzaambi ka katsiitsa kuba wasindukulu mu mamabi ko ; na nde-meene ka kasindukulaa muutu ko .
59001014	Ngo mpisi muutu wubaanaa wasindukulu mu nyiimunu dza nde-meene , dzimukokaana na dzimukoondaana ;
59001015	tumi nyiimunu dziyelaana , dzibutiri masumu , na masumu mayelaana , mabutiri lufwa .
59001016	Bampaangi baami ba mutima , yaa luhumuka kweenu ko .
59001017	Mpisi kikabu kyakibwete , na mpisi kimbwanga kyayirima , lo kya ku yulu , kifumunaa kuri taayi dya buungi , kuri nde kwahele nsobokoso na mposi yayiinga kibeendu ko .
59001018	Mu kutya kwaandi , nde watubuta mu maampu ma ngwanwa , mu kuba bunu mintekesele mu biyiriki byaandi .
59001019	Yaabee dyo bampaangi baami ba mutima ti , mpisi muutu yelemini kuba na malwangukila mu kuyuka , ngo wahele na mawasu mu kudzoonso na mu kubaka nkesi ;
59001020	bukuri nkesi dza muutu dzikookukukisaa nsungumunu ya Nzaambi ko .
59001021	Hango-nkuumbu , bu lumwaalooso myominso myamviindu , na biyiriki bya mutima-bubi , taambuleenu mu kidzuunu maampu makunu mu beenu , makuka mu kubvuukisa miheebulu myeenu .
59001022	Beenee bakwesalila maampu , nkani ka bani bakwemayuka ko , bakwewunukuna bo-meene .
59001023	Bukuri , mbuti muutu wuyuka maampu , ngo wahele kumasalila , lo wa bubwo wafwanikina na muutu wukengisiri kidziri kya nde-meene mu lumweenye .
59001024	Mukwongo , nde bu kameeni kukengese nyutu yaandi , weensi , na hanaho dzimikini bunu bu kari .
59001025	Ngo wunde , wuyekamaa na wusaa kikuundi mu mangisi makuka ma bunsaalisi , kwahele kuba muyuki wuri na bunzimbu , ngo wukukisaa biyiriki , lo nde sa kaba mu lwambwe kunsa kisalu kyaandi .
59001026	Mbuti muutu wumono kuri ti nde munsaambiri , ngo wahele kubangisina kutwaalisa ludima lwaandi , na wukwewunukuna nde-meene , lo nsambukulu yaandi yiri ya mungengi .
59001027	Nsambukulu ya ngwanwa , na yahele nsumukunu ha busu bwa Taayi Nzaambi , ngo yimayi : kweyilimina bisaani na bafwiilila balumi , kunsa mpasi dzaaku , na kukebe nyutu yaandi mu nsumukunu dza nsi .
59002001	Bampaangi baami , yaa lusalila bubayi ko , mu kanyi di luri na dyo mu Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu ya nkeembu .
59002002	Mukwongo , mbuti muutu mosi , walwaata lungele lwa woolo , na binkuta bikweseme , kotiri mu nzo-nkutukunu yeenu , na wamuwelu se walwaata binkuta byamviindu kotiri ,
59002003	ngo beenu lusyeetuka kuri walwaata binkuta bikweseme lumuleeriri ti : " Ye , dzakala ha kibeendu kyakibwe ki " ; na kuri muwelu lumuleeriri ti : " Ye ngo wuri teleme hamaha , bunu pe dzakala ha nkata-miilu mya me ha " .
59002004	Buri haho kari nsobokoso luri mu kusa mu beenu-meene ko ? Na kari lweki batsuundisi bari na mfyongokunu yayibi ko ?
59002005	Bampaangi baami ba mutima , yukeenu : Buri kari Nzaambi ko wasooriri bari bawelu mu mya nsi ngo bisina mu mitariri kanyi , na bakondiri ba Kimfumu ki kari kasa lusiilulu kuri babo bamutyaanaa ?
59002006	Ngo kasi beenu lwasaanini muwelu . Buri kari bisina bakookwelubamisaana , na bakookwelunataana ha mbasi ya mutsuundu ko ?
59002007	Buri kari bo bakwesaana nkuumbu yayibwe , yibari balutangukina ko ?
59002008	Mbuti ngwanwa beenu lukukisaa ngisi ya kimfumu bunu buri Matinu : " Tya mbaasi yaaku bunu ye-meene " , haho lo luyirikaa mamabwe .
59002009	Ngo mbuti beenu luri bangaa-bubayi , lo luyirika masumu , na lufwaanaa nsoni mu mitariri mangisi , bukuri lweki basinini ba mangisi .
59002010	Bukuri wunde wukebaa mangisi momanso , ngo bwiiri mu ntoono mosi , lo bakimini mu momanso .
59002011	Mukwongo , wunde waleele ti : " Yaa ta kimpala ko " , waleele se ti : " Yaa dzusa ko " . Ngo mbuti ye wahele kuta kimpala , kasi dzusiri , lo ye weki musinini mangisi .
59002012	Mu didyo , dzoonseenu na salileenu , bunu beenu luba batsuundusu , mu ngisi ya bunsaalisi .
59002013	Mukwongo , mutsuundu wahele na ngebe kuri wunde wahele na ngebe ; ngo muutu ngaa-ngebe wahele na boomo bwa mutsuundu .
59002014	Bampaangi baami , mbuti muutu wuleele ti nde wuri na kanyi , ngo wahele na biyiriki , lo nkya ndaandu ? Buri kanyi dya bubwo lo dimubvuukisiri ?
59002015	Mbuti mpaangi mosi , bunu pe kibusi kimosi , bari mpene , na bahele na mbyandya bya mpisi-tsuku ,
59002016	ngo mosi mu beenu wubaleeriri ti : " Yendeenu mu kiyeengi , lwateenu binkuta bya kyoosi , na yukuteenu " , ngo kasi wahele kubaha biri mufunu mu nyutu , lo nkya ndaandu ?
59002017	Bunubwo se buri mu kanyi , mbuti dyahele na biyiriki , lo dyafwa mu dyo-meene .
59002018	Ngo muutu habaanaa wuleele ti : " Ye wuri na kanyi , ngo me nyiri na biyiriki . Sa soongo me , kanyi dya ye kwahele biyiriki , na me nyikusoongo kanyi mu biyiriki bya me . "
59002019	Ye wutaambula ti Nzaambi yomosi yiri , bwabubwe wuyirikaa ; mampeeve mamabi se mataambula na matekitaa .
59002020	Dzeeke dya muutu ! Yaaba kuri ti , kanyi dyahele na biyiriki , lo dyahele mufunu .
59002021	Buri Abalaami , taayi dyeetu , kari mu biyiriki kari kalulukusu , bu kaheeri mwaana waandi , Isaki , mu kikabu ha yulu dziku ko ?
59002022	Wumono ti , kanyi dyaba salisinaa na biyiriki byaandi , na mu biyiriki , kanyi dyatubuka mu kiteesu kyakuka .
59002023	Matinu mayende mu mana : " Abalaami kasanaa kanyi mu Nzaambi , ngo bamwiini dyo ti wasuunguma , na bamuteele ti nduku Nzaambi " .
59002024	Lumono ti muutu wuri walulukusu mu biyiriki , nkani ka munu mu kanyi kitsu ko .
59002025	Bunubwo se , Lakabi ngaa-buyala , mu biyiriki kari kalulukusu , bu kataamburi bantumu , na bu kabayitikisi mu nzila yikimi .
59002026	Mukwongo , bunu buri nyutu yahele na muwuumunu yiri yafwa , bunubwo se kanyi dyahele na biyiriki diri dyafwa .
59003001	Bampaangi baami , yaa luba balaka mu kweyikisa ko , yabeenu ti mutsuundu wa beetu bayikisi sa kabvulila makwa .
59003002	Mukwongo , beetu-banso turi mu kwebwa kwalaka . Mbuti muutu wahele kubwa mu nzoonsulu , lo wunde muutu wakuka , wubangisina kutwaalisa nyutu yaandi yoyinso .
59003003	Mbuti tukaangaana kisuunguki mu minwa mya makavaalu , lo mu kuri ti batumuma kuri beetu , na tutwaalisaa manyutu ma bo momanso .
59003004	Monee se mabwaatu , bwooso mabeele mu bunene , masindukulu mu biteembu bya makwa , lo mo mari matwaalusu mu mwaa kisuunguki kyantele , kunu kutiiri munati .
59003005	Bunubwo se , ludima mwaa-kinamu kyantele , ngo kikwebilika mu bitotolo byabinene . Monee meti ! Mwaa-mbaawu yantele yikooyokaa musitu bwooso kabeele mu bunene
59003006	Ludima se luri bunu mbaawu , nsi ya bubayi ; ludima lwasuusu ha kakati dya binamu byeetu , lusumunaa nyutu yoyinso , na luyokaa kidziingu kyokinso , bu luri lwanamuku mu mbaawu lubila .
59003007	Mukwongo , mpisi kitsuumbu kya bibulu bya ku bitiiti , kya banoni , kya banyoko , na kya bibulu bya mu maampa , kyayukusu na kyayeki kyayukusu kuri kitsuumbu kya muutu ;
59003008	Ngo ludima , kuri ti mosi mu baatu , wubangisina kuluyukusu ko , bubi buri bwakubwiisila pe , lwaluula mu misya midzusaana .
59003009	Mu lwo , tusakumunaa Mfumu wuri Taata ; na mu lwo se tubulilaa baatu mampopi , bari mu kifwaani kya Nzaambi .
59003010	Mu munwa ndemosi mupala lusakumunu na mampopi . Bampaangi baami , bwahele kuyelemene ti buba bubwo .
59003011	Buri mu nto yomosi , lo mukeri palisiri maampa madzuuna na mankari ?
59003012	Bampaangi baami , buri mungenge lo butiri mfilu , bunu pe mubviinya lo butiri ngenge ? Pele , nto ya maampa ma mungwa , ka yitsiitsa kupalisa maampa madzuuna ko ?
59003013	Nani mu beenu wuri ngaa-madyeele na wayika ? Kasoongo dyo mu ndyaatulu yayibwete , na mu biyiriki byaandi bya kidzuunu na bya madyeele .
59003014	Ngo mbuti beenu luri na musoki wankari , na mpeeve ya nwanusunu mu mitima myeenu , lo yaa luba na masiiku ko , na yaa lwekitula ngwanwa mu mpya ko .
59003015	Madyeele ma bubwo , makoofumunaa ku yulu ko , ngo kasi ma nsi , ma kimuutu na ma mampeeve mamabi .
59003016	Mukwongo , haho hari musoki na nwanusunu , hanaho se hari kisaangila , na nsalulu yoyinso yayibi .
59003017	Ngo kasi madyeele ma ku yulu , hatete mari nkati matsyeemeke , tumi ma kiyeengi , madzuuna , matumuma , maluula mu ngebe na mu bimbutu byabibwete , mahele na munsoori na mahele na bumpitu-bumpyoongo .
59003018	Kimbutu kya nsungumunu kiri kyakunu mu kiyeengi , kuri babo basalila kiyeengi .
59004001	Kuri kukoofuminaa midziingu , na nwanusunu ha kakati dya beenu ? Buri kari mu mantiilu meenu mamabi , makwenwaana munsa binamu byeenu ko ?
59004002	Beenu lukwenyiima , na lwahele kubaka , lukwedzusa , lukwesa musoki , na kalutsiitsa kutaambula ko . Lukwenwaana na lukwesa midziingu , lwahele kubaka bukuri lwaloombaa ko .
59004003	Beenu lukweloombo na lwahele kutaambula , bukuri luloombaa kwakubi , mu nzala kuyukutisa mantiilu meenu .
59004004	Bangaa-kimpala ! Buri beenu lwahele kuyaaba ti kinduku na nsi ngo kitaatu na Nzaambi ? Mpisi wunde wutiiri kuba nduku nsi , lo kitukiri mutaatu Nzaambi .
59004005	Buri beenu lutsimini ti , kwa mungengi Matinu mari mu kuleele ti : " Nzaambi tiiri mu bukwa mpeeve yi kari kasuusa mu beetu " ?
59004006	Nzaambi kootuhaanaa bweese bubvuriri bunene , hango-nkuumbu diri dyaleele ti : " Nzaambi wutungukilaa bangaa-masiiku , ngo kasi wuhaanaa bweese kuri bakuluka " .
59004007	Ngo tumumee kuri Nzaambi , tungukilee dyabulu , na nde sa kayitika la na beenu .
59004008	Kokosolee kuri Nzaambi , na nde sa kakokosolo kuri beenu . Swaakee myooko myeenu , beenu bangaa-masumu . Tsyeemesee mitima myeenu , beenu bangaa-maketi-keti .
59004009	Beenee mu ngebe , kotee bufwiiri na dileenu . Biseyu byeenu bikituka bufwiiri na kiminu kyeenu kikituka ngebe .
59004010	Kulukeenu ha busu bwa Mfumu , na nde sa kaludzaangisa .
59004011	Bampaangi , yaa lwekelesene ko , wunde wusa makele mu mpaangi yaandi , bunu pe wutsuundisa mpaangi yaandi , lo wudzoonsolo bwabubi mu mangisi , na wutsuundisa mangisi ; ngo mbuti ye wutsuundisa mangisi , lo ye wuri wukukisaa mangisi ko , ngo kasi mutsuundisi .
59004012	Mosi kitsu wuri mukaangi-mangisi na mutsuundisi , nde wakuka mu kubvuukisa na mu kufuukisa ; ngo ye na wuri mu kutsuundisa mbaasi ?
59004013	Haheki mu lumalu kuri bakweleele ti : « Lumalu bunu pe bweepari , beetu sa tweende ku bvula didyo , sa twadzakala kukwo mubvu mosi , sa twasa mumbungu , na sa twabaka ndaandu » ;
59004014	beenu lwahele kuyaaba bubeele kidziingu kya beenu bweepari . Mukwongo , beenu luri bunu mubuungi wuri , kapalaa mu mwaa-ntaangu , ha mambisa haho dziimbiri .
59004015	Ha kibeendu kya kuleele ti : « Mbuti Mfumu tiiri , beetu sa twaba mwooyo , na sa twayirika mamama bunu pe mamo . »
59004016	Beenu mu lu , lukwesa kimweese mu masiiku meenu ; mpisi kimweese kya bubwo lo kyakibi .
59004017	Ngo wunde wuyaari kuyirika mamabwe , kasi wahele kumayirika , lo mamo masumu kuri nde .
59005001	Haheki , mu lu kuri beenu bisina , dileenu , fulee misaakulu mu mpasi dzeenu dzi lubwilikila .
59005002	Busina bwa beenu bwasumuka , na binkuta byeenu byeki byadya kuri bansyelisi ,
59005003	woolo na mboongo dzeenu byeki byabwilikila nkaa-nkaala , na nkaa-nkaala yiyo sa yalufuunda , na sa yayoko manyutu meenu bunu mbaawu . Beenu lwakutukisi busina mu biluumbu bya mpotulu .
59005004	Monee , mufutu bisari byatoriri manseke meenu , wu lwakweeti beenu , wuri mu kufula misaakulu , na nyayulu dza batori dzayukukuni mu makutu ma Mfumu ngaa-mikaangu .
59005005	Beenu lwaneti kidziingu kyaluwu ha butoto , na kidziingu mu lwambwe , lwadiisiri manyutu meenu mu kiluumbu kya nzusulu bibulu .
59005006	Beenu lwakesiri mukanu , lwadzusiri muutu wahele ntoono , wahele kulutuungukila .
59005007	Ngo bampaangi , kiinduseenu mitima , natee nyisulu Mfumu . Monee muhati-manseke , nde wukiingila bimbutu bya butoto bya ntalu , wukiindisaa mutima natee ku katoriri bimbutu bitekesele na bisyeelele .
59005008	Beenu se kiindusee mitima , kumisee mitima myeenu , bukuri nyisulu Mfumu yeki bebele .
59005009	Bampaangi , yaa lwesilisina minyoongi beenu na beenu ko , mpisi luhele kuba batsuundusu . Monee mutsuundisi telemini ha mweelu .
59005010	Bampaangi , holeenu kifwaani mu mpasi na mu nkindusulu-mutima ya babikiri badzoonsiri mu nkuumbu ya Mfumu .
59005011	Monee , beetu tuleelaa kuri babo bakuundaa mpasi , ti bari mu lwambwe . Beenu lwayukiri kifiki ka Yobi , na lwamwiini nsukulu yaba yitiiri Mfumu , ti Mfumu waluula mu bundeembu na wubakila ngebe .
59005012	Bampaangi baami , tekesele momanso , yaa lwelaba maalu ti mu yulu , ti mu butoto , ti mu maalu makimi ko . Ngo kuri beenu , heehe diba heehe , pele diba pele , mpisi luhele kubwa mu mutsuundu .
59005013	Muutu mu beenu kubama kari mu kubama ? Kasaambila . Muutu mu kiminu kari ? Kayimbila mikuunga .
59005014	Muutu mu beenu kubeele kari kabeele ? Katumisa bakulu ba babakala ba dibuundu , mpisi bamusambikila , na bamukila maasi mu nkuumbu Mfumu .
59005015	Lusaambulu lwa kanyi sa lwabvuukisa mubeeru , na Mfumu sa kamutelemese ; na mbuti beeri wayirika masumu , lo sa kataambula mpemisi .
59005016	Lomboseneenu mampemisi beenu na beenu , na sambisineenu beenu na beenu , mpisi lutaambula butsiina . Lusaambulu lwa muutu wasuunguma , luri na makwa malaka na lukoosalaa .
59005017	Eliya waba muutu wuri bitsimi bunu buri beetu . Nde wasaambila mu kukaandika bvula , na bvula yasii kunoko ha butoto ko , mu mibvu mitatu na mangoondo masaamunu .
59005018	Tumi , nde wabweese kusaambila , na yulu dyanokoso bvula , na butoto bwaha bimbutu byaandi .
59005019	Bampaangi baami , mbuti mosi mu beenu dziimbiri , na weki la na ngwanwa , na muutu wumubvuturi ,
59005020	lo kayaaba ti : wunde wubvutula ngaa-masumu mu nzila yasuunguma , lo sa kabvuukisa muwuumunu nde mu lufwa , na sa kafuka fundu-fundu dya masumu .
60001001	Petelo , ntumu Yesu Kiristo , kuri babo basoolu , badzakala ku bunzeense , batsamukina mu mansi ma Ponto , Ngalatya , Kapadokya , Asya na Bitinya ,
60001002	bunu buri nyaabulu yatekesele ya Taata Nzaambi , mu mpeelu bungisi ya Mpeeve , mu ntumumunu na nyakunu makila ma Yesu Kiristo . Bweese na kiyeengi biba byafunusu kuri beenu !
60001003	Nzaambi , Taayi dya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo kaba wasakumunu ! Nde wuri , bunu buri bunene bwa ngebe dzaandi , watubuta mu mbutukulu yamoono , mu nsiitu dzamwooyo , mu mfulukulu ya Yesu Kiristo mu bafwa ,
60001004	mu ntoono saala diri dyabiiyaa ko , dyabviimfukaa ko , na dyakitukaa ko , di bari balusweekele mu mayulu ,
60001005	beenu luri lwakebu mu mpinu dza Nzaambi , mu kanyi , mu ntoono mvuukulu yayirima mu kuba yayabukusu mu ntaangu ya manunu .
60001006	Mu didyo , beenu luri mu kiminu , ti hayuku mu lumalu , beenu luyelemini kubama mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele , mu ntoono nsindukulu dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu ,
60001007	Mpisi heki nsiitsulu ya kanyi dyeenu , yibvuriri ntalu , ti na woolo dyatsyeemese mu mbaawu kasi difuukaana , yibaka ndaandu ya nsiikulu , ya nkeembu na ya lukiinsu , mu ntaangu yiyabakana Yesu Kiristo .
60001008	Beenu lutiiri wunde wuri lwasii kumumono ko , na mu lumalu kwahele kumumono lwasa kanyi mu nde . Beenu luri mu kutirimuka mu kiminu kyahele bwa kuleelele , kya nkeembu ,
60001009	mu kutaambula ndaandu ya kanyi , ngo mvuukulu ya miheebulu myeenu .
60001010	Babikiri basaka kuyaaba na bafyongokono musamu wa mvuukulu yiyo , na babikula mu ntoono bweese bwa beenu .
60001011	Bo bafyongokono mu kuyaaba , mu nkya ntaangu bunu pe mu nkya kiteesu , misamu myatekisiri kubayaabisa Mpeeve ya Kiristo miyirima . Misamu mimyo mitariri mpasi dza Kiristo , na munkeembu wukwiisa ha mambisa .
60001012	Babayaabisa kuri ti , dyaambu di baba kwesalilaana dyaba diri dya bo-meene ko , ngo dya beenu . Na mu lumalu bayikisi ba Musamu Wamubwete bamwaluyaabisa dyo , mu Mpeeve Yangisi yafumuna ku yulu . Bambasi se batiiri kuyaaba dyaambu didyo .
60001013	Hango-nkuumbu , beeneenu balubuka , beeneenu bari na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , sileenu nsiitu dzodzinso mu bweese bu balutwalikila , mu ntaangu yimonokono Yesu Kiristo .
60001014	Bunu baala bari na bintambukulu , yaa lunama kifwaani kya nyiimunu dza ntaangu yayikulu ko , yi lwaba lwakiri kunsa lubu .
60001015	Ngo bunu buri wunde waluteele mbila , wuri wangisi , beenu se beenee bangisi mu ndyaatulu yeenu yoyinso .
60001016	Bukuri diri dyatinu ti : « Beenu sa lwaba bangisi , bukuri me nyiri wangisi . »
60001017	Na mbuti beenu luteelaa mu lusaambulu ti Taata , wunde wahele na kimpengeki , wutsuundisa muutu-muutu bunu buri biyiriki byaandi , lo dyaatileenu mu kibvumi , mu ntaangu ya kidziingu kyeenu mu nsi ya bunzeense yi ,
60001018	bu luyaari kuri ti , kari mu bitotolo bifuukila ko , mboongo bunu pe woolo , beenu bari balukuula mu ndyaatulu yeenu yabuunu , yi luri lwakondolo kuri bataayi beenu ,
60001019	ngo mu makila mantalu ma Kiristo , mari bunu ma mwaana kimeeme , kyahele na kipfuumi na kyahele na mpita .
60001020	Nde wayabakana tekesele nyirikulu nsi , na wamumonokoso mu ntaangu ya manunu mu ntoono beenu .
60001021	Mu nde , beenu lwasa kanyi mu Nzaambi , wamufulukisa mu bafwa , na wamuha nkeembu , kuri heki kanyi dyeenu , na nsiitu yeenu biba mu Nzaambi .
60001022	Beenu lwatsyeemese miheebulu myeenu mu kutumuma kuri ngwanwa , mu dyaambu dya ntiilu ya kimpaangi , yahele na bumpitu-bumpyoongo . Tilisineenu beenu na beenu kwalaka mu mutima watsyeemeke ,
60001023	bu lwayeki lwabutuka mu mbutukulu yamoono , kari mu mumbutu wubolaa ko , ngo mu wuhelaa kubolo , mu maampu ma mwooyo ma Nzaambi mahelaa kusuka .
60001024	Bukuri « Mpisi muutu wuri bunu kitiiti , na nkeembu yaandi yoyinso yiri bunu kifulu kya kitiiti , kitiiti kikanaa , na kifulu kibwaanaa ,
60001025	ngo kasi maampu ma Mfumu madziingulaa mu mantaangu momanso . » Mamo ngo maampu ma bari baluyaabisa bunu Musamu Wamubwete .
60002001	Ngo looseenu momanso mamabi , momanso mamawunu , bumpitu-bumpyoongo , musoki , na makele .
60002002	Bunu mwaa-baala bansoombo , dilileenu beene dyadibwete , dya maampu ma Nzaambi , mpisi heki mu nde beenu lubuuka mu kubaka mvuukulu ,
60002003	mbuti lwabiimbiri ti Mfumu wuri wa mubwete .
60002004	Kokosolee kuri nde , tari dyamwooyo dyaloosu kuri baatu , ngo kasi dyasoolu na dyantalu kuri Nzaambi ,
60002005	na beenu-meene se , bunu matari mamwooyo , beene batuunguma mu nzo ya kimpeeve , mu kuyirika kingaanga kyangisi , mu kuha bikabu byayoku byakimpeeve , byataambulu kuri Nzaambi mu Yesu Kiristo .
60002006	Hango-nkuumbu , mu Matinu muri ti : « Monee , me nyisuusa mu Syoni tari dya ha kuumbu dyasoolu na dyantalu , na mpisi wusiila kanyi mu dyo , lo kafwa nsoni ko . »
60002007	Hango , lukiinsu luba kuri beenu lwasa kanyi ; ngo kasi kuri babo bahele kusa kanyi , « Tari dyaloosiri batuungi , dyeki dyanguri ha kuumbu . »
60002008	Na dyeki : « Tari dya mbumukunu makya , na dya mbwiilulu makubu . » Bo bari mu kubuminaa makya mu dyo , bukuri bahele kusa kanyi mu maampu , na mu bubwo bari babataasila .
60002009	Ngo kasi beenu , luri kitsuumbu kyasoolu , kabu dya bangaanga-nzaambi ba mbyaasi , kaanda dyangisi , baatu babakama kuri Nzaambi , mu kweyaabisa mamabwe , ma wunde waluteele mbila , mu kupala mu mampimbisi na kukoto mu buungi bwaandi bwansisi .
60002010	Beenu bari , mu ntaangu yayikulu , lwasii ba mukaangu baatu ko , kasi mu lumalu beenu lweki mukaangu baatu ba Nzaambi . Mu ntaangu yayikulu , Nzaambi kasii kulumwiinina ngebe ko , kasi mu lumalu nde wulumonono ngebe .
60002011	Banduku ba mutima , me nyilusyaamisa bunu minzakikiri miri ku bunzeense , mu kukaanga mutima , mu kuhele kubwa mu nyiimunu dza muswinyi , dzikwenwaanisa muheebulu .
60002012	Beenee na ndyaatulu yayibwete ha kakati dya bangooyi , mpisi heki ti hayuku bakwelufutukila misamu , bunu bayiriki ba mamabi , lo bo bamono biyiriki byeenu byabibwe , na bakeembise Nzaambi mu kiluumbu ki kakwiisa kulumono .
60002013	Beenee batumuma kuri mpisi lutumu lwa baatu , mu ntoono Mfumu , ti hayuku kuri mbyaasi wubvuriri lutumu ,
60002014	ti hayuku kuri batumi , bakari kaheeke mu kweseembe bayiriki ba mamabi , bunu pe mu kwesiika bayiriki ba mamabwe .
60002015	Bukuri kutya kwa Nzaambi bumabu kuri : mu nyirikulu mamabwe , beenu lukaanga minwa mya baatu ba madzeeke , bahele na nyaabulu .
60002016	Beenee bunu baatu bari na bunsaalisi , na bunsaalisi bubwo , yaa buba bunu nsaanda mu kwefuka bubi ko ; ngo beenee bunu bankutu ba Nzaambi .
60002017	Kiinseenu baatu bobanso , tyeeneenu bampaangi ba luri mu dibuundu , bvuminee Nzaambi , kiinseenu mbyaasi .
60002018	Bisari bya mu nzo , biba byatumuma mu kibvumi kyokinso , kuri bamfumu baaku ; kari kunu kuri bari na mutima wamubwete , na bari na bundeembu ko , ngo se na kuri bari mutima wamubi .
60002019	Bukuri bweese buri , mbuti mu ntoono kibvumi mu Nzaambi , muutu wukuundaa mpasi mu kubama kwahele kibila .
60002020	Mukwongo , nkya mvuumfu yiri , mbuti beenu lukuunda nseembulu , dza mamabi ma luyirikiri ? Ngo mbuti luyirika mamabwe na lukuundiri mpasi , lo bubwo bweese ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
60002021	Mukwongo , mu bubwo bari baluteele mbila , bukuri Kiristo se wabamini mu ntoono beenu ; nde walusisikila kifwaani , mpisi heki beenu lunama mu bitaambi byaandi .
60002022	Nde wuri kasii yirika masumu ko , na mu munwa waandi mwasii ba mawunu ko .
60002023	Nde bamutuka , ngo kasii bvutula kitari ko ; wamono mpasi , ngo kasii ŋaŋa ko , kasi wayekiri nyutu kuri mutsuundisi wasuunguma .
60002024	Mu nyutu yaandi , nde wanata masumu meetu ha yulu muti , mpisi heki bu tufwiiri mu masumu , tuba mwooyo mu ntoono nsungumunu . Mu biwa byaandi beenu luri lwatsinukusu .
60002025	Mukwongo , beenu lwaba bunu bimeeme bikweyiima ; ngo kasi mu lumalu , lumwaabvutuka kuri mutari na mukebi miheebulu myeenu .
60003001	Bwobumosi beenu bakasi , tumumeenu kuri balumi beenu , mpisi heki ti hayuku babamosi babisa kusiila kanyi mu maampu , baba babakama kwahele maampu , ngo mu ndyaatulu ya bakasi baaku ,
60003002	bu bamono ndyaatulu yeenu ya bungisi kunsa kibvumi .
60003003	Monokunu yeenu ya ku mbasi yaa yiba mu : mfu dzahandu , bilebete bya woolo , bunu pe ndwaatulu binkuta byabibwe ko ,
60003004	ngo bibyo byasweeku kunsa mutima muutu , biri byabiiya ko , bya mpeeve ya bundeembu , na ya kiyeengi , biri na ntalu yayinene ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
60003005	Mukwongo , bubwo mu ntaangu yayikulu , bakyeetu bangisi , baba na nsiitu mu Nzaambi , baba kwebweeyisaana manyutu maaku , mu kwetumuma kuri balumi baaku .
60003006	Bunu Sara , waba watumuma kuri Abalaami , wu kaba kweteelaana « Mfumu » . Beenu lwayeki baala baandi ba bakyeetu , bu luyirikaa mamabwe , na bu luhelaa kuba na boomo mu kitotolo ti kimosi .
60003007	Balumi se bwobumosi , dzakaleenu mu kintwaari kunsa nyukusunu , bunu bu luyaabiri buyonsi bwa kitsuumbu kya bakyeetu . Bakiinseenu , bukuri bo se bari bakoondiri ba saala dya bweese bwa kidziingu . Yirikee bubwo , mpisi heki nsaambulu dzeenu dzihele kuba dzakakusulu .
60003008	Ha mambisa haho , yukusunee beenu-banso , kabusinee mpasi , tyeenee bampaangi , beenee bangaa-ngebe , beene bakuluka ,
60003009	yaa lwebvutula mamabi mu mamabi ko , bunu pe kitari mu kitari ko . Ngo kasi yendee lwesakumuna , bukuri mu bubwo bari baluteele mbila , mpisi heki lutaambula lusakumunu ngo saala .
60003010	Mukwongo , « Mpisi wutiiri kubaka kidziingu na kumono biluumbu bya kiminu , lo kakebe ludima lwaandi mu mamabi , na bibori byaandi mu kuhele kweleele mya mpya ,
60003011	kalooso mamabi na kayirika mamabwete , kesaka kiyeengi na kanamitina kusalila mu kyo .
60003012	Bukuri miisu mya Mfumu miri ha yulu basuunguma , na makutu maandi maywiilaa nsaambulu dza bo ; kasi busu bwa Mfumu buri kitatu na babo bayirikaa mamabi . »
60003013	Na wuyirikila beenu mamabi , mbuti beenu luri bangaa-kuheme mu mamabwe ?
60003014	Ngo ti hayuku , beenu lukotiri mu mpasi mu ntoono nsungumunu , lo beenu luri mu lwambwe . Yaa luba na boomo bwa bo ko , na mutima yaa kasa mambaawu ko .
60003015	Dumusee Kiristo Mfumu kunsa mitima myeenu . Beene bayirima mu mantaangu momanso , mu kukalila buungu , kuri mpisi wunde wulufuula , nsiitu dziri mu beenu ,
60003016	ngo diba mu bundeembu , mu kibvumi , na mu bitsimi byabibwete , mpisi heki mu ntoono yi bari mu kulusaanina , babo balusaana bafwa nsoni , mu kumono mu ndyaatulu yeenu yayibwete mu Kiristo .
60003017	Mukwongo , bubvuriri bubwete , mbuti bubwo buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , mu kumono mpasi mu nyirikulu mamabwe , ti na kumono mpasi mu nyirikulu mamabi .
60003018	Bukuri Kiristo wamono mpasi , lwo lumosi mu masumu ; nde wasuunguma wamono mpasi mu ntoono bahele kusuunguma , mpisi heki kalunata kuri Nzaambi . Nde bamudzusiri mu muswinyi , ngo Mpeeve yamufulukisi .
60003019	Mu bubwo se , nde kari kayende mu kuyikisa biluunsi byaba mu boroko ,
60003020	byabisiri kusa kanyi mu ntaangu yayikulu , yaba namitinaa nkindusulu-mutima ya Nzaambi , mu biluumbu bya Nowa , bi kaba kwetuunga nzo ya kiluungu , munsa yo baatu bantele , miheebulu mpoomo myabvuukiri mu maampa .
60003021	Kikyo kyaba kifwaani kya mbotokulu , yilubvuukisa mu lumalu , mbotokulu yiyo yiri ya nswaakulu mviindu dza muswinyi ko , ngo ntambukulu Nzaambi mu kitsimi , mu nzila ya mfulukulu Yesu Kiristo ,
60003022	nde wuri bu kayende ku yulu , wuri ha lubakala lwa Nzaambi . Bambasi , na baatu bari na lutumu na bari na mpinu , bari kunsa lutumu lwaandi .
60004001	Ngo Kiristo bu kamono mpasi mu muswinyi , beenu se holeenu kitsimi kya bubwo bunu kinwaanunu , ti muutu wu mwaamono mpasi mu muswinyi , mwaahoto kuyirika masumu ,
60004002	mpisi heki beenu lunata kidziingu kya muswinyi , mu ntaangu yisiiri , bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , nkani ka buri nyiimunu dza baatu ko .
60004003	Bukukiri ! Bukuri mu ntaangu yaluta beenu lwayirikiri mi tiiri bangooyi , bu lwabee kwedyaatila kunsa buyala , nyiimunu , nkolulu malu , ndiilu na nwiinu bya mawaamba , na nsaambukulu-biteki yiri ntoono yayibi .
60004004	Mu didyo , bo bamono dyo dyankimukunu , ti beenu lwahele kubweese kweba kintwaari na bo , kunsa mawaamba ma buyala , ngo bari mu kwelusaana .
60004005	Bo sa batambikisa biyiriki byaaku , kuri wunde wayirima mu kutsuundisa bamwooyo na bafwa .
60004006	Mukwongo , mu bubwo , bari bayikisa Musamu Wamubwete kuri bafwa se , mpisi baba batsuundusu mu muswinyi bunu bu tiiriri baatu , na baba mwooyo mu Mpeeve bunu bu tiiriri Nzaambi .
60004007	Nsukulu bitotolo byobinso yeki bele . Ngo dyaatileenu mu madyeele , na beenee na ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , mu ntoono lusaambulu .
60004008	Tekeselee meti , kutilisina kwalaka beenu na beenu , bukuri " ntiilu yifuukaa fundu-fundu dya masumu " .
60004009	Yendee lwetaambula bambaasi beenu na beenu , kwahele kwemunguta .
60004010	Mpisi muutu , bunu buri kikabu kikari kataambula , kasalila kyo mu ndaandu ya bobanso , bunu bakebi bababwete ba mabweese ma Nzaambi , ma bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu .
60004011	Mbuti muutu wudzoonso , lo kadzoonso bunu nde wutubula maampu ma Nzaambi ; mbuti muutu wusala , lo kasalila mu makwa ma muha Nzaambi , mpisi heki mu momanso , Nzaambi kaba wakeembusu mu Yesu Kiristo , kuri nde kuri nkeembu na mpinu mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene .
60004012	Banduku ba mutima , yaa lukimuka ko , mu kuba kunsa nsindukulu dzamakwa dzi mwaalutubukula , bunu ti ntoono yanzeense .
60004013	Ngo bukuri beenu luri na kikuuku mu mpasi dza Kiristo , lo monee kiminu , mpisi heki mu ntaangu yiyabakana nkeembu yaandi , beenu lutirimika mu kiminu .
60004014	Mbuti bakwelutuka mu ntoono nkuumbu ya Kiristo , lo beenu luri mu lwambwe , bukuri Mpeeve ya nkeembu ya Nzaambi yiwuumaa ha yulu beenu .
60004015	Mukwongo , muutu ti mosi mu beenu , yaa kamono mpasi ko , bunu ti nde mudzusi kari , bunu pe ngaa-kwiibi , bunu pe muyiriki-mamabi , bunu pe ngaa-kintori .
60004016	Ngo mbuti nde mpasi kumono mu nkuumbu ya mukiristo , lo yaa kamono nsoni ko , ngo kakeembese Nzaambi mu nkuumbu yiyo .
60004017	Bukuri kimaki ngo kilookolo kya kubaandika mutsuundu mu nzo ya Nzaambi . Ngo mbuti bandukiri mu beetu , lo buri bubeele nsukulu ya babo , babisa kusa kanyi mu Musamu Wamubwete wa Nzaambi ?
60004018	Heki , " mbuti wasuunguma kubvuukila ha wuri dya mukuungi , lo buri bubeele mu muutu wahele na kinzaambi na mu ngaa-masumu ? "
60004019	Hango , babo se bamonaa mpasi bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , bayekele miheebulu mya bo kuri Muyiriki wakwiikama , mu nyirikulu mamabwe .
60005001	Me nyisyaamisa bakulu ba babakala bari ha kakati dya beenu . Me se nyiri mukulu-bakala bunu bo , mbaangi mu mpasi dza Kiristo , na nyiri kintwaari mu nkeembu yiba yayabakana .
60005002	Buunguleenu mpuumbu ya Nzaambi yiri ha kakati dyeenu . Kebeenu yo mu bunkete , kari mu kukwiikisa ko , ngo mu mutima-bubwete bunu buri kutya kwa Nzaambi , kari mu kubaka mufutu mu bumpilikisi ko , ngo mu kuheme ,
60005003	kari mu kuba bunu bamfumu , ha yulu babo balukwetwaalisa ko , ngo mu kuba kifwaani kyakibwete kuri mpuumbu .
60005004	Tumi ha monokono mukuutu batari , beenu lutaambula lukoongolo lwa nkeembu luri lwabiiya ko .
60005005	Bunubwo se , bituuti , beenee batumuma kuri bakulu ba babakala . Beenu-banso lwaateenu nkulukulu bunu musweele ha busu bwa bambaasi , bukuri : « Nzaambi wutungukilaa bangaa-masiiku , ngo kasi wuhaanaa bweese kuri bakuluka . »
60005006	Ngo kulukee kweenu kunsa koko kwa Nzaambi kwa mpinu , mpisi kaludzaangisa mu ntaangu yayelemene .
60005007	Mubwoongokileenu bitsimi byeenu byobinso bya mpasi , bukuri nde wuri na lusaambu mu beenu .
60005008	Beene bangaa-ndiilu na nwiinu byayelemene , beenee naana . Mutaatu weenu dyabulu , wuri mu kwedyengekele bunu nkosi yi kwewuma , yi kwesaka wu kamingutina .
60005009	Mutungukileenu na keketee mu kanyi , bu luyaari kuri ti bampaangi beenu se , bari mu kwekuunda mpasi dzodzimosi ha nsi .
60005010	Nzaambi ya mabweese momanso , waluteele mbila mu kukoto mu nkeembu yaandi yahele manunu mu Kiristo Yesu , bu lumwiini mpasi mu mwaa-ntaangu , sa kabweese kalutelemese nde-meene , sa kalukumisa , sa kaluha makwa na sa kalusa na keketee .
60005011	Kuri nde kuba mpinu mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene .
60005012	Mu lubakusu lwa Silvano , wu nyihololaa me bunu mpaangi yakwiikama , me nyilutinini mwaa-mukaanda wumawu , mu kulusyaamisa na mu kuta kimbaangi , ti bweese bwa Nzaambi bu luri lwasiila nsiitu buri bwangwanwa .
60005013	Dibuundu dyasoolu bunu beenu , diri ku Babiloni diluheekiri mboto . Malako se mwaana waami wuluheekiri mboto .
60005014	Beenu na beenu se helesenee mamboto mu nyumutunu ya ntiilu . Kiyeengi kiba kuri beenu-banso luri mu Kiristo .
61001001	Simehoni Petelo , nkutu na ntumu Yesu Kiristo , kuri babo bataambula kanyi diri ntalu yo yimosi na dya beetu , mu nsungumunu ya Nzaambi yeetu , na ya Mubvuukisi Yesu Kiristo .
61001002	Bweese na kiyeengi biba byafunusu kuri beenu , mu nyaabulu yangwanwa ya Nzaambi , na ya Yesu Mfumu yeetu .
61001003	Mpinu dza kinzaambi kyaandi , dzatuha byobinso biri mufunu mu kidziingu na kinzaambi , mu nyaabulu ya ngwanwa ya wunde watuteele mbila , mu nkeembu yaandi na mu makwa maandi .
61001004	Mu byo bari bamusiila nsiilulu dzantalu na dzibvuriri bunene , mpisi heki mu dzo , beenu luba kintwaari mu nzelu ya kinzaambi , mu kubata nyiimunu dzadzibi dziri mu nsi .
61001005	Mu didyo , bvuleenu kusalila makwa momanso . Bweeseenu ha yulu kanyi dyeenu , nzelu yayibwete , ha yulu nzelu yayibwete , nyaabulu ,
61001006	ha yulu nyaabulu , nkebulu nyutu , ha yulu nkebulu nyutu , kifiki , ha yulu kifiki , kinzaambi ,
61001007	ha yulu kinzaambi , nzala-baatu , ha yulu nzala-baatu , ntiilu .
61001008	Mukwongo , lubaanaa luri na mamo , na mabuukila mu beenu , lo maluha bubolo ko , na malusa bisita ko , mu nyaabulu Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo ;
61001009	ngo muutu wahele na mamo , lo wafwa miisu , bunu pe wahele kwemono biri ku la , wayeki wadzimbikina nsyemukunu mu masumu maandi mamakulu .
61001010	Hango-nkuumbu , bampaangi , bvuleenu kusalila makwa mu kukumisa mbila yi bari baluteele , na nsoolulu yibari balusoolo , bukuri lubaana luyirika mamo , lo luri mbwiilulu mu mamabi ko .
61001011	Mukwongo , mu bubwo , nkotulu mu Kimfumu kyahele manunu , kya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo , yiba yaha kuri beenu mu bunsaalisi .
61001012	Hango-nkuumbu , me nyelemini kwelubaambula mwooyo mu misamu mimyo mpisi ntaangu , ti bukuri lumiyaari kwaandi , na lwayeki lwakaangama mu ngwanwa ya lumalu .
61001013	Me nyitsima ti diri dyadibwete , ti me nyilubaambulaa mwooyo mpisi luba naana , mu ntaangu yoyinso yi nyakiri me mu musaampu wumawu ,
61001014	bu nyaari ti ntaangu ya kuyekele musaampu waami yeki bebele , bunu bwa nsoongiri Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
61001015	Me sa nsalila makwa , mpisi heki , ha mambisa ma mfwiilu yaami , beenu lubambukilaa misamu mimyo mwooyo , mu mpisi mpwaani yi lubaka .
61001016	Mukwongo , kari mu kwenama bimpa byabalu mu madyeele ko , beetu turi twaluyaabisila mpinu na monokunu ya Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , ngo beetu-meene , twaba bambaangi bamono mu miisu bunene bwaandi .
61001017	Mukwongo , nde wataamburi lukiinsu na nkeembu kuri Taata Nzaambi . Mbeembu yayukukuna kuri nde mu nkeembu yayinene ti : « Wumawu ngo mwaana waami wa mutima , mu nde me nyimonaa kiminu . »
61001018	Mbeembu yiyo , beetu twayiyuka yafumuna ku yulu , bu twaba na nde ha yulu mulaandu wangisi .
61001019	Na beetu turi na maampu ma mbikululu mabvuriri nsiitu . Beenu luri mu kuyirikaa bwabubwe mu kusa madyeele mu mo , bunu mu mwiinda wukoohaanaa buungi ha kibeendu kya mampimbisi , natee kukya bwiisi , na kupalila mbwetete ya kipari mu mitima myeenu .
61001020	Tekeseleenu kuyaaba dyo ti : mpisi mbikululu ya Matinu , ka yitsiitsa kuba yabaangulu bunu bu tiiriri muutu ko .
61001021	Mukwongo , mbikululu kari mu ntiilu ya baatu dziri dzayisa ko , ngo kasi mu ntwalusulu ya Mpeeve Yangisi , baatu bari badzoonsolo mu nkuumbu ya Nzaambi .
61002001	Kwaba babikiri bampya kunsa baatu , bunubwo se , sa kwaba bayikisi bampya , ha kakati dya beenu . Bo sa bakotoso mu madyeele nyikusulu dza nzimbusulu , na sa batuna Mfumu yabakuula , bo sa basakisa mfukusulu ya bo-meene na sisuu .
61002002	Baatu balaka sa babanama kunsa buyala bwaaku ; na mu ntoono bo , nzila ya ngwanwa sa yaba yasaanu ,
61002003	na mu ntiki-mboongo , mu dzoonsolo dza lupyelu bo sa babadiilila manene . Kuri bo kuholosono na kidzika , mutsuundu wuri mu kwesala , na mfukusulu yaaku yahele kubwa tolo .
61002004	Mukwongo , Nzaambi kasii wuungula bambasi basumukini ko , ngo wabakaangiri mu bikonyi , na wabatubiri ku lubila lwa mampimbisi , ku kari kabawuunguka mu ntoono mutsuundu .
61002005	Nsi yayikulu se nde kasii kuyiwuungula ko , ngo wabvuukisiri Nowa muutu wampoomo , muyaabisi nsungumunu , ha katweesi mbuukulu maampa mu nsi ya baatu bahele na kinzaambi .
61002006	Nde wakese mukanu wa mfukusulu kuri mabvula ma Sodoma na Ngomora , bu kamakitula lufuta , mu kusoongo kuri baatu bahele na kinzaambi kifwaani kya mamo makwiisa ku mankula .
61002007	Nde wabvuukisiri Loti ngaa-kusuunguma , waba kwebamaana mu ntoono ndyaatulu dza buyala , dza baatu bahele na mangisi .
61002008	Mukwongo , nde ngaa-kusuunguma , bu kaba kwedzakalaana ha kakati dya bo , mu kiluumbu ngo kiluumbu , nde waba kwebamaana mu muheebulu waandi wasuunguma , bu kaba kwemonaana na kweyukaana mamabi ma baba kweyirikaana .
61002009	Mamo masoongo ti , Mfumu yaari kukuula bangaa-kinzaambi mu mpasi , na kukebe bahele kusuunguma mpisi baba baseembu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu ,
61002010	mbiki ti babo batiiri kweyukutisa muswinyi , mu nyiimunu dzasumuka , na bakwenyaafuna bumfumu . Babo ngo bangaa-nzala-kubila , bangaa-masiiku , bahele na boomo mu kwesaana biluunsi bya nkeembu ,
61002011	koomosoko na bambasi , babvuriri makwa na mpinu , bahele kuteesele biluunsi bya nkeembu bibyo nzoonsulu dza nsaanunu , ha busu bwa Mfumu .
61002012	Baatu babo bakwesaana bi badziimbiri , ngo bo se sa bafwa bunu bibulu byahele na madyeele , bi bayirikiri mu ntoono yiri ti , byekaangama mu myeete kuri babidzusa ;
61002013	bo sa bataambula mamabi bunu mufutu wa mamabi . Bo bakwemono kiminu , mu kweyukitisa manzala ma muswinyi mwiini-ngeembe . Bo ngo mviindu na nsoni , bakwemono luwu mu mpya dzaaku , mu kweyirika minkeembu mya ndiilu kintwaari na beenu .
61002014	Miisu mya bo myaluula mu kimpala , na banamitina mu kweyirika masumu . Bakwekoondo baatu bahele kukwiikama , mitima mya bo myayuku mu ntiki-mboongo , bo ngo baala ba mpopi .
61002015	Bu bamana kusiisa nzila yasuunguma , bayeki bawumuka mu kwenama nzila ya Balaami mwaana Bosoro , watiiri mufutu wa mamabi .
61002016	Nde wataamburi biŋaŋunu mu ntoono kusinina kwa mangisi kwa nde-meene : mpuunda ya baba bu yapalisa mbeembu ya muutu , yahotoso bulawuku bwa mubikiri .
61002017	Baatu babo ngo manto mahele maampa , mibuungi mikweyende mu kiteembu , bari babawungukila mampimbisi ma bu bokoro .
61002018	Mukwongo , bakwedzoonso misamu myaminene myahele mufunu , bari mu kwekoondo mu nyiimunu dza muswinyi , mu buyala , babo babvuukila ha wuri dya mukuungi dya baatu bawumuka .
61002019	Bo bakwetaasila baatu bunsaalisi , buni bo-meene bankutu ba bifu byabibi . Bukuri , mpisi muutu wuri nkutu kuri bibyo bi kari katumuma .
61002020	Mukwongo , mbuti babaanaa bamwabvuuka mu nsumukunu dza nsi , mu ntoono nyaabulu ya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo , babweesiri kuba bakaangama lukimi mu nsumukunu dzidzo , na beki batumuma , lo kiteesu kya bo kisyeeriri , kyeki kibvuriri bubi ti na kyatete .
61002021	Mukwongo , bwaketi kubvulila bubwe kuri bo , mu kuhele kuyaaba nzila ya nsungumunu , ti na kuri bamanaa kuyiyaaba , bayekiri lutumu lwangisi , lu bari babatubukila .
61002022	Ma leele nkuma yangwanwa ma mwaa kubatubukila : « Mbwa yibweesiri kubvutukila biluku byaandi » , na : « ngulu yibayoosiri , yibvutukiri ku tamba . »
61003001	Banduku ba mutima , wumawu ngo mukaanda wamyoolo , me nyiri mu kulutinina . Mu myo myoolo , me nyilubaambula mwooyo , mpisi nyilusyaamisa mu mitariri madyeele ma bukensekelee mari mu beenu ,
61003002	na lubaambuka mwooyo mu maampu matekisiri kuyaabisa babikiri bangisi , na mu lutumu lwa bantumu beenu , lwa Mfumu na Mubvuukisi .
61003003	Tekeseleenu kuyaaba dimadi ti , mu biluumbu byansukulu , bangaa-munsiku sa biisa na munsiku waaku , sa bedyaatila bunu buri mantiilu ma bo-meene ,
61003004	na kweleele ti : « Lusiilulu lwa nyisulu yaandi buri luri kuyirima pe ? Mukwongo , kipilu kya fwiiri bakuutu , momanso mari bunu , bwaba mu mbandukulu nyirikulu bitotolo byobinso ! »
61003005	Mukwongo , bo batiiri kudzimbikina dimadi ti : mayulu maba mu ntaangu yayikulu , na mu maampu ma Nzaambi , butoto bwayirimini mu maampa na maampa ,
61003006	Mu bibyo se , nsi yayikulu yiri yadyaamina mu maampa na yiri yafuukusu .
61003007	Ngo mayulu na butoto bya lumalu , mu maampu momamosi , biri byawuunguku mu ntoono mbaawu , na byakebu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu , na kya mfukusulu baatu , bahele na kinzaambi .
61003008	Ngo banduku ba mutima , kuri ntoono mosi yiri beenu yaa luhele kuyiyaaba ko : kiluumbu kimosi kuri Mfumu , kiri bunu fuunda dya mibvu , na fuunda dya mibvu diri bunu kiluumbu kimosi .
61003009	Mfumu wahele kudziingila mu kukukisa nsiilulu dzaandi , bunu buri mu kwetsima babamosi ti wuri mu kudziingila ; ngo nde wukiindisaa mutima mu beenu , bukuri katiiri ko ti babamosi bafuuka , ngo nde tiiri ti baatu bobanso biisa ku nyiingulu madyeele .
61003010	Kiluumbu kya Mfumu sa kiisa na sisuu bunu ngaa-kwiibi . Mu kiluumbu kikyo mayulu sa maluta mu kiyomo kya makwa . Bitotolo bikweluluka sa byasulumuka , na butoto na biyiriki biri mu bwo sa byaba byafuukusu .
61003011	Ngo mbuti heki bubwo , ti byobinso sa byasulumuka , lo nkya baatu , beenu luyelemini kuba mu ndyaatulu ya bungisi , na mu kinzaambi ,
61003012	bu luri mu kwekiinga na kwebingukila nyisulu kiluumbu kya Nzaambi ! Mu kiluumbu kikyo , mayulu makweluluka sa masulumuka , na bitotolo bikwehense mu mbaawu sa byanyengemuke .
61003013	Ngo beetu turi mu kwekiingila , bunu buri lusiilulu lwaandi , mayulu mamoono na butoto bwamoono , mumwo muba nsungumunu .
61003014	Hango-nkuumbu , banduku ba mutima , bu luri mu kwekiingila mamo , seenee makwa , mpisi nde kiisa kalutangusina mu kiyeengi , kuri lwahele na maka na mi baluseembele
61003015	Holuleenu nkindusulu-mutima ya Mfumu yeetu , bunu mvuukulu yeenu . Bunubwo se , mpaangi yeetu ya mutima , Pawulo , kari kalutinina , bunu buri madyeele ma bari bamuha .
61003016	Bunubwo se kari katina mu mikaanda myominso , mi kari mu kudzoonsolo mu mamama . Munsa mikaanda mimyo , misamu myamosi miri mpasi mu kubakula , na baatu bahele na madyeele , na bahele kukwiikama , bakwemikitula bunu bu basaana se mu Matinu makaka , mu kusakisa mfukusulu ya bo-meene .
61003017	Ngo beenu , banduku ba mutima , bu lumwaalubuka , seenee madyeele , mpisi heki luhele kuba bawumunu , mu nzimbusulu ya baatu bahele na mangisi , na luhele kubwa mu nsiitu ya beenu-meene .
61003018	Buukeenu kunsa bweese , na nyaabulu ya Mfumu na Mubvuukisi weetu Yesu Kiristo . Kuri nde , kuba nkeembu lumalu , natee mu kiluumbu kyahele mbandukulu na manunu ! Amene .
62001001	Mamo maba munu mbandukulu , ma turi twayuka , ma turi twamono mu miisu myeetu , ma turi twakengese na ma turi twabelemene mu myooko myeetu , mu ntoono maampu ma kidziingu ,
62001002	kidziingu kikyo kyamonikini , beetu twakimono , turi mu kuta kimbaangi , tuluyaabisa kidziingu kyahele manunu , kyaba kuri Taata na kyamonikini kuri beetu .
62001003	Mamo ma turi twamono , ma turi twayuka , tuyaabisa mo se kuri beenu , mpisi heki beenu se luba mu kintwaari na beetu . Ngo kintwaari kyeetu , kintwaari na Taata na Mwaana waandi Yesu Kiristo .
62001004	Beetu turi mu kutina mamama , mpisi heki kiminu kyeetu kiba kyakuka .
62001005	Wumawu ngo mukeensu wu turi twayuka kuri nde , na wu turi mu kuyaabisa kuri beenu : Nzaambi ngo buungi , na mu nde , mwahele mampimbisi ti mamosi .
62001006	Mbuti tuleelaa ti turi kintwaari na nde , ngo tudyaatila kunsa mampimbisi , lo tufuta mpya , na ka twasalilaa ngwanwa ko ;
62001007	mbuti beetu tudyaatila kunsa buungi , lo turi mu kintwaari beetu na beetu , na makila ma Yesu , Mwaana waandi , matutsyeemisaa mu mpisi sumu .
62001008	Mbuti tuleeriri ti twahele na masumu , lo tuwunukunaa beetu-meene , na ngwanwa ka yiri mu beetu ko .
62001009	Mbuti tutambukilaa masumu meetu , lo nde wuri wakwiikama na wasuunguma , mu kutuhemesene masumu meetu , na mu kututsyeemese mu mpisi lumvuki .
62001010	Mbuti tuleelaa ti twahele na masumu , lo tusaanaa kuri ti Nzaambi kaba ngaa-mpya , na maampu maandi ka mari mu beetu ko .
62002001	Mwaa-baala baami , me nyilutinina mamama , mpisi luhele kubwa mu masumu . Ngo mbuti muutu bwiiri mu masumu , lo turi na Nkariri kuri Taata , ngo Kiristo Yesu , ngaa-kusuunguma .
62002002	Nde ngo kikori mu ntoono masumu meetu , kari munu mu masumu ma beetu ko , ngo se mu masumu ma nsi yansiina .
62002003	Mu dimadi beetu tubakulaa ti twayeki twamuyaaba , mbuti tukebaa ntumu dzaandi .
62002004	Mpisi wunde wuleelaa ti : « Me nyayeki nyamuyaaba » , ngo wahele kukebe ntumu dzaandi , lo nde ngaa-mpya , na mu nde ngwanwa yo pe .
62002005	Wunde wukebaa maampu maandi , lo ngwanwa mu nde , ntiilu ya Nzaambi yayeki yakuka . Mu didyo , beetu tuyaabilaa ti turi mu nde .
62002006	Wunde wuleelaa ti wasa kikuundi mu nde , lo yelemini kudyaatila se , bunu bu kadyaatiri nde .
62002007	Banduku ba mutima , me nyahele kulutinina lutumu lwamoono ; ngo kasi lutumu lwalukulu lu lwataamburi beenu , kuholosono kunu mbandukulu . Lutumu lwalukulu lulwo ngo maampu ma luri lwayuka .
62002008	Mukwongo , lutumu lwamoono me nyiri mu kulutinina ; didyo diri dyangwanwa mu nde na mu beenu , bukuri mampimbisi mari mu kuluta , na buungi bwangwanwa bweki mu kuseme .
62002009	Wunde wuleelaa ti wuri kunsa buungi , ngo wubelaa mpaangi yaandi , lo natee lu nde wuri kunsa mampimbisi .
62002010	Wunde wutyaanaa mpaangi yaandi , lo wasa kikuundi kunsa buungi , na mu nde mpwaani ya kubwa mu masumu yo pe .
62002011	Wunde wubelaa mpaangi yaandi , lo wuri kunsa mampimbisi , wukwedyaatila kunsa mampimbisi , na wahele kuyaaba ku kakweyende , bukuri mampimbisi mamudzusa miisu .
62002012	Me nyitinina kuri beenu mwaa-baala , bukuri masumu ma beenu mayeki mahemusunu , mu ntoono nkuumbu yaandi .
62002013	Me nyitinina kuri beenu bataata , bukuri beenu lwayeki lwamuyaaba kuholosono kunu mbandukulu . Me nyitinina kuri beenu bituuti , bukuri beenu lwabwiisiri Ngaa-bubi .
62002014	Me nyatinini kuri beenu mwaa-baala , bukuri beenu lwayeki lwayaaba Taata . Me nyatinini kuri beenu bataata , bukuri beenu lwayeki lwamuyaaba kuholosono kunu mbandukulu . Me nyatinini kuri beenu bituuti bukuri beenu luri bangaa-makwa , na maampu ma Nzaambi masa kikuundi mu beenu , na beenu lwabwiisiri Ngaa-bubi .
62002015	Yaa lutya nsi ko , ti bitotolo biri mu nsi . Mbuti muutu tiiri nsi , lo kutya kwa Taata kwahele mu nde ;
62002016	bukuri byobinso biri mu nsi , nyiimunu dza muswinyi , nyiimunu dza miisu na masiiku mu bya kidziingu , biri bya Taata ko , ngo kasi bya nsi .
62002017	Nsi yiri mu kuluta na nyiimunu dzaandi ; ngo wunde wuyirikaa kutya kwa Nzaambi , lo wuri na kidziingu mantaangu momanso .
62002018	Mwaa-baala , ki ngo kilookolo kya mpotulu , bunu bu lwayukiri ti mutaatu Kiristo wuri mu kwiisa , mu lumalu bataatu ba Kiristo balaka bamwaakwiisa ; mu didyo beetu tuyaari ti ki ngo kilookolo kya mpotulu .
62002019	Bo bapariri ha kakati dya beetu , ngo basii kuba ba beetu ko ; bukuri mbuti ngo , baba ba beetu , nkani baketi kudzakala na beetu . Bo bapariri mpisi diba dyayabakana ti bobanso bari ba beetu ko .
62002020	Beenu lwataambula nkilulu kuri Wangisi , na beenu bobanso luyaari .
62002021	Me nyalutinini kari bukuri ti beenu lwahele kuyaaba ngwanwa ko , ngo bukuri beenu luyiyaari , na bukuri kuri mpya ti dzimosi ko , dzifumunaa kunsa ngwanwa .
