62002022	Na wuri ngaa-mpya , mbuti ka wunde wutunaa ti Yesu kari Kiristo ko ? Wunde ngo mutaatu Kiristo , wutunaa Taata na Mwaana .
62002023	Mpisi wunde wutunaa Mwaana , lo kari na Taata ko . Wutaambulaa Mwaana , lo wuri na Taata se .
62002024	Mamo ma lwayukiri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu , hemese masa kikuundi mu beenu . Mbuti mamo ma lwayukiri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu , masii kikuundi mu beenu , lo beenu se sa lwasa kikuundi mu Mwaana na mu Taata .
62002025	Na lu ngo lusiilulu lu kari kalusiila , kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso .
62002026	Me nyalutinini mamo mu dyaambu dya bakweludziimbisa .
62002027	Ngo beenu , nkilulu yi luri lwataambula kuri nde yasa kikuundi mu beenu , na lwahele na nzala kuri ti muutu kaluyikisa ; kasi nkilulu yaandi yiri mu kuluyikisa mu momanso , na yiri yangwanwa , ka yiri yampya ko , bunu bu yiri mu kuluyikisa , seenee kikuundi mu nde .
62002028	Na mu lumalu , mwaa-baala , seenee kikuundi mu nde . Mpisi heki , mbuti nde monikini , lo tubeeneenu na nsiitu , na tuhelee kufwa nsoni la na nde , mu ntaangu ya nyisulu yaandi .
62002029	Mbuti beenu luyaari ti nde wasuunguma , lo yabee se ti mpisi wunde wusalilaa nsungumunu , lo wabutuka mu nde .
62003001	Monee nkya ntiilu Taata kari katutiila , mpisi heki batuteele baala ba Nzaambi , na turi se bo . Hango-nkuumbu , nsi yahele kutuyaaba , bukuri yahele kuyaaba nde .
62003002	Banduku ba mutima , mu lumalu turi baala ba Nzaambi , na bubwo mbasi-tsuku bu tubeenee bwakiri kumonokono pe . Tuyaari kuri ti : mbuti nde monokini , lo beetu sa twafwanikina na nde , bukuri sa twamumono bunu bu kari .
62003003	Mpisi wunde wuri na nsiitu dza bubwo mu Kiristo , lo wutsyeemikaa nde-meene , bunu bu kari katsyeemeke nde .
62003004	Mpisi wunde wuyirika masumu , lo wusininaa se mangisi , bukuri masumu ngo kusinina kwa mangisi .
62003005	Beenu luyaari kuri ti : Kiristo wamonikini mu kuyusula masumu , na mu nde mwahele masumu .
62003006	Mpisi wasa kikuundi mu nde , kayirikaa masumu ko ; na mpisi wuyirikaa masumu , lo wakiri kumumono pe , na wakiri se kumuyaaba pe .
62003007	Mwaa-baala , muutu yaa kaludziimbisa ko . Wunde wusalilaa nsungumunu , lo wasuunguma bunu Kiristo wuri wasuunguma .
62003008	Wunde wuyirikaa masumu , lo wa dyabulu , bukuri kuholosono kunu mbandukulu dyabulu watobiri masumu . Mu dimadi Mwaana Nzaambi kamonikini , mpisi katsyaamuna biyiriki bya dyabulu .
62003009	Mpisi wunde wabutuka kuri Nzaambi kayirikaa masumu ko , bukuri mumbutu Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde . Nde ka katsiitsa kuyirika masumu ko , bukuri wabutuka kuri Nzaambi .
62003010	Mu didyo , bayaabulaa baala ba Nzaambi , na baala ba dyabulu . Mpisi wunde wuhelaa kusalila nsungumunu kari wa Nzaambi ko ; bunubwo se kuri wuhelaa kutya mpaangi yaandi .
62003011	Wumawu ngo mukeensu wu luri lwayuka kuholosono kunu mbandukulu : Twetilisineenu beetu na beetu .
62003012	Yaa tuba bunu Kayini ko , waba ngaa-bubi , na wadzusiri mpaangi yaandi . Heki mu nkya ntoono kamudzusiri ? Bukuri biyiriki bya Kayini byaba byabibi , na bya mpaangi yaandi byaba byasuunguma .
62003013	Bampaangi , yaa lwekimuka ko , mbuti nsi yikwelubele .
62003014	Beetu tuyaari ti , twayeki twayisika mu lufwa mu kuluta mu bumwooyo , bukuri beetu tutyaanaa bampaangi . Wunde wahele kutya bampaangi , lo wafwa kwakinkulu .
62003015	Mpisi wunde wubelaa mpaangi yaandi , lo nde mudzusi , na beenu luyaa ti mpisi mudzusi , lo kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso kyahele kusa kikuundi mu nde .
62003016	Mu didyo , beetu twayeki twayaaba ntiilu , bukuri Kiristo waheeri kidziingu kyaandi mu ntoono beetu , na beetu se tuyelemini kuha kidziingu kyeetu mu ntoono bampaangi .
62003017	Mpisi wunde wuri na lubaku lwa nsi , na mwiini mpaangi yaandi watikila , ngo kaangiri mutima , lo dyaburi ntiilu ya Nzaambi yitsiitsa kuba mu nde ?
62003018	Mwaa-baala , yaa twetiilee mu bini bibori ko ; ngo twetiilee mu biyiriki na mu ngwanwa .
62003019	Mu dimadi , beetu sa twayaaba ti turi bangaa-ngwanwa , na ha busu bwaandi , sa twadzuunisa mitima myeetu .
62003020	Ngo mbuti mutima weetu wutubwiisa , Nzaambi bvuriri kudzaangama na mutima weetu , na nde yaari momanso .
62003021	Banduku ba mutima , mbuti mutima weetu wahele kutubwiisa , lo turi na nsiitu mu Nzaambi ,
62003022	na mpisi ma tuloombo , tumataambula kuri nde , bukuri beetu tukebaa ntumu dzaandi , na tuyirikaa mamabwe ha busu bwaandi .
62003023	Lumalu ngo lutumu lwaandi : ti beetu tusa kanyi mu Mwaana waandi , Yesu Kiristo , na tutilisinee beetu na beetu , bunu bu kari katuha lutumu .
62003024	Wunde wukebaa ntumu dzaandi wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi , na Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde . Mu dimadi beetu tuyaabilaa ti , Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu beetu , mu Mpeeve yi kari katuha .
62004001	Banduku ba mutima , yaa lwesiila kanyi mu mpisi mpeeve ko , ngo fyongokinee mampeeve , mbuti ma Nzaambi mari ; bukuri babikiri bampya balaka bamwaakwiisa mu nsi .
62004002	Mu dimadi beenu luyaabula Mpeeve ya Nzaambi : mpisi mpeeve yitaambula ti Yesu Kiristo wayisa mu muswinyi , lo yiri ya Nzaambi ;
62004003	na mpisi mpeeve yihele kutaambula Yesu , lo yiri ya Nzaambi ko ; mpeeve yiyo ya mutaatu Kiristo , wu lwayukiri beenu ti wuri mu kwiisa , na mu lumalu weki mu nsi .
62004004	Mwaa-baala , beenu luri ba Nzaambi , na beenu lwabwiisiri babikiri bampya ; bukuri wunde wuri mu beenu , bvuriri makwa na wunde wuri mu nsi .
62004005	Bo bari ba nsi ; mu didyo , bakwedzoonsolo bunu buri nsi , na nsi yikwebaywiila .
62004006	Beetu turi baatu ba Nzaambi . Wunde wuyaari Nzaambi kootuywiila . Ngo wunde wuri kari wa Nzaambi ko , kakootuywiila ko . Mu didyo , beetu tuyaabilaa Mpeeve ya ngwanwa , na mpeeve ya mawunu .
62004007	Banduku ba mutima , tutilisinee beetu na beetu , bukuri ntiilu yiri ya Nzaambi . Mpisi wuri na ntiilu wabutuka kuri Nzaambi na yaari Nzaambi .
62004008	Wunde wahele na ntiilu , lo ka yaa Nzaambi ko , bukuri Nzaambi ngo ntiilu .
62004009	Bumabu ntiilu ya Nzaambi yiri yayabakana ha kakati dya beetu : nde waheeke Mwaana waandi ndemosi mu nsi , mpisi heki tuba mwooyo mu nde .
62004010	Ntiilu yiri bumabu : ka kuri ko ti beetu twatiiri Nzaambi , ngo kasi nde watutya , na waheeke Mwaana waandi , bunu kikori mu masumu meetu .
62004011	Banduku ba mutima , mbuti Nzaambi watutiila mu kiteesu kya bubwo , beetu se tuyelemini kwetilisina beetu na beetu .
62004012	Kuri muutu ko wumwaamono Nzaambi . Mbuti tutilisinaa beetu na beetu , lo Nzaambi wusanaa kikuundi mu beetu , na ntiilu yaandi mu beetu yayeki yakuka .
62004013	Beetu tuyaabilaa ti twasa kikuundi mu nde , na nde wasa kikuundi mu beetu , bukuri nde watuha Mpeeve yaandi .
62004014	Beetu twakengisiri na tuta kimbaangi ti Taata waheekiri Mwaana , bunu Mubvuukisi nsi .
62004015	Mpisi wunde wutaambula ti Yesu Mwaana Nzaambi , lo Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde , na nde wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi .
62004016	Beetu twayaaba , na twasa kanyi mu ntiilu yiri na Nzaambi mu beetu . Nzaambi ngo ntiilu ; mpisi wunde wasa kikuundi mu ntiilu , lo wasa kikuundi mu Nzaambi , na Nzaambi wasa kikuundi mu nde .
62004017	Mu didyo , ntiilu yiri yakuka ha kakati dya beetu , mpisi heki tubeeneenu na nsiitu mu kiluumbu kya mutsuundu , bukuri bunu bu kari nde , bunubwo se beetu turi mu nsi yimayi .
62004018	Boomo bwahele mu ntiilu ; ngo kasi ntiilu yangwanwa yiyisilaa boomo , bukuri munsa boomo muri maseembu . Wunde wahele na boomo wayeki wakuka mu ntiilu .
62004019	Beetu tutyaanaa , bukuri nde watete watutiiri .
62004020	Mbuti muutu wuleele ti : « Me ntiiri Nzaambi » , ngo wubelaa mpaangi yaandi , lo nde ngaa-mpya . Mukwongo , wunde wuhelaa kutya mpaangi yaandi yikamono , lo katsiitsa kutya Nzaambi ko , wu kahele kumono .
62004021	Lu ngo lutumu lu turi twataambula kuri nde : wunde wutya Nzaambi , lo katya se mpaangi yaandi .
62005001	Mpisi wunde wusa kanyi ti Yesu ngo Kiristo , lo nde wabutuka kuri Nzaambi , na mpisi wunde wutiiri mubuti , lo katya se wabutuka kuri nde .
62005002	Beetu tuyaaba ti tutiiri baala ba Nzaambi , mu ntaangu yi tukootyaanaa Nzaambi , na yi tusalilaa ntumu dzaandi .
62005003	Mukwongo , ntiilu ya Nzaambi yiri kuri ti , tukebee ntumu dzaandi ; ngo ntumu dzaandi dzahele kuleme ,
62005004	bukuri mpisi wabutuka kuri Nzaambi , lo waluuluka mu nsi , na ndulukulu ya kuluuluka mu nsi , ngo kanyi dyeetu .
62005005	Na waluuluka mu nsi , mbuti ka wunde wasiila kanyi , ti Yesu ngo Mwaana Nzaambi ko ?
62005006	Yesu Kiristo ngo wunde wayisiri na maampa na makila , kari na mani maampa kitsu ko , ngo na maampa na makila ; Mpeeve ngo muteeri kimbaangi , bukuri Mpeeve ngo ngwanwa .
62005007	Bambaangi batatu bari :
62005008	Mpeeve , maampa na makila , na bo batatu bari kintwaari mu kimbaangi kyokimosi .
62005009	Mbuti tutaambulaa kimbaangi kya baatu , lo kimbaangi kya Nzaambi kibvuriri bunene ; bukuri kimaki ngo kimbaangi kya Nzaambi , ki kari kata mu Mwaana waandi .
62005010	Wunde wusiilaa kanyi mu Mwaana Nzaambi , wuri na kimbaangi mu nde-meene . Wunde wuhelaa kusiila kanyi mu Nzaambi , lo wusanaa kuri ti Nzaambi kaba ngaa-mpya , bukuri wahele kutaambula kimbaangi kya Nzaambi , ki kari kata mu Mwaana waandi .
62005011	Kimbaangi kikyo ngo ki : Nzaambi watuha kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso , na kidziingu kikyo kiri mu Mwaana waandi .
62005012	Wunde wuri na Mwaana , wuri na kidziingu ; wunde wahele na Mwaana Nzaambi , wahele na kidziingu .
62005013	Me nyalutinini mamo mpisi luyaaba ti , beenu lusiila kanyi mu nkuumbu Mwaana Nzaambi , luri na kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso .
62005014	Dzimadzi ngo nsiitu dzi turi na dzo mu nde , mbuti tumuloombiri kitotolo , bunu buri kutya kwaandi , lo nde wutuywiilaana .
62005015	Na mbuti tuyaari ti nde wutuywiilaa , lo tuyaari se ti tutaambulaa bibyo bi tumuloombaa .
62005016	Mbuti muutu wumono mpaangi yaandi , wuyirika masumu mahele kunata ku lufwa , lo kaloombo , na Nzaambi sa kaha kidziingu kuri mpaangi yiyo , kuri babo bayirikaa masumu mahele kunata ku lufwa . Kuri sumu dinataa ku lufwa ; ngo kari mu didyo ko me nyituma ti kasaambila .
62005017	Mpisi kuhele kwa nsungumunu masumu ; ngo kuri masumu mahelaa kunata ku lufwa .
62005018	Tuyaari ti mpisi wabutuka kuri Nzaambi , lo kayirikaa masumu ko , bukuri Mwaana Nzaambi wumukebaa , na Ngaa-bubi kari mbelemene nde ko .
62005019	Tuyaari ti beetu turi baatu ba Nzaambi , na nsi yoyinso yiri kunsa bubi .
62005020	Ngo kasi tuyaari ti , Mwaana Nzaambi wayisa , na watuha madyeele mu kuyaaba Wangwanwa ; na turi kunsa Wangwanwa , mu Mwaana waandi , Yesu Kiristo . Nde wuri Nzaambi yangwanwa , na kidziingu kya mantaangu momanso .
62005021	Mwaa-baala , seenee madyeele beenu-meene mu ntoono biteki .
63001001	Me Mukulu-bakala , kuri Mukyeetu wasoolu , na kuri baala baandi , ba nyiri nyatya mu ngwanwa . Ngo kari wunu me kitsu nyibatii ko , kasi bobanso se bamwaayaaba ngwanwa ,
63001002	mu ntoono ngwanwa yasa kikuundi mu beetu , na sa yaba na beetu mu mantaangu momanso .
63001003	Hemese bweese , ngebe na kiyeengi bifumunaa kuri Taayi Nzaambi , na kuri Yesu Kiristo Mwaana wa Taayi , byeba na beetu , mu ngwanwa na mu ntiilu .
63001004	Me nyankeembiri kwalaka , bu nyamwiini ti baala baaku , bakwedyaatila mu ngwanwa , bunu buri lutumu lu turi twataambula kuri Taata .
63001005	Na mu lumalu di nyiloombo kuri ye , Mukyeetu , kari bunu ti lutumu lwamoono , me nyiri mu kutinina kuri ye ko , ngo luni lu turi twataambula , kuholosono munu mbandukulu ti , twetilisineenu beetu na beetu .
63001006	Ntiilu yiri kuri ti , twedyaatileenu bunu buri ntumu dzaandi . Lutumu lu luri lwataambula kuholosono munu mbandukulu , kuri ti beenu lwedyaatila mu nde .
63001007	Bawumuni balaka bamwaatsamukina mu nsi . Bo bahele kwetaambula ti Yesu Kiristo wayisa mu muswiini . Wunde ngo muwumuni , mutaatu-Kiristo .
63001008	Seenee madyeele beenu-meene , mpisi heki luhele kudziimbisa bi turi twasala , ngo lutaambula mufutu wakuka .
63001009	Mpisi wunde wuluta nyikusulu dza Kiristo , na wahele kusa kikuundi mu dzo , lo wahele na Nzaambi . Ngo wunde wasa kikuundi mu nyikusulu , lo wuri na Taata na Mwaana .
63001010	Mbuti muutu wiisiri kuri beenu , na wahele kutwaala nyikusulu dzidzo , lo yaa lumutaambula mu nzo yeenu ko , na yaa lumuha mboto ko .
63001011	Mukwongo , mpisi wunde wumuha mboto , lo wuri kintwaari mu biyiriki bya muutu wunde byabibi .
63001012	Mbee kwaandi na myalaka mya kulutinina , ngo me nsii tya kusalila kipapila na ntiinta ko , kasi nyiri na nsiitu mu kwiisa kuri beenu , na mu kudzoonsono kuri tutalisina mu miisu na miisu , mpisi heki kiminu kyeetu kiba kyakuka .
63001013	Baala ba kibusi kyaaku kyasoolu , bakuheekiri mboto .
64001001	Me Mukulu-bakala , kuri Ngayo nduku ya mutima , yi ntiiri mu ngwanwa .
64001002	Nduku ya mutima , me nyikutiisa ti ye baanguka mu myominso , na ba wamutsiina , bunu bwabaanguka se muheebulu waaku .
64001003	Mukwongo , me nyankeembiri kwalaka , mu bampaangi bayisiri na mu kimbaangi ki bateeri mu ye mu ngwanwa , kuri ti ye wukwedyaatila mu ngwanwa .
64001004	Kiminu kya me kibvuriri bunene , mu kuyuka ti baala ba me , ba kwedyaatila mu ngwanwa .
64001005	Nduku ya mutima , ye wuri mu kwesala mu nkwikumunu , mu ma wuri mu kweyirika mu bampaangi , na bunubwo se mu banzeense .
64001006	Bo bateeriri ye kimbaangi , ha busu bwa Dibuundu , mu ntiilu yi wuri na yo . Ye yelemini kubaha bi bari na nzala byo , mu budyeengi bwa bo , mu kiteesu kyayelemene mu Nzaambi .
64001007	Mukwongo , bo bayensikiri mu nkuumbu , kwahele kutaambula kitotolo ti kimosi kuri makaanda .
64001008	Mu didyo , beetu tuyelemini kutaambula ba bubwo , mpisi heki tuba bakwesala kintwaari mu ntoono ngwanwa .
64001009	Me nyatinini mwaa mantoono kuri dibuundu ; ngo kasi Dyotelefe , wutiiri kweba watete mu bo , wahele kututaambula .
64001010	Hango-nkuumbu , mbuti me nyiisiri , lo sa nyamubaambula mwooyo , mu biyiriki byaandi , bi kari mu kweyirika : nzoonsulu dzadzibi , dzabudzeke mu beetu ; kiminu bu kiheriri kukuka mu mamo , nde wubisa kutaambula bampaangi ; na batiiri kwaaku kwetaambula bampaangi , nde wukwebakabukisa na wubapalisa mu dibuundu .
64001011	Nduku ya mutima , yaa wesombosolo mamabi ko ; ngo sombosolo mamabwe . Wunde wusalilaa mamabwe wuri wa Nzaambi , na wunde wusalilaa mamabi , lo kamwii Nzaambi ko .
64001012	Baatu bobanso bateeriri Demeteryo kimbaangi kyakibwe . Ngwanwa yo-meene se yiri mu kumuteele kimbaangi . Beetu se tumuteele kimbaangi , na ye yaari ti kimbaangi kyeetu kyangwanwa .
64001013	Mbee kwaandi na myalaka mya kukutinina . Ngo nyahele kutya kusalila ntiinta na lusala .
64001014	Me nyiri na nsiitu , ti kidzika kyantele mbee nyikumwiini , na sa twadzoonsono kuri tutalisina mu miisu na miisu .
64001015	Hemese kiyeengi kiba na ye ! Banduku bakuheekiri mboto . Ye se ha mboto kuri banduku , muutu-muutu mu nkuumbu yaandi .
65001001	Yuda , nkutu Yesu Kiristo , mpaangi Yakobo , kuri babo ba bari bateele mbila , batya mu Taayi Nzaambi , na ba bari bakebe mu Yesu Kiristo .
65001002	Hemese ngebe , kiyeengi na ntiilu bya Nzaambi , biba kuri beenu na fundu-fundu .
65001003	Banduku ba mutima , me mbeeri kwaandi na musoongo walaka mu kulutinina , mu dyaambu dya mvuukulu yeetu ya kintwaari , ngo mwiini mufunu mu kulutinina , mpisi nyilusyaamisa mu kunwaana mu ntoono kanyi , di bari bayakisa kwakinkulu kuri bangisi .
65001004	Mukwongo , baatu babamosi bayolomikini mu nsweeki , bari kuholosono na kidzika , batekesele kubatina mankuumbu mu mutsuundu wunde . Bo ngo bangooyi , bakwekitula bweese bwa Nzaambi yeetu mu buyala , na bakwetuna wunde wuri ndemosi Mutumi na Mfumu yeetu , Yesu Kiristo .
65001005	Me ntiiri kulubaambula mwooyo mu momanso ma luyaari ti , Mfumu kamanaa kubvuukisa lwo lumosi , kaanda ku nsi ya Ngipiti , ha lumbisa haho , nde wafuukisa bari basii kusa kanyi ko .
65001006	Bambasi bari basii kebe kibeendu kya bo-meene ko , ngo basisiri kikuundi kya bo-meene , nde wabawuunguka mu bikonyi bya bibvu ngo bibvu , kunsa mampimbisi , mu kiluumbu kyakinene kya mutsuundu .
65001007	Bunu buri Sodoma na Ngomora na mabvula ma badyengekele , masariri buyala bunu bo , mu kiteesu kyokimosi , na banemi bari na manyutu ma kinzeri kikimi , bo bari mu kifwaani kya baatu babwiilikila maseembu ma mbaawu ya mantaangu momanso .
65001008	Baatu bamaba se bwobumosi , bakwesa biwobiri , hamosi bakwesumuna manyutu , hakaka bakwenyaafuna lutumu , na bakwesaana bambasi bankeembu .
65001009	Ngo kasi , Mikaheli mbasi ya yikuutu , ha baba kalakanaa bo na dyabulu , mu kukaangina nyutu Moose , kasii tya kumuteesele mya nsaanunu ko , ngo nde bu kamuleeriri ti : " Mfumu kakuseembe ! "
65001010	Ngo bamaba , hamosi bakwesaana myominso miri bahele kuyaaba , hakaka bakwefuuka mu myominso mi bakweyaabila mu kimuutu , bunu bibulu byahele na madyeele .
65001011	Kyaari kuri bo , bukuri banemi nzila ya Kayini , bo bayekimini mu mpumukunu ya Balaami mu ntoono mufutu , na bafuukiri kunsa tungu dya Kore .
65001012	Bamaba ngo bo , bangaa-kisaangila , kunsa ndiilu yeenu ya kimpaangi , bakwekeembe mu ndiilu ya mawaamba kwahele boomo , bakwebuungula manyutu ma bo-meene , bo ngo matuti mahele maampa , makweheembeke mu kiteembu , miti mya manunu ndoolo , myahele na bimbutu , myafwa mfwa dzoolo , myataabuka .
65001013	Bo ngo mipaku mya mubu mya kibakala , mitoombolaa fula dya nsoni dzaaku , bambwetete bakweyiima , ba bari bawungukila , mampimbisi ma bubokoro mu mantaangu momanso .
65001014	Mu bo , Enoki , wansaamu kubandikila mu Adami , kaba leele ti : « Mono , Mfumu wayisiri na fundu-fundu dya bangisi baandi ,
65001015	mu kutsuundisa baatu bobanso , na kusa kuri ti babakula biyiriki byaaku bya bungooyi , mu ntoono misamu mikolo , mya muteesele bangooyi bangaa-masumu . »
65001016	Bo ngo bakwemunguta , bahele kumono kiminu mu kiteesu kyaaku , bakwedyaatila bunu buri nyiimunu dzaaku , na minwa mikwedzoonsolo mu masiiku , na bakwesiikila baatu mu ndaandu .
65001017	Ngo kasi , beenu banduku ba mutima , baambukee mwooyo , mu maampu matekisiri kuleele bantumu , ba Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo .
65001018	Bo baba leelaa kuri beenu ti : « Kumanunu ntaangu , sa kwaba bangaa-munsiku bakwedyaatila bunu buri nyiimunu dzaaku , dza bangooyi . »
65001019	Babo ngo bakwekotoso nkabunu , bakwedyaatila bunu bibulu , na bahele na Mpeeve .
65001020	Ngo beenu , banduku ba mutima , tuungumeenu beenu-mee ha yulu kanyi dyeenu dyangisi na ngisi , na saambileenu mu Mpeeve Yangisi .
65001021	Beenu-meene kebee manyutu kunsa ntiilu ya Nzaambi , bu luri mu kwekiingila ngebe dza Mfumu yeetu Yesu Kiristo , mu kubaka kidziingu kyahele manunu .
65001022	Na beenu hamosi , bakilee bari na maketi-keti ngebe ,
65001023	hakaka , bvuukisee babamosi mu kubapalisa kunsa mbaawu , bakilee se bakaka ngebe mu boomo , mu kubele se na kinkuta kyasumunu kuri muswinyi .
65001024	Kuri wunde wakuka mu kulukebe kwahele kubumuna makya , na kulutelemese ha busu bwa nkeembu yaandi , kwahele maseembu , kunsa nyeense ,
65001025	kuri Nzaambi yomosi , Mubvuukisi weetu mu Yesu Kiristo , Mfumu yeetu , kuba nkeembu , bumfumu , makwa na lutumu , tekesele mantaangu momanso na mu lumalu natee bibvu byobinso , bunubwo ! Amene .
66001001	Nyabukusu Yesu Kiristo ya muha Nzaambi , mu kusoongo kuri bisari byaandi , mamo makwiisa mu mawasu . Nde waheeke mbasi yaandi kuri kisari kyaandi Yowane , mu kuyaabisa yo ,
66001002	wunde wata kimbaangi mu Maampu ma Nzaambi , na kimbaangi kya Yesu Kiristo , momanso ma kari kamono .
66001003	Kiminu kiri na muutu wunde wutaanga mukaanda wu , na kiri na bayuka maampu ma mbikululu , na bakebaa mari mu yo , bukuri ntaangu yeki bebele .
66001004	Yowane , kuri mabuundu nsaamu mari mu nsi ya Asya : Bweese kuri beenu na kiyeengi bifumini kuri wunde wuri , waba , na wukwiisa , na kuri mampeeve nsaamu mari ha busu bwa mboloko yaandi ,
66001005	na kuri Yesu Kiristo , Mbaangi yakwiikama , watete wabutuka mu bafwa , na mwaana mfumu ya bambyaasi ba butoto . Kuri nde wututiiri , watukuula mu masumu meetu mu makila maandi ,
66001006	nde wasa beetu kimfumu kya bangaanga-nzaambi , mu kusalila Nzaambi wuri se Taayi dyaandi ; kuri nde kuba nkeembu na makwa mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene !
66001007	Mono , nde wuri mu kwiisa mu matuti , mpisi muutu sa kamumono , na babo bamutobiri dyoongi . Makaanda momanso ma ha butoto sa makoto mu manyoongi mu ntoono nde . Heehe ! Amene !
66001008	« Me ngo Alafa na Omenga » , buleeriri Mfumu Nzaambi , wuri , waba , na wuri mu kwiisa , Mwa-mbete .
66001009	Me Yowane , mpaangi yeenu , wu luri ntwaari mu nsiitsulu , mu kimfumu , mu nkwikumunu mu Yesu ; me nyabeeri ku kibuma ki bateelaa ti Patomo , mu dyaambu dya Maampu ma Nzaambi na kimbaangi kya Yesu .
66001010	Mpeeve yambaka mu kiluumbu kya Mfumu , na nyayuka ku mambisa ma me mbeembu yayinene yiri bunu mvumvuri ,
66001011	yaleele ti : « Mamo ma wuri mu kumono , tina mo munsa mukaanda , na heeke nde ku mabuundu mo nsaamu : ku Efeso , ku Semirana , ku Peregamo , ku Tyatira , ku Saredeyi , ku Filadelefya , na ku Lahodikya . »
66001012	Me nyabaluka mu kumono mbeembu yiyo yaba dzoonso kuri me ; na bu nyabaluka , me nyamono bitetukulu bya miinda nsaamu byawoolo ,
66001013	na ha kakati dya Bitetukulu bya miinda , me nyamono wafwanikina na mwaana muutu , waba walwaata kinkuta kyakila natee ku miilu , na waba walwaata musweele wawoolo mu ntulu .
66001014	Mutu waandi na mfu dzaandi byaba byahembeke bunu myoosi mya bimeeme , bunu midiingi , na miisu myaandi bunu mule mbaawu ;
66001015	miilu myaandi myafwanikina na nsoongo yayoku ku dziku dya mbaawu na mbeembu yaandi yafwanikina na kiyoomo kya maampa .
66001016	Na wakwaata mu kooko kwaandi kwa lubakala bambwetete nsaamu , na mu munwa waandi mwaapala mbeesi yayila ya mabusu moolo , yasekusu kibari na kibari , na busu bwaandi , bunu ntaangu yiseme mu mpinu dzaandi .
66001017	Me bu nyamumono , nyabwa ha miilu myaandi , bunu muutu wafwa , na nde wateeteke kooko kwaandi kwa lubakala ha yulu me , waleele : « Yaa ba na boomo ko , me nyiri watete na wampotulu ,
66001018	wamwooyo , me nyabee nyafwa , ngo mono me nyiri mwooyo mu bibvu ngo bibvu ; me nyiri na mafungula ma lufwa na ma lubila .
66001019	Hango , tina ma mwiini , mamo mari , na mari mu kwiisa ha lumbisa lwa mamo .
66001020	Mpaanu dza bambwetete nsaamu , ba mwiini mu kooko kwaami kwa lubakala , na bitetukulu bya miinda nsaamu byawoolo dziri bumabu : bambwetete nsaamu ngo bambasi ba mabuundu nsaamu , na bitetukulu bya miinda nsaamu ngo mabuundu mo nsaamu . »
66002001	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Efeso : « Wakwaata bambwetete nsaamu mu kooko kwaandi kwa lubakala , wuri mu kweyende hansa bitetukulu nsaamu bya miinda byawoolo , mimami kari mu kuleele :
66002002	Me nyaari biyiriki bya ye , kisalu na kifiki kyaaku . Me nyaari ti ye wakuunda bababi ko , na ye watsiitsiri babo bakweleele bo-meene ti bo bantumu , ngo bo bari bantumu ko , na ye wamwii ti bangaa-mpya bari .
66002003	Ye wuri na kifiki , ye wakuunda mpasi mu dyaambu dya nkuumbu yaami , ye wahele kuholo-bito .
66002004	Ngo kasi di mberiri me mu ye diri : ye wayekele ntiilu yaaku yatete .
66002005	Hango , baambuka mwooyo mu ha wuri wabwiilila , yiinga dyeele na bvutukila biyiriki byaaku byatete ; mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo me sa nyiisa kuri ye , na sa nyiinga kibeendu kya kitetukulu kya mwiinda waaku , mbuti ye wahele kuyiinga dyeele .
66002006	Kasi ye wuri na dimadi se : ye wubelaa biyiriki bya Nikolayiti , biri me se nyabibele . »
66002007	« Wunde wuri na makutu kayuka , mamo madzoonsiri Mpeeve kuri dibuundu . Kuri wunde wuluuluka , me sa nyimuha muti wa mwooyo wa kudya , wuri mu paradiso dya Nzaambi . »
66002008	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Semirana : « Watete na wampotulu , wafwiiri na wafulukiri , bumabu kari mu kuleele :
66002009	Me nyaari mpasi na buwelu bwa ye , kasi wuri kisina , nyaari se nsaanunu dza babo bari mu kweleele ti Bayudayo bari , ngo bari Bayudayo ko , kasi baatu ba nzo-nkutukunu ya Satana .
66002010	Yaa bata ti kitotolo ti kimosi ko , mu mpasi dzi wubwanikina na dzo . Mono , dyabulu sa katuba bakaka mu beenu munsa boroko , mpisi heki balutsiitsa ; sa lwaba lwatsiitsa mu biluumbu kuumi . Ba wakwiikama natee dya lufwa , tumi nyikuha lukoongolo lwamwooyo . »
66002011	« Wunde wuri na makutu kayuka , mamo madzoonsiri Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! » « Wuluulukiri ka kafwa lwadzoolo ko . »
66002012	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Peregamo : « Wakwaata mbeesi yayila , yasekusu mu bibari byobyoolo , bu kari mu kuleele :
66002013	Me nyaari ku wubaanaa ye , kukwo kuri mboloko Satana , ye wakwaata mu makwa nkuumbu yaami , na wahele kutuna kanyi dya mu me , ti mu biluumbu bya Antipa , mbaangi yaami , mpaangi yaami yakwiikama , wubari badzusa kuri beenu , kwa tuunga Satana .
66002014	Kasi me nyiri na munyoongi wantele mu ye : bukuri ye wuri na baatu bakaangama mu nyikusulu dza Balaami , waba yikisa kuri Balaki , bwa kubwiisila baala ba Isaheli , mu kudya toongo , twaha mu bikabu kuri biteki na kwesa buyala .
66002015	Bwobumosi , ye se wuri na baatu bakaangama mu nyikusulu dza bari Nikolayiti .
66002016	Hango nkuumbu , yiinga dyeele ; mbuti ka bubwo ko , lo me sa nyiisa mu mawasu kuri ye , na sa nyibanwaanisa mu mbeesi yayila ya munwa waami . »
66002017	« Wunde wuri na makutu mu kuyuka , kayuka mamo madzoonsiri Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! » « Kuri wuluuluka , me sa nyamuha maana , yasweeku ; na sa nyaha kuri nde tari dyahembeke , na ha yulu tari dyatinu nkuumbu yamoono , yiri muutu ti mosi kayaa ko , mbuti ka wutaambula dyo ko . »
66002018	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Tyatira : « Mwaana Nzaambi di kari mu kuleele , wuri na miisu myafwanikina na mule mbaawu , na miilu myafwanikina na nsoongo .
66002019	Me nyaari biyiriki bya ye , ntiilu , kanyi , kisalu na kifiki kyaaku , biyiriki bya ye basyeelele bibvuriri kwalaka na byatete .
66002020	Ngo di nyiri nyabele ye , di wuri wahemese mukyeetu wuri nkuumbu Yedzabele , wu kweleele ti nde mubikiri , wukweyikisa na wukwedziimbisa bisari byaami , kuri bakwesa buyala , na bakwedya toongo twaha mu kikabu kuri biteki .
66002021	Me nyimuha ntaangu ya kuyiinga dyeele , ngo wahele kutya kuyiinga dyeele mu buyala bwaandi .
66002022	Mono nyimuneŋesene , kintwaari na bateeri kimpala na nde , ha yulu mbuka ya manyoongi mamanene , mbuti bahele kuyiinga dyeele ha busu bwa biyiriki bya nde wa mukyeetu ,
66002023	lo me sa nzusa baala ba nde wa mukyeetu . Na mabuundu momanso sa bayaaba ti , me ngo nyikengisaa bitsimi na manzala , na sa bvutula kuri muutu-muutu mu beenu , bunu buri biyiriki byaandi . »
66002024	« Me nyileele kuri beenu na kuri bakaka bari ku Tyatira , kuri bobanso bahele na nyikusulu dzi , babo bahele kuyaaba " musundu Satana " , bunu bu bakweleele ; me nyahele kutuba ha yulu beenu kinati kikimi ;
66002025	ngo mamo ma luyaari , kebeenu natee me nyiisiri . »
66002026	« Kuri wunde wuluulukiri na wukebiri biyiriki byaami natee manunu , me sa nyaha kuri nde , lutumu ha yulu makaanda ,
66002027	na sa kamatwaalisa mu luboto ha kooko , sa kakosono mo , bunu bu bakosonaa bisa bya tubuumbu ,
66002028	bunu bwo se me nyiri nyataambula lutumu kuri Taata , na me sa nyimuha mbwetete ya minkya . »
66002029	« Wuri na makutu , kayuka ma leele Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! »
66003001	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Saredeyi : « Wakwaata mampeeve nsaamu ma Nzaambi , na bambwetete nsaamu , bu kari mu kuleele : me nyaari biyiriki bya ye , wuri na mvuumfu ti wuri mwooyo , ngo kasi ye wafwa .
66003002	Ba naana , na syaamisa bari mu kwefwa ; mukwongo me nyahele kumono kuri ye , biyiriki byayirima ha busu bwa Nzaambi yaami .
66003003	Hango nkuumbu , baambuka mwooyo mu bu wataambula na bu wayukila , kebe na yiinga dyeele . Mbuti wahele kuba naana , sa nyiisa bunu ngaa-kwiibi , na wuyaaba ko mu nkya kilookolo me nyikwiisa kuri yeenu .
66003004	Kasi bantele ba ye ba ku Saredeyi babviimfiri bilwaatu bya bo . Bo sa badyaata na me , mu bilwaatu byahembeke , bukuri bakuka . »
66003005	« Wuluuluka se sa kaba mu bilwaatu byahembeke , na nyiyaala nkuumbu yaandi mu mukaanda wa mwooyo ko , na sa nyamuteelile kimbaangi ha busu bwa Taata , na ha busu bwa bambasi baandi . »
66003006	« Wuri na makutu , kayuka ma dzoonso Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! »
66003007	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya Filadelefya : « Wangisi , Wangwanwa , wuri na mafungula ma Davidi , kadzibulaana , wukaanga nde pe , na kakaangaana , wudzibula nde pe , bu kari mu kuleele :
66003008	Me nyaari biyiriki bya ye ; mono , me nyikusuusiri ha busu bwa mweelu wadzibulu , kuri muutu ti mosi ko wakuka mu kukaanga nde ; bukuri ye mwaa-mpinu wuri na dzo , kasi wakebe maampu maami , tumi se wahele kutuna nkuumbu yaami .
66003009	Mono ma nyiyirika me kuri bari mu nzo lukutukunu ya Satana , bakweleele ti bo Bayudayo , kasi bari Bayudayo ko , bukuri bari bangaa-mpya . Me tsa sa kuri ti bo biisa na batsukumina hari miilu mya ye , na kuyaaba ti me nyakutya .
66003010	Mu bukuri ye wakebiri maampu maami mu kifiki , me se sa kebe ye mu ntaangu ya nsindukulu , dziyelemini kutubuka mu nsi yoyinso ya baatu , mu kusindukila babo badzakala mu nsi .
66003011	Me nyikwiisa mu mawasu : kwaata na keketee bi wuri na byo , mpisi heki muutu kahele kuholo mpu yaaku ya ndulukulu . »
66003012	« Kuri wunde wuluuluka , me nsa nyamusa kuunsi dya mu Nzo ya Nzaambi yaami , na kabweese kupala ko , na me nsa ntina nkuumbu ya Nzaambi yaami ha yulu nde , na nkuumbu ya bvula dya Nzaambi yaami , Yerusalemi dyamoono , disunduka mu yulu , kuri Nzaambi yaami , na nkuumbu yaami yamoono . »
66003013	« Wuri na makutu , kayuka ma dzoonso Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! »
66003014	Tina kuri mbasi ya dibuundu dya ku Lahodikya : « Amene , mbaangi yakwiikama na yangwanwa , mbandukulu byobinso bya yirika Nzaambi bu kari mu kuleele :
66003015	Me nyikuyaari mu biyiriki byaaku ; ye wahele kyoosi , wahele se mbaawu ; habee kwaandi ba ti kyoosi bunu pe mbaawu !
66003016	Ngo bukuri , ye wuri kyeele , wahele mbaawu , na wahele se kyoosi , me nyeki kulobolo ye mu munwa waami .
66003017	Bukuri ye wuri mu kweleele ti : " Me nyiri kisina , mwaabaka busina , nyahele na nzala kitotolo ti kimosi " . Ngo ye wahele kuyaaba ti ye wuri ngaa-manyoongi , wa kubakila ngebe , wuri muwelu , ye wafwa miisu na wuri mpene .
66003018	Ndoongi yi nyikuha , yiri ti suumba woolo dyatsyeemusu mu mbaawu kuri me , mpisi heki ye ba kisina , suumba binkuta byahembeke , wubilwaata mpisi sweeke nsoni dza kimpene kyaaku ; suumba se mukelu wa kutsoniso mu miisu mpisi ye mono .
66003019	Me nyiŋaŋanaa na nyiseembaa bobanso bari nyibatiiri ; mu didyo , ba na kuheme na yiinga madyeele .
66003020	Mono , me nyateleme ha mweelu na nyikomboto ; mbuti muutu yukiri mbeembu yaami , na dzibiri mweelu , me nsa nkoto mu nzo yaandi , nsa dya na nde , na nde sa kadya na me . »
66003021	« Wunde wuluuluka , me nsa nyamudzakisa kintwaari na me ha mboloko yaami , bunu buri me se nyalulukiri , na nyadzakala kintwaari na Taata , ha mboloko yaandi . »
66003022	« Wuri na makutu , kayuka ma dzoonso Mpeeve kuri mabuundu ! »
66004001	Ha mambisa haho , me nyamono mweelu wadzibulu ku mayulu . Mbeembu yatete yi nyayukiri , yaba dzoonso kuri me , bunu mvumvuri , yaleele ti : « Nwaata hamaha , me nyikusoongo mamo mayirima ha lumbisa . »
66004002	Mu kilookolo kinikyo , Mpeeve yambaka , na nyamono mboloko ku yulu , na ha yulu mboloko muutu mosi waba wadzakala .
66004003	Wunde waba wadzakala , waba semaana bunu matari mantalu ma baleelaa ti yasipi na sardyoni , na mboloko yaba yadyeengukulu mu mungongolo , waba semaana bunu tari dya samaragado .
66004004	Mu teteke dya mboloko , mwaba makuumi moolo na mana ma mamboloko , na ha yulu mo binuni makuumi moolo na bina byaba byadzakala , byalwaata binkuta byahembeke na nkoongolo dzawoolo mu yulu mitu .
66004005	Mu mboloko mwaba palaana manseremi , mambeembu , na manzasi . Ha mankula ma mboloko , miinda nsaamu myaba lulukaana mu mbaawu , mamo ngo mampeeve nsaamu ma Nzaambi .
66004006	Ha mankula ma mboloko , kwaba mubu waba semaana bunu lumweenye , luri lo , biri mpele na mpele bimonokono . Ha kakati dya mboloko , na mu teteke , mwaba bibulu bina byaluula mu miisu ku mankula na ku mambisa .
66004007	Kibulu kyatete kyaba kyafwanikina na nkosi , kyabyoolo kyafwanikina na mwaa-mutwaala ngoombo wa mulumi , kyabitatu kyaba na kidziri kya muutu , na kyabina kyafwanikina na ngo-noni yiri mu kuyooko ku yulu .
66004008	Mpisi kibulu mu byobina , kyaba na mapaapu masaamunu , maluula mu miisu mpele na mpele . Butsuku na mwiini byo biri mu kuleelaana kwahele kuwuuma ti : « Wangisi , Wangisi , Wangisi , Mfumu Nzaambi , Mwa-mpuungu , waba , wuri na wukwiisa . »
66004009	Na mu mpisi ntaangu , yiri bibulu bibyo biha nkeembu , lukiinsu na matoondo kuri wunde wadzakala ha yulu mboloko , wuri mwooyo mu bibvu ngo bibvu ,
66004010	lo makuumi mana ma binuni , bayilimini ha busu bwa wunde , wadzakala ha yulu mboloko , basaambiri wunde wuri mwooyo mu bibvu ngo bibvu , na batubiri nkoongolo dza bo ha mankula ma mboloko , na baleeriri ti :
66004011	« Ye Mfumu na Nzaambi yeetu , wayelemene mu kutaambula nkeembu , lukiinsu na mpinu , bukuri ye wayirika bitotolo byobinso , na mu kutya kwa ye , byo byaba , na biri byayiriku . »
66005001	Me nyamono ha kooko , kwa lubakala kwa wunde waba wadzakala ha mboloko , mukaanda watinu mbisa na mbisa , wakaangu mu binyemu nsaamu .
66005002	Nyamono mbasi yamakwa yaba bikisaana mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Na wayelemene mu kudzibula mukaanda , na mu kunyanguna binyemu byaandi ? »
66005003	Ngo kuri muutu ti mosi ko ku yulu , ha butoto na ku nsuku butoto waba wakuka mu kudzibula mukaanda , na kutala kunsa-kati .
66005004	Me nyadila kwalaka , bukuri kwasii bakama muutu ti mosi ko , waba wayelemene mu kudzibula mukaanda , na kutala kunsa-kati .
66005005	Ngo mosi mu binuni waleele kuri me ti : « Yaa dila ko ! Mono nkosi ya kaanda dya Yuda , yapalila mu Davidi , nde waluuluka , wakuka mu kudzibula mukaanda , na binyemu nsaamu byaandi . »
66005006	Me nyamono Mwaana kimeeme , wuri bunu wu bari bakeke , wateleme ha kakati dya mboloko , ha kakati dya bibulu bina , na ha kakati dya binuni . Nde waba na mampoko nsaamu , na miisu nsaamu , mamo mampeeve nsaamu ma Nzaambi , ma kari kaheeke mu nsi yansiina .
66005007	Mwaana kimeeme wayisa , na waholo mukaanda , ha kooko kwa lubakala kwa wunde waba wadzakala ha mboloko .
66005008	Bu kaholo mukaanda , bibulu byobina na binuni makuumi moolo na bina , byayilima ha busu bwa Mwaana kimeeme . Mpisi kinuni kyaba na ngoomfi , na mambasa mawoolo maluula mu mananaasi , dzidzo ngo nsaambulu dza bangisi .
66005009	Baba yimbilaana mukuunga wamoono ti : « Ye wayelemene kuholo mukaanda , na kudzibula binyemu byaandi , bukuri ye bakukekiri , na mu makila maaku , ye wakuula baatu mu ntoono Nzaambi , ba bitsuumbu byobinso , mandiinga momanso , baatu bobanso , na makaanda momanso .
66005010	Mu ntoono Nzaambi yeetu , ye wasa bo kimfumu na bangaanga-nzaambi , na bo sa batuma ha butoto . »
66005011	Me nyamono , na nyayuka mbeembu ya fundu-fundu ya bambasi badyengekele mboloko , bibulu na binuni . Lutaangu lwa bo lwaba byaasi mu byaasi na mafuunda ku kifuunda ,
66005012	baba bikisa mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Mwaana kimeeme wu bari bakeke wayelemene mu kutaambula mpinu , busina , madyeele na makwa , lukiinsu , nkeembu na ndumusu . »
66005013	Biyiriki byobinso biri ku yulu , biri ha butoto , biri ku nsuku butoto , biri mu mubu na byobinso biri mu mo , me nyayuka bibikisa ti : « Kuri wunde wadzakala ha mboloko , na kuri Mwaana kimeeme kuba ndumusu , lukiinsu , nkeembu na makwa mu mibvu ngo mibvu . »
66005014	Na bibulu byobina byaba taambulaa ti : « Amene ! » Na binuni byayilima na byasaambila .
66006001	Me nyamono , haba dzibula Mwaana kimeeme kinyemu kyatete , mu byo nsaamu , na nyayuka kimosi mu bibulu byobina , kyaleele mu mbeembu yiri bunu nzasi ti : « Wasa ! »
66006002	Me nyamono kavaalu dyahembeke . Wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu dyo , waba wakwaata buta bwa nsyaari ; nde bamuha lukoongolo , na wayende bunu muutu waluuluka , mu kweeluuluka .
66006003	Ha kaba dzibula nde kinyemu kyabyoolo , me nyayuka kibulu kyabyoolo kileele ti : « Wasa ! »
66006004	Kavaalu dikimi dyabeenge bunu mbaawu , dyapala . Wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu dyo , bamuha makwa ma kuyisila kiyeengi ha butoto ; mpisi heki baatu bekekesene bo na bo . Nde bamuha mbeesi yayila yayinene .
66006005	Ha kaba dzibula kinyemu kyabitatu , me nyayuka kibulu kyabitatu kileele ti : « Wasa ! » Me nyamono kavaalu dyapiinda . Wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu dyo , waba na kipeesulu ha kooko kwaandi .
66006006	Me nyayuka bunu mbeembu , yaba palilaa ha kakati dya bibulu byobina yaleele ti : « Mutooto masaangu nkama mipata , mitooto mitatu mya bwaangala nkama mipata ; ngo mu mitariri maasi na malu yaa wubibibiiyisa ko . »
66006007	Ha kaba dzibula kinyemu kyabina , me nyayuka kibulu kyabina kileele ti : « Wasa ! »
66006008	Me nyamono kavaalu dya ntiinta ya maampa ma nsaka . Wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu dyo nkuumbu yaandi lufwa , na nsi ya bafwa yaba kwemunama . Baha kuri bo lutumu mu kibari kimosi , mu bibari bina bya butoto , mpisi badzusila baatu mu mbeesi yayila , mu nzala , mu lufwa na mu bibulu byansisi biri ha butoto .
66006009	Ha kaba dzibula kinyemu kyabitaanu , me nyamono ku nsuku dziku , miheebulu mya babo babakekiri mu ntoono maampu ma Nzaambi , na mu ntoono kimbaangi ki bari baleele .
66006010	Bo babikisa mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Natee kya ntaangu , Mfumu yangisi na yangwanwa , ye wukiinga mu kutsuundisa bari ha butoto , na kubvutula kitete mu makila ma beetu ? »
66006011	Kuri mosi-mosi mu bo , bayakisa dzweele dyahembeke , na babaleele ti , bakiinga mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele , natee kukuka lutaangu lwa bambaasi ba bo , bari mu bunkutu , na bampaangi ba bo baba badzusu bunu bo .
66006012	Ha kaba dzibula kinyemu kyabisaamunu , me nyamono , butoto bwaningina mu makwa ; ntaangu yaba yeki yapiinda bunu nsaanda yapiipi ; na ngoondo yoyinso yaba yeki bunu makila .
66006013	Bambwetete baba ku yulu basonoko ha butoto , bunu busononaa mungenge bimbutu byaandi byankaaka , habaanaa kiteembu kya makwa , kiri mu kumuningisa .
66006014	Yulu dyadziimbila bunu mukaanda wu bafutukiri , milaandu myominso na bibuma bya butoto , babiyisila mu bibeendu byaaku .
66006015	Bambyaasi ba butoto , baatu ba lukiinsu , bakuutu ba bayongolo , bisina , bangaa-mpinu , na bobanso bari bankutu , na baatu bari na bunsaalisi , basweeme kunsa miduku na kunsa matari ma milaandu .
66006016	Bo baleele kuri milaandu na kuri matari : « Bweeneenu ha yulu beetu , na tusweekeenu ha busu bwa wunde wadzakala ha yulu mboloko , na ha busu bwa nkesi dza Mwaana kimeeme ,
66006017	bukuri , kiluumbu kyakinene kya nkesi dza bo kimwaatubuka , na wakuka mu kuteleme ? »
66007001	Ha mambisa haho , me nyamono bambasi bana , baba bateleme mu manto ma butoto momana , bo baba bakaanga biteembu bina bya butoto , mpisi heki kiteembu kihele kuluta ha butoto , ha yulu mubu na ha yulu muti ti mosi .
66007002	Na me nyamono mbasi yikimi , yaba naaka ku mpele ya este , yaba yakwaata kinyemu kya Nzaambi yamwooyo . Nde wabikisa mu mbeembu yayinene kuri bambasi bobana , ba bari baloombo mu kumonoso butoto na mubu mpasi ,
66007003	yaleele ti : « Yaa lumonoso butoto , mubu , na miti mpasi ko , natee ku tumana kusa beetu binyemu , mu mambuunsu ma bisari bya Nzaambi yeetu . »
66007004	Me nyayuka lutaangu lwa babo ba basiiri binyemu : nkama na makuumi mana na mana ma mafuunda , ma ba basiiri binyemu mu mpisi kaanda dya baala ba Isaheli :
66007005	mu kaanda dya Yuda , mafuunda kuumi na moolo ma baatu bari basa binyemu ; mu kaanda dya Lubene mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Ngada mafuunda kuumi na moolo ;
66007006	mu kaanda dya Asere mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Nefetali mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Manase mafuunda kuumi na moolo ;
66007007	mu kaanda dya Simehoni mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Levi mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Isakara mafuunda kuumi na moolo ;
66007008	mu kaanda dya Dzabuloni mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Yosefi mafuunda kuumi na moolo ; mu kaanda dya Benyamini mafuunda kuumi na moolo ma ba basiiri binyemu .
66007009	Ha mambisa haho , me nyatala na nyamono mpuumbu baatu yayinene , yiri muutu ti mosi lo wahele kubangisina kutaanga , baatu ba mansi momanso , ba bitsuumbu byobinso , ba makaanda , na ba mandiinga momanso , baba bateleme ha busu bwa mboloko , na ha busu bwa Mwaana kimeeme , baba balwaata madzweele mahembeke na bakwaata matsweenyi mu myooko .
66007010	Bo baba bikisaa mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Mvuukulu yiri na Nzaambi yeetu , yadzakala ha mboloko , na yiri na Mwaana kimeeme ! »
66007011	Bambasi bobanso baba badyengekele mboloko , binuni na bibulu byobina ; bo bayilimisa mabusu maaku ha nsi , na basaambila Nzaambi ,
66007012	baleele ti : « Amene ! Kuri Nzaambi yeetu , kuba ndumusu , nkeembu , madyeele , matoondo , lukiinsu , mpinu na makwa mu bibvu ngo bibvu ! Amene . »
66007013	Mosi mu binuni wafuula kuri me ti : « Balwaata madzweele mahembeke bamaba ba na , na kuri bafumuni ? »
66007014	Me nyaleele kuri nde ti : « Mfumu yaami , ye yaari . » Nde waleele kuri me ti : « Bamaba ngo bamwiini mpasi dzalaka , baswaakiri madzweele maaku , na bahembikisi mo mu makila ma Mwaana kimeeme .
66007015	Mu didyo bo bari ha busu bwa mboloko ya Nzaambi , na bari mu kumusaambila butsuku na mwiini mu Nzo-nzaambi yaandi . Wunde wadzakala ha mboloko , sa kabafuka kunsa musaampu waandi .
66007016	Bo ka babweese kumono nzala ko , ka babweese kubaka mpwiisu ko , ka babweese kumono mwiini ko , na ka babweese kumono nzunuku ko ,
66007017	bukuri Mwaana kimeeme wuri ha kakati dya mboloko , sa kabatwaalisa na sa kabanata ku bidzinga bya maampa mamwooyo , na Nzaambi sa kayaala mansangasa momanso mu miisu mya bo . »
66008001	Ha kadziburi nde kinyemu kyansaamu , mayulu mawura lusuku , kampe mu kitinu kya kilookolo kimosi .
66008002	Me nyamono bambasi bo nsaamu , bateleme ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na babaha mamvumvuri nsaamu .
66008003	Mbasi yikimi yayisa na yateleme ha dziku , na yaba yakwaata kiyokolo kya mananaasi kyawoolo . Nde bamuyakisa mananaasi malaka , mpisi heki kaha mo mu kikabu , na nsaambulu dza bobanso bangisi , ha yulu dziku dyawoolo , diri ha busu bwa mboloko .
66008004	Ha kooko kwa mbasi , mwiisi mananaasi wutoomboko ha busu bwa Nzaambi , na nsaambulu dza bangisi .
66008005	Mbasi yaholo kiyokolo kya mananaasi , waluulusa kyo mu mbaawu dziku , na watubu kyo ha butoto ; manzasi , mambeembu , manseremi na ningununu butoto byasalama .
66008006	Bambasi bo nsaamu , baba na mamvumvuri nsaamu bayirima mu kumasika .
66008007	Mbasi yatete yasika mvumvuri ; bvula ya mindiingi yabvuuta na mbaawu na makila yanoko ha butoto . Kibari kya butoto kimosi mu bitatu kyanyeenge , ndaambu miti mosi mu mandaambu matatu yanyeenge , na bitiiti byobinso bya maampa byanyeenge .
66008008	Mbasi yaboolo yasika mvumvuri , kitotolo kiri bunu mulaandu wamunene wa mbaawu kikweluluka , bakituba mu mubu . Kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya mubu kyakituka makila ,
66008009	ndaambu mosi mu mandaambu matatu , ma bibulu byamwooyo bya mu mubu , yawa kufwa , na ndaambu mosi mu mandaambu matatu ma mabwaatu , yawa kutsyaamuka .
66008010	Mbasi yabatatu yasika mvumvuri , mbwetete mosi yayinene yikweluluka bunu kyufu kya mbaawu , yanangukina ku yulu , yasonoko na yabwa , ha yulu kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya manyari , na mu bidzinga bya maampa .
66008011	Mbwetete yiyo nkuumbu nkari . Kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya maampa kyaba kyeki nkari , na baatu balaka bafwa mu maampa mamo , bukuri maba meki nkari .
66008012	Mbasi yabana yasika mvumvuri , kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya ntaangu , kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya ngoondo , na kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya bambwetete babiseembe , kuri heki kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya byo kiba mampimbisi , na kibari kimosi mu bibari bitatu bya mwiini na bya butsuku kihele kuba kunsa buungi .
66008013	Me nyamono na nyayuka , ngo-noni yaba yooko ku nkati-yulu , yileele mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Kyaari ! Kyaari ! Kyaari kuri baatu ha butoto , mu ntoono lusuku lukimi lwa mamvumvuri ma bweese kusika bambasi batatu ! »
66009001	Mbasi yabataanu yasika mvumvuri , na me nyamono mbwetete , yanangukina ku yulu , yibwiiri ha butoto , baha mbwetete yiyo fungula dya bulu dya lubila ,
66009002	na yadzibula bulu dya lubila . Mwiisi watoomboko mu bulu , wuri bunu mwiisi wa dziku dya mbaawu dyadinene . Mwiisi bulu wasa kuri ti ntaangu na maheembele biba mampimbisi .
66009003	Mu mwiisi mwaapala bambambala ha butoto , baha kuri mo miswa miri bunu mya bangeenge ba ha butoto .
66009004	Badika bambambala kukwaamisa bitiiti biri ha butoto , makaya mankaaka na miti , ngo bakwaamisa bani baatu bahele na kinyemu kya Nzaambi mu mambuunsu .
66009005	Babadika kudzusa baatu babo , ngo kasi bababamisa mu mangoondo mataanu ; kubama kwa bo , lo bunu bu bamonaa muutu , wuri ngeenge yimutatikiri .
66009006	Mu biluumbu bibyo , baatu sa basaka lufwa , ngo ka badzuukila lwo ko . Sa baba na nzala kufwa , ngo lufwa sa lwayitika la na bo .
66009007	Bambambala babo , baba bafwanikina na makavaalu , meki mayirima mu kweende ku mudziingu ; mu mitu mya bo , mwaba mwateeteke nkoongolo dziri bunu dzawoolo , na bidziri bya bo byaba bunu bya baatu ,
66009008	mfu dza bo dzaba bunu mfu dza bakyeetu , miinu mya bo myaba bunu mya bankosi ,
66009009	baba na binkuta bya mu ntulu , bya mukaanda kibulu , bunu binkuta byabiseengu , lusuku lwa mapaapu ma bo , lwaba bunu lusuku lwa kikokolo kya makavaalu malaka , mari mu kudzumuna mu mudziingu .
66009010	Mikila mya bo , myaba myafwanikina na mya bangeenge , miri na biba ; na mu mikila mya bo mwaba misya , miri lo mibamisini baatu mu mangoondo mataanu .
66009011	Mbyaasi bo , ngo mbasi ya lubila ; mu kihebeleho , « Abadoni » , mu kihelene « Apolyoni . »
66009012	Mpasi dzatete dzaluta ; ha mambisa haho , biteesu byoolo bya mpasi , biri mu kubweese kwiisa .
66009013	Mbasi yabasaamunu yasika mvumvuri , na me nyayuka mbeembu , yapalila mu mampoko mana ma dziku dyawoolo , diri ha busu bwa Nzaambi .
66009014	Mbeembu yiyo yaleele kuri mbasi yabasaamunu , yaba na mvumvuri ti : « Nyanguna bambasi bana , ba bari bakaanga mu nyari yayinene , ngo Efarata . »
66009015	Bambasi bobana babanyanguna ; bo baba bayirima mu kilookolo , mu kiluumbu , mu ngoondo , na mu mubvu , mu kudzusa ndaambu mosi , mu mandaambu matatu ma baatu .
66009016	Lutaangu lwa bayongolo baba mu yulu makavaalu , byaasi byoolo bya byaasi na byaasi , me nyiri nyayuka .
66009017	Bubwo me nyamwiini mu mamono-miisu makavaalu , na baba badzakala ha yulu mo , balwaata binkuta bya mu ntulu bya mukaanda kibulu , byabeenge bunu mbaawu , biri na ntiinta ya tari dya safire , na ntiinta ya mfulu dza musaka-nkala . Mitu mya makavaalu , myaba bunu mitu mya bankosi ; mu minwa mya bo , mwaba palaana mbaawu , mwiisi na mfulu dza ntiinta ya musaka-nkala .
66009018	Ndaambu mosi , mu mandaambu matatu ma baatu , yawa kufwa mu bitsuumbu bya mpasi byo bitatu bibyo : mbaawu , mwiisi na mfulu dza ntiinta ya musaka-nkala , byaba palaana mu minwa mya bo .
66009019	Mukwongo , makwa ma makavaalu mari mu minwa myaaku , na mu mikila myaaku . Mikila mya bo , miri na mitu miri bunu mitu mya banyoko , mu myo bakoomonisaa baatu mpasi .
66009020	Baatu babamosi , bari basii fwa mu bitsuumbu bya mpasi dzidzo ko , basii yiinga madyeele ko , mu ntoono biyiriki bya myooko myaaku , kuri bahotiri kusaambila mampeeve mamabi , na biteki bya woolo , bya palata , bya nsoongo , bya matari na bya miti , biri byamona ko , byayuka ko , na bikookweyendaa ko .
66009021	Bo basii yiinga madyeele se ko , mu ntoono ya kwedzusa baatu , kweloko baatu , kwesalila buyala na kweyiba .
66010001	Me nyamono mbasi yikimi , yiri na makwa yanangukina ku yulu , yasunduka , yalwaata tuti , na wuri na mungongolo ha yulu mutu waandi , busu bwaandi bunu ntaangu , na miilu myaandi bunu makuunsi ma mbaawu .
66010002	Wakwaata mu kooko kwaandi , mwaa-mukaanda wantele wadzibulu . Wateeteke kuulu kwaandi kwa lubakala ha yulu mubu , na kwa lumoso wasuusa ha butoto .
66010003	Wafula musaakulu mu mbeembu yayinene bunu nkosi yiwuma . Nde bu kafula , banzasi nsaamu badzoonso .
66010004	Banzasi bo nsaamu bu badzoonso , lo me nyaba nyeki baandika kutina , ngo nyayuka mbeembu mu yulu yaleele ti : « Kebe mamo , ma leeriri banzasi bo nsaamu , na yaa tina mo ko . »
66010005	Mbasi yi nyamwiini yaba yateleme , ha yulu mubu na ha yulu butoto , yanaanguna kooko kwaandi kwa lubakala ku yulu ,
66010006	yaa laba maalu mu nkuumbu ya wunde wuri mwooyo mu bibvu ngo bibvu , wayirika mayulu na byobinso biri mu mo , wayirika butoto na byobinso biri mu bwo , wayirika mubu na byobinso biri mu nde . « Ku sii ntaangu ko .
66010007	Ngo mu biluumbu bisika mbasi yansaamu mvumvuri , mpaanu dza Nzaambi sa dzayirima , bunu bu kayaabisiri dyo kuri bisari byaandi , babikiri . »
66010008	Mbeembu yi nyayukiri ku yulu , yabweese kudzoonso kuri me yaleele ti : « Yende weholo mukaanda wadzibulu , wuri ha kooko kwa mbasi yateleme , ha yulu mubu na ha yulu butoto . »
66010009	Me nyayende kuri mbasi na nyaleele kuri nde ti , ha me mukaanda wantele . Nde wandeele ti : « Holo na mudya , sa kasa midya mya ye nkari , ngo kasi mu munwa waaku sa kaba wadzuuna bunu maasi ma nyosi . »
66010010	Me nyaholo mukaanda wantele , mu kooko kwa mbasi , na nyamudya , waba mu munwa waami wadzuuna bunu maasi ma nyosi , na bu nyamana kumudya , midya myaami myaba myeki nkari .
66010011	Baleele kuri me ti : « Ye yelemini kubikula lukimi mu baatu , mu makaanda , mu mandiinga na mu bambyaasi balaka . »
66011001	Bayakisa me dyaari diri bunu luboto , bandeele ti : « Teleme , teese Nzo-nzaambi na dziku , na babo bakoosaambikilaa mumwo .
66011002	Mbasi Nzo-nzaambi ngo yiri , hemese kwaandi , yaa teese ko , bukuri bayeki bayiha kuri makaanda . Mo sa madzabata bvula dyangisi mu mangoondo makuumi mana na moolo .
66011003	Me sa nyaha miswa kuri bambaangi baami boboolo , mu kubikula mu fuunda dimosi nkama dzoolo na makuumi masaamunu ma biluumbu kuri balwaata matsaaka . »
66011004	Bo ngo miti myomyoolo mya olive , na bitetukulu bya miinda byobyoolo biri ha busu bwa Mfumu .
66011005	Mbuti muutu tiiri kubasa bubi , lo mbaawu yipariri mu minwa mya bo , na yinyeengisini bataatu ba bo ; mpisi wutiiri kubasa bubi , lo bubwo kafwiila .
66011006	Bambaangi babo bari na lutumu lwa kukaanga yulu , mpisi mvula yihele kunoko , mu biluumbu bya babikula bo . Bari na lutumu se lwa kukitula maampa kuri meki makila , na lwa kuseembe butoto , mu mpasi dza bitsuumbu-bitsuumbu , bunu bu batiiriri bo .
66011007	Mu ntaangu yi bamana kuta kimbaangi kya bo , kibulu kitoomboko mu lubila , sa kaba bwisikila mudziingu , sa kababwiisa na kabadzusa .
66011008	Bamvuumbi ba bo sa baba ha kibeendu kya bvula dyadinene , di bateela mu kimpeeve Sodoma na Ngipiti , haho habakomini Mfumu bo .
66011009	Baatu ba mpisi kaanda , kitsuumbu , ndiinga na nsi , sa bamono bamvuumbi ba bo , mu biluumbu bitatu na ndaambu , na bataambula ko ti , badziika bamvuumbi ba bo ku mampeembe .
66011010	Baatu bari ha butoto , bari mu kumono kiminu mu ntoono bo , na bari mu kiminu , sa bahelesene bikabu kuri bo na bo , bukuri babikiri boboolo babo , bakwaamisini baatu badzakala ha butoto .
66011011	Ha mambisa ma biluumbu bitatu na ndaambu , muwuumunu wa mwooyo wa Nzaambi wakoto mu bo , na bo bateleme ; babo baba bamono , babaka boomo bwalaka .
66011012	Babikiri babo bayuka mbeembu yayinene ku yulu yaleele kuri bo ti : « Nwaatee hamaha . » Bo banwaata ku yulu mu tuti , na bataatu baaku babamono .
66011013	Mu kilookolo kinikyo , butoto bwaningina mu makwa , na kibari kimosi mu bibari kuumi bya bvula kyabwa , na mafuunda nsaamu ma baatu mafwa mu ningununu butoto yiyo . Babo babvuukiri babaka boomo bwalaka , na baha nkeembu kuri Nzaambi ya ku yulu .
66011014	Mpasi dza kiteesu kyabyoolo dzaluta . Mono , mpasi dza kiteesu kyabitatu dziri mu kwiisa mu mawasu .
66011015	Mbasi yansaamu yasika mvumvuri . Mambeembu mamanene mayukukuna ku yulu maleele ti : « Kimfumu kya nsi kyeki kuri Mfumu yeetu , na kuri Kiristo dyaandi . Nde sa katuma mu bibvu ngo bibvu . »
66011016	Makuumi moolo na mana ma binuni badzakala ha busu bwa Nzaambi , ha yulu mamboloko maaku , bayilimisa mabusu maaku na basaambila Nzaambi ,
66011017	baleele ti : « Mfumu , beetu tubvutula matoondo kuri ye , Mfumu Nzaambi , Mwa-mpuungu , wuri na waba , bukuri ye wasariri mpinu dzaaku dzadzinene , na ye wadzakisa kimfumu kyaaku .
66011018	Makaanda mabaka nkesi , nkesi dza ye dzamonokono , na ntaangu ya kutsuundisa bafwa yitubukiri , ya kuha museendu kuri bisari byaaku , kuri babikiri , kuri bangisi na kuri babvuminaa nkuumbu yaaku , kuri bakuutu na bilesi ; ntaangu ya kutsyaamuna babo bari mu kwetsaamuna butoto ! »
66011019	Nzo-nzaambi yadzibuma ku yulu , sanduku dya lulelusunu lwaandi dyamonoko , mu Nzo-nzaambi yaandi ; manseremi , mambeembu , manzasi , ningununu butoto na mvula ya midiingi ya makwa byasalama .
66012001	Kidiimbu kyakinene kyamonoko ku yulu , mukyeetu mosi walwaata ntaangu , wateleme ha yulu ngoondo , na wuri na lukoongolo lwa bambwetete kuumi na boolo mu mutu waandi .
66012002	Nde wuri na yimi , wuri mu kufulaa , wuri na misoongo na wuri mu kwenyonyomoko mu kubuta .
66012003	Kidiimbu kikimi kyamonoko ku yulu : mono , maŋataŋo mamanene , mabeenge bunu mbaawu , mari na mitu nsaamu na mampoko kuumi , na mu yulu mitu myaandi , muri mampu nsaamu ma lutumu .
66012004	Mukila waandi wakoombolo ndaambu mosi , mu mandaambu matatu ma bambwetete bari ku yulu , na wabatuba ha butoto . Maŋataŋo wateleme ha busu bwa mukyeetu waba weki buta , mpisi heki , kamanaa kubuta , kamumingutina na mwaana .
66012005	Mukyeetu wabuta mwaana wa mubakala , wunde mbasi-tsuku , wutwaalisa makaanda momanso mu luboto lwa kiseengu . Bakitumuna mwaana wunde , bamunata kuri Nzaambi , na kuri mboloko yaandi .
66012006	Mukyeetu wayitika ku nsi yankatu , kwamuyirikila Nzaambi kibeendu , mpisi kaba wadiisulu kukwo , mu fuunda dimosi nkama dzoolo na makuumi masaamunu ma biluumbu .
66012007	Mudziingu wabwa ku yulu , Mikaheli na bambasi baandi banwaana mudziingu na maŋataŋo . Maŋataŋo se na bambasi baandi banwaana mudziingu ,
66012008	ngo kasii kubvula makwa ko , na kwasii bakama kibeendu kya bo ku yulu ko .
66012009	Batuba ha butoto Maŋataŋo mamanene , nyoko yayikulu , yi bateele ti dyabulu na Satana , wunde wudziimbisa nsi yansiina , bamutuba ha butoto , bambasi baandi se babatuba kintwaari na nde .
66012010	Me nyayuka mbeembu yayinene ku yulu yaleele ti : « Mu lumalu mvuukulu , mpinu , kimfumu kya Nzaambi yeetu , na lutumu lwa Kiristo dyaandi bimwaakwiisa , bukuri mufuundisi bampaangi ba beetu , bamwaamutuba , nde wabee kwebafuundana kuri Nzaambi yeetu , butsuku na mwiini .
66012011	Bo bamubwiisiri , mu ntoono makila ma Mwaana kimeeme , na mu ntoono maampu ma kimbaangi kya bo ; bo basii tya kukalila miwuumunu myaaku ha busu bwa lufwa ko .
66012012	Hango-nkuumbu , monee kiminu , mayulu na babo badzakila mu mo ! Mpasi kuri butoto na kuri mubu , bukuri dyabulu mwaasunduka kuri beenu , wuri na nkesi dzamakwa , bu kayaari kuri ti Mwaa-ntaangu yantele kari na yo . »
66012013	Maŋataŋo , wasungumina mukyeetu wabutiri mwaana wa mu bakala , bu kamono ti bamutubiri ha butoto .
66012014	Baha kuri wa mukyeetu mapaapu moolo ma ngo-noni yayinene , mu kuri ti kadumuka mu kweende ku nsi yankatu , ku kibeendu kyaandi , kukwo ku bamudiisila , mu ntaangu mosi , mu mantaangu , na mu ndaambu ntaangu , kuri la na kidziri kya nyoko .
66012015	Nyoko yaluka , mu munwa waandi , maampa mari bunu nyari ha mambisa ma wa mukyeetu , mpisi heki kadyaama mu yo .
66012016	Butoto bwayisa mu kubakisa wa mukyeetu ; bwo bwadzibula munwa waandi , bwamina mu munwa waandi nyari yapariri mu munwa maŋataŋo .
66012017	Maŋataŋo wabakila mukyeetu nkesi , na wayende mu kweesa mudziingu kuri baala ba wa mukyeetu basaala , babo bakebaa mangisi ma Nzaambi , na basimbikila kimbaangi kya Yesu .
66012018	Maŋataŋo , ha kateleme , ha yulu munyeenge wa mubu .
66013001	Me nyamono kibulu kitoomboko mu mubu , kyaba na mampoko kuumi na mitu nsaamu , mu yulu mampoko maandi mo kuumi , mwaba mampu kuumi ma lutumu , na ha yulu mpisi mutu waandi kwaba mankuumbu ma nsaanunu .
66013002	Kibulu ki nyamwiini me , kyaba kyafwanikina na ngo , miilu myaandi myaba bunu miilu mya nzusi , munwa waandi bunu munwa nkosi . Maŋataŋo waha mpinu dzaandi , mboloko yaandi na lutumu lwalunene kuri kibulu kikyo .
66013003	Mosi mu mitu myaandi waba bunu wakeke , kasi mputa yaandi ya mfwiilu yiyo bayibelekese . Butoto bwabutsiina bwakimuka na bwanama kibulu .
66013004	Baatu basaambila maŋataŋo , bukuri nde waheeri lutumu kuri kibulu ; basaambila kibulu na baleele ti : « Na wafwanikina na kibulu , na na wakuka mu kunwaanisa kyo ? »
66013005	Baha kibulu mbeembu mu kusa biwobiri bya masiiku na bya nsaanunu , bamuha lutumu lwa kusala mu lutaangu lwa mangoondo makuumi mana na moolo .
66013006	Kyo kyadzibula munwa mu kusaana Nzaambi , mu kusaana nkuumbu yaandi , musaampu waandi na babo badzakala ku yulu .
66013007	Bakiha miswa mu kunwaanisa bangisi na mu kuluuluka mu bo , bamuha lutumu ha yulu bitsuumbu byobinso , baatu bobanso , mandiinga momanso na makaanda momanso .
66013008	Bobanso badzakala ha butoto , sa basaambila kibulu kikyo ; bobanso bari mankuumbu mahele kutina , mu mukaanda wa mwooyo wa Mwaana kimeeme , wubakekiri , kuholosono kunu mbandukulu nsi .
66013009	« Mbuti muutu wuri na makutu , lo kayuka !
66013010	Mbuti muutu wataasulu mu bunkutu , lo ku bunkutu kakweende . Mbuti muutu wataasulu mu lufwa lwa mbeesi yayila , lo mu mbeesi yayila kafwiila . Haho ngo , ha bamono kifiki na kanyi dya bangisi . »
66013011	Me nyamono kibulu kikimi kyaba pala mu butoto , kyo kyaba na mampoko moolo mari bunu ma mwaana kimeeme , kyaba kwedzoonso bunu maŋataŋo .
66013012	Kyo kyaba kwesalila lutumu lwolunso lwa kibulu kyatete , ha busu bwaandi . Kibulu kikyo kyasa kuri ti butoto na badzakala mu bwo , basaambila kibulu kyatete , kyaba na mputa ya lufwa yabeelekiri .
66013013	Kyo kyasa bimaangu byabinene , kuri lo sundiri mbaawu ya ku yulu ha butoto , ha busu bwa baatu .
66013014	Mu ntoono bimaangu bi bamuheeri miswa mu kuyirika , ha busu bwa kibulu , kyo kikwedziimbisa babo badzakala ha butoto , na kikweleele kuri badzakala ha butoto ti bayirika kiteki , mu kifwaani kya kibulu ki baleti boko mu mbeesi yayila , ngo kiri mwooyo .
66013015	Baha kibulu kyabyoolo kikyo miswa , mu kuha muwuumunu kuri kiteki kya kifwaani kya kibulu kyatete , mpisi kiteki kikyo kidzoonso , na kisa kuri ti badzusa bobanso bari basii saambila kiteki kya kifwaani kya kibulu ko .
66013016	Kyo kyasa momanso mayelemene mpisi heki , bakuutu na bilesi , bisina na bawelu , baatu bari na bunsaalisi na bankutu , babasa kidiimbu mu kooko kwa lubakala , bunu pe ha mbuunsu ,
66013017	mpisi heki muutu kahele kuba na miswa mya kusuumba bunu pe mya kuyarika , mbuti wahele na kidiimbu , na nkuumbu kibulu bunu pe lutaangu lwa nkuumbu kibulu .
66013018	Hamaha ngo ha kusa madyeele . Wuri na madyeele katangimisa lutaangu lwa kibulu , bukuri lutaangu lulwo lutaangu lwa nkuumbu muutu . Lutaangu lwaandi ngo nkama saamunu makuumi masaamunu na bisaamunu .
66014001	Me nyatala , na nyamono Mwaana kimeeme waba wateleme ha yulu mulaandu wa Syoni , na mafuunda kuumi na mana ma baatu babatinini nkuumbu nde na ya taayi dyaandi mu mambuunsu ma bo .
66014002	Me nyayuka mbeembu yanangukina ku yulu bunu kiyomo kya maampa malaka na bunu kidumu kya nzasi yayinene ; mbeembu yi nyayukiri me yaba bunu ya basiki ba ngoomfi bari mu kusika mangoomfi maaku .
66014003	Mafuunda ma baatu babo , baba yimbilaa mukuunga wamoono ha busu bwa mboloko , ha busu bwa bibulu bina na bwa binuni ; kuri muutu ti mosi waba wakuka mu kuyika mukuunga wunde , mbuti ka bari mu nkama makuumi mana ma mafuunda ko , baba kuuriri ha butoto .
66014004	Bamaba ngo babo bari basii kusumuka mu bakyeetu ko , bukuri baba bakiri banswaasa , bamaba ngo bari mu kwenama Mwaana kimeeme kwokunso ku ka kweyende . Bamaba ngo ba bari bakuula ha kakati dya baatu , mintekesele mya Nzaambi na mya Mwaana kimeeme .
66014005	Mu minwa mya bo , kwasii pala dya mpya ko ; bahele na mi baba seembele .
66014006	Me nyamono mbasi yikimi yaba yooko ku nkati yulu , yaba na Musamu Wamubwete wahele manunu , mu kuyaabisa baatu badzakala ha butoto , mansi momanso , bitsuumbu byobinso , mandiinga momanso na baatu bobanso ,
66014007	yikweleele mu mbeembu yayinene ti : « Bvuminee Nzaambi na muheenee nkeembu , bukuri kilookolo ki katsuundisa nde baatu kiisiri ; saambilee wunde wayirika yulu na butoto , mubu na manto ma maampa ! »
66014008	Mbasi yaboolo yanama yatete yaba kweleele ti : « Dibwiiri , dibwiiri , bvula dya Babiloni dyadinene ! » Dyo dyanwiisa mansi Momanso malu ma nkesi dza buyala bwaandi .
66014009	Mbasi yikimi ya batatu yanama boboolo batete , yaleele mu mbeembu yayinene : « Mbuti muutu saambiri kibulu , na kiteki kya kifwaani kya kibulu , na taamburi kidiimbu ha mbuunsu yaandi bunu pe ha yulu kooko kwaandi ,
66014010	lo nde se sa kanwa malu ma nkesi dza Nzaambi , masekele kwahele bisaangi , munsa mbasa ya nkesi dzaandi , nde sa kaba wakwaamusu kunsa mbaawu na mfulu dza ntiinta ya musaka-nkala , ha busu bwa bambasi bangisi na ha busu bwa Mwaana kimeeme .
66014011	Mwiisi wa nkwamusunu bo sa katoomboko , mu bibvu ngo bibvu . Basaambila kibulu na kiteki kya kifwaani kya kibulu ki kyo , na mpisi wunde wutaambula kidiimbu kya nkuumbu yaandi , baba na kidzuunu ko , butsuku na mwiini . »
66014012	Haho ngo , ha bamono kifiki kya bangisi , bakebaa ntumunu dza Nzaambi na kanyi mu Yesu .
66014013	Me nyayuka mbeembu mosi yafumuna ku yulu yileele : « Tina : " Kiminu kuri babo bafwa , bafwiila mu Mfumu , kubaandika lumalu ! " – " Heehe , buleele Mpeeve , bo bawuumaa mu bisalu bya bo , bukuri biyiriki bya bo bikwebanama ! " »
66014014	Me nyatala , na nyamono tuti dyahembeke , na ha yulu dyo , kwaba kwadzakala wafwanikina na mwaana muutu , waba na lukoongolo lwa woolo ha yulu mutu , na mu kooko kwaandi wakwaata kisalulu kyasekusu .
66014015	Mbasi yikimi yapala mu Nzo-nzaambi , yabikisa mu mbeembu yayinene kuri wadzakala ha yulu tuti ti : « Heeke kisalulu kya ye na tolo bikunu , bukuri ntaangu ya ntolulu bikunu yimwaatubuka ; bukuri bikunu bya butoto bimwaayele ! »
66014016	Waba wadzakala ha yulu tuti , watubu kisalulu kyaandi ha nsi , na batolo bikunu ha butoto .
66014017	Mbasi yakaka yapala mu Nzo-nzaambi ya ku yulu , nde se waba wakwaata kisalulu kyasekusu .
66014018	Mbasi yikimi yaba na lutumu mu mbaawu , yapalila ha dziku . Yo yabikisa mu mbeembu yayinene kuri waba na kisalulu kyasekusu ha kooko , yaleele ti : « Laambula kisalulu kyaaku kyasekusu , na kaba binkaangi bya bviinya dya butoto , bukuri bimbutu bwaandi bimwaabeenge . »
66014019	Mbasi yakulula kisalulu kyaandi ha butoto , yakaba bimbutu bya bviinya dya butoto , na wabituba munsa kikamukunu kyakinene kya nkesi dza Nzaambi .
66014020	Bakamuna bimbutu bya bviinya ku mbisa bula , na makila mapala , matubuka natee mu mve ya minwa mya makavaalu , mu kibeensu kya fuunda na nkama saamunu dya bitaki .
66015001	Me nyamono kidiimbu kikimi kyakinene , na kya nkimukunu ku yulu ; bambasi nsaamu baba na biteesu nsaamu bya mpasi bya mpotulu . Mu byo , nkesi dza Nzaambi dziwiila .
66015002	Me nyamono bunu ti mubu wasaanga na mbaawu , wuri mu kuseme bunu lumweenye , babo baluulukiri mu kibulu , mu kiteki kyaandi na mu lutaangu lwa nkuumbu yaandi , baba bateleme ha yulu mubu wuri mu kuseme bunu lumweenye , bari na mangoomfi ma Nzaambi .
66015003	Baba yimbilaana mukuunga Moose , kisari kya Nzaambi , na mukuunga Mwaana kimeeme wuleele ti : « Mfumu Nzaambi Mwa-mpuungu , biyiriki byaaku byabinene , na bya nkimukunu ! Mbyaasi ya makaanda , manzila maaku masuunguma na mari mangwanwa !
66015004	Mfumu , na wunde wuhele kubvumina ye , wuhele kudumusa nkuumbu yaaku ? Bukuri ye kitsu wuri wangisi , makaanda momanso sa miisa ha busu bwaaku na sa makusaambila , bukuri nsundusulu dzaaku dzimwaamonoko . »
66015005	Ha mambisa haho , me nyamono Nzo-nzaambi ku yulu yadzibulu , mwaba musaampu wa kimbaangi ,
66015006	na bambasi bo nsaamu bapala mu Nzo-nzaambi , na biteesu byo nsaamu bya mpasi , baba balwaata binkuta bya ntalu bikweseme , na misweele myawoolo mu ntulu .
66015007	Mosi mu bibulu bina waha kuri bambasi nsaamu , mambasa nsaamu mawoolo maluula mu nkesi dza Nzaambi , yiri mwooyo mu bibvu ngo bibvu .
66015008	Nzo-nzaambi yaba yaluula mu mwiisi munkeembu Nzaambi , na mu mpinu dzaandi ; kuri muutu ko waba wakuka mu kukoto mu Nzo-nzaambi , natee kwawiiri biteesu byo nsaamu , bya mpasi bya bambasi bo nsaamu .
66016001	Me nyayuka mbeembu yayinene yafumuna ku Nzo-nzaambi , yaleele kuri bambasi nsaamu ti : « Yendee na tsaamunee mambasa nsaamu ma nkesi dza Nzaambi ha butoto . »
66016002	Yatete yayende na yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi ha butoto . Munuungu wamubi na wa mpasi wabwiilila baatu baba na kidiimbu kya kibulu na babasaambila kiteki kya kifwaani kya kibulu kikyo .
66016003	Yaboolo yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi mu mubu , mubu wakituka bunu makila ma wafwa ; na byobinso bya mwooyo byaba mu mubu byawa kufwa .
66016004	Yabatatu yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi mu manyari , na mu manto ma maampa , na maampa makituka makila .
66016005	Me nyayuka mbasi ya maampa yaba leele ti : « Ye wuri wasuunguma , wuri , na waba ye wangisi , bukuri ye walalimini bubwo .
66016006	Bo batsaamini makila ma bangisi na ma babikiri , mu didyo ye wubanwiisiri mo ; bubwo bwayelemene mu bo ! »
66016007	Me nyayuka dziku dileele ti : « Heehe , Mfumu , ye Nzaambi mpuungu , nsundusulu dzaaku dziri dzangwanwa na dzasuunguma ! »
66016008	Mbasi yabana yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi ha yulu ntaangu , nde bamuha miswa mya kuyoko baatu mu mbaawu .
66016009	Baatu banyeenge mu nyangala yamakwa . Bo basaana nkuumbu Nzaambi , nde wuri na lutumu mu biteesu bya mpasi bi ; kasi bahele kuyiinga madyeele mu kuha nkeembu kuri nde .
66016010	Mbasi yabataanu yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi ha yulu mboloko ya kibulu . Kimfumu kyaandi kyakoto mampimbisi . Baatu batatika ndima dzaaku mu mpasi .
66016011	Bo basaana Nzaambi ya ku yulu , mu ntoono mpasi dzaaku na minuungu ; kasi bahele kuyiinga madyeele mu biyiriki byaaku .
66016012	Mbasi yabasaamunu yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi mu nyari yayinene ya Efarata ; nde wasikisa maampa ma nyari , mu kudzibula nzila kuri babmbyaasi bafumunaa kupalilaa ntaangu .
66016013	Me nyamono mampeeve matatu masumuka , mari bunu madzuundu , mapala mu munwa maŋataŋo , mu munwa kibulu , na mu munwa babikiri bampya .
66016014	Mukwongo , mampeeve mamabi mari , makwesa bidiimbu , makweyende kuri bambyaasi ba nsi yansiina , mu kubakutukisa , mu ntoono mudziingu , wa kiluumbu kyakinene kya Nzaambi mpuungu .
66016015	« Me nyikwiisa bunu ngaa-kwiibi . Kiminu kiri na muutu wunde wuri naana na wukebaa binkuta byaandi , mpisi kahele kweyende mpene , na baatu bahele kumono nsoni mu nde . »
66016016	Mbasi yabakutukisa ha kibeendu ki baleelaa mu kihebeleho ti , Armangedoni .
66016017	Mbasi yansaamu yatsaamuna mbasa yaandi mu maheembele ; mbeembu yayinene yafumuna ku mboloko ya mu Nzo-nzaambi yayukukuna na yileele ti : « Ma mwaayirima . »
66016018	Kwa bakama manseremi , mambeembu , manzasi na ningununu butoto yayinene , mu kiteesu kiri , kuholosono kwa yeki baatu ha butoto , kwabakimini ningununu butoto yayinene na ya makwa mu kiteesu kya bubwo ko .
66016019	Bvula dyadinene dyakabuka mu bibari bitatu ; mabvula ma mansi mabwa . Nzaambi wabaambuka mwooyo mu Babiloni , bvula dyadinene , mu kudiha mbasa malu ya kabala dya nkesi dzaandi .
66016020	Bibuma byobinso byabata , na milaandu myadziimbila .
66016021	Mvula ya mindiingi myaminene , miri kuleme makuumi matatu mamakilo , yanokono baatu ; bo basaana Nzaambi mu ntoono kiteesu kya mpasi dza mvula ya mindiingi , bukuri kiteesu kya mpasi kikyo , kyaba kyakinene na kyalutila .
66017001	Mosi mu bambasi nsaamu baba bakwaata mambasa nsaamu , wayisa mu kudzoonso na me , waleele ti : « Wasa , me sa nyakusoongo buba nsundusulu kiyala kya mukyeetu kyakinene , kyadzakala ha yulu maampa mamanene ,
66017002	Bambyaasi ba butoto basa buyala na nde , na baatu badzakala ha butoto bakolo malu ma buyala bwaandi . »
66017003	Mbasi yanata me mu kimpeeve ku nsi yankatu . Me nyamono mukyeetu mosi wadzakala ha yulu kibulu kyabeenge , kyaluula mu mankuumbu ma nsaanunu , kyaba na mitu nsaamu na mampoko kuumi .
66017004	Mukyeetu waba walwaata binkuta byabeenge , bikweseme , na bilebete byawoolo , bya matari mantalu na misaanga . Nde waba wakwaata mu kooko kwaandi , mbasa ya woolo yaluula mu mya nsoni na mviindu dza buyala bwaandi ,
66017005	Ha mbuunsu yaandi haba hatina nkuumbu mosi ya nsweeki : « Babiloni dyadinene , nguri biyala na mya nsoni mya ha butoto . »
66017006	Me nyamono mukyeetu wakolo mu makila ma bangisi , na mu makila ma bambaangi ba Yesu . Me nyakimuka mu kiteesu kya makwa ha nyamumwiini .
66017007	Mbasi yaleele kuri me ti : « Mu nki ntoono ye wukimuka ? Me sa nyayaabisa ye mpaanu dza mukyeetu na dza kibulu kiri na mitu nsaamu , na mampoko kuumi , kiri mu kwemunata .
66017008	Kibulu ki wamwiini ye kyaba , ngo kyasaala ko , sa kitoomboko mu lubila , na sa kyeende ku mfukusulu ; baatu badzakala ha butoto , babo bari mankuumbu mahele kutina mu mukaanda wa mwooyo , kuholosono nyirikulu nsi , sa bakimuka ha bamono kibulu , Bukuri kyo kyaba na kyasaala ko , kasi sa kyabweese kumonokono . »
66017009	« Hamaha ha monoko madyeele na nyaabulu . Mitu nsaamu ngo milaandu nsaamu , miri mukyeetu wadzakala ha yulu myo . Mitu mimyo se ngo bambyaasi nsaamu :
66017010	bataanu mu bo babwa , mosi wuri , wakaka wakiri kwiisa pe ; di kakwiisa nde , mwaa-ntaangu yantele kasa .
66017011	Kibulu kyaba , na kiri kyasaala ko , yiyo ngo mbyaasi yampoomo , wuri mosi mu bambyaasi nsaamu na wuri mu kweende ku mfukusulu . »
66017012	« Mampoko kuumi ma wamwii ye , ngo bambyaasi kuumi , bakiri kutaambula pe kimfumu ; kasi sa bataambula lutumu bunu bambyaasi mu kilookolo kimosi , kintwaari na kibulu .
66017013	Bambyaasi bamaba kitsimi kimosi bari na kyo , kya kuha mpinu na lutumu lwa bo kuri kibulu .
66017014	Bo sa basa mudziingu kuri Mwaana kimeeme ; na Mwaana kimeeme sa kababwiisa , bukuri nde wuri Mfumu ya bamfumu , Mbyaasi ya bambyaasi . Nde sa kababwiisa mu kintwaari na ba kari kateele mbila , ba kari kasoolo na bakwiikama mu nde . »
66017015	Mbasi yaleele kuri me ti : « Maampa ma wuri wamoono , madzakikila kiyala kya mukyeetu , ngo baatu , mampuumbu , makaanda na mandiinga .
66017016	Mampoko kuumi ma wuri wamoono na kibulu , sa babele kiyala kya mukyeetu , sa bahosono byobinso bi kari na byo , sa bamusa kimpene , sa badya miswinyi myaandi , na sa bamuyoko ku mbaawu .
66017017	Mukwongo , Nzaambi wasuusa mu mitima mya bo , kitsiimi kya kukukisa kitaasi kyaandi , mu kukukisa kitaasi kyokimosi , na mu kuyakisa kimfumu kya bo kuri kibulu , natee kuri ma leele Nzaambi mayirimini . »
66017018	« Mukyeetu wu wuri wamono ye , ngo bvula dyadinene , diri na kimfumu ha yulu bambyaasi ba ha butoto . »
66018001	Ha mambisa haho , me nyamono mbasi yikimi , yasunduka ku mayulu , yaba na lutumu lwalunene , na butoto bwakoto kunsa buungi bwa munkeembu waandi .
66018002	Yo yafula mu mbeembu yayinene , yaleele ti : « Dibwiiri , dibwiiri , Babiloni dyadinene , dikitukiri kikuundi kya mampeeve mamabi , kibeendu kya mampeeve momanso masumuka , banoni bobanso basumuka , bibulu byobinso byasumuka bi bari babele ,
66018003	bukuri makaanda momanso manwa malu ma nkesi dza buyala bwaandi , na bambyaasi ba ha butoto basa buyala na nde , bangaa-mumbungu bari ha butoto babaka busina mu mpinu dza busina bwa nde . »
66018004	Me nyayuka mbeembu yikimi ku mayulu yaleele ti : « Baatu baami , palee mu bvula di , mpisi luhele kuba ntwaari mu masumu ma dyo , na luhele kutaambula biteesu bya mpasi dza dyo ,
66018005	bukuri masumu ma bvula di matubukiri natee ku yulu , na Nzaambi baambukiri mwooyo mu bubayi bwa dyo .
66018006	Muyirikilee mamabi , ma kari kayirikila bambaasi , na bweeseenu biteesu byoolo bya mamabi maandi ; munsa mbasa yi kari kasaanga , mu saangileenu biteesu byoolo ,
66018007	bunu bu kari kakeembise nyutu yaandi , na bu kari kataanda busina bwaandi , mu moniseenu mpasi na manyoongi , bukuri nde wukweleele kunsa mutima waandi ti : " Me nyadzakala mu bumbyaasi , me nyiri mufwiiri ko , na se nyiri mwiinina mpasi dza kufwiilila ko . "
66018008	Mu ntoono yiyo , biteesu bya mpasi dzaandi , mfwiilu , ngebe dza kufwiila , nzala , sa miisa kuri nde mu kiluumbu kimosi , na nde sa kanyeenge mu mbaawu , bukuri Mfumu Nzaambi wumutsuundisa , wuri ngaa-kwa . »
66018009	Bambyaasi ba ha butoto , baba kwesa buyala na nde , na bataandiri busina bwa bo , sa badila na sa bateeteke myooko ha yulu mutu mu ntoono nde , ha bamono mwiisi mbaawu yi kanyeengine nde ,
66018010	bu bateleme kimamanga , mu ntoono boomo bwa mpasi dza nde , bo sa baleele ti : « Kyaari ! Kyaari ! Kuri bvula dyadinene , Babiloni bvula diri na makwa , bukuri nsundusulu yaaku yitubukiri mu kilookolo kimosi . »
66018011	Bangaa-mumbungu ba ha butoto , bakwedila na bakoto bufwiiri mu nde , bukuri kusii muutu wubweese kusuumba nkaari bo ko :
66018012	nkaari ya woolo , ya palata , ya matari mantalu , ya misaanga , ya mansaanda mamabwete mabeenge , mahembeke , ma mbeengulu ya mbaawu , miti myominso mya mananaasi , bitotolo byobinso byayiriku mu miinu mya nzawu , na bitotolo byobinso byayiriku mu miti myantalu , nsoongo , biseengu na malweende ,
66018013	bi basaanga mu byandya , mamfumfuku , mananaasi , milono , libano , malu , maasi , bifulu bya masaangu , bwaangala , bibulu byabinene , bimeeme , makavaalu , bikokolo , manyutu na miheebulu mya baatu .
66018014	« Bimbutu bi waba tyaanaa ye , byeki la na ye , busina bwobunso , nkeembu yoyinso bidziimbiri ha busu bwa ye , na babweese kubaka bitotolo bibyo ko ! »
66018015	Bakooyarikaa bitotolo bibyo , na ba bakiri busina mu bvula didyo , sa bateleme kimamanga , mu boomo bwa mpasi dzaandi , sa badila na sa bakoto bufwiiri ;
66018016	bo sa baleele ti : « Kyaari ! Kyaari , kuri bvula dyadinene , di balwiikiri mansaanda mamabwete mabeenge , mari mbeengulu bunu mbaawu , di balwikiri bilebete bya woolo , matari mantalu na misaanga ,
66018017	bukuri mu kilookolo kimosi , mburi busina bu bwo budziimbiri ! » Banati ba mabwaatu bobanso , bakweyendaa mu mabwaatu , bisari bya mabwaatu byobinso , na bobanso basala mu mubu , baba bateleme kimamanga ,
66018018	baba fulaana misaakulu , ha bamwiini mwiisi mbaawu yaba nyeengise bvula , bo baleele ti : « Na wafwanikina na bvula dyadinene di ? »
66018019	Baatu batuba fuunda ku yulu mitu mya bo , bafula misaakulu , badila na bakoto bufwiiri , baleele ti : « Kyaari ! Kyaari ! Kuri bvula dyadinene ! Diri bobanso bari na mabwaatu mu mubu , babangukila mu busina bwa dyo , bukuri mu kilookolo kimosi ditsyaamukini . »
66018020	Yulu , mono kiminu mu dyo ! Beenu se bangisi , bantumu na babikiri , monee kiminu , bukuri Nzaambi tsuundisiri dyo mu ntoono bubi bu kaluyirikiri !
66018021	Mbasi yiri na makwa yanaanguna tari , diri bunu tari dyadinene di batuutilaa bitotolo , yatuba dyo mu mubu , na yaleele ti : « Bubwo , mu mbala mosi , balooso Babiloni , bvula dyadinene , na ka ba bweese kudimono ko .
66018022	Ku nzo ye , babweese kuyuka mikuunga mya basiki ba ngoomfi , bayimbiri , basiki ba nseembe , na basiki ba mvumvuri ko . Ku nzo ye , babweese kumono se , muutu wuri na kisalu kya mu myooko , mpisi kyo ko ; na ku nzo ye , kubweese kuyukukuna lusuku lwa tari di batuutilaa bitotolo ko ;
66018023	ku nzo ye , babweese kumono buungi bwa mwiinda ko ; ku nzo ye , babweese kuyuka mambeembu ma munkuula na ntuumba bari mu lulelusunu lwa makweele ko , bukuri bangaa-mumbungu ba ye , babeeri baatu ba lukiinsu butoto , bukuri mu makundu maaku , ye wawumini makaanda momanso . »
66018024	Na mu bvula dya Babiloni , badzuukiri makila ma babikiri , ma bangisi , na ma bobanso ba bari bakeke ha butoto .
66019001	Ha mambisa haho , me nyayuka bunu ti mbeembu yayinene ya mpuumbu baatu yalaka mu mayulu , bari mu kuleele ti : « Aleluya ! Mvuukulu , nkeembu na mpinu bya Nzaambi yeetu !
66019002	Nsundusulu dzaandi dziri dzangwanwa na dzasuunguma ; bukuri nde watsuundisiri kiyala kya mukyeetu kyakinene , kyabee kweebiiyisa butoto mu buyala bwaandi , na wabvutiri kitete kuri kiyala kikyo , mu ntoono makila ma bisari byaandi . »
66019003	Babweese kuleele lwadzoolo ti : « Aleluya ! Mwiisi bvula wuri mu kutoomboko mu bibvu ngo bibvu . »
66019004	Makuumi moolo na bina ma binuni , na bibulu bina byasaambila Nzaambi , wadzakala ha mboloko , byaleele ti : « Amene ! Aleluya ! »
66019005	Mbeembu yapala mu mboloko , yaleele ti : « Siikeenu Nzaambi yeetu , beenu bobanso bisari byaandi , bakoomubvumunaa , bakuutu na bilesi . »
66019006	Me nyayuka bunu ti mbeembu ya mpuumbu baatu yalaka , na bunu ti kiyomo kya maampa mamanene , bunu ti mbeembu ya banzasi ba makwa yabaleele ti : « Aleluya ! Bukuri Mfumu , Nzaambi [ yeetu ] , Mwa-mpuungu wuri mu kutuma !
66019007	Tumoneenu kiminu , tukeembeenu na tumuheenee nkeembu , bukuri nkweelulu Mwaana kimeeme yitubukiri , na mukasi waandi weki wayirima .
66019008	Nde mwaamuha nsaanda yayibwete yikweseme na yatsyeeme mpisi kalwaata . Nsaanda yayibwete yiyo , ngo biyiriki byasuunguma bya bangisi . »
66019009	Mbasi yaleele kuri me ti : « Tina : Kiminu kiri na babo ba bari bateele mbila , mu kudya byandya bya makweele ma Mwaana kimeeme . » Yabweese kuleele kuri me ti : « Mamo ngo Maampu ma Nzaambi mangwanwa . »
66019010	Me nyayilima ha miilu myaandi , mu kumusaambila . Mbasi yaleele kuri me ti : « Yaa sa bubwo ko ; me se kisari nyiri bunu ye , na bunu bampaangi ba ye , bari na kimbaangi kya Yesu . Saambila Nzaambi ! » Mukwongo , kimbaangi kya Yesu ngo mpeeve ya mbikululu .
66019011	Me nyamono yulu dyadzibulu , na kavaalu dyahembeke dyapala , waba wadzakala ha yulu dyo , nkuumbu yaandi wakwiikama na wangwanwa . Nde wutsuundisaa na wunwaanaa mudziingu kunsa nsungumunu .
66019012	Miisu myaandi miri bunu mule mbaawu , na ha yulu mutu waandi , haba mampu ma lutumu malaka . Nde waba na nkuumbu yatinu , yiri muutu ti mosi wahele kuyaaba , ngo wunu nde-meene wuyiyaari .
66019013	Nde waba walwaata kiyuungu kyaluula mu makila . Nkuumbu yaandi « Maampu ma Nzaambi . »
66019014	Mikaangu mya bayongolo ba ku yulu myaba kwemunama mu makavaalu mahembeke , baba balwaata binkuta byabibwe byahembeke na byatsyeeme .
66019015	Mu munwa waandi mwapala mbeesi yayila yasekusu , mpisi heki kaseembe makaanda mu yo . Sa kamatwaalisa mu luboto lwa kiseengu , na nde-meene sa katsyaamuna kisa kya malu ma kabala dya nkesi dza Nzaambi , Mwa-mpuungu .
66019016	Mu kiyuungu na mu kito kyaandi mwatina nkuumbu ti : « Mbyaasi ya bambyaasi , Mfumu ya bamfumu » .
66019017	Me nyamono mbasi mosi yateleme kunsa ntaangu , yabikisa mu mbeembu yayinene , kuri banoni bobanso bakwedumukaa ku nkati-yulu ti : « Waseenu , kutukineenu mu ntoono ndiilu ya yayinene ya Nzaambi ,
66019018	mpisi ludya miswinyi mya bambyaasi , miswinyi mya bakuutu ba bayongolo , miswinyi mya bangaa-makwa , miswinyi mya makavaalu , na mya babo badzakala ha yulu mo , miswinyi mya bobanso : bari na bunsaalisi na bari bankutu , bakuutu na bilesi . »
66019019	Me nyamono kibulu , bambyaasi ba butoto na mikaangu myaaku mya bayongolo , bakutukuna mu kunwaanisa wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu kavaalu , na mukaangu bayongolo waandi .
66019020	Basiimba kibulu kikyo , ha kimosi na mubikiri wampya , waba kweyirikaa bimaangu ha busu bwa kibulu kikyo , mu kwedziimbisa baba na kidiimbu kya kibulu , na baba saambilaana kiteki kyaandi . Bo boolo babatuba bamwooyo ku lubila lwa mbaawu ya mile .
66019021	Babo basiiri , babadzusa mu mbeesi yayila , yaba pala mu munwa wa wunde waba wadzakala ha yulu kavaalu , na banoni bobanso bayukuta mu miswinyi mya bo .
66020001	Me nyamono mbasi mosi yafumuna ku yulu yasunduka , yaba yakwaata fungula dya lubila , na syeene dyadinene ha kooko kwaandi .
66020002	Yo yakwaata maŋataŋo , nyoko yayikulu , yiri dyabulu na Satana , na yamukaanga mu syeene mu fuunda dya mibvu .
66020003	Mbasi yamutuba ku lubila , yakaanga na yasa kinyemu , mpisi heki maŋataŋo kahele kubweese kwewumuna makaanda , natee kukuka fuunda dya mibvu . Ha mambisa haho , bayelemini kumupatula mu mwaa-ntaangu yantele .
66020004	Me nyamono mamboloko , baba badzakala ha yulu mo , babaha lutumu lwa kutsuundisa . Nyamono se miheebulu mya baatu ba bataburi mitu , mu ntoono kimbaangi kya Yesu , na mu ntoono maampu ma Nzaambi , na babo bari basii saambila kibulu na kiteki kyaandi ko , na bari basii taambula bidiimbu mu mambuunsu na mu myooko mya bo ko . Bo bafuluka na batuma kintwaari na Kiristo mu fuunda dya mibvu .
66020005	Bafwa bakaka basii fuluka ko , natee fuunda dya mibvu dikukiri . Yiyo ngo mfulukulu yatete .
